31a2('dul ba): snyed gyon pa byin no/ /me tog phreng rgyud mkhan gyi bu la ni/ gzhon nu rnams kyis so/ /me tog phreng rgyud mkhan gyi mna' ma la ni/ rgyal po'i mna' ma rnams kyis te/ de mthong ba'i chos de
31a3('dul ba): nyid la nor gyi me tog mngon par grub par gyur te/ dbul ba med par gyur to/ /dge slong dag/ ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi me tog phreng rgyud mkhan gang yin pa de ni/ nor can 'di
31a4('dul ba): nyid yin no/ /me tog phreng rgyud mkhan gyi chung ma gang yin pa de ni/ nor can gyi chung ma yin no/ /me tog phreng rgyud mkhan gyi bu gang yin pa de ni/ nor can gyi bu yin no/ /me tog phreng rgyud
31a5('dul ba): mkhan gyi mna' ma gang yin pa de ni/ nor can gyi mna' ma yin te/ 'di dag gis rang sangs rgyas la bya ba byas shing / smon lam btab pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas/
31a6('dul ba): phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes nas/ khyim du lha dang mi'i g.yang babs par gyur to/ /nga'i spyan snga nas kyang bden pa mthong bar byas te/ nga rang sangs rgyas bye ba brgya
31a7('dul ba): stong bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa/ 'di dag gis mnyes par byas kyi/ mi mnyes par ni ma yin no/ /dge slong dag/ de lta bas na/ las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi zhes bya ba nas
31b1('dul ba): brtsam par bya ste/ dge slong dag/ khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o/ /zhes pa'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams lhag par yang mngon par dad
31b2('dul ba): par gyur nas stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang
31b3('dul ba): thabs cig la bdag cag gis dgung zla gsum du na bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman dang yo byad rnams 'bul zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du
31b4('dul ba): gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams la gnang ngo / /de nas yangs pa can gyi khyim bdag dang / bram ze rnams bcom ldan 'das cang mi
31b5('dul ba): gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas stan las langs te dong ngo / /de nas yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis/ de nyid kyi nub mo
31b6('dul ba): nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dag sta gon byas te zhes bya ba nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas/ stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das
31b7('dul ba): kyi spyan sngar 'dug go / zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/
32a1('dul ba): yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so/ /de nyid du nyi ma gnyis sam/
32a2('dul ba): gsum gyi bar du 'das so/ /yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyi 'khor rgya chen po mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung bas/ de rnams kyi nye du dag zas kyi phyir nyi ma re re zhing 'ong bas de dag
32a3('dul ba): gis gtses par gyur nas/ dge slong rnams la smras pa/ 'phags pa dag/ mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung bas/ bdag cag gi nye du dag skrur mchis te/ de rnams la bdag cag gdugs gcig
32a4('dul ba): bzhin stsol bas/ khyed cag dang de rnams la khyab par rngo mi thogs na/ kye 'phags pa dag/ bdag cag gis yo byad rnams dbul gyi/ zhal ta kho na mdzod cig/ dge slong rnams kyis smras
32a5('dul ba): pa| bcom ldan 'das la zhus te bya'o/ /zhes dge slong rnams kyis skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ rjes su gnang ste/
32a6('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyis zhal ta bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis zas kyi zhal ta bya'o zhes gsungs pas/ de rnams kyis zhal ta bya bar brtsams te/ ji tsam na/ steng g.yogs med
32a7('dul ba): par thug pa 'tshed pa'i zhal ta byas pa las/ lhas char phab pas des ma rung bar gyur pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ steng g.yogs
32b1('dul ba): med par btso bar mi bya'o/ /sgo khang dang / khyams su 'tshed par byed pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgo khang dang / khyams su btso bar mi bya'o/ /dge slong dag/ de lta bas na/ rung ba'i
32b2('dul ba): gnas kyi gzhir mi rung ba ni/ bcu po 'di dag ste/ 'di rnams su zas kyi zhal ta mi bya'o/ /bcu gang zhe na/ steng g.yogs med pa dang / sgo khang dang / khyams dang / bsro khang dang / khrus khang dang
32b3('dul ba): rgyal po'i gnas dang / mchod rten gyi gnas dang / mu stegs can gyi gnas dang / khyim bdag gi gnas dang / dge slong ma'i dbyar khang ngo / /gzhi bcu po 'di dag ni/ rung ba ma yin pa'i
32b4('dul ba): gnas kyi gzhi yin te/ de rnams su dge slong gis zas kyi zhal ta mi bya'o/ /zhal ta byed na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /sdom ni/ nad bu can dang zas dag dang / g.yar tshus lhag
32b5('dul ba): pa dag dang yang / /tshal gyi 'bras bu chu skyes dang / /pad+ma'i rtsa dang lug dag go/ gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /mnyan yod na/ dge slong nad bu can zhig yod pas des sman pa la dris pa/
32b6('dul ba): bzhin bzang dag/ kho bo la sman ston cig/ des nad kyi gzhi dris nas smras pa/ 'phags pa/ thug pa gsol cig dang sos par 'gyur ro/ /des smras pa/ bzhin bzang / bcom ldan 'das
32b7('dul ba): kyis ma gnang ngo / /sman pas smras pa/ 'phags pa/ khyod kyi ston pa thugs rje can yin pas/ 'di nyid kyis rkyen byas nas gnang bar 'gyur ba'i gnas yod do/ /des skabs de dge slong rnams
33a1('dul ba): la'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te sman pas thug pa 'thungs shig ces zer
33a2('dul ba): na| sman pas bsgo ba bzhin thug pa btung bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis sman pas bsgo ba bzhin thug pa btung bar bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / de'i
33a3('dul ba): nad g.yog gis thug pa grang mo zhig khyer te byin no/ /de nas sman pa 'ongs nas dris pa/ 'phags pa/ khyod bde 'am/ des smras pa/ bzhin bzang / mi bde'o/ /ci/ khyod kyis thug pa ma gsol
33a4('dul ba): tam/ 'thungs so/ /ci 'dra ba zhig/ grang mo'o/ /'phags pa/ ma legs pa zhig bgyis so/ /sang ni/ dron mo gsol cig/ de nas de'i nad g.yog gis bslangs nas grang mo kho na rnyed
33a5('dul ba): nas/ des de bsros te byin no/ /de nas sman pa 'ongs te de bzhin du dris pa dang / des smras pa/ mi bde'o/ /ci/ thug pa ma gsol tam/ 'thungs so/ /ci 'dra ba zhig/ grang mo zhig bsros
33a6('dul ba): nas so/ /'phags pa/ ma legs pa zhig bgyis so/ /de grang ste bsros pa lags kyi/ sang ni/ rang bzhin gyis dron por mdzod la gsol cig/ de nas de'i nad g.yog gis/ 'bras dang
33a7('dul ba): snod sta gon byas nas/ gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol gyi shing drung zhig tu btso bar brtsams pa las/ de nas khwa'i rtug pas/ de ma rung bar byas pas/ dge slong de phongs par gyur pa'i
33b1('dul ba): skabs de/ dge slong rnams la'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis ni/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ de lta bas na/ rung ba'i gnas bsko bar
33b2('dul ba): bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis rung ba'i gnas bsko bar bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis/ ji 'dra ba dang ji tsam pa ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rung
33b3('dul ba): ba'i gnas lnga ste/ rtsom pa'i mtha' can dang / sems gtod pa'i mtha' can dang / ba nyal ba lta bu dang / stong pa'i gnas dang / bskos pa'o/ /de la rtsom pa'i mtha' can ni/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong
33b4('dul ba): lag gi blas gnas rtsom pa na/ der thog mar gzhi 'di ni/ dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su 'gyur ro/ /zhes sems bskyed cing tshig tu smras pa ste/ 'di ni/ rung ba'i gnas rtsom pa'i mtha' can zhes
33b5('dul ba): bya'o/ /sems gtod pa'i mtha' can gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong lag gi blas der thog mar rdo ba 'deg pa na/ nye 'khor gyi dge slong rnams la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag/ gzhi 'di ni/ dge
33b6('dul ba): 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su 'gyur bar nges par zungs shig/ nges par zungs shig ces bya ba ste/ 'di ni/ sems gtod pa'i mtha' can zhes bya'o/ /ba nyal ba lta bu gang zhe na/ gang la sgo tha dad
33b7('dul ba): par gses pa ste/ 'di ni/ ba nyal ba lta bu zhes bya'o/ /gnas stong pa gang zhe na/ spangs pa'i gnas te/ 'di ni/ gnas stong pa zhes bya'o/ /bskos pa gang zhe na/ gsol ba dang gnyis kyi
34a1('dul ba): las kyis bskos pa'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis ji ltar bsko ba ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas gang zhig thams cad zin par byas pa/
34a2('dul ba): nang mtshams dang / phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa la/ dge 'dun gyis 'dod na de bsko bar bya'o/ /bsko ba yang 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bshams la/ gaN+DI brdungs te
34a3('dul ba): dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/ dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa dang / dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/ /dge 'dun btsun
34a4('dul ba): pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gnas thams cad lags pa/ nang mtshams dang / phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di/ dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bsko na/ gal te dge 'dun
34a5('dul ba): gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyi gnas thams cad lags pa/ nang mtshams dang / phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di/
34a6('dul ba): dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bsko'o/ /'di ni/ gsol pa'o/ /las ni/ 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gnas thams cad lags pa/ nang mtshams dang /
34a7('dul ba): phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di/ dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bsko bar bzhed de/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis gnas thams cad lags pa/ nang mtshams dang / phyi
34b1('dul ba): rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di/ dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bsko na/ tshe dang ldan pa rnams las/ gang dag/ gnas thams cad lags pa/ nang tshams dang / phyi rol nye 'khor
34b2('dul ba): 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di/ dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni/ cang ma gsungs shig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni/ gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing
34b3('dul ba): gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis gnas thams cad bgyis lags pa/ nang mtshams dang / phyi rol nye 'khor 'dom gang dang bcas pa 'di/ dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bskos lags te/ 'di
34b4('dul ba): ltar cang mi gsung pas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /gang du dge 'dun gyi rung ba'i gnas su bskos pa der/ gnyis skabs dbye ste/ mtshams kyi nang du btsos pa dang / mtshams kyi nang du zhag lon
34b5('dul ba): pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can gyi spre'u rdzing gi 'gram na khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na bzhugs so/ /yangs pa can na sde dpon seng ge zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ de'i nyen
34b6('dul ba): kor na gnas pa rnams kyis/ de'i tshe ched du sha khyer te 'ongs nas/ de yang za bar byed do/ /gang gi tshe des/ bcom ldan 'das las bden pa mthong ba de'i tshe mi za bas/ khyer te 'ongs na yang
34b7('dul ba): dge slong rnams la sbyin par byed do/ /dge slong rnams kyis kyang de dag zos pa dang mu stegs can rnams smod par byed/ gzhogs 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed de/ shes ldan dag/ sde
35a1('dul ba): dpon seng ge'i ched du byas te sha khyer te 'ongs na ni/ des de dag ma zos la/ shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams la byin pa dang / shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams
35a2('dul ba): kyis ched du byas pa'i sha ni/ zos so/ /zhes bya ba'i skabs de dag dge slong rnams kyis bcol ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas gnas gsum
35a3('dul ba): gyis rung ba ma yin pa'i sha bza' bar mi bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa/ gsum gang zhe na/ bdag gi ched du byas par mngon sum du mthong ba/ rung ba ma yin pa'i sha bza' bar mi bya'o/ /
35a4('dul ba): zhes gsungs pa dang / yid ches pa las khyod kyi ched du byas pa yin no/ /zhes thos pa/ rung ba ma yin pa'i sha bza' bar mi bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa dang / rang nyid kyi blo la rnam par
35a5('dul ba): rtog pa skyes pa/ tshul las 'di ni/ bdag gi ched du byas pa yin no/ /snyam du rung ba ma yin pa'i sha bza' bar mi bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa yin no/ /dge slong dag/ ngas gnas
35a6('dul ba): gsum gyis rung ba'i sha bza' bar bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'dis bdag gi ched du byed par mngon sum du ma mthong ba rung ba'i sha bza' bar bya'o/ /zhes
35a7('dul ba): gsungs pa dang / yid ches pa las 'dis khyed kyi ched du byas pa ma yin no/ /zhes thos pa/ rung ba'i sha bza' bar bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa dang / bdag nyid kyi blo la rnam par
35b1('dul ba): rtog skyes pa/ tshul las 'di bdag gi ched du byas pa yin no snyam pa ma skyes pa/ rung ba'i sha bza' bar bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa yin no// //gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan
35b2('dul ba): yod na'o/ /mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung nas/ dge slong dag ltogs par gyur pas de rnams glos phab ste 'dug pa dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa
35b3('dul ba): dag/ gcig tu brtson par bya ba'i bstan pa la/ ci'i slad du glos phab ste bzhugs shing / dge ba'i phyogs la brtson par mi mdzad/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ mu ge dang bcas pa'i
35b4('dul ba): dus byung bas/ bsod snyoms lto 'grangs par mi rnyed pas/ kho bo cag ltogs te nyam chung bas des na glos phab ste 'dug go/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ ci ste zhal tshus mi gsol/
35b5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / /khyod kyi ston pa ni/ thugs rje can yin pas/ gnang bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas de yod do/ /zhes bya ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis
35b6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ de'i phyir rjes su gnang ste/ mu ge'i sdug bsngal dgon pa 'di lta bur dge slong rnams
35b7('dul ba): kyis g.yar tshus bza' bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// //gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung nas/ dge slong rnams la bram ze dang /
36a1('dul ba): khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag/ 'di nyid du zas kyi bya ba mdzod cig/ de rnams kyis zas kyi bya ba byas nas bsod snyoms sngar rnyed
36a2('dul ba): pa khyer nas gtsug lag khang du song ste/ de rnams kyis mu ge'i skyon gyis de yang bza' bar 'dod na/ 'on kyang 'gyod pas ma zos pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das
36a3('dul ba): la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir rjes su gnang ste/ mu ge'i sdug bsngal dgon pa 'di lta bur 'dod na/ sngar blangs zin to snyam du sems la/ sngar
36a4('dul ba): rnyed pa yang bza' bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// //gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung nas/ bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can
36a5('dul ba): rnams kyis/ dge slong rnams khyim gyi nang du zas la mgron du bos nas de rnams kyis zos pa dang / bca' ba las lhag ma zhig lus so/ /bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/
36a6('dul ba): 'phags pa dag /khyed kyi ched du sta gon bgyis pa lags kyi/ bsnams te bzhud la phyis gsol cig/ de rnams kyis khyer te dong ngo / /dong nas de bza' bar 'dod nas 'gyod pas ma zos
36a7('dul ba): pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir rjes su gnang ste/ mu ge'i sdug bsngal dgon pa 'di
36b1('dul ba): lta bur/ 'di dag ni/ byin pa yin no/ /snyam du bsam nas bza' bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// //gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung
36b2('dul ba): nas/ bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis/ dge slong rnams zas la mgron du bos te/ de rnams kyis zos nas/ bca' ba la sogs pa cung zad cig lhag ste/ dge slong rnams dong
36b3('dul ba): ba dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/ 'di ni/ bdag cag gis 'phags pa dag kho na la yongs su btang ba lags te/ 'tshal te mchis la/ khyed kho na la dbul lo zhes de
36b4('dul ba): rnams kyis khyer te 'ongs pa dang / dge slong rnams de la yang za bar 'dod nas 'gyod pas ma zos pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
36b5('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir rjes su gnang ste/ mu ge'i sdug bsngal dgon pa 'di lta bur/ sngar yongs su btang ba'o/ /snyam du bsam nas bza' bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi
36b6('dul ba): bya'o/ / //gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis nub phyogs kyi tshal na yod pa'i 'bras bu rnams grub nas/ de rnams kyis bsam pa/
36b7('dul ba): 'di dag ni/ rnyed dka' ba yin pas/ 'phags pa rnams la dbul lo/ /zhes de dag gis dge slong rnams zas zos nas spangs pa byas pa rnams la de dag byin pa dang / dge slong rnams
37a1('dul ba): kyis spangs pa byas zin to/ /zhes 'gyod pas ma zos pa dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag/ gang gi tshe bcom ldan
37a2('dul ba): 'das 'jig rten du ma byung ba de'i tshe/ mu stegs can rnams la yon gnas bgyid pa las/ da ni/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung nas khyed rnams kyang da ni yon gnas su gyur
37a3('dul ba): pa lags na/ gal te khyed kyis ma bzhes na/ ci/ bdag cag ni/ dge ba'i bshul rgyags dang bral te 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu mchi bar bgyi'am/ de lta bas na/
37a4('dul ba): thugs brtse bas bzhes shig pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir rjes su gnang ste/ rnyed
37a5('dul ba): par dka' ba yin no/ /snyam du bsam nas bza' bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /de la/ tshal na yod pa'i 'bras bu ni/ 'di dag yin te/ rgun 'brum dang / bal po se'u
37a6('dul ba): dang / 'bra go dang / star ka dang / yon tshe dang / shing tog ur ma na dang / shing tog u ru ma yi ka dang / shing tog ni ke tsa dang / shing tog ba b+hu dang / shing tog sin tsi
37a7('dul ba): ka'o/ / //gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis/ dge slong rnams zas zos zin pa dang chu nas skyes pa dag phul
37b1('dul ba): ba dang / dge slong rnams 'dod kyang spangs pa byas zin to/ /zhes 'gyod pas ma zos pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
37b2('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ rnyed dka' ba yin no/ /snyam du bsam nas bza' bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /de la/ chu nas skye ba ni/ 'di dag yin te/ ut+pa la'i rtsa ba dang / pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang /
37b3('dul ba): ku mu da'i sa bon dang / pad+ma'i sa bon no/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu khams ma snyoms pas khrag dang bad kan 'khrugs par gyur to/ /de'i rim gro byed pa tshe
37b4('dul ba): dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos bsam pa/ bdag rang gi blos ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la lan mang du rim gro byas kyi/ lan 'ga' yang sman pa la ma dris kyi/ ma la bdag gis
37b5('dul ba): dri'o snyam nas/ des sman pa la dris pa/ bzhin bzang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu khrag dang bad kan 'khrugs par gyur na/ de'i sman ston cig/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i
37b6('dul ba): 'o ma stsol cig dang sos par 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos bsam pa/ gal te bdag gis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la pad+ma'i rtsa ba phal ba'i 'o mas rim gro bya ba ni/
37b7('dul ba): bdag gi cha ma yin no/ /snyam du bsam nas/ ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag pas mnyan yod nas mi snang bar gyur te dal gyis 'bab ces bya ba'i 'gram du phyin par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i
38a1('dul ba): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / klu'i rgyal po rab brtan gyi gnas dang nye bar gyur pa dang / de nas klu'i rgyal po rab brtan gyis mthong nas smras
38a2('dul ba): pa| 'phags pa/ dgos pa ci zhig gi phyir byon/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu khrag dang bad kan 'khrugs nas/ de la sman pas pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i 'o ma bstan to/ /klu'i
38a3('dul ba): rgyal po rab brtan gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa/ gal te de lta na re zhig gzhes shig/ de dal gyis 'bab kyi nang du zhugs nas mi'i tshad tsam gyi pad+ma'i rtsa ba dag bton cing bton cing /
38a4('dul ba): pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i 'o ma pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i skyo rar gzar nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i lhung bzed bkang ngo / /tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos pad+ma'i rtsa ba gshags
38a5('dul ba): pa la blta bar brtsams pa dang / de nas klu'i rgyal po rab brtan gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa ci gzigs/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba dag gsol bar bzhed dam/ de cang mi smra bar 'dug pa dang /
38a6('dul ba): smras pa/ 'phags pa bzhud cig dang bskur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i 'o mas lhung bzed bkang ba khyer nas dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram
38a7('dul ba): nas mi snang bar byas te mnyan yod kyi rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal/ mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra bar phyin to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus sman pas bstan pa bzhin
38b1('dul ba): pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i 'o ma 'thungs pas sos par gyur to/ /klu'i rgyal po rab brtan gyis kyang glang po che nag po'i cha byad 'chang la pad+ma'i rtsa ba khur gcig bskur nas/ mnyan yod kyi rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi
38b2('dul ba): tshal du song la/ gtsug lag khang gi khyim gyi mdun du zhog la shog/ de rlung gi shugs ltar mgyogs pa'i mthus/ mnyan yod kyi rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi gtsug lag khang du 'ongs nas
38b3('dul ba): pad+ma'i rtsa ba rnams khyams kyi mdun du bzhag nas/ slar log pa las/ lam gyi phyed na tshal gyi bal glang mo zhig yod pa dang lhan cig 'dus par gyur to/ /dus gzhan zhig na/ bal glang mo de
38b4('dul ba): las bal glang phrug gu zhig 'brangs te/ 'brangs pa'i mod la seng ge'i sgra 'byin to/ /de nas bal glang mo de skrag pas gcin rtug shor nas/ bal glang phrug gu por te bros so/ /de nas rgyal
38b5('dul ba): po'i khab na gnas pa'i shing mkhan zhig shing gi ched du tshal du song ba las/ bal glang phrug gu de mthong nas khyim du blangs/ bsnyun gsos bskyed de/ nor gyis bskyangs pas/ ming nor skyong
38b6('dul ba): nor skyong zhes bya bar grags so/ /kha cig ni/ rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la nor skyong skyes su bskur ba las de mnyan yod kyi yul na gnas pa la skye bos nor gyis
38b7('dul ba): bskyangs pas na/ nor skyong zhes 'don to/ /pad+ma'i rtsa ba kha cig ni/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos zos/ kha cig ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ kha cig ni/ dge 'dun
39a1('dul ba): la brims pa las 'on kyang lhag par gyur to/ /de nas dge slong rnams kyis spangs pa byas nas kyang za 'dod na/ bdag cag gis spangs pa byas so/ /zhes ma
39a2('dul ba): zos pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ mi rnams kyis lha'i pad+ma'i rtsa rnyed par
39a3('dul ba): dka' bas de'i phyir rjes su gnang ngo / /pad+ma'i rtsa ba rnyed par dka' ba yin no/ /snyam du bsam nas bza' bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o// //gleng gzhi
39a4('dul ba): ni| mnyan yod na'o/ /de'i tshe grong khyer bzang byed na bsod nams chen por shes par bya ba drug gnas te/ khyim bdag lug ces bya ba dang / lug gi chung ma dang / lug gi bu
39a5('dul ba): dang / lug gi mna' ma dang / lug gi bran pho dang / lug gi bran mo'o/ /khyim bdag lug bsod nams che bar ji ltar shes she na/ gal te bang mdzod stong pa rnams la bltas
39a6('dul ba): na| mthong ma thag kho nar gang bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na/ khyim bdag lug bsod nams che bar shes so/ /lug gi chung ma ji lta bu zhe na/ des gcig gi don du snod du btsos
39a7('dul ba): pa ni/ brgya stong gi bza' ba 'byung ste/ lug gi chung ma ni/ de lta bu yin no/ /lug gi bu ni/ ji lta bu zhe na/ de'i rked pa la lnga brgya ba'i snod btags te 'dug la/ des gang gi
39b1('dul ba): tshe brgya 'am/ stong yongs su btang ba de'i tshe/ de bzhin du gang bar 'dug ste/ yongs su zad par mi 'gyur te/ lug gi bu ni/ de lta bu yin no/ /lug gi mna' ma ji lta bu zhe na/ des
39b2('dul ba): gcig gi don du dri sbyar na/ brgya stong khyed par 'gyur te/ lug gi mna' ma ni/ de lta bu yin no/ /lug gi bran pho ji lta bu zhe na/ des gang gi tshe zhing la rol gcig rmos pa de'i tshe/ zhing
39b3('dul ba): la rol bdun rmos par 'gyur te/ lug gi bran pho ni/ de lta bu yin no/ /lug gi bran mo ni/ ji ltar bsod nams che bar shes she na/ de gang gi tshe 'bras gtun gang tsam drus pa de'i
39b4('dul ba): tshe| bdun tsam du skyes par 'gyur te/ de ltar na/ lug gi bran mo bsod nams che ba yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ khyim bdag lug gdul ba'i dus mkhyen nas/ tshe dang
39b5('dul ba): ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la dge slong rnams la dge slong dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ ljongs rgyu zhing grong khyer bzang byed du gshegs kyi/ khyed cag
39b6('dul ba): las/ gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig tu ljongs rgyu zhing grong khyer bzang byed du 'dong bar spro ba de ni/ chos gos rnams longs shig/ ces sgos shig/ btsun
39b7('dul ba): pa| bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ dge slong rnams la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag/ bcom ldan 'das ljongs
40a1('dul ba): rgyu zhing grong khyer bzang byed du gshegs kyi/ khyed cag las/ gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig tu ljongs rgyu zhing grong khyer bzang byed du 'dong
40a2('dul ba): bar spro ba de ni/ chos gos rnams longs shig/ tshe dang ldan pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes dge slong de rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo las mnyan to/ /de nas bcom
40a3('dul ba): ldan 'das dul ba 'khor dul ba/ zhi ba 'khor zhi ba/ dgra bcom pha 'khor dgra bcom pa dang / ljongs rgyu zhing grong khyer bzang byed du gshegs so/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan
40a4('dul ba): 'das kyis mnyan yod du cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa de'i tshe/ mu stegs can rnams mtha' 'khob tu dong ba las/ de nas kha cig grong khyer bzang byed du dong nas gnas pa de rnams
40a5('dul ba): kyis/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'ong ngo / /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang rod rod por gyur nas/ bdag cag sngon ni/ dge sbyong go'u ta mas yul dbus nas spyugs so/ /de gal te
40a6('dul ba): 'dir 'ongs na/ gdon mi za bar bdag cag 'di nas spyugs par 'gyur gyi/ de la thabs shig bsham par bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /de rnams rigs kyi khyim bdag tu dong nas smras pa/
40a7('dul ba): chos thob par gyur cig/ chos thob par gyur cig/ 'phags pa dag/ de ci lags/ shes ldan dag/ bltas zin gyi/ 'gro'o/ /ci'i slad du/ re zhig khyed cag gi 'byor
40b1('dul ba): ba phun sum tshogs pa ni/ kho bo cag gis mthong gi/ ji srid rgud pa ma mthong ba de'i bar du 'dong ngo / /'phags pa dag/ bdag cag la rgud pa ci zhig 'byung bar 'gyur lags/ shes
40b2('dul ba): ldan dag/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma spu gri'i ser ba 'bebs shing / du ma zhig bu med pa dang / khyim thab med par byed cing 'ong ngo / /'phags pa dang / gal te de lta na/ gang gi dus kho nar
40b3('dul ba): gzhes par bgyi ba de kho na'i dus su bdag cag spang bar bgyi'am/ bzhugs shig/ ma bzhud cig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag cag ci ste 'dug/ khyed cag kho bo cag gi nyan
40b4('dul ba): du mi btub bo/ /'phags pa dag/ gsungs shig/ mnyan par bgyi'o/ /de rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ grong khyer bzang byed kyi nye 'khor gyi skye bo'i tshogs thams cad
40b5('dul ba): gnas nas phyung la/ grong khyer bzang byed kyi nang du tshud cig/ rtswa sngon po rnams ni/ rngos shig/ 'dug gnas rnams ni/ bshig cig/ me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing rnams ni/ chod
40b6('dul ba): cig/ chu rnams ni/ dug blugs shig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag/ bzhugs shig dang / thams cad bgyi'o/ /de nas de rnams kyis grong khyer bzang byed kyi nye
40b7('dul ba): 'khor gyi skye bo'i tshogs thams cad gnas nas bton nas grong khyer bzang byed kyi nang du btsud de/ rtswa sngon po rnams ni/ brngas/ 'dug gnas rnams ni/ bshig/ me tog dang
41a1('dul ba): 'bras bu'i shing rnams ni/ bcad/ chu rnams ni/ dug blugs so/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bsam pa/ bcom ldan 'das la bkur
41a2('dul ba): sti ma yin pa byed pa yal bar dor ba ni/ bdag gi cha ma yin te/ 'di ltar/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du dka' ba brgya stong du mas pha rol tu phyin pa drug
41a3('dul ba): yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pas/ bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes pa'i bcom ldan 'das de/ 'jig rten thams cad med pa'i yul stong du rgyu zhing gshegs par bya'am/ ma la
41a4('dul ba): bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bde ba la reg par bya'o/ /snyam nas/ des rlung gtong ba'i lha'i bu la bsgo ba/ song la chu dug can rnams skoms
41a5('dul ba): shig / char pa 'bebs pa'i lha'i bu la bsgo ba/ 'di rnams kyis bskams pa dang / khyod kyis chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas khongs shig /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la
41a6('dul ba): yang bsgo ba/ khyed kyis grong khyer bzang byed kyi nye 'khor du gnas thob cig /de nas rlung gtong ba'i lha'i bus ni/ chu dug can rnams bskams so/ /char pa 'bebs pa'i lha'i bus ni/
41a7('dul ba): der yang chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas bkang ngo / /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis kyang grong khyer bzang byed kyi nye 'khor du gnas btab nas/ longs spyod rnams 'byor cing
41b1('dul ba): rgyas par gyur to/ /mu stegs can rnams kyis grong khyer na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams bsags nas/ de rnams kyis rtog chen dag mngags te ljongs rnams ci 'dra ltos shig /de rnams
41b2('dul ba): dong ba las/ ljongs rnams lhag par yang 'byor cang rgyas par gyur pa mthong nas/ slar 'ongs te smras pa/ shes ldan dag /ljongs 'di lta bur 'byor cing rgyas pa ni/ sngon lan 'ga'
41b3('dul ba): yang bdag cag gis ma mthong ngo / /mu stegs can rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag /khyod kyis mthong ngam/ re zhig gang zhig sems med pa'i dngos po rnams kyang sgyur bar byed pa des/ khyed
41b4('dul ba): cag sgyur bar mi byed pa de lta srid re skan/ khyed cag rnam pa thams cad du bltas zin te/ blta ba'i mtha' ma byas nas 'gro'o/ /de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag /bzhugs shig /khyed
41b5('dul ba): cag la dge sbyong go'u ta mas ci zhig bgyir mchis/ de yang rab tu byung ba lags la/ khyed kyang rab tu byung ba slong zhing 'tsho ba lags na/ ci/ des khyed cag gi slong ba bkag par 'gyur snyam
41b6('dul ba): mam/ mu stegs can rnams kyis smras pa/ dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te khyed cag sus kyang dge sbyong go'u ta ma la lta bar 'gro bar mi bya zhing / gang zhig 'gro ba de la chad par kaR+sha pa Na drug
41b7('dul ba): cus bcad par khrims 'cha' na 'dug go / de rnams kyis kyang khas blangs nas khrims su bcas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/ rim gyis grong khyer bzang
42a1('dul ba): byed du gshegs nas/ bzang byed kyi lho phyogs kyi gnas shig na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe ser skya'i gzhi'i bram ze'i bu mo grong khyer bzang byed du bag mar
42a2('dul ba): btang ba de ra ba'i kha na 'dug pas/ bcom ldan 'das mun khang na bzhugs pa mthong nas des bsam pa/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya'i rigs dga' bar mdzad pa/ shAkya'i rigs kyi
42a3('dul ba): rgyal po spangs nas/ rab tu byung ba de ni/ 'di yin te/ gal te 'di la them skas shig yod par gyur na/ bdag mar me thogs la 'bab pa zhig /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i
42a4('dul ba): bsam pa thugs su chud nas/ them skad shig sprul to/ /de nas de snying dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rab tu dga' bas mar me thogs te them skas las babs nas/ bcom ldan
42a5('dul ba): 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mar me bzhag nas zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go /de nas bcom
42a6('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ de dang mthun pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad
42a7('dul ba): pa mdzad de zhes bya ba nas skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
42b1('dul ba): bu mo khyod tshur shog /khyim bdag lug gang na ba der song la phyin pa dang / de la nga na re/ nad med par gyur cig /ces smros la/ 'di skad ces kyang smros shig /khyim bdag khyod kyi ched kho
42b2('dul ba): nar nga 'dir 'ongs na/ khyod sgo bcad nas 'dug pa/ glo bur ba la ji ltar khyod byed pa de lta bur bya ba de ji ga rigs sam/ gal te tshogs kyis khrims su bca' bar byas so/ /zhes smras
42b3('dul ba): pa dang / khyod kyi bu'i rked pa la lnga brgya pa'i snod btags te 'dug pa des/ gal te brgya'am/ stong 'gyed par btang na yang / gang ba nyid du 'dug cing yongs su zad par mi 'gyur na/ khyod
42b4('dul ba): kaR+sha pa Na drug cu byin nas 'ong mi nus sam zhes smros shig / btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes/ bu mo des bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas chas pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
42b5('dul ba): kyis ji ltar sus kyang mi tshor ba de ltar byin gyis brlabs nas khyim bdag lug gi gan du song ste phyin pa dang / smras pa/ khyim bdag /bcom ldan 'das khyod la nad med par gyur
42b6('dul ba): cig / ces gsungs so/ /des smras pa/ bu mo/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyim bdag la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod kho na'i ched du nga 'dir
42b7('dul ba): gshegs na/ khyod sgo bcad nas 'dug pa/ glo bur ba la ji ltar khyod byed pa de lta bur bya ba/ ji ga rigs sam/ des smras pa/ bu mo/ tshogs kyis khrims su bcas pa/ sus kyang
43a1('dul ba): dge sbyong go'u ta ma la blta ba'i phyir 'gro bar mi bya'o/ /gang zhig 'gro na de tshogs kyis kaR+sha pa Na drug cu'i chad pas gcad do/ /zhes dam bcas so/ /khyim
43a2('dul ba): bdag la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyi bu'i rked pa na lnga brgya pa'i snod cig btags te 'dug pa des/ gal te brgya'am/ stong 'gyed par btang na gang ba kho nar 'gyur
43a3('dul ba): zhing yongs su zad par mi 'gyur na/ kaR+sha pa Na drug cu byin nas khyod 'ong par mi nus sam zhes gsung ngo / /des bsam pa/ 'di ni/ sus kyang mi shes na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni/ thams
43a4('dul ba): cad mkhyen pa yin pas 'gro'o/ /snyam nas/ des kaR+sha pa Na drug cu sgor bzhag nas bram ze'i bu mos bstan pa'i them skas las bab ste bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
43a5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag lug gi
43a6('dul ba): bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ khyim
43a7('dul ba): bdag lug gis de thos nas zhes bya ba nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /des bden pa mthong nas gsol ba dang /
43b1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das/ bzang byed na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs 'di dag gis kyang ji ga 'di lta bu'i chos rnam pa sna tshogs 'thob par 'gyur pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
43b2('dul ba): pa| khyim bdag / khyod la brten nas phal cher kun gyis thob pa kho nar 'gyur ro/ /de nas khyim bdag lug gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom
43b3('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ste/ de khyim du phyin nas grong khyer gyi nang du kaR+sha pa Na'i phung po gcer te/ tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ gang zhig rgyal ba 'dod chags skyon bcom
43b4('dul ba): rtsod med pa/ /mtshungs pa med pa gser gyi mdog can blta 'dod pa/ /de ni 'jigs med snying gis shin tu nges byos la/ /myur du dengs shig de yi nor ni kho bos gzhal/ /skye bo'i
43b5('dul ba): tshogs kyis smras pa/ khyim bdag /dge sbyong go'u ta ma mthong na dge bar 'gyur ram/ des smras pa/ dge bar 'gyur ro/ /de rnams kyis smras pa/ gal te de lta na tshogs kho nas
43b6('dul ba): khrims su bcas pa/ tshogs kho nas bshig tu zad mod/ 'di la 'gal ba ci zhig yod/ de rnams kyis khrims su bcas pa bshig nas 'byung bar brtsams so/ /de nas phan
43b7('dul ba): tshun bsdos pas 'byung bar ma nus pa dang / gnod sbyin lag na rdo rjes 'dus pa'i skye bo la snying brtse ba'i phyir rdo rje 'phangs pas ra ba dral nas/ srog chags brgya stong du ma kha cig
44a1('dul ba): ni| ya mtshan skyes/ kha cig ni/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas yang dag par bskul nas byung ngo / /de nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'dus bas/ bcom ldan
44a2('dul ba): 'das kyi nye 'khor dpag tshad gcig tshun chad 'khor bar 'dug go / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor de rnams zil gyis mnan te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan
44a3('dul ba): bshams pa nyid la bzhugs nas/ sems can du ma dag gi rgyud la dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par byed pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos nas kha cig gis ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i
44a4('dul ba): 'bras bu mngon du byas so/ /zhes bya ba nas/ kha cig gis ni/ skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs so/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// //
44a5('dul ba): 'dul ba gzhi/ bam po nga brgyad pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yun ring po zhig tu chos bshad pas /gdugs tshod kyi dus las yol bar gyur to/ /khyim bdag lug gis gsol
44a6('dul ba): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ zhal zas kyi mdzad pa mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag /zas kyi dus las yol bar gyur to/ /des gsol pa/
44a7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das/ dus ma lags par rung ba ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mar dang / bu ram dang / hwags dang / sha kha ra dang / btung ba dag go/
44b1('dul ba): de nas khyim bdag lug gis g.yos mkhan dag bkug ste/ smras pa/ shes ldan dag /dus ma yin pa'i bca' ba rnams myur du sta gon gyis shig /de rnams kyis dus ma yin pa'i
44b2('dul ba): bca' ba rnams sta gon byas so/ /de nas khyim bdag lug gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la dus ma yin pa'i bca' ba dang / dus ma yin pa'i btung ba rnams kyis
44b3('dul ba): tshim par byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag lug 'khor dang bcas pa yang bden pa rnams la so sor bkod/ ri bor na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs de yang skal ba ji lta
44b4('dul ba): ba bzhin du btul te gshegs pa na/ khyim bdag lug gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bshul gyi snyun rgyags kyi zong kaR+sha pa Na dag bzhes shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
44b5('dul ba): stsal pa/ blang bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kaR+sha pa Na blang bar bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis su zhig gis blang bar bya ba ma shes nas/ bcom ldan
44b6('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rung ba byed pas so/ /rung ba byed pa med nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge tshul gyis so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang
44b7('dul ba): ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge tshul gyi bslab pa'i gzhi bcu par gser dngul len pa gsungs la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge tshul
45a1('dul ba): gyis blang bar bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa de/ ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nye bar 'khor/ ngas 'chang bar byed pa las dgongs
45a2('dul ba): te gsungs kyi/ mi blang ba ni/ ma yin te/ de bas na/ dge tshul gyis blang bar bya'i/ blangs nas bdag gir ni mi bya'o/ /khyim bdag lug gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bu
45a3('dul ba): ram dag bzhes shig / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blang bar bya'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis su zhig gis ji ltar blang bar bya ba ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
45a4('dul ba): stsal pa/ khyim pa'am/ dge tshul med na/ dge slong gis zhag bdun par byin gyis brlabs nas rang nyid kyis bkur bar bya'o/ /dge slong dag gis ji ltar byin gyis brlab par bya ba
45a5('dul ba): ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag pa gnyis bkrus nas sbyin len byas te/ lag pa g.yon pa'i steng du bzhag la/ lag pa g.yas pas bkab nas/ dge
45a6('dul ba): slong zhig gi mdun du 'dug nas/ tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba'i sman 'di dag tshangs par mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyi phyir zhag bdun par byin
45a7('dul ba): gyis brlab bo/ /zhes de skad lan gnyis lan gsum du brjod par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan
45b1('dul ba): 'das kyis bu ram zhag bdun par byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /zhes gang gsungs pa su zhig gis 'tshal bar bgyi lags/ nye bar 'khor/ gang zag lnga rnams kyis te/ lam du zhugs
45b2('dul ba): pa dang / smyung ba byas pa dang / nad pa dang / dge bskos dang / lag gi blas so/ /dge slong ljongs rgyur chas pa rnams kyis/ 'bras dang / phye dag gi nang du bu ram bcug pa las/ lam
45b3('dul ba): gyis ngal nas bza' bar 'dod nas/ 'gyod pas ma zos pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong
45b4('dul ba): dag / zas des zas kyi bya ba byed mi nus pas/ 'bras dag gi nang du bcug pa gang yin pa de sprugs nas bza' bar bya'o/ /phye rnams gang yin pa de chus bkrus nas bza' bar bya'o/ /kha
45b5('dul ba): cig zhu bar gyur pa de/ bkrur ma rung ste/ zas dang bcas pa nyid du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ snyug ma'i tshal pas bzhar la chus bkru bar bya'o/ /'on kyang zas
45b6('dul ba): med par bkru ma nus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legs par bsal te chu'i nang du mnyes la btung bar byas nas/ de tshags kyis btsags la btung bar bya ste/ de la
45b7('dul ba): 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ khyim bdag lug dang / lug gi
46a1('dul ba): mchis brang dang / lug gi bu dang / lug gi mna' ma dang / lug gi bran pho dang / lug gi bran mos las ci zhig bgyis na/ des na/ de drug bsod nams chen
46a2('dul ba): por gyur cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bden pa mthong nas/ 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis kyi/ ma mnyes par ni ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
46a3('dul ba): stsal pa/ dge slong dag /'di dag nyid kyis las rnams byas shing bsags pa tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas/ 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/ /ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /
46a4('dul ba): dge slong dag /sngon byung ba/ wA ra NA si'i grong khyer du/ rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/ de'i tshe wA ra NA si'i grong khyer du ltas mkhan rnams kyis lo
46a5('dul ba): bcu gnyis su char mi 'bab pas/ thur mas 'tsho ba'i mu ge chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan to/ /mu ge rnam pa gsum ni/ za ma tog dang / rus gong dkar po
46a6('dul ba): dang / thur mas 'tsho ba'o/ /de la/ za ma tog ces bya ba ni/ za ma tog de'i nang du mi rnams kyis 'bru dag blugs te/ ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams kyi ched du bzhag nas
46a7('dul ba): bdag cag shi na/ 'bru 'dis mi de dag gi bya ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /snyam pa ste/ 'di ni/ za ma tog dang 'brel pas za ma tog ces bya'o/ /rus gong dkar po gang zhe na/ dus
46b1('dul ba): de na mi rnams kyis rus pa dag bsdus nas re zhig btsos te/ ji tsam na/ rus pa de dag dkar por gyur pa dang / de nas de'i khu ba 'thung ba ste/ 'di ni/ rus gong dkar po dang 'brel pas
46b2('dul ba): rus gong dkar po zhes bya'o/ /thur mas 'tsho ba gang zhe na/ dus de na mi rnams kyis g.yul gyi ser gnas 'bru'i 'brum bu dag thur mas brus nas chu mang po'i snod du btsos nas 'thung ba
46b3('dul ba): ste/ 'di ni/ thur ma dang 'brel bas thur mas 'tsho ba zhes bya'o/ /de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis wA ra NA sir dril sgrog tu bcug pa/ wA ra NA si na gnas pa'i shes ldan grong khyer pa dag
46b4('dul ba): nyon cig / ltas mkhan rnams kyis lo bcu gnyis su char mi 'bab pas/ za ma tog dang / rus gong dkar po dang / thur mas 'tsho ba'i mu ge 'byung bar lung bstan gyi/ khyed las/ gang
46b5('dul ba): dag lo bcu gnyis kyi bza' ba yod pa de rnams ni/ 'khod cig /gang dag la med pa de dag ni/ gar dga' bar dengs la/ mu ge med cing lo legs par gyur nas slar sheg cig /de'i
46b6('dul ba): tshe na wA ra NA si na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba/ 'khor yangs shing rgya che ba zhig yod de/ des mngan bkug ste/ smras pa/ kye nang rje/ kho bo 'khor dang bcas pa'i
46b7('dul ba): lo bcu gnyis kyi bza' ba yod dam/ des smras pa/ dpon po/ mchis so/ /de de nyid na gnas pa las/ mu ge de lo brgyud ma kho nar byung bas/ de'i bang mdzod rnams yongs su zad pas/
47a1('dul ba): 'khor gyi skye bo thams cad shi bar gyur te/ bdag nyid dang drug cig lus so/ /de nas khyim bdag des bang mdzod rnams phyags pa las/ 'bras bre'u chung
47a2('dul ba): gang zhig byung nas/ de chung mas snod du blugs te btsos so/ /sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa na/ rang sangs rgyas zhes bya ba nas 'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu dag /
47a3('dul ba): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur bas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /ji tsam na/ rang sangs rgyas shig ljongs rgyu zhing song ba dang / wA ra NA sir phyin nas/ snga dro sham thabs
47a4('dul ba): bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ wA ra NA sir bsod snyoms la zhugs pa na/ khyim bdag des kyang bza' ba bsdogs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas de yang rim bzhin du
47a5('dul ba): bsod snyoms la rgyus nas/ de'i khyim du phyin to/ /khyim bdag des/ de lus mdzes shing sems dang ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bsam pa/ 'di bdag gis zos kyang gdon
47a6('dul ba): mi za bar srog dang 'bral bar 'gyur gyi/ ma la bdag gi skal pa rab tu byung ba 'di la sbyin no/ /snyam nas/ des chung ma la smras pa/ bzang mo/ kho bo'i skal pa ni/ rab tu byung
47a7('dul ba): ba 'di la dbul lo/ /des bsam pa/ bdag gi khyim thab mi za na/ bdag gis ci ste bza' snyam nas/ des smras pa/ rje'i sras/ bdag gi skal pa yang 'di la dbul lo/ /de
47b1('dul ba): bzhin du bu dang / mna' ma dang / bran pho dang / bran mos kyang dpyad nas rang rang gi skal ba yongs su btang ste/ de nas de thams cad 'dus nas/ rang sangs rgyas la bsod snyoms phul lo/ /
47b2('dul ba): bdag nyid chen po de dag ni/ lus kyis chos ston gyi/ tshig gis ni/ ma yin pas/ des ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba ltar steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas/ 'bar ba dang /
47b3('dul ba): gsal ba dang / char 'bebs pa dang / glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so/ /so so'i skye bo dag ni/ rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems gtod pa yin pas/ shing rtsa ba nas bcad de
47b4('dul ba): 'gyel ba bzhin du rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas/ smon lam ci 'dod pa gdab par rtsom ste/ khyim bdag gis smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas
47b5('dul ba): pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'dis/ bdag gis gal te bang ba dang / bang mdzod stong pa dag la bltas pa na/ mthong ba de'i mod la gang bar gyur cig /'di lta bu'i chos rnams kyang thob nas/
47b6('dul ba): 'di bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa rnams mnyes par bgyid cing / mi mnyes par mi bgyid par gyur cig /chung mas smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta
47b7('dul ba): bu la bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'dis/ bdag gis gal te gcig gi don du snod du btsos pa de brgya'am/ stong gis zos kyang ji srid bdag gis sbyor ba ma btang ba'i
48a1('dul ba): bar yongs su zad par mi 'gyur zhing / 'di lta bu'i chos rnams kyang thob nas/ 'di bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa rnams mnyes par bgyid cing / mi mnyes
48a2('dul ba): par mi bgyid par gyur cig / bus smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'dis/ bdag gi rked pa la lnga brgya pa'i snod
48a3('dul ba): btags te 'dug pa/ gal te brgya'am/ stong 'gyed par btang yang gang ba nyid du 'dug ste/ yongs su zad par mi 'gyur zhing / 'di lta bu'i chos rnams kyang thob nas/ 'di bas
48a4('dul ba): khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa rnams mnyes par bgyid cing / mi mnyes par mi bgyid par gyur cig /mna' mas smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu
48a5('dul ba): la bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'dis/ bdag gis gal te gcig gi phyir dri rnams sbyar na/ des brgya'am/ stong byugs kyang ji srid kyang sbyor ba ma btang gi bar du
48a6('dul ba): zad par mi 'gyur zhing / 'di lta bu'i chos rnams kyang thob nas/ 'di bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa rnams mnyes par bgyid cing / mi mnyes par mi bgyid par gyur cig/
48a7('dul ba): bran phos smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'dis/ bdag gis gal te zhing rol gcig rmos na/ rol bdun
48b1('dul ba): rmos par 'gyur zhing / 'di lta bu'i chos rnams kyang thob nas/ 'di bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa rnams mnyes par bgyid cing / mi mnyes par mi bgyid par gyur cig /bran mos
48b2('dul ba): smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'dis/ bdag gis gal te snod gang tsam brus pa gang yin pa des/ snod bdun tsam
48b3('dul ba): du 'phel bar 'gyur zhing / 'di lta bu'i chos rnams kyang thob nas/ 'di bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa rnams mnyes par bgyid cing / mi mnyes par mi bgyid par gyur cig/ de rnams
48b4('dul ba): kyis de lta bu'i smon lam btab nas/ rang sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po de/ de rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyis chas pa dang / ji tsam na/ rgyal po tshangs sbyin steng gi khang bzang
48b5('dul ba): gi gzhir song ste 'dug pa las/ de rdzu 'phrul gyis song ba'i grib ma rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyi steng du bab nas/ des gyen du blta bar brtsams pa las/ rang sangs rgyas de mthong nas/ de
48b6('dul ba): 'di snyam du/ bdag nyid chen po 'di'i rdzu 'phrul gyi gshol chen pos yang su zhig gi bkren pa'i drungs phyung bar gyur snyam mo/ /de nas khyim bdag de/ re ba chen pos mdzod dang / bang
48b7('dul ba): mdzod rnams la blta ba dang / ji tsam na/ gang bar mthong ngo / /des chung ma la smras pa/ re zhig kho bo'i smon lam ni/ rdzogs par gyur gyi/ da khyed cag gi blta'o/ /de nas
49a1('dul ba): bran mos 'bras snod gang tsam brus na/ bdun cam du 'phel bar gyur te/ /chung mas gcig gi don du snod du btsos pa la de dag thams cad kyis
49a2('dul ba): zos kyang de kho na bzhin du 'dug / nye 'khor gyi srog chags brgya stong phrag du mas zos kyang de kho na bzhin du 'dug go/ de nas khyim bdag des wA ra NA sir dril sgrog tu bcug
49a3('dul ba): pa| shes ldan dag / khyed cag las su zhig ci don du gnyer ba de shog cig/ wA ra NA sir sgra gsal ba dang / sgra chen por byung ba rgyal pos thos nas/ des smras pa/ shes
49a4('dul ba): ldan dag / sgra gsal ba dang / sgra chen po 'di ci zhig yin/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ khyim bdag che ge mo zhig ces bgyi bas mdzod dang / bang ba rnams phye ba lags
49a5('dul ba): so| |rgyal pos smras pa/ gang gi tshe 'jig rten thams cad shi zin pa de'i tshe/ khyim bdag des mdzod dang / bang ba rnams phye'am/ shes ldan dag /khyim bdag de khug cig /de
49a6('dul ba): rnams kyis bkug pa dang / de nas rgyal pos smras pa/ khyim bdag /gang gi tshe 'jig rten thams cad shi zin pa de'i tshe/ khyim gyi mdzod dang / bang ba rnams phye 'am/ lha/ su'i
49a7('dul ba): mdzod dang / bang ba rnams phye/ 'on kyang de ring kho nar sa bon stsal ba'i 'bras bu de ring nyid du grub lags so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ de ji lta bu zhig /des skabs de rgyas par
49b1('dul ba): smras pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ khyim bdag /khyod kyis bdag nyid chen po de la bsod snyoms phul lam/ lha/ bdag gis phul lo/ /de yang lhag par dad par gyur nas/ tshigs su
49b2('dul ba): bcad pas smras pa/ kye ma'o yon tan las byung ba'i/ /skyon kun rnam par spangs pa'i zhing / /de la sa bon btab pa yi/ /'bras bu deng nyid thob par gyur/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/
49b3('dul ba): khyim bdag dang / khyim bdag gi chung ma dang / khyim bdag gi bu dang / khyim bdag gi mna' ma dang / khyim bdag gi bran pho dang / khyim bdag gi bran mo gang yin pa de ni/ khyim bdag
49b4('dul ba): lug dang / khyim bdag lug gi chung ma dang / lug gi bu dang / lug gi mna' ma dang / lug gi bran pho dang / lug gi bran mo 'di dag nyid yin no/ /'di dag gis/ /rang sangs rgyas la bya
49b5('dul ba): ba byas shing smon lam btab pa gang yin pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pas drug car yang bsod nams chen por gyur cing / nga'i spyan sngar bden pa mthong zhing / rang sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong bas
49b6('dul ba): ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa nga mnyes par byas kyi/ mi mnyes par ma yin no/ /dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni/ gcig tu
49b7('dul ba): gnag pa yin la/ gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni/ gcig tu dkar ba yin pa zhes bya ba nas rtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag /khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o/ /zhes bya ba'i bar
50a1('dul ba): gong ma bzhin du'o/ / //sdom ni/ ke na'i bu yis btung ba blangs/ /ka shi'i tshong rdal nas thug dang / sdig can du ni bca' ba dang / /'gyod dang
50a2('dul ba): sbyar ba'i zas dag go / bcom ldan 'das yul u du ma'i gnas na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe drang srong ke na'i bu/ gnas ni/ yul u du ma'i gnas na 'dug go /nyin par ni/ rdzing bu
50a3('dul ba): dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram na gnas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ ngas gang du 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi rnams la chos bshad na/ der ngas tshegs chung ngus drang srong
50a4('dul ba): ke na'i bu thul bar 'gyur snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ ma la ngas rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram du bshad na/ der thul bar 'gyur ro/ /snyam
50a5('dul ba): mo| |de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed de/ chos nyid kyis/ gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa de'i tshe/
50a6('dul ba): brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs te/ lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa sems kyis shes par 'gyur bas/ rgyal po rnam thos kyi bus bsam pa/ bcom ldan 'das
50a7('dul ba): kyis ci zhig gi phyir 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad pa bltas na/ bdag cag 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi rnams kho na la chos bshad par bzhed do/ /snyam du rig nas/ gnod sbyin
50b1('dul ba): gyi sde dpon chen po lnga rtsen la bsgo ba/ lnga rtsen song la/ rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram du bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan shoms te/ 'dun pa chen po 'dus pa na sus kyang de'i mdangs 'phrog
50b2('dul ba): par mi 'gyur bar drang srong ke na'i bu'i srung ma gcig kyang skos shig / des rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram du drang srong ke na'i bu'i srung ma bzhag nas gnas shom par rtsom pa na/ de na skye
50b3('dul ba): bo'i tshogs chen po'i ca co'i sgra byung ba dang / de nas drang srong ke na'i bu/ ca co'i sgras langs nas/ srung ma de la dris pa/ ca co'i sgra 'di ci zhig /des smras pa/ gdan shom par byed pa'i 'o/ /ci/
50b4('dul ba): kho bo'i phyir ram/ khyod kyi phyir ni ma yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir yin no/ /khyod 'di na ci zhig la sdod/ khyod kho na srung ngo / /ci'i phyir/ 'byung po mang po 'du bar
50b5('dul ba): 'gyur bas so/ /des smras pa/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma de/ su zhig srung bar byed par 'gyur/ des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das de la su zhig srung / bcom ldan 'das de nyid ni/ 'jig rten
50b6('dul ba): lha dang bcas pa'i srung ma mdzad do/ /zhes byas pa dang / drang srong ke na'i bus thos nas cang mi smra'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro na bza' sham thabs man bas te/ lhung bzed dang chos
50b7('dul ba): gos bsnams nas/ u du mar bsod snyoms la zhugs te/ u du mar bsod snyoms spyad nas zas kyi bya ba mdzad de/ zas phyi ma'i bsod snyoms spangs nas/ ji ltar thugs mnyam par
51a1('dul ba): bzhag na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu u du ma nas mi snang bar gyur te/ rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram du byon par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin
51a2('dul ba): la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /de nas rgyal po chen po yul 'khor skyong dri za du ma'i 'khor
51a3('dul ba): dang / dri za brgya phrag du ma'i 'khor dang / dri za stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang / dri za brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang / lha'i nor bus thu ba bkang ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song
51a4('dul ba): nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha'i nor bu rnams kyis gtor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun
51a5('dul ba): la mdun gyis bltas nas shar phyogs su brten te 'dug go/ rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po yang / grul bum du ma'i 'khor dang / grul bum brgya phrag du ma'i 'khor dang / grul bum
51a6('dul ba): stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang / grul bum brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang / lha'i mu tig gis thu ba bkang ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom
51a7('dul ba): ldan 'das la lha'i mu tig gis gtor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mdun gyis bltas
51b1('dul ba): nas lho phyogs su brten te 'dug go/ rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang yang klu du ma'i 'khor dang / klu brgya phrag du ma'i 'khor dang / klu stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang / klu brgya stong phrag du ma'i
51b2('dul ba): 'khor dang / lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man dA ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom
51b3('dul ba): ldan 'das la lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man dA ra ba rnams kyis gtor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom
51b4('dul ba): ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mdun gyis bltas nas nub phyogs su brten te 'dug go/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus kyang / gnod sbyin du ma'i 'khor dang / gnod sbyin
51b5('dul ba): brgya phrag du ma'i 'khor dang / gnod sbyin stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang / lha'i dbyig dang gser gyis thu ba bkang ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang
51b6('dul ba): na ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbyig dang gser gyis gtor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong
51b7('dul ba): gi dge 'dun la mdun gyis bltas nas/ byang phyogs su brten te 'dug go/ de la dbus pa'i rigs ni/ gnyis yin te/ yul 'khor skyong dang / 'phags skyes po'o/ /mtha' 'khob pa'i
52a1('dul ba): rigs ni/ gnyis te/ mig mi bzang dang / rnam thos kyi bu'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ gal te ngas dbus pa'i chig gis chos bshad
52a2('dul ba): na| gnyis kho nas shes par 'gyur gyi/ gnyis kyis ni/ mi shes la/ gal te mtha' 'khob pa'i tshig gis bshad na/ gnyis kho nas shes par 'gyur gyi/ gnyis kyis ni/ mi shes
52a3('dul ba): pas/ ma la ngas gnyis la ni/ dbus pa'i tshig gis chos bshad do/ /gnyis la ni/ mtha' 'khob pa'i tshig gis bshad do/ /snyam du dgongs nas/ rgyal po chen po yul 'khor skyong
52a4('dul ba): la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ 'di ltar/ lus zhig pa dang / tshor ba gsil bar gyur pa dang / 'du shes 'gag pa dang / 'du byed rnams nye bar zhi bar gyur pa dang / rnam par
52a5('dul ba): shes pa nub par gyur pa de nyid sdug bsngal gyi mtha' yin no/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa na/ rgyal po chen po yul 'khor skyong dang / de dang skal ba mnyam pa'i dri za brgya
52a6('dul ba): stong phrag du ma chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen
52a7('dul ba): po| de la/ khyod kyis mthong ba la mthong ba tsam dang / thos pa dang / rtogs pa dang / rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa tsam du gyis shig/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal
52b1('dul ba): pa na/ rgyal po chen po 'phags skyas po dang / de dang skal ba mnyam pa'i grul bum brgya stong phrag du ma chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/ /de nas bcom ldan
52b2('dul ba): 'das kyis rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang la bka' stsal pa/ de ltar na/ rgyal po chen po/ e ni/ me ne/ dab phe/ da Da ba phe/ 'di nyid sdug bsngal gyi mtha' yin no/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
52b3('dul ba): bka' stsal pa na/ rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang dang / de dang skal pa mnyam pa'i klu brgya stong phrag du ma chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/ /de nas bcom ldan
52b4('dul ba): 'das kyis rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la bka' stsal pa/ de ltar na/ rgyal po chen po/ mA ShA/ tu ShA/ saM shA mA/ sarba tra bi rA DI/ 'di nyid sdug bsngal gyi mtha' yin no/ /chos kyi rnam grangs
52b5('dul ba): 'di bka' stsal pa na/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / de dang skal pa mnyam pa'i gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma chos la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/ /bcom ldan
52b6('dul ba): 'das kyis dgongs pa/ da ni/ bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' pa'i dus la khad kyis nye na/ su la bstan pa gtad nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da'/ gal te lha rnams la ni/ lha rnams
52b7('dul ba): bag med pa la dga' ba mang bas yun ring du gnas par mi 'gyur ro/ /'on te mi rnams la ni/ mi ni/ tshe thung ba yin pas de bzhin du yun ring du gnas par mi 'gyur gyi/ ma la ngas lha
53a1('dul ba): dang / mi rnams dang / dge slong 'od srung la gtad nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/ /snyam du dgongs nas/ rgyal po chen po yul 'khor skyong la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal
53a2('dul ba): po chen po/ khyod kyis nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bstan pa shar phyogs nas srung ba byos shig/ rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ khyod kyis
53a3('dul ba): kyang lho phyogs nas srung ba byos shig/ rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ khyod kyis kyang nub phyogs nas srung ba byos shig/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi
53a4('dul ba): bu la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ khyod kyis kyang byang phyogs nas srung ba byos shig/ de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
53a5('dul ba): to| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ji skad stsal pa de bzhin du bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis bsrung bar bgyi lags so/ /zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das las bden
53a6('dul ba): pa mthong nas zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la bstan pa mtha' dag gi
53a7('dul ba): bya ba rnams gtad nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la/ yang bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis kyang / bstan pa'i don gyi bya ba la brtson par gyis shig/ dge slong rnams the tshom
53b1('dul ba): skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams kyis las ci zhig bgyis na/ las sde'i rnam par smin pas rgyal po bzhir
53b2('dul ba): gyur cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bden pa mthong bar bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ 'di dag nyid kyis/ sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan
53b3('dul ba): rnams su las rnams byas shing bsags pa tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas/ 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/ /ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /dge slong dag/ sngon byung ba/
53b4('dul ba): bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu rnams kyis tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ ston pa zhes bya ba nas lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten
53b5('dul ba): du byung ngo / /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de'i tshe rgya mtsho chen po na klu gnyis shig gnas pa/ dbugs 'byin dang / dbugs cher 'byin no/ /shing shal ma brtsegs pa na
53b6('dul ba): yang nam mkha' lding gnyis shig yod pa/ 'gro ba'i dbang phyug dang / gtsug gi dbang phyug go /gang gi tshe dbugs 'byin dang / dbugs cher 'byin gnyis la/ de gnyis gnod
53b7('dul ba): pa byed pa de'i tshe de gnyis sa'i 'og tu 'gro bar byed do/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ dbugs 'byin dang / dbugs cher 'byin gnyis/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od
54a1('dul ba): srung gi spyan sngar skyabs su song zhing / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs pa dang / de gnyis la nam mkha' lding gis gnod par bya bar brtsams pa las/ ri rab la
54a2('dul ba): rlung dang / chu'i shugs bzhin du rdugs nas slar log pa dang / de gnyis kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ sngon ni/ kho bo cag gis khyed cag la gnod pa byas na sa'i 'og tu 'gro na/ da
54a3('dul ba): gang gis na/ kho bo cag khyed dang 'phrad nas ri rab la rlung dang chu'i shugs bzhin du rdugs nas phyir ldog pa 'di la rgyu ci zhig yod/ dbugs 'byin dang / dbugs cher 'byin gnyis kyis
54a4('dul ba): smras pa/ bdag cag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs so/ /de gnyis kyis smras pa/ gal te de
54a5('dul ba): ltar bdag cag gis kyang blang ngo / /zhes de gnyis de dag dang lhan cig 'grogs te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar dong nas de dag phyin pa dang / yang
54a6('dul ba): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan snga nas 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dag gis chos de thos nas dong ba de dag/ de gnyis kyis mthong nas nam mkha' lding de gnyis kyis/ klu
54a7('dul ba): dbugs 'byin dang / dbugs cher 'byin gnyis la dris pa/ 'gro ba pha bi dag su yin/ de gnyis kyis rgyas par smras pa dang / nam mkha' lding gnyis kyis smras pa/ gal te de ltar
54b1('dul ba): na| bdag cag gis kyang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs la smon lam gdab bo/ /zhes de gnyis kyis
54b2('dul ba): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung las skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs so/ /dbugs 'byin dang / dbugs cher 'byin gnyis ni/ slar blangs so/ /
54b3('dul ba): de nas lhan cig 'dus nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas smon lam btab pa/ ji ltar/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po 'di dag gis yang
54b4('dul ba): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar chos mnyan nas bden pa mthong ste rang gi gnas su mchis pa de bzhin du/ bdag cag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ 'jig rten
54b5('dul ba): skyong ba bzhir gyur cing / bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis/ bram ze'i khye'u bla ma zhes bgyi ba gang lags pa de la/ bram ze'i khye'u skye rgu rnams kyis
54b6('dul ba): tshe lo brgya thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan pa'i bcom ldan 'das des kyang de
54b7('dul ba): bzhin du rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram du bdag cag la chos bshad de/ bdag cag gis chos de thos nas bden pa mthong ste/ 'di bzhin du rang gi gnas su mchi bar gyur cig/ ces
55a1('dul ba): byas so/ /dge slong dag/ ji snyam du sems/ klu dang nam mkha' lding bzhi po gang yin pa de dag ni/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po gang yin pa de dag nyid yin te/ de'i
55a2('dul ba): tshe de'i dus kyi dbugs 'byin gang yin pa de ni/ yul 'khor skyong 'di nyid yin no/ /dbugs cher 'byin gang yin pa de ni/ 'phags skyes po yin no/ /'gro ba'i dbang phyug ni/ mig mi
55a3('dul ba): bzang yin no/ /gtsug gi dbang phyug ni/ rnam thos kyi bu yin te/ de'i tshe de'i dus na 'di dag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab
55a4('dul ba): pa'i gzhi rnams blangs shing / smon lam btab pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhir gyur cing / nga'i spyan sngar bden pa mthong bar byas nas rang gi
55a5('dul ba): gnas su song ngo / /chos bshad pa drang srong ke na'i bus thos nas mchog tu dga' ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i
55a6('dul ba): bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ gang thos nas mod la drang srong ke na'i bus 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mngon par rtogs nas phyir mi 'ong ba'i
55a7('dul ba): 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad do/ /de nas de rtogs pa'i dad pa dang ldan par gyur nas/ btung ba brgyad po/ co tsa'i btung ba dang / chu shing gi 'bras
55b1('dul ba): bu'i btung ba dang / rgya shug gi btung ba dang / a shwa tha'i btung ba dang / u dum ba ra'i btung ba dang / rtsub 'gyur gyi btung ba dang / 'bra go'i btung ba dang / rgun gyi btung ba khyer te/ bcom
55b2('dul ba): ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ btung ba brgyad po 'di dag ni/ sngon gyi drang srong rnams kyis bstod cing bsngags
55b3('dul ba): pa lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste bzhes su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong ke na'i bu la thugs brtse bas nye bar dgongs nas/ btung ba brgyad po
55b4('dul ba): dag bzhes so/ /bzhes nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ btung ba brgyad po 'di dag dus su sbyin len byas/ dus su mnyes/ dus su btsags so/ /dus su byin gyis
55b5('dul ba): brlabs na/ dus su longs spyad par bya zhing / dus ma yin par longs spyad par mi bya la/ nam gyi thun dang po thal nas longs spyad par mi bya'o/ /btung ba brgyad po 'di dag dus su byin len
55b6('dul ba): byas la/ dus ma yin par mnyes/ dus ma yin par btsags/ dus ma yin par byin gyis brlabs pa na/ longs spyad par mi bya'o/ /btung ba brgyad po 'di dag dus su byin len byas/ dus
55b7('dul ba): su mnyes/ dus ma yin par btsags/ dus ma yin par byin gyis brlabs pa ni/ longs spyad par mi bya'o/ /btung ba brgyad po 'di dag dus ma yin par sbyin len byas la/ dus ma yin
56a1('dul ba): par mnyes/ dus ma yin par btsags pa ni/ zas kyi 'og tu yang longs spyad par mi bya la/ nam gyi cha stod 'das na yang longs spyad par mi bya'o/ /de nas drang srong ke na'i
56a2('dul ba): bu stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
56a3('dul ba): ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gis gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong ke na'i bu la cang mi gsung
56a4('dul ba): bas gnang ngo / /de nas drang srong ke na'i bu bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ stan las langs te song ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyang rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyi 'gram
56a5('dul ba): nas mi snang bar mdzad de/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu u du mar gshegs so/ /de nas drang srong ke na'i bu nam ma langs par langs nas nang mi rnams la smras pa/ 'phags
56a6('dul ba): pa dag / bzhengs shig /bzhin bzang dag /longs shig /shing dag gshegs shig /me bus shig /zhal zas dag brim par gyis shig /bkad sa dag byi dor gyis shig /de'i
56a7('dul ba): tshe drang srong ke na'i sring mo'i bu/ drang srong ri bo zhes bya bas de nyid du nub mo gnas btab pa las/ drang srong ri bos/ drang srong ke na'i bu nam ma langs par langs nas nang mi rnams
56b1('dul ba): la smra ba thos so/ /thos nas kyang drang srong ke na'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /drang srong / ci/ khyod tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams mgron du bos sam/ yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs
56b2('dul ba): gzugs can snying po 'am/ pho brang 'khor na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs sam/ drang srong gi chos ji ltar 'dod pa yongs su rdzogs sam/ des smras pa/ ri bo/ kho bo ni/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod
56b3('dul ba): pa rnams mgron du bos pa yang ma yin/ yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po yang ma yin/ pho brang 'khor na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyang ma yin/ drang srong gi chos ji ltar
56b4('dul ba): 'dod pa yongs su rdzogs pa yang ma yin gyi/ 'on kyang kho bos sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod la spyan drangs so/ /des sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgra sngon ma thos pa thos
56b5('dul ba): nas/ ba spu thams cad zing zhes byed nas/ gus pa dang bcas pas dris pa/ drang srong / sangs rgyas zhes bya ba de/ ci zhig yin/ ri bo/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma shAkya'i sras/ shAkya'i rigs las skra dang
56b6('dul ba): kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
56b7('dul ba): pa zhig yod de/ ri bo/ sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni/ de yin no/ /ri bos smras pa/ drang srong / dge 'dun zhes bya ba de/ ci zhig yin/ drang srong ke na'i bus smras pa/ ri bo/ rgyal rigs kyi bu rnams
57a1('dul ba): las kyang skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba yang yod/ bram ze'i rigs dang / rje'u rigs
57a2('dul ba): dang / dmangs rigs kyi bu rnams las kyang zhes bya ba nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab tu byung ba de nyid kyi rjes su rab tu byung ba
57a3('dul ba): yod de zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ ri bo/ 'di ni/ dge 'dun zhes bya'o/ /ri bo/ dge 'dun 'di dang / sngar smos pa'i sangs rgyas te/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun
57a4('dul ba): 'di kho bos gdugs tshod la spyan drangs so/ /de nas drang srong ri bos sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i dran pas nang par sngar langs te/ 'khor lnga brgya dang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin
57a5('dul ba): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ drang srong ri bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
57a6('dul ba): btsun pa/ legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la bdag rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lta na/ bdag /bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs
57a7('dul ba): par spyad par bgyi'o/ /drang srong ri bo 'khor lnga brgyas legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob par gyur to// //
57b1('dul ba): 'dul ba gzhi/ bam po nga dgu pa/ de nas drang srong ke na'i bus de nyid kyi nub mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dag ces bya ba nas bstabs shing tshim par byas so/ /zhes bya ba'i
57b2('dul ba): bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol ba na/ ri bo rab tu byung ba mthong nas/ des smras pa/ ri bo/ khyod rab tu byung ngam/ rab tu byung
57b3('dul ba): ngo| |legs par byas so/ /shin tu legs par byas so/ /kho bo yang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol zin nas rab tu 'byung ngo / /de nas drang srong ke na'i bus
57b4('dul ba): sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' pa dag / rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
57b5('dul ba): gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas/ stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la
57b6('dul ba): yon bsngo ba dang / chos bshad pa mdzad nas gshegs so/ /de nas drang srong ke na'i bus rgyu lhag de dag thams cad btang ba'i chos byas nas/ 'khor lnga brgya dang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der
57b7('dul ba): dong ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ drang srong ke na'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di
58a1('dul ba): skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la bdag rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lta na/ bcom
58a2('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag tshangs par spyad par bgyi'o/ /drang srong ke na'i bus 'khor lnga brgya dang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge
58a3('dul ba): slong gi dngos po thob par gyur to/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dge slong stong po de dang / 'bab chu rab tu bzang mo'i 'gram du a mra'i tshal gdugs lta bur
58a4('dul ba): dbyar gnas par zhal gyis bzhes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka bi na la dge slong lnga brgya gtad do/ /tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la nyis brgya
58a5('dul ba): lnga bcu gtad do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la nyis brgya lnga bcu gtad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka bi nas gdams ngag phog pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ nyon mongs pa
58a6('dul ba): thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/ /tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /tshe dang
58a7('dul ba): ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la
58b1('dul ba): zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ni/ shes rab che ba rnams dang / tshe dang ldan ba mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ni/ mthu che ba dang rdzu 'phrul che ba rnams kyi
58b2('dul ba): mchog tu bstan lags na/ 'on kyang tshe dang ldan pa bram ze ka bi nas gdams ngag phog ba gang lags pa de dag ni/ dgra bcom pa/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i gang dag lags
58b3('dul ba): pa de dag ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i gang dag lags pa de dag ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan
58b4('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /da ltar du ma zad/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang ka bi na'i gdams ngag phog pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ gzugs med pa'i khams la rab tu bkod/
58b5('dul ba): mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ gzugs kyi khams dang / shA ri'i bu'i gang dag yin pa de ni/ mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod pa de nyon cig /dge slong dag /sngon
58b6('dul ba): byung ba/ dgon pa'i gnas shig na drang srong gnyis shig gnas te/ so sor 'khor lnga brgya lnga brgya yod do/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na de gnyis las gcig shi nas/ de'i bram ze'i khye'u
58b7('dul ba): rnams bla ma dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal dang / yid mi bde bas gdungs nas phan tshun 'phyan 'phyan nas/ drang srong gcig shos de'i drung du 'ongs pa dang / des de rnams mig mchi mas gang
59a1('dul ba): ba mthong nas dris pa/ bram ze'i khye'u dag /khyod kyi mkhan po de gar song / gum mo/ /des bsam pa/ bdag 'das na bram ze'i khye'u rnams 'di 'dra ba'i gnas
59a2('dul ba): skabs su 'gyur gyi/ ma la bdag gis 'di dag bsdu bar bya'o/ /snyam nas/ des de rnams dbugs phyung ste bsdus so/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ drang srong de yang nad kyis thebs bar
59a3('dul ba): gyur nas de'i slob ma mchog gsum yod pa la/ des gcig la lnga brgya/ gnyis pa la nyis brgya lnga bcu/ gsum pa la ni/ nyis brgya lnga bcu gtad do/ /de ni/ 'chi ba'i chos dang ldan par
59a4('dul ba): gyur to/ /de la lnga brgya gtad pa gang yin pa des ni/ ji ltar gzugs med pa'i khams la bkod pa de ltar gdams ngag phog go /nyis brgya lnga bcu gtad pa gang yin pa des ni/ ji ltar gzugs
59a5('dul ba): kyi khams la bkod pa de ltar gdams ngag phog go / nyis brgya lnga bcu phog pa gcig shos kyis ni/ ji ltar mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pa de ltar gdams ngag phog go /dge slong dag /ji
59a6('dul ba): snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi drang srong bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya gzugs med pa'i khams la 'god pa gang yin pa de ni/ dge slong ka bi na 'di nyid yin no/ /nyis brgya lnga bcu gzugs kyi
59a7('dul ba): khams la rab tu 'god pa gang yin pa de ni/ dge slong mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'di nyid yin no/ /gcig shos kyis nyis brgya lnga bcu mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod pa gang yin pa de ni/ dge
59b1('dul ba): slong shA ri'i bu 'di nyid yin no/ /'on kyang dge slong ka bi nas gdams ngag phog pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ dbang po rnon po yin no/ /mo'u 'gal gyi bu'i gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ dbang po 'bring po yin
59b2('dul ba): no| |shA ri'i bu'i gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ dbang po rtul po yin no/ /gal te shA ri'i bus gdams ngag ma phog par gyur na/ de dag gis dro bar gyur pa yang rtogs par mi 'gyur ro/ /ke na'i bu ni
59b3('dul ba): ral pa can/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas sngags brjod pa/ /rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis ni/ /thams cad mthun par mnyan par gyis/ /ke na'i bu yi khyim du ni/ /dus gcig cig ni ston pa po/ /dpa'
59b4('dul ba): chen nyan thos thabs cig tu/ /gdugs tshod la ni spyan drangs so/ /ke na'i bu yi khyim du ni/ /zas kyi zhal ta byed pa dag /bram ze ri bos mthong gyur te/ /mthong nas ke na'i bu la dris/ /bag ma
59b5('dul ba): len tam 'on te ci/ /rgyal po yul 'khor mgron bos sam/ /khyod kyi mchod sbyin che dus sam/ /dris pa de ni bdag la smros/ /bdag ni bag ma mi len la/ /rgyal po'am yul 'khor mgron
59b6('dul ba): ma bos/ /bdag gis sangs rgyas sems dpa' mchog /gdugs tshod la ni spyan drangs so/ /ri bo sangs rgyas sgra thos nas/ /yid skyo ba ni skyes gyur te/ /sangs rgyas de ci ke na'i bu/ /dris pa
59b7('dul ba): de ni bdag la smros/ /shAkya'i rigs las skyes pa yi/ /ston pa gang zag zla med yod/ /de ni chos kun blo ldan pas/ /de bas sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/ /'dus byas 'jig par 'gyur ba'i chos/ /
60a1('dul ba): 'das pa sangs rgyas kyis gzigs la/ /de bzhin ma 'ongs pa gzigs shing / /da ltar byung ba rnams kyang gzigs/ /mngon shes bya ba ji snyed pa/ /de kun rtogs
60a2('dul ba): pas thams cad rig / thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs/ /de bas sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/ /mngon par shes bya mngon shes byas/ /bsgom par bya ba rnams kyang bsgoms/ /
60a3('dul ba): spang bar bya rnams spangs pas na/ /de bas sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/ /gang zhig bltams par gyur pa na/ /rgya mtsho ri bor bcas pa yi/ /sa 'di rab tu g.yo mdzad pa/ /de la thal sbyar
60a4('dul ba): phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gis bdud dang nag po yi/ /rtsa lag bzhon bcas bcom nas ni/ /de bzhin gshegs kyi stobs thob pa/ /de la thal sbyar phyag 'tshal lo/ /wA ra NA si'i grong
60a5('dul ba): bzhud nas/ /gang gis rnam pa bcu gnyis pa'i/ /chos kyi 'khor lo de bskor ba/ /de la thal sbyar phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gis 'dod chags bcing bas bcings/ /'dod chags
60a6('dul ba): zhe sdang gis gdungs pa'i/ /sems can mang po grol mdzad pa/ /de la thal sbyar phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang zhig /rnam 'dren de ni ji srid na/ /shAkya'i sras
60a7('dul ba): po 'od mdzad la/ /de ring nyid nas skyabs su 'gro/ tshal sdug yid du 'ong ba de/ /gang na bar ni bram ze'i chos/ /dri za'i rgyal po lta bu yi/ /sangs rgyas bla med mthong bar 'gyur/ /na bza'
