60b1('dul ba): ngur smrig 'od ldan de/ /gser 'od nyi ma'i 'od zer can/ /de bzhin gser ni btso ma yi/ /gser las gzugs ni byas pa bzhin/ /sA la shing gi me tog dang / /kar ni ka ra'i me tog 'dra/ /rin chen
60b2('dul ba): sna tshogs spras pa yi/ /rin chen mchod sdong ji bzhin no/ /n+ya gro d+ha lta bur ni/ /chu zheng gab par gyur ba dang / /khor yug 'dom gang 'od kyis ni/ /kun nas snang ba dag tu mdzes/ /rgyal srid rgyal
60b3('dul ba): dang nye dur bcas/ /'dod pa kun dga' spangs nas ni/ /rab tu byung bar mngon byung ba'i/ /thob pa dben pa rnams la dgyes/ /spos ngad ldang ba'i seng ge ni/ /nags su 'jigs pa med pa ltar/ /seng ge
60b4('dul ba): lta bur bsnyengs med gsungs/ /bram ze sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur/ /zhal 'dzum 'jam pa'i gsung dang ni/ /tshangs pa'i gsung dang snyan pa'i gsung / /rnga yi sgra yi gsung lta bu'i/ /sangs rgyas bram
60b5('dul ba): ze mthong bar 'gyur/ /zla ba dag pa nam mkha' la/ /rgyu skar rnams kyis yongs bskor ba'i/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bu yi/ /sangs rgyas bram ze mthong bar 'gyur/ /nyi ma'i 'od zer dang ldan pa/ /
60b6('dul ba): nam mkha'i ngos la mdzes pa lta'i/ /sangs rgyas mun dang bral gyur cing / /mdzes pa bram ze mthong bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar bya ba'i khyu mchog ni/ /nog dang ldan pa'i g.yog gnas ldan/ /skyes bu khyu
60b7('dul ba): mchog stobs bcu ldan/ /sangs rgyas bram ze mthong bar 'gyur/ /rgya mtsho dag ni gting zab pa'i/ /chu chen tshad gzung med pa lta'i/ /sangs rgyas bsam gtan pa yi mchog /bsam gyis mi
61a1('dul ba): khyab bla med mthong / /nag po'i phyogs las nges byung ba'i/ /nyi ma mkha' la gsal ba dang / /me yi phung po 'bar ba lta'i/ /go'u tam sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar
61a2('dul ba): 'khor lo sgyur rgyal po/ /zham ring byed pas yongs bskor ltar/ /de bzhin rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ /dgra bcom rnams kyis mdun byas mdzes/ /'dod pa rnams la dbang sgyur dang / /ji ltar
61a3('dul ba): tshangs chen dbang phyug ltar/ /stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten khams/ /thub pa dbang ni sgyur bar mdzad/ /gang thos nye bar zhi 'gyur zhing / /sdug bsngal mtsho chen las sgrol ba/ /sdug bsngal rnam
61a4('dul ba): pa du ma dang / /sdug bsngal kun 'byung gang yin dang / /sdug bsngal nye bar zhi ba dang / /lam ni yan lag bzhi tshan gnyis/ /sbrang rtsi ma bskol ro lta bu'i/ /bden pa dag ni rab tu
61a5('dul ba): 'chang / /nor med rnams la nor sbyin zhing / /nad pa rnams kyi dpyad kyang mdzad/ /gnod pa rnams kyi skyabs gyur pas/ /skye rgu sdug bsngal grol bar mdzad/ /mun par gyur pa'i
61a6('dul ba): sems can dang / /blun po lam gol rgyu ba dang / /bde ba mya ngan 'das 'gro ba'i/ /lam ni drang po rab tu ston/ /'dod chags zhe sdang kun 'bar zhing / /gti mug rab 'bar skye
61a7('dul ba): rgu rnams/ /ji ltar sprin chen char 'bebs ltar/ /thub pa chen pos zhi bar mdzad/ /gzugs dang kha dog stobs ldan pas/ /de dang 'dra ba yod ma yin/ /sku mkhregs stobs
61b1('dul ba): mchog ldan pa ni/ /ri bo bzhin du shin tu gnas/ /rnyed dang ma rnyed bde sdug dang / /smad pa dang ni bstod pa dang / /grags pa dang ni ma grags pas/ /chu yis pad+ma bzhin ma gos/ /srog gcod
61b2('dul ba): pa ni rnam spangs te/ /ma byin pa la dga' mi byed/ /bden pa gsung zhing tshangs par spyod/ /de ni phra ma spangs pa yin/ /tshig rtsub dag ni mi gsung zhing / /dus su bab par 'jam por gsungs/ /de ni
61b3('dul ba): 'dod la brnab sems med/ /skye bo rnams la de sems byams/ /yang dag lta ba phun sum tshogs/ /ting nge 'dzin stobs spyod yul ba/ /bsam gtan chen po mngon shes drug /rdzu 'phrul
61b4('dul ba): gyis ni mkha' la gshegs/ /lha dang mi yi sgra dag ni/ /gang yin rnam pa sna tshogs gsan/ /nyon mongs can nam dge kyang rung / /pha rol gyi ni sems kyang mkhyen/ /gang dang gang du sngon
61b5('dul ba): gnas pa/ /sngon gyi gnas la mkhas pa dang / /sems can 'gro dang 'ong ba yi/ /'chi 'pho dang ni skye ba mkhyen/ /zag pa zad cing mi ldan pas/ /nyer zhi shin tu mya ngan 'das/ /dbang po zhi zhing
61b6('dul ba): thugs zhi ba/ /mtsho ni gang ba bzhin du gnas/ /pad+ma'i rdzing na glang po che/ /pad+ma drug cu lon pa ltar/ /mthong na ngoms ni mi shes pas/ /bram ze dga' ba thob par 'gyur/ /ri bo bcom ldan 'di 'dra
61b7('dul ba): ste| |de yi sku ni skyes chen gyi/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' zhing / /gzi brjid me yi phung po bzhin/ /gang gis lo brgya tshang bar ni/ /skyob pa'i bsngags pa brjod byas kyang / /de bzhin
62a1('dul ba): gshegs pa tshad med pas/ /des ni mthar phyin mi 'gyur ro/ /bram ze gang gis de mthong ba/ /de yi rnyed pa bla na med/ /gang gis mthong nas skyabs song ba/ /de yi rnyed
62a2('dul ba): pa de bas 'phags/ /bram ze ri bo thub chen gyi/ /bsngags pa thos nas skyo bar gyur/ /dben pa'i sems kyi rtog pa yis/ /ke na'i bu la 'di skad smras/ /mar gyur pa la bdag gis ni/ /de 'dra'i
62a3('dul ba): bsngags pa thos ma myong / /ke na 'chad pa dang sbyar na/ /de ni 'jig rten kun gyi gtso/ /tshong pa nor dag don gnyer ba/ /khyod kyis nga rgyal rgyal mtshan spongs/ /de la bkur sti gus byos dang / /
62a4('dul ba): bram ze dga' ba 'thob par 'gyur/ /bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya yi/ /slob ma dag gis mdun bdar te/ /sangs rgyas bzhugs pa bzang po der/ /bram ze ri bo song bar gyur/ /lha rnams kyi ni dga'
62a5('dul ba): tshal ltar/ /me tog shing ni phun sum tshogs/ /rnam par dben zhing sgra med cing / /bya yi tshogs kyis bsnyen gyur pa/ mi min gdug pa med rgyu ba/ /shAkya'i sras kyis bsten pa yi/ /chos kyi rgyal
62a6('dul ba): po'i gnas su ni/ /de nas bram zes zhugs par gyur/ /ma dul 'dul ba kha lo sgyur/ /skyes bu dam pa mthong nas ni/ /ri bo yis ni tshig gsol pa/ /shes ldan ji ga snyun mi mnga'am/ /ka la
62a7('dul ba): ping+ka'i sgra dbyangs can/ /sangs rgyas snyan cing gsal ba'i bkas/ /ri bo la ni slar gsungs pa/ /nga la nad ni yod min te/ /nyes pa med cing sgrib pa med/ /the tshom thams cad rnam par bcad/ /
62b1('dul ba): rnam par grol zhing mi ldan pa/ /nga ni zag med thal ba med/ /'jig rten na ni rdul med rgyu/ /gtsang zhing dag la dri nga med/ /des na bram ze nga gtsang ste/ /'khon dang 'jigs pa kun las brgal/ /ri
62b2('dul ba): bo khyod kyang 'ongs pa legs/ /stan 'di la ni legs par 'dug /bram ze ji ga bde 'am khyod/ /lus ni ngal bar ma gyur mod/ /dpa' bo chen po khyod mthong bas/ /thub pa chen po de ltar bde/ /rgyan
62b3('dul ba): rnams kyis ni brgyan pa ltar/ /yid ni rab tu dga' ba yis/ /de dang rjes su 'tsham pa'i gtam/ /rim pa bzhin du byas nas ni/ /de nas bram ze 'dzem pa dang / /dman pa'i yid kyis 'dug par
62b4('dul ba): gyur/ /klog pa dang ni gsang tshig 'dzin/ /rig byed gsum gyis rigs mthar phyin/ /bram ze ri bo 'dug nas ni/ /thub pa'i mtshan la rtog par byed/ /'jig rten gyi ni mgon po yi/ /sku la mtshan
62b5('dul ba): ni sum cu mthong / /ljags srab 'doms sba sbubs nub pa/ /gnyis la ri bo the tshom za/ /thub pa chen po'i mtshan rnams la/ /the tshom yid gnyis gyur nas ni/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i rigs/
62b6('dul ba): bden pa'i mtshan la yongs zhus pa/ /thub pa chen po'i mtshan rnams ni/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis thob pa gang / /go'u tam khyod kyi sku dag la/ /gnyis ni g.yar sngar ma bab bo/ /mi yi dam pa
62b7('dul ba): 'doms kyi ni/ /sba ba sbubs su nub lags sam/ /ljags bzang zhes ni bgyi ba yang / /ji ga thung ba ma lags grang / /thub chen bdag gis ci nas kyang / /ljags ring glo bar chud 'gyur
63a1('dul ba): bar/ /ljags srab myur du brkyang mdzad de/ /bdag gi the tshom bsal du gsol/ /rnam par 'dren rnams 'jig rten du/ /brgya lam na ni lan
63a2('dul ba): 'ga' 'byung / /u dum wa ra'i me tog bzhin/ /thub pa chen po dkon pa lags/ /sos ka skom pa chab dang ni/ /bkres pa la ni g.yar zas dang / /nad pa sman la ji lta bar/ /ston
63a3('dul ba): pa la ni bkur sti bgyid/ /ka la ping+ka'i sgra dbyangs can/ /sangs rgyas snyan cing gsal ba'i bkas/ /ri bo la ni slar gsungs pa/ /bram ze the tshom spangs bar gyis/ /ljags kyis spyan dang
63a4('dul ba): snyan dag ni/ /rab tu khebs par ljags ring gis/ /zhal gyi dkyil 'khor khebs par mdzad/ /rdzu 'phrul bzhi la mkhas pa yi/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis kyang bstan mdzad pas/ /thub pa'i 'doms
63a5('dul ba): sba sbubs nub pa/ /bram ze ri bos mthong bar gyur/ /thub pa chen po'i mtshan rnams la/ /the tshom med cing zug rngu phyung / /sems kyi rtog pa rab dga' nas/ /ri bo yis ni tshig gsol
63a6('dul ba): pa/ /sum cu gnyis dang dpe byad rnams/ /bdag gis gsang tshig las thos pa/ /de kun khyod kyi sku 'di la/ /yongs su rdzogs te ma tshang med/ /dge dang ldan pas spyod pa bzang / /
63a7('dul ba): legs par 'khrungs pas blta na sdug /nyan thos dge 'dun dbus na ni/ /gdugs ba dal ba ni lta bur mdzes/ /dam par bsngags pa khyod la ni/ /dge sbyong dngos pos ci zhig bgyi/ /
63b1('dul ba): ma yi khyu mchog khyod lta bu/ /dpung gi yan lag bzhi dag dang / /rin chen bdun dang ldan pa yin/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'os/ /sa bdag rgyal po mdzad nas ni/ /sa steng 'khor
63b2('dul ba): los bsgyur ba mdzod/ /ri bo nga ni rgyal po ste/ /chos kyi rgyal chen bla na med/ /nga ni sa yi dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed/ /nga yi rigs ni rgyal rigs te/ /nga ni dge ba'i
63b3('dul ba): rigs las 'khrungs/ /bdud dpung bcas par bcom nas ni/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub dam pa thob/ /bram ze nga dran 'khor lo ste/ /nga yi shes rab blon po yin/ /brtson 'grus shugs mgyogs
63b4('dul ba): rta pho ni/ /btang na dang la 'byung ba yin/ /nga yi nor bu dam pa ni/ /ting 'dzin mun pa gsal byed yin/ /btang snyoms glang chen dam pa ste/ /bskul na dang la rgyug pa yin/ /chags bcas bud
63b5('dul ba): med 'dod pa ltar/ /bram zer nga dga' 'dod pa yin/ /bram ze nga yi khyim bdag ni/ /shin tu sbyangs nor dam pa yin/ /nga yi byang chub yan lag bdun/ /'jig rten kun 'das rin chen des/ /
63b6('dul ba): long bar gyur cing gnyid log pa'i/ /skye rgu 'di dag sad par bya/ /phyogs rnams kun nas nga rgyal bas/ /nga la bsdo ba'i dgra yod min/ /nyon mongs tshogs rnams 'joms pa yi/ /'khor
63b7('dul ba): bzhi po dag nga yi sras/ /rdzu 'phrul kun dga' phun sum tshogs/ /lam gyi bzhi mdor sprul pa byas/ /mdo sde skyes pa'i rabs dag bkram/ /skyes bu chen po rnams kyis bsten/ /rnam
64a1('dul ba): thar gsum po sgo mo can/ /dran pa'i srung ma rnams kyis bsrungs/ /ngo tsha khrel yod kyis g.yogs pa'i/ /grong khyer sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyis/ /bsten pa dag tu
64a2('dul ba): de bzhin gshegs/ /rgyal po nga ni bzhugs nas su/ /nga yi chos kyis g.yul sprad de/ /chos kyi rnga chen brdungs nas ni/ /bdud rnams mtha' dag bcom byas te/ /nga ni byang chub phyir
64a3('dul ba): dbang bskur/ /tshad med pa dag rab bsgoms pa/ /nga yi rgyan du bdog pa yin/ /tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po yis/ /nyon mongs pa dag rab tu bzlog /pha rol rab tu rgol bcom ste/ /
64a4('dul ba): rnam par bcom zhing rmeg med byas/ /srog chags rnams la 'jig rten 'dir/ /snang ba sbyin zhing yang dag spyad/ /nga ni bden par gnas bcas nas/ /ye shes kyis ni mtshon gyis bcad/ /
64a5('dul ba): rdzu 'phrul rkang pa gnas yin te/ /zhi gnas dag ni 'dzin stangs yin/ /tshul khrims shing rta sgra snyan la/ /nga yi lhag mthong kha lo sgyur/ /bzod dang des pa'i go bgos nas/ /lam
64a6('dul ba): bsgoms pas na g.yul ngor ni/ /gang gis sgrib pa 'joms pa yi/ /dbang po lnga yi dong pa dang / /gang gis nyon mongs theg 'jud pa'i/ /yang dag spong ba bzhi po yis/ /ngas ni
64a7('dul ba): dpa' bo'i g.yul sprad de/ /chos kyi rnga bo che brdungs nas/ /bdud dpung bcas par bcom byas te/ /nga ni byang chub dbang bskur to/ /rig pas ma rig bcom nas ni/ /phung po skye zhing
64b1('dul ba): 'jig pa can/ /g.yul gyi rtse mo brgal te nga / /skye rgu byang chub phyir sangs rgyas/ /gang gis skye rgu gnod byed pa/ /'jig rten chom rkun chen po gsum/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/
64b2('dul ba): de kun nga yis bcom pas na/ /mngon shes kun gyi stobs byung bas/ /nga ni dgra bcom yon gnas 'os/ /zhing gshin pa la zhugs pa yis/ /sbyin sreg rnams kyang len pa yin/ /brtson 'grus
64b3('dul ba): dam pa brtsams nas ni/ /ngas ni zag pa rnams bcom mo/ /chu bo che las brgal nas ni/ /bsgral pa'i phyir ni gnas pa yin/ /ji ltar seng ge mche ba'i stobs/ /nags su srog chags dang
64b4('dul ba): phrad nas/ /chung dang 'bring dang chen po'ang rung / /de la mtshungs par snun pa ltar/ /mi yi seng ge rnam 'dren pa/ /rdzogs sangs de bzhin 'jig rten ni/ /byis pa'am 'bring ngam chen po la/ /
64b5('dul ba): mnyam par chos ni ston par mdzad/ /go'u tam khyod kyis 'di ru ni/ /nad pa bdag gi the tshom sol/ /zug rngu 'byin pa rnams dang ni/ /mig mkhan rnams kyi mchog khyod lags/ /khyod kyi
64b6('dul ba): the tshom bsal bar byas/ /bram ze khyod ni 'dun par gyis/ /grags ldan rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /mthong ba rnyed par dka' ba ste/ /gang zhig 'di ni rnyed dka' ba/ /brgya lam na ni
64b7('dul ba): lan 'ga' 'byung / /bram ze rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nga / /chos kyi rgyal po bla med yin/ /de bzhin gshegs la ris gsol ba/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes bka' stsal te/ /ma 'dres
65a1('dul ba): 'khor lo bskor mdzad na/ /go'u ta ma ji skad gsung ba bzhin/ /khyod kyis 'khor lo bskor ba gang / /rjes su mkhas pa bskor bgyid pa/ /ston pa nyid
65a2('dul ba): 'khrungs nyan thos ni/ /sde dpon dag tu su 'gyur lags/ /bram ze nga la nyan thos ni/ /shes rab mtshungs pa'i sras yod pa/ /nye rgyal zhes ni grags pa'o/ /mang du thos pa shA ri'i bu/ /
65a3('dul ba): mdud pa kun las rnam grol ba/ /nyer zhi zag pa med yod de/ /ngas ni 'khor lo gang bskor ba/ /mkhas pa rjes su bskor bas byed/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas chos dang ni/ /e ma'o
65a4('dul ba): nyan thos phun sum tshogs/ /e ma'o rin chen dam pa gsum/ /'jig rten byung ba ngo mtshar che/ /bzang po khyod kyi nyan thos su/ /bdag gis g.yar gyis blangs bgyis la/ /kye ma'o
65a5('dul ba): chos kyi bcud 'tshal nas/ /shin tu mya ngan 'das par bgyi/ /sems rtog rab tu dga' gyur nas/ /de nas bram ze skyo gyur te/ /dben pa 'dod pa'i sems kyis ni/ /'khor la
65a6('dul ba): 'di skad ces smras so/ /nags na seng ge sgra 'byin ltar/ /bsam gtan chen po zug rngu 'byin/ /spyan dang ldan pas ci gsungs pa/ /'di ni shes ldan dag nyon cig /gang dag 'dod
65a7('dul ba): pa rjes su song / /gang dag mi 'dod de dag dengs/ /shes ldan mchog gi bstan pa la/ /de ring kho nar rab 'byung ngo / /tshangs spyod 'di la legs spyad cing / /lam nyid shin tu goms
65b1('dul ba): byas na/ /bag yod pa la gnas pa yi/ /rab byung 'bras bu bcas par 'byung / /gal te khyed cag rab 'byung zhing / /bsnyen par rdzogs par 'dod na ni/ /bram ze ral pa 'dir bregs te/ /bdag
65b2('dul ba): cag rab tu 'byung bar bya/ /sems rtog rab tu mgu gyur nas/ /sor mo bcu yis thal sbyar te/ /bla gos phrag pa gcig gzar nas/ /bram ze ri bos de gsol pa/ /bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya
65b3('dul ba): po| |'di dag thal sbyar 'khod pa ni/ /thub chen rab tu 'byung ba dang / /bsnyen par rdzogs par thob par 'tshal/ /de nas ston par thugs rje can/ /drang srong chen po thugs brtse bas/ /dge
65b4('dul ba): slong tshur shog bka' stsal pas/ /de dag bsnyen par rdzogs par gyur/ /shes rab chen po shA ri'i bu/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan pa mo'u 'gal dang / /dga' yod gnas brtan ka pi ni/ /spobs pa
65b5('dul ba): rtogs par khong du chud/ /chu bo bzang po'i 'gram du ni/ /yid du 'ong ba'i tshal khrod du/ /spobs pa byang ba'i gnas brtan gyis/ /de dag la ni gdams ngag phog /der ni de las chos kyi
65b6('dul ba): gtam/ /rjes su mthun par de shes nas/ /ring por ma thogs rnam grol te/ /dam pa'i don la rab tu bkod/ /de dag mthong thob bde gyur pas/ /mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan 'das/ /sangs
65b7('dul ba): rgyas 'jig rten 'dren pa la/ /rab tu mgu bas phyag byas so/ /dam pa'i chos dang tshogs gtso dang / /rgyal bas bsngags pa'i bslab pa dang / /ting nge 'dzin dang bged pa dang / /bag yod
66a1('dul ba): pa la phyag byas so/ /de bas bdag la phan 'dod pa'am/ /bdag nyid chen po mngon 'dod pas/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ /bkur sti byos la skyabs
66a2('dul ba): su dengs/ /'di na de nyid gzigs pa yis/ /'jig rten na ni skyabs su bsngags/ /gnod pa rnams kyis skrag pa la/ /bde ba kun ni rab sbyin mdzad/ /chos kyi rgyal po nyi ma'i gnyen//
66a3('dul ba): sangs rgyas bstan pa chos kyi ni/ /bdag nyid chen po mchog gyur la/ /thar pa 'dod pas rtag tu bsten/ /ke na'i bu'i tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so// //de nas bcom
66a4('dul ba): ldan 'das yul ka shi nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/ ka shi'i tshong rdal du byon to/ /ka shi'i tshong rdal de na/ sngon 'breg mkhan byed byed pa rab tu byung ba pha spad gnyis shig yod pa las/
66a5('dul ba): bus smras pa/ pha/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu ka shi'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs nas gtsug lag khang du byon pa/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge
66a6('dul ba): 'dun sku mnyel gyi/ ma la bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa nas thug la spyan drangs na/ de la ci khyod thug pa sta gon byed dam/ 'on te dge
66a7('dul ba): slong gi dge 'dun spyan 'dren/ des smras pa/ khyod song la dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drongs shig/ nga ni/ thug pa sta gon byed do/ /des dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs so/ /
66b1('dul ba): de yang me long zhig thogs nas/ tshong dus su song ba las/ des de na tshong dpon zhig skra dang kha spu ring ba mthong nas/ des de la me long bstan pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ 'di lta bu'i mkhyen
66b2('dul ba): pa yang mnga' 'am/ des smras pa/ yod do/ /gal te mnga' na bregs shig /des breg par brtsams pa dang / khyim bdag gnyid log nas bregs zin pa dang sad do/ /des smras pa/ 'phags
66b3('dul ba): pa| bregs lags sam/ khyim bdag/ bregs zin to/ /de mgu nas smras pa/ 'phags pa/ bdag lhag par glo ba dga' bas/ khyod mchog ci bzhed pa 'don to/ /des smras pa/ kho bos
66b4('dul ba): sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun nas thug la spyan drangs kyi/ nas thug byin cig/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ nas thug lta khyod la ci rung / bza' ba dang / bca' ba bsod
66b5('dul ba): pa dag dbul gyi/ bzhud la spyan drongs shig /nad med par gyur cig ces smras nas de song ngo / /de nas khyim bdag des gtsang zhing bsod pa zhes bya ba nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung
66b6('dul ba): la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas bza' ba dang / bca' ba bsod pa dag brim pa na/ dge slong rnams kyis bsam pa/ bdag cag
66b7('dul ba): ngan pa la mgron du bos na/ kha zas bsod pa 'di bdag cag gis ji ltar blang zhes/ de rnams kyis ma blangs pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
67a1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te ngan pa la mgron du pos la/ kha zas bsod pa rnyed na longs spyad par bya ste/ da la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /bcom
67a2('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba de ni/ dge slong dag rigs dang mthun pa'i snod thogs pa las gyur gyi/ de lta bas na dge slong gis rang gi bzo bstan par mi
67a3('dul ba): bya| rigs dang mthun pa'i snod kyang bsrel bar mi bya'o/ /bsrel na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /sngon sman pa yin na/ gtsa' khab kyi snod bsrel ba dang / sngon yi ge pa yin na/ ram
67a4('dul ba): phyis bsrel ba dang / bzo mkhan rab tu byung ba khab ral bsrel ba ni/ ma gtogs so/ /bcom ldan 'das gyad yul nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/ sdig can du byon nas/ sdig can
67a5('dul ba): na srin bu bad pa'i tshal stug po na bzhugs so/ /sdig can na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i zhang po gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan zhes bya ba zhig gnas pa de shin tu ma dad pa zhig ste/
67a6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das sdig can gyi gyad yul nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te sdig can du byon nas/ sdig can na srin bu pad pa'i tshal stug po na bzhugs so zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang
67a7('dul ba): gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag/ bcom ldan 'das gyad yul nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ sdig can du byon nas/ sdig can na srin bu pad pa'i tshal stug po na
67b1('dul ba): bzhugs so/ /zhes thos kyi/ gal te bdag cag re res sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol na/ gzhan gyis skabs mi rnyed par 'gyur pas/ ye khrims shig
67b2('dul ba): bca' bar bya ste/ bdag cag sus kyang gcig pus sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol bar mi bya zhing / bdag cag 'dus pa kho nas gdugs tshod gsol bar
67b3('dul ba): bya'o/ /bdag cag las gang zhig gcig pu kho nas gdugs tshod gsol na/ de la tshogs kyis kaR+sha pa Na drug cu'i chad pas gcad do/ /de nas sdig can gyi gyad thams cad 'dus nas/ bcom
67b4('dul ba): ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan
67b5('dul ba): 'das kyis chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis sdig can gyi gyad rnams la zhes bya ba nas yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas
67b6('dul ba): sdig can gyi gyad rnams stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
67b7('dul ba): ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig sang bdag cag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan
68a1('dul ba): 'das kyis sdig can gyi gyad rnams la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas sdig can gyi gyad rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/
68a2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ stan las langs te song ngo / /de nas gyad sna
68a3('dul ba): chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan ni/ de nyid na 'dug pa dang / de la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/ 'od ldan khyod dad par gyur tam ci/ des smras pa/ bdag dad par ma gyur mod kyi/
68a4('dul ba): 'on kyang tshogs kyi khrims su bcas pa zhes bya ba nas/ kaR+sha pa Na drug cu'i chad pas gcad do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ khyod chad pas 'jigs nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i
68a5('dul ba): phyir 'ongs pa lta zhig/ btsun pa/ de lta lags so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan khrid de/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song
68a6('dul ba): nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan 'di ni/ sangs rgyas la mngon par ma dad/ chos la ma lags/ dge
68a7('dul ba): 'dun la ma lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar 'di sangs rgyas la mngon par dad cing / chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dad par 'gyur pa de ltar chos legs par bshad du gsol/
68b1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan la gang thos pas gyad sna chen po la gtogs
68b2('dul ba): pa 'od ldan sangs rgyas la mngon par dad/ chos dang / dge 'dun la mngon par dad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad do/ /de nas gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan stan las
68b3('dul ba): langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na pa de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad des gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dge
68b4('dul ba): slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ 'od ldan/ nga sngar sdig can gyi gyad rnams kyis spyan drangs
68b5('dul ba): zin to/ /bcom ldan 'das gnang bar mdzod cig dang / ji ltar sdig can gyi gyad rnams btub pa de ltar bdag bgyid do/ /'od ldan/ gal te sdig can gyi gyad rnams btub na/ de
68b6('dul ba): bzhin du ngas khyod la gnang ngo / /de nas gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag btsal nas/ stan las langs te chas nas/
68b7('dul ba): sdig can gyi gyad rnams gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / sdig can gyi gyad rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/ /shes ldan dag/ re zhig sdod cig/ bdag gis thog mar bcom
69a1('dul ba): ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol nas/ de'i 'og tu khyed cag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs
69a2('dul ba): tshod gsol na dka' bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de rnams kyis smras pa/ kho bo cag gis sngar sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs zin pas/ kho bo cag mi nyan to/ /des
69a3('dul ba): smras pa/ ji ste mi btub na/ bca' ba dang btung ba re re zhing brim mo/ /de na ma dad pa gang yin pa de dag gis smras pa/ mi gnang ngo / /dad pa can gang yin pa de dag gis smras pa/ shes
69a4('dul ba): ldan dag/ 'di dad pa med pa zhig las/ 'dis dge 'dun mnga' ba'i yon dag 'bul bar 'gyur bas gnang ngo / /zhes de rnams kyis de la gnang ngo / /de nas des g.yos mkhan
69a5('dul ba): dag bkug ste bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag/ kho bos yo byad thams cad sbyar gyi/ bca' ba gcig pu gang kho nas 'grangs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sta gon gyis shig/ des dri zhim po
69a6('dul ba): sna tshogs kyi rdzas la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i yo byad rnams phog pa dang / de rnams kyis dri zhim po sna tshogs kyis yongs su rgyas pa re res re re 'grangs par 'gyur pa'i bca' ba gang yin
69a7('dul ba): pa dag byas so/ /de nas sdig can gyi gyad rnams kyis nub mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i zhes bya ba nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so zhes bya
69b1('dul ba): ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan gyis bca' ba dang / btung ba brim par brtsams pa dang / dge slong rnams 'gyod bas longs ma spyad do/ /bcom
69b2('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yon bdag la blta bar bya'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis sdig can gyi gyad rnams la bltas pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag/ gyad sna chen po
69b3('dul ba): la gtogs pa 'od ldan gyis bdag cag bslus lags kyi/ bzhes shig /de nas gyad sna chen po la gtogs pa 'od ldan gyis bca' ba brims pa dang / de kho nas dge slong rnams 'grangs te/
69b4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis yon bsngo ba mdzad de gshegs pas/ sdig can gyi gyad rnams kyi zas de dag longs ma spyad par gyur to/ /nyi ma gzhan zhig la dge slong rnams bsod snyoms la zhugs pa
69b5('dul ba): dang | bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/ sangs rgyas tshur spyon/ chos tshur spyon/ dge 'dun tshur spyon/ 'di dag snoms shig/ dge slong rnams 'gyod pas ma blangs so/ /bcom
69b6('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ci/ kho bo la sbyin nam/ 'on te bcom ldan 'das rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog gang yin pa de la dbul zhes dri bar bya'o/ /gal te bcom ldan 'das rkang gnyis
69b7('dul ba): rnams kyi mchog gang yin pa de la'o zhes smra na/ bdag gir mi bya'o/ /'on te bdag cag gi sangs rgyas ni/ khyod nyid lags so zhes smra na/ blang bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /de bzhin
70a1('dul ba): du chos 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyi mchog gang yin pa de la'am zhes brjod par bya zhing / dge 'dun tshogs rnams kyi mchog gang yin pa de la'am zhes rgyas par
70a2('dul ba): sbyar par bya'o/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /khyim bdag cig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bsro khang la spyan drangs so/ /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pas ri zhes bya ba/
70a3('dul ba): gzhon nu thor bu lang tshol bab pa/ rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon pa/ bsnyen par rdzogs nas ring po ma lon pa/ chos 'dul ba 'dir 'ongs nas ring po ma lon pa des bsam pa/ bcom ldan
70a4('dul ba): 'das kyis gang gis nyung du byin pa dang / gang gis mang du byin pa dang / gang gis bzang po byin pa dang / gang gis yid dga' bas las byas pa dang / gang gis rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis
70a5('dul ba): rjes su yi rang ba de dag thams cad ni/ bsod nams kyi skal ba can du 'gyur ro/ /zhes gsungs kyi/ ma la bdag gis kyang las shig bya'o snyam nas des shing gsheg par brtsams pa las/
70a6('dul ba): ji tsam na/ shing rul pa zhig gi ser ka nas sbrul gdug pa zhig byung nas/ rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthe bo la zin pa dang / de dug gi shugs kyis brgyal nas sa la 'gyel te/ lbu bar skyug cing
70a7('dul ba): bzhin yang gyur/ mig kyang gyur te/ de de ltar sdug bsngal ba/ bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ 'di khyim bdag su zhig gi bu yin/ gzhan dag
70b1('dul ba): gis smras pa/ che ge mo zhig gi'o/ /de dag gis smras pa/ dge sbyong shAkya'i sras mgon med pa rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung gi/ gal te rab tu ma byung bar gyur na/ nye du rnams kyis 'di la dpyad
70b2('dul ba): byed pa zhig ces pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman pa la dris la dpyad byos shig/ dge slong dag gis sman
70b3('dul ba): pa la dris pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ sbyar ba'i zas gsol cig pa'i skabs de/ dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman
70b4('dul ba): pas bstan na sbyin par bya'o/ /dge slong dag gis zas sbyar ba ji lta bu yin pa ma shes nas/ de rnams kyis sman pa la dris pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa dag/ khyod nyid kyi ston pa bcom
70b5('dul ba): ldan 'das ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs pa kho na yin te/ de nyid mkhyen to zhes pa dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
70b6('dul ba): stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ zas sbyar ba ni/ lci ba dang / gcin dang / thal ba dang / sa'o/ /de la lci ba ni/ byung nas ring po ma lon pa'i be'u rnams kyi'o/ /gcin yang de kho na'o/ /thal ba ni/ shing
70b7('dul ba): lnga po/ kan tsa ni'i dang / ka pi da ka'i dang / a shwa tha'i dang / u dum wa ra'i dang / n+ya gro d+ha'i 'o/ /sa ni/ sa las sor bzhi'i 'og nas phyung ba'o/ /'di ni/ sbyar ba'i zas yin no/ /de nas dge
71a1('dul ba): slong rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa sa ri la zas sbyar ba byin na/ 'on kyang sos par ma gyur pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
71a2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis nga las rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags bzung nas kun chub par byas te/ dge slong sa ri la srung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang /
71a3('dul ba): yongs su bzung ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / dug bsad pa dang / mtshams bcad pa dang / sa bcing bar nus sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal du gsol/
71a4('dul ba): mnyan te bgyi'o// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po drug cu pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /sangs
71a5('dul ba): rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di lta ste/ a ma le/ bi ma le/ nir ma le/ mang+ga le/ hi ra N+ye/ hi ra N+ye/ gar+b+he/ b+ha dre/ su b+ha dre/ sa man+ta
71a6('dul ba): b+ha dre/ shrI b+ha dre/ sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni/ pA ra mAr+tha sA d+ha ni/ sarba a nar+tha/ pra sha ma Ni/ sarba mang+ga la sA d+ha ni/ ma na se/ ma na se/ ma hA ma na se/ a ts+yud te/ ad b+hU te/ a da t+yed b+hU te/ mu ka te/ mo
71a7('dul ba): tsa ni/ mo k+Sha ni/ a ra dze/ bi ra dze/ a mri te/ a ma re/ a ma ra Ni/ brah+me/ brah+ma swa re/ pU ra Ne/ pUr+Na/ ma no ra the/ mu ka te/ dzI wa n+te/ sa ri'i gnod pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / nad thams
71b1('dul ba): cad pas srung sa shig swAhA/ btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags blangs nas/ dge slong sa ri la bde legs
71b2('dul ba): su 'gyur bar byas pas/ dug med nas sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du gyur to/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom
71b3('dul ba): ldan 'das/ ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags sman pa dang / gces spras bgyid pa ngo mtshar che lags so/ /dge slong dag /da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/ ji ltar 'das
71b4('dul ba): pa'i dus na yang nga log par ltung ba'i lus mi khom par gyur pa na/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mos phan pa dang / gces spras byas pa de nyon cig /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba/ ri'i rgyal po
71b5('dul ba): gangs ri'i lho phyogs kyi ngos la/ rma bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ de nang par rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags 'dis bde legs su 'gyur ba byas te/ nyin mo bde legs su
71b6('dul ba): gnas/ nub kar bde legs su 'gyur ba byas te/ mtshan mo bde legs su gnas so/ /de dus gzhan zhig na 'dod pa'i 'dod chags la lhag par chags/ 'dod pa rnams la zhen/
71b7('dul ba): 'chums/ brgyal/ myos/ rab tu rmongs/ rab tu brgyal te/ bag med pas nags kyi rma bya mor ba tu mang po rnams dang lhan cig tu kun dga'i ra ba nas kun dga'i ra ba dang / skyed mos
72a1('dul ba): tshal nas skyed mos tshal dang / ri'i ngos nas ri'i ngos su rgyu ba las/ ji tsam na/ ri'i ser ga zhig tu zhugs pa dang / de der yun ring du phyir rgol pa/ dgrar
72a2('dul ba): gyur pa/ 'tshe bar gyur pa/ glags lta ba rnams kyis rma bya rnyis bzung ste/ de ni/ mi mdza' ba'i nang du son pa dang / rab tu rmongs pa las dran pa rnyed nas/ rma bya chen mo'i rig pa 'di kho
72a3('dul ba): na yid la byas so/ /'di lta ste/ a ma le/ bi ma le/ nir ma le/ mang+ga l+ye/ hi ra N+ye/ hi ra N+ye/ gar+b+he/ b+ha dre/ su b+ha dre/ sa man+ta b+ha dre/ shrI b+ha dre/ sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni/ pa ra mA r+tha sA d+ha ni/ sarba
72a4('dul ba): a nar+tha/ pra sha ma ni/ sarba mang+ga la sA d+ha ni/ ma na se/ ma na se/ mahA ma na se/ ad ts+yud te/ ad b+hu te/ ad t+yed b+hu te/ muka te/ mo tsa ni/ mok+Sha ni/ a ra dze/ bi ra dze/ a ma re/ a
72a5('dul ba): mri te/ a ma ra Ni/ brah+ma swa re/ pU ra Ne/ pUr+Na/ ma no ra the/ muka te/ dzI wa n+te/ bdag gnod pa thams cad las srungs shig swAhA/ de rma bya'i rnyi chad nas bros so/ /dge slong dag/ ji snyam
72a6('dul ba): du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rma bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni/ nga yin te/ de na yang nga la rma bya chen mo'i rigs sngags kyis phan pa dang / gces spras byas so/ /
72a7('dul ba): da ltar na yang ngas rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags kyis pham pa dang / gces spras byas so/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rig sngags kyis dge slong sa ri la ji tsam pa bde legs su
72b1('dul ba): 'gyur ba bgyis pa la gzigs/ dge slong dag /da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi/ ji ltar 'das pa'i de yang nyon cig /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba wA ra NA si'i grong khyer na/ sbrul sngags mkhan
72b2('dul ba): zhig yod do/ /rgyal rigs kyi khye'u zhig sprul gyis zin nas de shi ba dang / sbrul sngags mkhan gyis rig sngags kyis de sos par byas so/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus
72b3('dul ba): kyi sbrul sngags mkhan gang yin pa de ni/ nga nyid yin no/ /de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khye'u gang yin pa de ni/ dge slong sa ri yin no/ /sman gyi gzhi rdzogs so// //gos kyi gzhi'i
72b4('dul ba): bsdus pa'i sdom ni/ 'tsho byed dang ni gso ras dang / /de bzhin kha tshar ring po dang / /dbyar ral bar ni rig bya dang / 'chi ba'i dus dang nye dga' dang / /tha ma dag ni nad pa yin/ /bsdus
72b5('dul ba): pa'i sdom ni/ 'tsho byed dang ni gsum 'dral dang / /dbyar gyi ras chen gding ba dang / /g.yon pa bde gshegs mon dar dang / /bal dang sha ma zar ma'i ras/ /sdom la/ dum bu
72b6('dul ba): sa skyong seng ge dang / de bzhin yangs par song ba dang / /sems 'phrog drang srong sa 'tsho dang / /a mra skyong dang 'jigs med dang / /tshong dpon chung ma rigs skyes dang / /sman pa yi ni
72b7('dul ba): lung dang ni/ /rdo 'jog dang ni bzang byed dang / /u dum wa ra gzhal ba dang / /bskyed dang rgyal chen skyed mos tshal/ /bcom brlag gyad dang bud med sbrul/ /ya mu na dang dur khrod
73a1('dul ba): dang / /yangs pa mig dang srin gyi med/ /rgyal po'i khab bdun bzhi lnga dang / /'tsho byed sde tshan bsdus pa yin/ /lus 'phags na rgyal bo 'phags skyes po zhes
73a2('dul ba): bya ba/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug go /de'i blon po dum bu la sogs pa lnga brgya yod pa las/ blon po'i
73a3('dul ba): mchog dum bus chos dang mthun par rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ tha snyad du bya ba yang rigs pas lta bar byed do/ /des na skyes pa'i tshogs thams cad de'i ngor lta zhing 'dug go /des rigs
73a4('dul ba): mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ /dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed de/ de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las
73a5('dul ba): khye'u zhig btsas te/ de'i btsas ston nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu zhes bya ba nas sa skyong zhes bya bar btags so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de yang rtse bar byed/
73a6('dul ba): dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las khye'u zhig btsas te/ gong ma bzhin du rgyas par sbyar te/ de ni/ seng ge zhes bya bar btags so/ /sa skyong dang / seng ge rim
73a7('dul ba): gyis gzhon nur gyur na yang / blon po'i mchog dum bu ni/ thog ma nyid nas dpa' zhing pha rol gnon pa/ gnas lnga la byang ba yin te/ des na blon po rnams kyi mchog tu gyur to/ /
73b1('dul ba): gang gi tshe bu'i mthu skyes pa de'i tshe lhag par yang blon po thams cad zil gyis mnan te 'dug go /de nas blon po de rnams zil gyis non pas/ mi bzod pa skyes nas phan tshun du gros byas te rgyal
73b2('dul ba): po'i drung du dong ngo / /de nas skabs la bab par rig nas rgyal po la smras pa/ lha/ rgyal po su lags/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag gis brtag tu ci yod/ rgyal po lha yin mod/ gzhan
73b3('dul ba): su zhig yin/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ rgyal po ni/ dum pu lags kyi/ lha ma lags so/ /gal te de 'tshal bar gyur na/ lha rgyal srid las phyung nas rang nyid cod pan bcings te rgyal
73b4('dul ba): srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal pos bsam pa/ des 'di dag thams cad zil gyis mnan pas/ des na dbyen byed do snyam mo/ /re zhig dus gzhan zhig na/
73b5('dul ba): rgyal po blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te 'dug pa dang / blon po'i mchog dum bu rgol ba dang / phyir rgol ba brgya stong gis yongs su bskor nas rgya bo'i pho brang du zhugs te/
73b6('dul ba): rgyal po'i pho brang de gang bar byas nas 'dug go /gang gi tshe rgyal srid kyi bya ba byas nas phyir byung ba de'i tshe/ yang rgyal po'i pho brang de stong par 'dug go/ rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan
73b7('dul ba): dag / skye bo'i tshogs thams cad phyir byung bar gyur tam/ blon po rnams kyis glags snyed nas de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ gang gi slad du snyan du gsol ba lha'i spyan sngar bab lags
74a1('dul ba): mod/ gal te dum bu 'tshal bar gyur na/ lha rgyal srid las phyung nas/ rang nyid kyis cod pan bcings te rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang bgyid par 'gyur ro/
74a2('dul ba): rgyal po rnams ni/ khwa ltar khum 'phrig za ba yin pas/ des bsam pa/ 'di rnams kyis ji skad smras pa de bzhin du gdon mi za'o/ /snyam nas de de la klan ka tshol bar gyur to/ /
74a3('dul ba): 'jig rten na mdza' ba dang / mi mdza' ba dang / bar ma yod pas/ ji tsam na gzhan dag gis dum bu la smras pa/ khyod la rgyal po klan ka tshol zhing 'dug gi /thabs legs par
74a4('dul ba): soms shig / de rtog pa skyes shing de dpyod pa la zhugs pa/ gang du 'gro/ gal te mnyan yod du song na ni/ mnyan yod de yang rgyal po'i mnga' ris yin pas/ nyen 'di nyid yod do/ /
74a5('dul ba): de bzhin du wA ra NA si dang / rgyal po'i khab dang / tsam pa yang gcig gi dbang du gyur pas nyen 'di yod do/ /yangs pa can ni/ tshogs kyi dbang yin te/ bcu dga' ba gang yin pa
74a6('dul ba): de la ni/ nyi shu mi dga' bar 'gyur bas/ de yangs pa can du 'gro'o snyam nas/ de yangs pa can gyis li tsa byi rnams la/ bdag ni/ khyed cag gi dpung gi phag na 'dug par 'dod do/ /
74a7('dul ba): zhes pho nya btang ngo / /de rnams kyis gus pa'i tshul gyis lan spring pa/ yangs pa can 'dir byon pa legs kyi/ spyon cig /de nas blon po'i mchog dum bus nye du rnams bos te smras pa/
74b1('dul ba): shes ldan/ bdag ni/ yangs pa can du chas kyi/ khyed cag las gang dag 'dir dga' ba de dag ni/ 'dug cig /gang dag mi 'dod pa dag ni/ sta gon gyis shig dang 'dong ngo / /ba lang
74b2('dul ba): rdzi dang / phyug rdzi rnams la bsgo ba/ khyed cag gis ba lang dang / ma he yangs pa can gang na ba der skyongs shig /zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la bsgo ba/ yangs pa can du 'dong gi /go gyon
74b3('dul ba): cig / de nas skye bo'i tshogs ltar de sta gon byed du bcug nas/ rgyal po'i drung du song ste/ rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ lha/ bgyi ba cung zhig mchis te/ skyed mos tshal du mchi
74b4('dul ba): na/ gzigs su gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ de bzhin bya'i/ songs shig /des skyed mos tshal byi dor byas nas/ nor gces pas shing rta bkang ste/ steng bza' ba dang / bcab pas g.yogs
74b5('dul ba): nas song ngo / /blon po rnams kyis dum bu bros so/ /zhes bya ba thos nas de rnams rings pa rings par rgyal po'i drung du dong nas smras pa/ lha/ dum bu ni/ bros so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ dengs
74b6('dul ba): la slar khug cig / de rnams kyis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon nas/ /bsnyegs te smras pa/ dum bu/ lhas bka' stsal gyi/ slar log cig /des smras pa/ shes ldan
74b7('dul ba): dag / khyed cag gis yun ring mo zhig nas kye ma'i dum bu shi 'am bros par gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam du bsam pa de/ tshegs chung dus grub kyi/ dengs shig /kho bo ni/ bros pa yin no/ /
75a1('dul ba): de rnams rgyal po'i sems bsrung ba'i phyir mda' dang mda' dag 'dres par byas nas/ log ste rgyal po la smras pa/ lha/ blon po'i mchog dum bu ni/ bros so/ /
75a2('dul ba): rgyal pos ma legs so/ /snyam du bsam nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go /dum bu yang rim gyis yangs pa can du phyin to/ /de'i tshe yangs pa can na rigs gsum du gnas te/
75a3('dul ba): rigs dang po na ni/ khang pa brtsegs ma bdun stong pa gam gser las byas so/ /ris bar ma na ni/ khang pa brtsegs ma khri bzhi stong ba gam dngul las byas so/ /ris tha ma na ni/ khang
75a4('dul ba): pa brtsegs ma nyi khri chig stong ba gam zangs las byas pa ste/ de rnams na ni/ mi dam pa dang / bar ma dang / phal ba rnams ci rigs par gnas so/ /yangs pa can gyi tshogs gyis khrims su
75a5('dul ba): bcas te bzhag pa ni/ ris dang por bu mo btsas pa gang yin pa de ni/ ris dang po nyid du gtong bar byed kyi/ bar mar ma yin/ tha mar ma yin no/ /bar ma'i gang yin pa de ni/ ris
75a6('dul ba): dang po dang bar ma la gtong bar byed do/ /tha ma'i gang yin pa de ni/ ris gsum char du gtong bar byed de/ bud med rnams ni/ yangs pa can ma gtogs par gzhan du mi gtong zhing /
75a7('dul ba): mi 'byin to/ /bud med rin po che ni/ su la yang mi gtong bar tshogs spyi'i yongs su longs spyad pa kho nar byed do/ /dum bu ni/ skyes bu dam pa yin no zhes te/ ris dang por khang pa
75b1('dul ba): byin nas/ de na gnas par brtsams pa las/ gang gi tshe tshogs 'dus pa de'i tshe/ de bos kyang 'dur ma btub nas/ de la yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyis smras pa/ dum bu/ khyod ci'i phyir mi
75b2('dul ba): 'du/ des smras pa/ 'du ba kho na las bdag la nyes dmigs byung bas bdag mi 'du'o/ /yangs pa can rnams kyis smras pa/ dum bu/ 'dus shig /'dir nyes dmigs ci zhig 'byung / des 'dus
75b3('dul ba): par brtsams nas blo gros ma byin no/ /de rnams kyis smras pa/ dum bu/ blo gros byin cig /des smras pa/ gang gi phyir blo gros kho nas bdag la nyes dmigs byung bas na/ blo gros ni/ mi sbyin
75b4('dul ba): no/ /de rnams kyis smras pa/ blo gros byin cig /'dir nyas dmigs ci zhig 'byung / de tshogs dang lhan cig 'dus nas blo gros kyang byin to/ /sngon yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams gang su la yang
75b5('dul ba): rung yi ge spring bar byed na/ rtsub po dang bcas par spring bar byed do/ /gang gi tshe dum bus blo gros byin pa de'i tshe/ 'jam po dang bcas par yi ge spring bar byed do/ /gang dag la 'jam po dang
75b6('dul ba): bcas pa'i yi ge 'ongs par gyur pa de rnams phan tshun du gros byas pa/ shes ldan dag /gang gis na yangs pa can gyi tshogs sngon rtsub pa dang bcas par spring bar byed pa las/ da 'jam po
75b7('dul ba): dang bcas par byed par gyur pa la rgyu ci zhig yod/ /gzhan dag gis smras pa/ khyad par yod de/ lus 'phags kyi rgyal po'i blon po'i mchog dum bu der 'ongs nas/ de dag de'i blo gros
76a1('dul ba): bzhin byed de/ des na/ da ltar 'jam po dang bcas par spring bar byed do/ /dum bus sa skyong dang / seng ge khyim phub nas/ seng ge rtse bar byed/ dga'
76a2('dul ba): bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las bu mo zhig btsas te/ de'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas gos can zhes bya bar btags so/ /de ltas mkhan rnams kyis mthong nas/ khye'u
76a3('dul ba): zhig btsa' bar 'gyur te/ des pha srog dang phral nas rang nyid cod pan bcings te rgyal srid byed par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/ /de yang rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur
76a4('dul ba): spyod par byed pa las bu mo zhig btsas te/ de'i btsas ston yang rgya cher byas nas nye gos can zhes bya bar btags so/ /de yang ltas mkhan rnams kyis mthong nas/ bu mtshan rdzogs pa
76a5('dul ba): zhig btsa' bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/ /sa skyong gdug pa rtsal che ba zhig pas yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyi skyed mos tshal rnams ma rung bar byas pa dang / skyed mos tshal srung
76a6('dul ba): ba rnams kyis smras pa/ yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams ni/ gdug pa rtsal po che yin gyi/ de dag gi skyed mos tshal rnams ma rung bar ma bya zhig ces des slar bzlog kyang ma btub nas/
76a7('dul ba): skyed mos tshal srung ba rnams kyis dum bu la smras pa/ khyod kyi bus yangs pa can gyi mi li tsa byi rnams kyi skyed mos tshal rnams ma rung bar byas te/ li tsa byi 'di dag ni/ gdug pa rtsal po
76b1('dul ba): che yin pas/ 'di la gnod pa byas su 'ong gi/ 'di slar zlog cig /des de bkug nas smras pa/ bu/ yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams ni/ gdug pa rtsal po che yin pas/ 'di dag gi skyed mos
76b2('dul ba): tshal ma rung par ma bya zhig / de dag gis gnod pa byas sa re/ des smras pa/ yab/ 'di dag la ni/ skyed mos tshal mchis na/ bdag cag la ma mchis so/ /des smras pa/ bu/ skyed mos tshal gyi
76b3('dul ba): don du tshogs la gsol ba gdab bo/ /des tshogs la gsol ba btab pa/ shes ldan dag /bdag gi bu gnyis la skyed mos tshal ma mchis kyi/ bdag la skyed mos tshal zhig thugs dpag
76b4('dul ba): mdzad pa'i rigs so/ /de rnams kyis de dag la skyed mos tshal rnying pa zhig byin pa las/ de na shing sA la chen po zhig yod de/ de la gcig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan byed
76b5('dul ba): du bcug go / gcig shos kyis ni zhal sros byas so/ /de bzhin du gnas brtan rnams kyis kyang mdo sde'i nang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na/ sa skyong dang / seng ge'i
76b6('dul ba): shing sA la'i tshal na bzhugs so/ /zhes brjod do/ /sa skyong gis bya ba ma yin pa stong phrag dag byas pas/ li tsa byi rnams smod par byed/ gzhogs 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed do/ /
76b7('dul ba): de nas dum bus bkug ste bsgo ba/ bu/ khyod tshogs 'khrug par ma byed par ri bor che ge mo zhig tu song la/ der rang gi zhing las kyi mtha' rnams la zhal ta byed cing 'dug cig /de der
77a1('dul ba): song nas rang gi zhing las kyi mtha' rnams la zhal ta bya bar brtsams so/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ yangs pa can gyi sde dpon shi nas/ de rnams kyis blon po'i
77a2('dul ba): mchog dum bu sde dpon du bcug pa las/ des kyang dus thung du zhig tu chos dang mthun bas sde dpon byas nas shi'o/ /yangs pa can gyi tshogs 'dus nas/ su zhig sde dpon du gzhug ces
77a3('dul ba): byas pa dang / de nas kha cig gis smras pa/ blon po'i mchog dum bus tshogs yongs su bskyangs pas na/ de nyid kyi bu gzhug go /kha cig gis smras pa/ de'i bu sa skyong ni/ gdug pa/ rtsal
77a4('dul ba): po che zhig ste/ gal te sde dpon du bcug na/ gdon mi za bar tshogs phye bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i nu bo seng ge gang yin pa de ni/ des pa/ 'grogs na bde ba/ tshogs kyi sems mgu bar byed
77a5('dul ba): nus pa zhig pas/ gal te tshogs 'dod na/ sde dpon du gzhug go /thams cad dga' bas de rnams 'dus nas seng ge'i gan du song ste/ seng ge khyod la sde dpon sbyin no/ /des smras pa/
77a6('dul ba): sa skyong ni/ bdag gi phu bo yin pas de sde dpon du chug cig /de rnams kyis smras pa/ seng ge/ sde dpon khyod kyi rigs brgyud kyi rim pas 'ongs pa yin nam ci/ tshogs gang la 'drang ba des
77a7('dul ba): sde dpon bya bar zad mod/ gal te khyod mi 'dod na/ kho bo cag gis gzhan zhig sde dpon du gzhug go/ des bsam pa/ gal te bdag gi khyim nas sde dpon gzhan du shor na/ de ni/ ma 'os
77b1('dul ba): pas ye bskur ro/ /snyam nas des khas blangs pa dang / de rnams kyis bkur sti chen pos sde dpon du bcug go/ yangs pa can pa rnams sngon gang la yi ge spring pa de la dum bu la sogs
77b2('dul ba): pa tshogs kyis bka' stsal pa zhes 'bri ba las/ gang gi tshe seng ge sde dpon du gyur pa de'i tshe/ seng ge la sogs pa tshogs kyis bka' stsal pa zhes 'bri bar byed do/ /ji tsam dus gzhan
77b3('dul ba): zhig na/ ri bor na sa skyong / rang gi zhing las kyi mtha' rnams la zhal ta byed pa'i ri bor gang yin pa der spring pa 'ongs pa dang / sa skyong gis phye ste bklags nas/ des smras pa/ shes ldan
77b4('dul ba): dag/ sngon ni/ yangs pa can gyi tshogs/ dum bu la sogs pa'i tshogs kyis bka' stsal pa zhes 'bri na/ da ni/ seng ge la sogs pa tshogs kyis bka' stsal pa zhes 'bri na/ ci/ kho
77b5('dul ba): bo'i pha shi'am/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ shi'o/ /de mi bzod pa skyes nas yangs pa can du song ste smras pa/ phu bo nga 'dug bzhin du khyod kyis sde dpon bya ba ji ga rigs sam/ seng ges ji
77b6('dul ba): ltar gyur pa de la smras pa dang / de yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams la mi bzod pa skyes nas bsam pa/ bdag la yangs pa can rnams kyis bkur sti ma yin pa byas kyi/ rgyal po'i khab tu 'gro'o
77b7('dul ba): snyam nas/ des rgyal po gzugs can snying po la bdag lha'i btsan phag na mchis par 'tshal lo/ /zhes pho nya btang ngo / /des de la spring pa/ 'ongs pa legs kyi/ shog cig ces spring pa/ de rgyal
78a1('dul ba): po'i khab tu 'ongs pa dang / de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos blon po'i mchog tu bcug go /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i
78a2('dul ba): btsun mo dam pa shi nas de 'gram pa la lag pa gtad de sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa de/ sa skyong gis mthong nas smras pa/ lha/ ci'i slad du zhal la phyag gtad de thugs mi dgyes
78a3('dul ba): shing bzhugs/ des smras pa/ nga'i btsun mo dam pa shi na/ ci'i phyir sems khong du chud cing mi 'dug /lha/ thugs ngan ma mdzad cig/ bdag gi nu bo la bu mo gzugs dang lang tsho
78a4('dul ba): phun sum tshogs pa/ lha kho na la 'os pa gnyis mchis na/ de la gcig la ni/ pha 'gum pa'i bu zhig btsa' bar 'gyur/ gcig shos la ni/ mtshan phun sum tshogs pa zhig btsa' bar
78a5('dul ba): 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan na/ lha'i ched du de gang khrid de mchi/ bu mtshan phun sum tshogs pa btsa' bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan pa gang yin pa de'o/ /de nas sa skyong gis seng ge
78a6('dul ba): la spring ba/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i btsun mo dam pa shi nas/ khyod kyi nye gos can tshur bkris shig dang / btsun mo dam par 'gyur ro/ /des de la yi ge'i lan spring pa/ gar
78a7('dul ba): bskor kyang khyod kho na la bdag 'dri bar zad kyi/ khyod kyis byas pa gang yin pa de ni/ tshad ma'i mchog yin pas khyod nyid shes so/ /ji ltar tshogs kyis khrims su bcas pa/ yangs pa
78b1('dul ba): can las gzhan du bu mo mi gtang ngo zhes bcas mod kyi/ 'on kyang khyod nyid 'ongs te skyed mos tshal du sdod cig dang / kho bos de skyed mos tshal du phyung ba dang / khyod kyis khrid de songs shig /de
78b2('dul ba): nas sa skyong gis rgyal po la mchi phyag byas nas shing rtar zhugs te yangs pa can du song ba las/ rim gyis phyin nas skyed mos tshal du bsdad do/ /de'i tshe yangs pa can gyi sgo srung zhig shi nas mi
78b3('dul ba): ma yin pa rnams su skyes pa des/ yangs pa can pa rnams la bstan pa/ bdag ni/ mi ma yin pa rnams su skyes kyi/ bdag gi gnod sbyin gyi gnas byos la/ mgul bar dril sbyongs shig dang /
78b4('dul ba): gal te yangs pa can rnams la phyir rgol ba 'ga' zhig 'ongs na/ bdag gis ji tsam du zin pa'am/ 'bros par gyur pa srid du dril gyi sgra bsgrag bar bya'o/ /de rnams kyis gnod sbyin gyi gzugs
78b5('dul ba): brnyan byas nas mgul pa la dril btags te/ gar dang / glu dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / gtor ma dang / me tog phreng gi yo byad kyis sgo khang du bzhag go/ sa skyong gis seng ge la spring pa/ kho bo skyed
78b6('dul ba): mos tshal na sdod kyi byung zhig/ des yangs pa can gyi tshogs la brtags nas khyim du song ste/ nye gos can la smras pa/ khyod rgyal po gzugs can snying po la byin gyi/ rgyan rnams thogs la skyed
78b7('dul ba): mos chal du phyung zhig/ de rgyan rnams 'dogs par brtsams pa dang / gos can gyis mthong nas/ des smras pa/ ci zhig gi phyir rgyan rnams 'dogs/ kho mo bag mar btang ngo / /su zhig la/
79a1('dul ba): rgyal po gzugs can snying po la'o/ /des smras pa/ kho mo phu mo yin na/ khyod ci ste bag mar btang / gal te de ltar na khyod rgyan thogs shig/ de yang smra ba las
79a2('dul ba): dril gyi sgra byung ngo / /yangs pa can gyi tshogs rod rod por gyur te/ bdag cag gi mi mdza' ba zhig yangs pa can du zhugs so/ /seng ge dngangs pas nye gos can yin no/ /snyam nas/ gos
79a3('dul ba): can khrid de myur ba myur bar phyir byung ba dang / sa skyong yang dngangs pas gos can shing rtar bcug ste song ngo / /yangs pa can gyi tshogs kyis phyi bzhin bsnyegs nas/ de dang de rnams su lhan cig
79a4('dul ba): 'thab par brtsams pa dang / de gnas lnga rnams la byang ba yin pas/ des li tsa byi lnga brgya'i gnad du bsnun nas/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag /ngas khyod cag las lnga brgya gnad du bsnun
79a5('dul ba): zin gyi/ lhag ma rnams srog bskyab kyi/ slar dengs shig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ nged cag las sems can gcig kyang bsad pa med do/ /go phud cig/ de rnams kyis go phud pa dang / lnga
79a6('dul ba): brgya sa la 'gyel nas srog dang bral bar gyur to/ /de nas de rnams kyis mi 'di ni/ srin po yin no/ /snyam nas skrag ste bros so/ /yangs pa can du lhags nas gros bya bar brtsams pa/
79a7('dul ba): shes ldan dag/ bdag cag gi dgra 'di la gzugs can snying po'i bu rnams lan glon du gzhug gi/ glegs bu la yi ger bris te sgrom bur bcug nas rgya skegs la rgyas btab nas gzhag go/
79b1('dul ba): zhes de rnams kyis de bzhin du byas nas bzhag go/ sa skyong yang rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin nas smras pa/ nye gos can bobs shig/ des smras pa/ khu gu/ bdag ni/ nye gos can ma lags te/
79b2('dul ba): bdag ni/ gos can lags so/ /khyod kyis ci'i phyir bdag la ma smras/ de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ de nas de sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bas/ rgyal po'i drung du song ba rgyal pos mthong nas smras
79b3('dul ba): pa| sa skyong 'ongs sam/ 'ongs pa legs so/ /lha/ bdag mchis lags so/ /nye gos can khrid de 'ongs sam/ lha/ khrid de mchis kyang mchis la/ khrid de ma mchis kyang ma mchis so/ /ci zhig
79b4('dul ba): zer/ nye gos can lags snyam nas/ gos can khrid de mchis so/ /blta'i/ khrid de shog cig/ de nang du khrid pa dang / rgyal pos lhag par yang gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa
79b5('dul ba): mthong nas/ bud med kyi yul gyis 'phrog pas mthong ma thag kho nar rgyal po chags par gyur nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ bu pha gsod pa gang yin pa de ni/ rgyal srid kyi phyir yin pas
79b6('dul ba): gal te nga la bu yod par gyur na/ da btsas ma thag tu ngas cod pan gyis bcing bar bya'o/ /de nas de dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos bag mar blangs te yul lus 'phags nas 'ongs pas na/ lus
79b7('dul ba): 'phags ma zhes bya bar grags so/ /de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /re zhig dus gzhan zhig na/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po ri dwags
80a1('dul ba): kyi phyir byung ba na bsti gnas shig na drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan ba zhig gnas so/ /ji tsam na ri dwags mda'i long la btags pas skrag pa zhig/ drang srong
80a2('dul ba): de'i bsti gnas su zhugs shing byung ba rgyal po'i mdas gnad du bsnun to/ /de nas drang srong de khros nas smras pa/ 'thab krol can gyi rgyal po bdag gi bsti gnas gcan gzan gdug
80a3('dul ba): pas kyang gzem par bya bar ri dwags skyabs su 'ongs pa khyod kyis gsod dam zhes drang srong de rgyal po la de skad du kha zer ba dang / dpung gi tshogs 'ongs nas smras pa/ lha/ 'di su la g.yar
80a4('dul ba): mchis/ rgyal pos smras pa/ nga la yin na/ shes ldan dag/ rgyal po la kha tshas zer ba gang yin pa de la chad pa ci yod/ lha/ de'i chad pa dgum pa lags so/ /gal te de ltar na/ ngas
80a5('dul ba): drang srong de yongs su spangs so/ /de gsad par brtsams te/ de gsod pa na/ smon lam log par btab pa/ rgyal po 'thab krol can 'dis/ bdag nyes pa med cing gnod pa mi byed pa bsad
80a6('dul ba): par bkris/ gang du skyes pa der 'di srog dang bral bar byed par gyur cig/ yang bsam pa/ rgyal po 'di dag ni/ shin tu sbas pa/ shin tu srung pa/ shin tu btsas pa yin pas/ gal
80a7('dul ba): te gzhan du skye ba blangs na/ lan 'ga' yang skabs rnyed par mi 'gyur gyi/ rnam pa thams cad du bdag 'di'i btsun mo dam pa'i mngal du skyes par gyur cig ces byas so/ /des smon lam
80b1('dul ba): log par btab pas gos can gyi mngal du skyes so/ /gang gi tshe nyi ma kho na la nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs pa de nyid kyi nyi ma la khrag gi char bab bo/ /gos can 'dod pa skyes pa/ e ma'o/ /
80b2('dul ba): bdag gis lha'i rgyab kyi sha bcad cing bcad cing zos kyang ci ma rung snyam mo/ /de ltar gyur pa rgyal po la smras pa dang / rgyal pos ltas mkhan rnams bkug nas smras pa las/ de rnams kyis
80b3('dul ba): smras pa/ lha/ 'di ni/ btsun mo'i rum du sems can zhig zhugs pa gang lags pa de'i mthu lags so/ /rgyal po sems khong du chud de 'dug nas 'di'i 'dod pa ci zhig gis sel bar
80b4('dul ba): 'gyur snyam mo/ /mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gzhan dag gis smras pa/ lha/ ras kyi bar stsang shas bltams par bgyis te gsol la/ nyid btsun mo la stob mdzod cig/ de nas rgyal
80b5('dul ba): pos ras kyi bar shas gang bar byas pa bgos nas/ bdag nyid gos can la bstabs pa dang / des rgyab kyi sha yin no snyam nas zos so/ /de nas de'i 'dod pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar
80b6('dul ba): gyur to/ /yang de'i 'dod pa skyes pa/ kye ma'o/ /bdag gis lha'i khrag kho na 'thungs kyang ci ma rung snyam pa de yang rgyal po la smras pa dang / de nas rgyal pos yan lag lnga'i rtsa gtar nas
80b7('dul ba): khrag blud pas/ de 'dod pa de dang yang bral bar gyur te/ ji tsam na zla ba dgu tshang ba dang / khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa zhig btsas so/ /btsas te gang gis
81a1('dul ba): nyi ma la btsas pa de nyid kyi nyi ma la yang khrag gi char bab bo/ /rgyal pos yang ltas mkhan rnams bkug nas smras pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ bstan
81a2('dul ba): bcos las ji ltar gda' ba ltar na/ gdon mi 'tshal bar khye'u 'dis lha sku tshe dang phral nas rang nyid cod pan bcings te rgyal srid bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal pos bsam pa/ rnam pa
81a3('dul ba): thams cad du rgyal srid kyi ched du 'dis srog dang bral bar byed kyi/ 'di la bdag nyid kyis rgyal srid byin na/ ci'i phyir bdag srog dang bral bar byed snyam mo/ /de'i tshe yangs pa can na li
81a4('dul ba): tsa byi ming chen zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ de'i skyed mos tshal na a mra'i tshal yod pa las/ der glo bur du chu shing gi sdong po zhig skyes pa/ kun dga'i ra ba srung bas mthong ngo / /de
81a5('dul ba): ma thag kho nar me tog chags pa dang / de ngo mtshar skyes nas ming chen la smras pa dang / des ltas mkhan rnams bkug nas dris pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ de srung du
81a6('dul ba): gsol cig dang / dgung bdun gyi nyin par gas par 'gyur te/ de'i nang nas bu mo zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /khyim bdag ming chen gyis thos nas lhag par yang ngo mtshar skyes par
81a7('dul ba): gyur te/ skyed mos tshal der kun nas srung ma'i mi rnams bkod nas/ nyi ma bgrang pa la zhugs so/ /ji tsam na zhag bdun lon pa dang / skyed mos tshal de rdo ba dang / gseg ma
81b1('dul ba): dang / gyo mo rnams bsal nas/ tsan+dan gyi chus chag chag btab/ shin tu dri zhim po'i pog phor dag bshams/ dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po bres/ me tog sil mas bkram/ glu dang / rol
81b2('dul ba): mo'i sgra rnam pa du ma dag dang / mdza' bo dang / gnyen bshes kyi skye bos yongs su bskor nas dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos chung ma dang lhan cig byung nas/ skyed mos tshal de na de rtse bar byed/
81b3('dul ba): dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod pa byed pa las/ chu shing gi sdong po gas nas/ bu mo gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ yan lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig byung ngo / /de nas
81b4('dul ba): ming chen gyis chung ma dam pa la gtad pa dang / des smras pa/ lha/ 'di'i ming gdags su gsol/ ming chen gyis smras pa/ bu mo 'di ni/ a mra'i tshal nas rnyed pa yin pas/ 'di'i ming a mra skyong
81b5('dul ba): ma zhes bya'o/ /ji tsam na/ khyim bdag ming chen skyed mos tshal nas rang gi khyim du song ste/ bu mo a mra skyong ma bskyed bsrings te zhes bya ba nas chen mor gyur to/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//
81b6('dul ba): de slong ba'i phyir yul krung krung ba rnams dang / shAkya rnams dang / gzhan yang yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i rgyal po'i bu dang / blon po'i bu dang / tshong pa dang / tshong dpon dang / ded dpon du ma dag
81b7('dul ba): 'ongs pa dang / khyim bdag ming chen gyis bsam pa/ gang kho na la ma byin pa de dag kho na sdang bar 'gyur na/ 'on kyang tshogs kyi khrims su bcas pas/ re zhig tshogs la brtag go/ snyam nas/
82a1('dul ba): des yangs pa can gyi tshogs bsdus te/ shes ldan bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams nyon cig/ bdag gis skyed mos tshal nas bu mo zhig rnyed pa de/ bdag gis
82a2('dul ba): bsnun/ bsnyod de bskyed nas/ de bdag gis rang gi rigs rgyud dang 'tsham par 'ga' zhig la chung mar sbyin na/ tshogs kyis ltos shig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ khyim bdag/ sngon
82a3('dul ba): tshogs kho nas khrims su bcas pa/ bud med rin po che mi gtang ste/ tshogs kyis spyad do/ /zhes bcas pa yin gyi/ re zhig bu mo de ci 'dra ba zhig blta'i/ khrid de shog cig/ des de tshogs
82a4('dul ba): kyi nang du khrid de 'ongs pa dang / gzugs dang / lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas/ tshogs thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur pa'i mig bgrad de kun tu brtag par brtsams nas smras pa/
82a5('dul ba): khyim bdag/ 'di ni/ bud med rin po che yin pas tshogs kyis spyad kyi/ su la yang mi sbyin no/ /de nas khyim bdag ming chen/ yid mi bde zhing rang gi khyim du song nas/ de 'gram pa
82a6('dul ba): la lag pa gtad de sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa dang / a mra skyong mas mthong nas dris pa/ yab/ ci'i slad du thugs mi dgyes/ bu mo/ khyod bud med rin po che yin no/ /zhes tshogs
82a7('dul ba): kyis spyad par gyur te/ bdag gi yid la re ba ma rdzogs so/ /yab/ ci/ khyod gzhan gyi dbang du gyur tam/ bu mo/ sngon tshogs kyis khrims su bcas pa/ bud med rin po che ni/ tshogs
82b1('dul ba): kyis spyad do/ /zhes bcas la/ khyod kyang bud med rin po che yin pas/ de'i phyir bdag la dbang med do/ /des smras pa/ dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te bdag la tshogs kyis dam pa lnga zhig stsal
82b2('dul ba): na| bdag tshogs kyis spyad par bgyi ste/ ris dang po'i khang pa stsal pa dang / skyes pa gcig nang du zhugs pa na gcig shos nang du mi 'jug pa dang / nang du 'jug pa gang yin pa de yang kaR+sha
82b3('dul ba): pa Na lnga brgya 'tshal te mchi ba dang / gang gi tshe khyim nyul ba de'i tshe bdag gi khyim zhag bdun na byul ba dang / bdag gi khyim du mchi ba rnams kyi phyir 'byung ba dang / nang du 'jug pa la mi brtag
82b4('dul ba): pa'o/ /ming chen gyis/ a mra skyong ma'i 'phrin bzlas pa dang / tshogs kyis smras pa/ de bzhin du bya ste/ ris dang po'i khang pa zhes gang smras pa la/ ris dang po'i khang pa ni/ bud med rin po che
82b5('dul ba): kho na la 'os so/ /gcig nang du zhugs pa na/ gcig shos nang du mi 'jug par bya'o/ /zhes gang smras pa de yang bden te/ sha 'khon rnams las ni/ 'di lta ste/ bud med kyi sha 'khon tha chad
82b6('dul ba): yin pas/ gal te gcig nang du zhugs pa dang gcig shos kyang nang du zhugs na/ gdon mi za bar gcig la gcig gsod par 'gyur ro/ /nang du 'jug pa des kaR+sha pa Na lnga brgya thogs te
82b7('dul ba): nang du 'jug par bya'o/ /zhes gang smras pa de yang bden te/ gdon mi za bar de'i gos dang / rgyan du dgos so/ /zhag bdun lon pa dang khang pa byul bar bya'o/ /zhes gang smras pa de yang
83a1('dul ba): bden te/ sngar ram/ phyis byas kyang rung / de la 'gal ba ci zhig yod/ skyes pa rnams kyis phyir 'byung ba dang nang du 'jug pa la mi brtag go/ zhes gang
83a2('dul ba): smras pa de yang bden te/ 'di smad tshong ma yin pas/ gal te mi rnams kyi phyir 'byung ba dang nang du 'jug pa brtags na/ su zhig de'i khyim du 'jug/ de nas tshogs kyis de la
83a3('dul ba): mchog lnga byin nas/ tshogs kyis spyad par gyur to/ /yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyis/ dga' mgur spyad pa'i phyir de'i khyim du 'jug par brtsams pa las/ de na kha cig
83a4('dul ba): ni| yul la chags ches pa'i phyir mthong ma thag kho nar 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur to/ /kha cig gis ni/ reg pa kho nas te/ de la 'gas kyang skyes pa'i bya ba ma byas so/ /des
83a5('dul ba): bsam pa/ 'di dag ni/ skyes pa ma yin gyi/ thabs shig bsham par bya'o/ /snyam nas/ des yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i ri mo mkhan rnams bkug nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag/
83a6('dul ba): gang na rgyal po'am/ blon po'am/ phyug po'am/ tshong dpon nam/ tshong pa'am/ ded dpon ci 'dra ba zhig mthong ba de 'dra ba dag rtsig pa la bris shig/ de rnams kyis ji ltar mthong
83a7('dul ba): ba bzhin bris pa dang / de nas a mra skyong ma rgyan rnams kyis brgyan nas/ ri mo'i las rnams la so sor brtags te/ dris pa/ shes ldan dag/ 'di ni/ gang zhig /'di ni/ rgyal po
83b1('dul ba): rab snang ngo / /gzhan 'di gang zhig /ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal lo/ /gzhan 'di gang zhig /bad sa la'i rgyal po 'char byed do/ /gzhan 'di gang zhig/ ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs
83b2('dul ba): gzugs can snying po'o/ /des de bzhin dris pa dang / de rnams kyis kyang thams cad smras so/ /de nas des thams cad la brtags pa dang / gzugs can snying po la mig chags nas des
83b3('dul ba): bsam pa/ skyes bu 'di lta bur chu zheng gab pas ni/ bdag dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad par nus snyam mo/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can
83b4('dul ba): snying po steng gi khang bzang gi gzhir song nas/ blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te 'dug nas/ tshul ma yin pa'i gtam smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ sus smad tshong ma ji lta bu mthong / sa
83b5('dul ba): skyong gis smras pa/ lha/ re zhig gzhan lta zhog/ yangs pa can na smad tshong ma a mra skyong ma zhes bgyi ba/ shin tu gzugs dang / lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa/ sgyu rtsal drug cu rtsa bzhi 'tshal
83b6('dul ba): ba| lha kho nas spyad du rung ba zhig mchis so/ /des smras pa/ sa skyong / gal te de lta na yangs pa can du 'dong / de dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod do/ /des smras pa/ yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi
83b7('dul ba): rnams ni/ yun ring po nas gnod pa bgyid pa/ slar rgol ba/ dgra bo lags pas/ khyod la gnod pa bgyid du mchi'o/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag /mi rnams ni/ skyes bu'i dpa'
84a1('dul ba): snying can yin pas 'dong ngo / /des smras pa/ lha/ gal te don ma mchis pa la gtsigs che bar mdzad na/ gshegs mod/ de shing rtar zhugs nas sa skyong dang lhan
84a2('dul ba): cig yangs pa can du chas te/ rim gyis yangs pa can du phyin nas/ sa skyong ni/ skyed mos tshal na sdod do/ /rgyal po ni/ a mra skyong ma'i khyim du zhugs pa dang / ji
84a3('dul ba): tsam na dril gyi sgra byung ngo / /yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams rod rod por gyur nas shes ldan dag /bdag cag gi mi mdza' ba zhig nang du zhugs pas dril 'khrol lo zhes sgra gsal
84a4('dul ba): ba dang / sgra chen po byung ba dang / rgyal po gzugs can snying pos/ a mra skyong ma la dris pa/ bzang mo/ 'di ci zhig yin/ lha/ sdum par nyul bar bgyid do/ /ci zhig gi phyir/ lha'i
84a5('dul ba): slad du'o/ /ji ltar bya/ ci/ 'bros sam/ lha/ mi dgyes par ma mdzad cig/ lha/ dgung bdun lon dang / bdag gi sdum par nyul bar bgyid pas/ re zhig dgung bdun du rol bas
84a6('dul ba): dgyes par mdzod/ dgyes rgur mdzod la dgung bdun lags dang / dus mkhyen par bgyi'o/ /de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las/ ji
84a7('dul ba): tsam na a mra skyong ma sems can dang ldan par gyur nas/ des rgyal po gzugs can snying po la smras pa/ lha/ bdag la sems can zhugs lags so/ /des de la seng ras shig dang /
84b1('dul ba): sor gdub kyi rgya byin nas smras pa/ gal te bu mo zhig yin na/ khyod nyid kyi yin no/ /'on te khye'u yin na/ seng ras 'di bskon la/ sor gdub kyi rgya mgul du thogs te nga'i drung du
84b2('dul ba): bkri zhig/ de byung ste shing rtar zhugs te sa skyong dang lhan cig chas pa dang / dril bu 'khrol bar 'dug go/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ dgra bo byung gi /rjes
84b3('dul ba): bzhin btsal lo/ /zhes li tsa byi skyon gor gyi mda' rtsibs can lnga brgyas rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i phyi bzhin bsnyegs pa dang / sa skyong gis mthong nas/ des smras pa/ lha/
84b4('dul ba): yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams mchi na/ lha/ ci/ 'di dag dang lhan cig 'thab mo bgyi'am/ 'on te shing rta bda'/ des smras pa/ nga ni/ dub pas shing rta 'ded kyi/ khyod kho nas 'di dag
84b5('dul ba): dang lhan cig 'thab mo khye zhig/ des de rnams dang lhan cig 'thab mo 'gyed par brtsams pa las/ yangs pa can rnams kyis ngo shes nas/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag/
84b6('dul ba): mi'i srin po de nyid 'di yin gyi/ slar ldog go/ de rnams slar log nas yangs pa can du 'ongs te/ 'dus nas yang khrims bcas pa/ shes ldan dag/ bdag cag gi dgra 'di la yang
84b7('dul ba): gzugs can snying po'i bu rnams sha glon du gzhug go/ zhes bcas so/ /ji tsam na zla ba dgu 'das pa dang / a mra skyong ma la khye'u gzugs bzang la/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa
85a1('dul ba): zhig btsas so/ /btsas nas zhes bya ba nas/ bsrings bskyed de chen por gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /de yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi'i khye'u rnams dang lhan cig rtse
85a2('dul ba): par byed pa las/ de rnams kyis mi dga' ba'i tshig smras pa/ bran mo'i bu khyod/ brgya stong phrag du ma zhig las ni/ skyes na/ pha su yin/ des ngus nas ma'i drung du song ba dang / des
85a3('dul ba): smras pa/ bu/ ci'i phyir du/ des thams cad rgyas par smras pa dang / des smras pa/ bu/ gal te yang dris pa dang / nga'i pha lta bu ni/ khyed cag gcig la yang med do/ /zhes smros shig/
85a4('dul ba): gal te su yin zhes smra na/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po yin no/ /zhes smros shig /ji tsam na/ de de rnams dang lhan cig yang rtse bar byed pa las/ de rnams kyis de la de bzhin du
85a5('dul ba): smras pa dang / des smras pa/ nga'i pha lta bu ni/ khyed cag gcig la yang med do/ /su yin/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po yin no/ /de rnams kyis/ shes ldan dag/ bdag cag gi dgra
85a6('dul ba): gang yin pa de ni/ 'di'i pha yin no/ /zhes lhag par yang brdegs so/ /des dus nas ji ltar gyur pa rnams ma la smras pa dang / des bsam pa/ yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams ni/
85a7('dul ba): gdug pa rtsal po che yin te/ gal te 'di gsod par 'gyur ba'i gnas de yod do snyam mo/ /de de lta bu sems shing 'dug pa dang / tshong ba rab tu mang po zong thogs nas rgyal po'i khab
85b1('dul ba): tu 'dong ba de dag des mthong nas smras pa/ sor gdub kyi rgya 'dis snod rgyas thob la dengs shig dang / sho gam mi gcod par 'gyur ro/ /khye'u 'di yang rgyal po'i pho brang du khrid la/ sor gdub kyi
85b2('dul ba): rgya 'di/ 'di'i mgul du thogs te rgyal po'i khab kyi sgor zhog cig/ de rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du bya'o zhes khas blangs so/ /bu la yang mu tig gi do shal zhig byin nas smras pa/ bu/ rgyal
85b3('dul ba): po dgos pa'i ched du 'dus pa dang mu tig gi do shal rkang pa'i steng du zhog la 'dzegs te pang du 'dug cig/ gal te 'ga' zhig khye'u 'di 'jigs mi shes pa zhig go /zhes smras pa dang / de la
85b4('dul ba): yang / bu phas 'jigs pa 'ga' yod dam zhes smros shig/ de tshong pa rnams dang lhan cig tu rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin nas/ de rnams kyis khrus byas te sor gdub kyi rgya brtags nas
85b5('dul ba): rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor bzhag pa dang / de rgyal po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas mu tig gi do shal rkang pa la bzhag nas 'dzegs te pang du 'dug go/ rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag/
85b6('dul ba): khye'u 'di ni/ 'jigs mi shes pa zhig go /des smras pa/ yab/ bu phas 'jigs pa 'ga' mchis lags sam/ de nas rgyal pos 'jigs pa med pa'i sgra kun du smras pas/ rgyal bu gzhon
85b7('dul ba): nu 'jigs med/ rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med ces bya bar grags so// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po drug cu gcig pa/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po gzhan gyi
86a1('dul ba): bud med la lhag par chags pas/ glang po che la zhon nas grong khyer gyi srang rnams su song nas mig phan tshun du lta zhing 'khyam par byed do/ /de'i tshe rgyal po'i
86a2('dul ba): khab na/ tshong dpon phyug pa/ nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba zhig yod pa des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas zhes bya ba nas dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /zhes bya ba'i bar
86a3('dul ba): gong ma bzhin du'o/ /des dus gzhan zhig na chung ma la smras pa/ bzang mo/ zong thogs nas yul gzhan du 'gro'o/ /des smras pa/ rje'i sras/ de bzhin du mdzod cig /de zong thogs te
86a4('dul ba): yul gyi mthar song ngo / /de yang kha zas zhim po dang / gos kyis nyon mongs pas gdungs par gyur pa las/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po glang po che la zhon nas de'i khyim drung nas song ba
86a5('dul ba): dang / des kyang skar khung du 'dug nas rgyal po la me tog gi phreng ba bor ro/ /de nas rgyal pos mthong nas smras pa/ mar shog /des smras pa/ lha/ g.yar tsha lags kyi/ khyod nyid nang du
86a6('dul ba): gshegs shig / de nas rgyal po nang du zhugs nas de de dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las/ yang de'i tshe rung zhing zla mtshan dang ldan pas sems can chags par gyur
86a7('dul ba): nas des rgyal po la smras pa/ lha/ bdag ni/ sems can dang ldan par gyur to/ /de nas rgyal pos de la yang sor gdub kyi rgya dang seng ras khra bo byin nas smras pa/ gal te re zhig
86b1('dul ba): khye'ur gyur na/ seng ras 'di bskon la/ sor gdub kyi rgya yang mgul du thogs te nga'i drung du bkri zhig /'on te bu mo yin na ni/ khyod nyid kyi yin no/ zhes smras nas rgyal po song ngo / /ji
86b2('dul ba): tsam na ded dpon de don rnams grub ste/ rgyal po'i khab dang nye ba zhig tu phyin nas des chung ma la/ bzang mo dga' ba skyed cig /kho bo don grub nas bde bar 'ongs te zhag 'di tsam kho na na
86b3('dul ba): phyin par 'ong ngo spring ba des thos nas/ bdag gis ni/ bya ba ma yin pa 'di lta bu byas la/ de yang 'ong na/ de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya snyam du 'phongs par gyur nas/ des ji ltar gyur pa
86b4('dul ba): rnams rgyal po la rig par byas pa dang / de nas rgyal pos slar spring pa/ bag ma tsha bar 'dug cig /ji nas kyang myur du mi 'ong pa de ltar ngas bya'o/ /rgyal pos de la pho nya btang ba/ ded
86b5('dul ba): dpon/ nga la rin po che che ge mo dang / che ge mo dag cig dgos kyi/ de med par khyod 'dir ma 'ongs shig /de rin po che de rnams kyi phyir lam ring por song ngo / /de yang zla ba dgu 'das nas
86b6('dul ba): btsas pa dang / khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa zhig btsas so/ /ma bslab kyang bud med la shes nyen yod pas/ des mar dang sbrang rtsis de 'grangs par bsnyod nas sor
86b7('dul ba): gdub kyi rgya mgul du btags te seng ras kyis dkris nas sgrom bu'i nang du bcug ste/ bu mo mngag gzhug ma la bsgo ba/ song la sgrom bu 'di khyer te rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor khyed kyis dkyil
87a1('dul ba): 'khor byos la me mar bus te phyogs gcig tu ji srid 'ga' zhig gis blangs kyi bar du sdod cig / des de bzhin du byas pa dang / ji tsam na rgyal po steng gi khang bzang
87a2('dul ba): gi gzhir song nas rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med dang lhan cig 'dus pa las/ des rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo na mar me mthong ngo / /de nas zho shas 'tsho ba dag la bsgo ba/ /shes ldan dag
87a3('dul ba): rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo na mar me 'bar ba'o ni/ ci yin ltos shig /de dag gis bltas nas smras pa/ lha/ sgrom bu zhig mchis so/ /des smras pa/ longs shig /rgyal bu gzhon nu
87a4('dul ba): 'jigs med kyis smras pa/ lha/ sgrom bu de na ci mchis pa de bdag la stsal par ci gnang / rgyal pos/ de bzhin du bya'o/ /zhes khas blangs so/ /ji tsam na sgrom bu blangs nas rgyal po
87a5('dul ba): la phul ba dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ kha phye zhig/ kha phye ba las khye'u zhig byung ngo / /rgyal pos smras pa/ 'di ci gson nam/ 'on te shi ba zhig /de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ gson
87a6('dul ba): lags so/ /de nas rgyal pos sor gdub kyi rgya dang seng ras ngo shes nas rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med la byin pa dang / des de bsnun bsnyod bskyed do/ rgyal pos gson nam zhes
87a7('dul ba): tshig tu byung ba dang / rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med kyis gsos pas 'tsho byed gzhon nus gsos zhes bya bar grags so/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ 'tsho byed gzhon nus gsos
87b1('dul ba): chen por gyur to/ /de 'jigs med dang lhan cig bre mo'i gtam zer zhing 'khod pa/ 'jigs med/ gzhon nu ma skyes dgra ni/ ma btsas pa kho na nas rgyal po nyid du lung bstan gyi/ bdag cag ni/
87b2('dul ba): bzo cung zad bslab ste/ des na bdag cag gi phyi dus kyi 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /de gnyis kyis de ltar gros byas pa las/ shing rta mkhan gos dkar po gyon pa/ mi gos dkar po gyon pa rnams
87b3('dul ba): kyis yongs su bskor nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs pa dang / de rgyal bu gzhon nu 'jigs med kyis mthong bas/ des rgyal po'i mi gzhan dag la dris pa/ 'di su zhig yin/ de rnams kyis smras
87b4('dul ba): pa| shing rta mkhan lags so/ /'di ci 'thob/ 'tsho ba'o/ /des bsam pa/ bdag gis kyang lha la brtags nas shing rta mkhan bslab bo/ /snyam nas de rgyal po'i drung du song nas smras pa/ lha/
87b5('dul ba): bdag kyang shing rta mkhan bslab bo/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ bu/ khyod ci 'dis 'tsho bar 'gyur ram/ yab/ rgyal po'i bus ni/ bzo thams cad la bslab par bgyi ba lags so/ /bu/ gal
87b6('dul ba): te de lta na khyod shing rta mkhan slobs shig / des bslab par brtsams so/ /'tsho byed kyis kyang sman ba gos dkar po gyon pa/ mi gos dkar po gyon pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas
87b7('dul ba): rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs par mthong nas des gzhan dag la dris pa/ 'di su zhig yin/ de dag gis smras pa/ sman pa lags so/ /de ci zhig byed/ dpyad bgyid do/ /ci 'thob/ gal
88a1('dul ba): te nad pa zhig sos na/ rngan pa 'thob bo/ /'on te gum na/ mi tshol mi 'dri'o/ /des bsam pa/ sman dpyad bslab bo/ /snyam nas/ de ba'i gan du song nas smras pa/
88a2('dul ba): lha/ gnang bar mdzod cig /sman dpyad bslab lags so/ /bu/ khyod rgyal po'i sras yin no/ /khyod la sman dpyad kyis ci bya/ lha/ rgyal po'i bus ni/ bzo thams cad la bslab par bgyi ba
88a3('dul ba): lags so/ /bu/ gal te de lta na slobs shig /des sman dpyad bslab par brtsams pa dang / des sman dpyad ni/ lobs na/ des klad pa'i thod pa dbye ba'i dpyad ma shes nas/ des rdo
88a4('dul ba): 'jog na sman pa'i rgyal po rgyun shes kyi bu zhes bya ba yod de/ /des klad pa'i thod pa 'byed pa'i dpyad shes so/ /zhes thos nas/ de rgyal po'i drung du song ste smras pa/ lha/ rdo 'jog tu mchi'o/
88a5('dul ba): ci zhig gi phyir/ de na sman pa'i rgyal po rgyun shes kyi bu zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ de klad pa'i thod pa 'byed pa'i dpyad 'tshal bas de slob tu mchi'o/ /bu/ khyod 'dis 'tsho'am/ lha/ yang
88a6('dul ba): na ni sman dpyad mi bslab/ yang na ni legs par bslab par bgyi'o/ /bu/ gal te de lta na songs shig /des rgyal po pad+ma'i snying po la spring pa/ bdag gi bu 'di sman dpyad slob tu rgyun shes
88a7('dul ba): kyi bu'i drung du 'ong gi / 'di'i dgos pa thams cad khyod kyis sbyor cig /de rim gyis rdo 'jog tu phyin pa dang / pad+ma'i snying pos kyang spring yig bklags te rgyun shes kyi bu la gtad nas rgyal
88b1('dul ba): po'i bu 'di/ khyod kyi drung du ched du 'ongs kyi/ 'di la sman dpyad slobs shig /rgyun shes kyi bus de la ston par byed pa na/ des nyung zad bstan pa dang / 'tsho byed kyis khyad par dang bcas par
88b2('dul ba): lobs so/ /rgyun shes kyi bu'i kun tu spyod pa ni/ gang gi tshe nad pa la bltar 'gro ba de'i tshe/ bram ze'i khye'u zhig khrid de 'gro ba yin pas/ de dus gzhan zhig na 'tsho byed khrid de song nas/
88b3('dul ba): des nad pa'i sman bstan pa/ 'di dang 'di dag byin cig ces smras nas byung ngo / /'tsho byed kyis bsam pa/ 'di ni/ mkhan pos nyes te/ gal te 'dis sman 'di zos na/ 'di deng nyid 'chi
88b4('dul ba): bar 'gyur te/ mkhan pos bstan pa ni/ legs pa ma yin gyi/ thabs shig bya'o/ /snyam nas/ de rgyun shes kyi bu dang lhan cig tu byung nas slar nang du zhugs te smras pa/ mkhan po 'di
88b5('dul ba): skad ces gsung ngo / /kho bos sman bstan pa gang yin pa de ma byin par 'di dang 'di dag byin cig zer ro/ /des de bzhin du byas pas sos par gyur to/ /ji tsam nyi ma gzhan zhig la rgyun
88b6('dul ba): shes kyi bu yang de'i drung du song nas dris pa/ na ba ji ltar/ sos par gyur to/ /sang yang de nyid byin cig /ci/ snga ma lags sam/ 'on te slad kyis bstan pa lags/ ci/ bdag gis sngar
88b7('dul ba): bstan tam/ 'on te phyis bstan/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'di dag ni/ khyod kyis mngon sum du bstan to/ /'di ni/ 'tsho byed la 'phrin du spring pa yin no/ /des bsam pa/ bdag gis nyes
89a1('dul ba): kyi/ 'tsho byed ni/ shes rab can yin no/ /snyam bsam nas smras pa/ 'tsho byed kyis bstan pa gang yin pa de byin cig /rgyun shes kyi bu 'tsho byed la dga' ba
89a2('dul ba): skyes pas/ de gang du 'gro ba der 'tsho byed khrid do/ /bram ze'i khye'u gzhan rnams kyis smras pa/ mkhan po/ khyod rgyal po'i bu'o snyam nas 'di la ni/ spro bas ston par mdzad kyi/ bdag
89a3('dul ba): cag la ni/ mi mdzad do/ /des smras pa/ 'tsho byed ni/ shes rab can yin pas ngas bstan pa gang yin pa de rang gis rnam par 'byed nus kyi/ khyod kyis ni/ de lta ma yin no/ /de rnams
89a4('dul ba): kyis smras pa/ mkhan pos ji ltar mkhyen/ gal te de lta na/ ngas khyed cag gi mngon sum du bya'o/ /bla ma ze'i khye'u de rnams la/ khyod kyis ni/ rdzas che ge mo zhig gi rin dris shig /
89a5('dul ba): khyod kyis kyang che ge mo zhig gi'o/ /zhes thams cad tshong dus su btang ngo / /'tsho byed kyang khyod kyis kyang che ge mo zhig gi'o zhes bsgo'o/ /bram ze'i khye'u de dag gis ji skad bstan pa
89a6('dul ba): kho na bzhin byas so/ /'tsho byed kyis kyang ji skad bstan pa bzhin byas nas bsam pa/ gal te mkhan po rdzas gzhan gyi rin 'dri bar byed na/ bdag gis ji skad brjod par bya'i/ thams
