89a7('dul ba): cad du rdzas thams cad kyi rin 'dri'o snyam nas/ de dag thams cad mkhan po'i drung du song nas ji skad bstan pa bzhin smras so/ /rgyun shes kyi bus/ ma bstan pa'i rdzas kyi rin dri
89b1('dul ba): bar brtsams te bram ze'i khye'u/ rdzas che ge mo zhig gi rin ji tsam/ des smras pa/ ma 'tshal to/ /gzhan dag la dris pa dang / smras pa/ ma 'tshal lags so/ /'tsho byed la dris pa dang / des
89b2('dul ba): rdzas thams cad kyi rin smras so/ /rgyun shes kyi bus smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u dag /khyed kyis thos sam/ thos lags so/ /ngas/ 'tsho byed ni/ shes rab can yin te/ cung zad bstan
89b3('dul ba): na yang de la rang gis rnam par 'byed nus so/ /zhes smras pa ni/ don de yin no/ /gzhan yang mngon sum du bya'o/ /zhes des de rnams la smras pa/ thang shing can gyi ri la dengs la sman
89b4('dul ba): ma yin pa dag khyer de shog cig / de dag dong nas de dag las gang zhig gis gang sman ma yin par shes pa de/ de dag gis blangs so/ /'tsho byed kyis bsam pa/ sman ma yin pa ni/ cung
89b5('dul ba): zad kyang med do snyam nas des 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i rtsa ba dang / rdo ba'i dum bu zhig blangs so/ /ji tsam na 'tsho byed kyis/ lam gyi phyed na phyugs rdzi mo zhig /zho'i bum pa dang phrum tshud khyer
89b6('dul ba): nas rgyun shes kyi bu'i drung du song ba las/ de shin tu mig na ba des mthong nas des dris pa/ gang du 'gro/ des smras pa dang / des de la gnas de nyid kyi drung na yod pa'i sman zhig bstan pa
89b7('dul ba): las/ des byas pa dang mod la sos par gyur to/ /de dga' ba skyes nas smras pa/ zho'i bum pa dang phrum tshud 'di khyed snoms shig /des phrum tshud blangs te zho'i bum pa ni/ de nyid la
90a1('dul ba): byin nas de phrum tshud khyer te song ba las/ ji tsam na/ bram ze'i khye'u rnams kyis/ lam gyi dbus na glang po che'i rjes shig mthong nas de rnams kyis de la brtag
90a2('dul ba): par brtsams pa dang / 'tsho byed kyang 'ongs nas des smras pa/ 'di ci yin/ glang po che'i rjes so/ /'di ni/ glang po che'i rjes ma yin gyi/ 'di ni/ ba lang mo'i rjes yin te/ de yang mig
90a3('dul ba): g.yas pa zhar ba/ de ring kho nar glang po'i phru gu 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhig yin la/ de la zhon pa ni/ bud med yin la/ de yang mig g.yas pa zhar ba/ sbrum pa/ de ring nyid du bu pho bca'i
90a4('dul ba): bar 'gyur ba zhig yin no/ /ji tsam na/ rgyun shes kyi bu'i drung du 'ongs nas gang gis gang khyer te 'ongs pa des de bstan to/ /rgyun shes kyi bus smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u dag /'di thams
90a5('dul ba): cad ni/ sman yin te/ re zhig 'di ni/ che ge mo zhig gi nad che ge mo zhig yin la/ de bzhin du gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang yin no/ /'tsho byed la dris pa/ khyod kyis ci khyer te 'ongs/
90a6('dul ba): des smras pa/ mkhan po/ de thams cad sman lags te/ sman ma lags pa ni/ ci yang ma mchis so/ /'on kyang bdag gis 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i rtsa ba dang / rdo'i dum bu dang / phrum tshud
90a7('dul ba): cig 'tshal te mchis so/ /'di dag ci dgos/ sdig pas zin pa la 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i rtsa ba'i dud pas bdug go/ phrum tshud kyis ni/ glan par bgyi'o/ /rdo'i dum bus ni/ ston
90b1('dul ba): ka'i dus na zho'i bum pa 'chags par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun shes kyi bu 'dzum phyung ba dang / bram ze'i khye'u rnams kyis bsam pa/ mkhan po ni/ 'di la khros so/ /snyam nas de rnams kyis smras pa/
90b2('dul ba): mkhan po/ ci/ 'di gcig pur bas snyam mam/ bdag cag mchi ba na lam gyi dbus su glang po che'i rjes shig mthong ba na 'di'i mchid nas/ 'di ni/ ba lang mo'i rjes yin te/ de yang mig
90b3('dul ba): g.yas pa zhar ba/ sbrum pa/ de ring kho nar glang po'i phru gu 'byung bar 'gyur ba zhig yin la/ de la zhon pa ni/ bud med yin la/ de yang mig g.yas pa zhar ba/ sbrum pa/ de ring nyid du bu pho
90b4('dul ba): btsa' bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes mchi'o/ /rgyun shes kyi bus dris pa/ 'tsho byed/ bden nam/ mkhan po/ med do/ /de glang po che'i rjes sam/ ba lang mo'i rjes yin pa ji ltar shes/ des smras
90b5('dul ba): pa| mkhan po/ bdag ni/ rgyal po'i rigs las chen por gyur pa lags na/ ji ste mi 'tshal/ glang po che'i rjes ni/ zlum po/ ba lang mo'i rjes ni/ chu ring ngo / /mig g.yas pa zhar
90b6('dul ba): bar ji ltar shes/ g.yon phyogs su ran 'tshal zhing mchis pa lags so/ /sbrum par ji ltar shes/ rkang pa gnyis gnon cing mchi ba lags so/ /deng kho nar 'brang bar 'gyur ba ji
90b7('dul ba): ltar shes/ gcin be'u snabs dang bcas par 'byung bas so/ /glang po che'i phru gu phor 'brang bar 'gyur ba ji ltar shes/ rkang pa g.yas pa lhag par gnon cing mchis pas so/ /de
91a1('dul ba): la bud med zhon par ji ltar shes/ babs nas rkang ba'i bar du gcis pa las so/ /de yang mig g.yas pa zhar bar ji ltar shes/ g.yon phyogs su me tog
91a2('dul ba): 'thu zhing mchis pas so/ /de yang sbrum par ji ltar shes/ de'i rkang pa'i rting pa phal cher gnon cing mchis pas so/ /deng kho nar btsa' bar 'gyur bar ji ltar shes/ gcin ljan ljin
91a3('dul ba): dang bcas te 'byung ba las so/ /de lta lags kyis kyang gal te mkhan po thugs mi ches na/ mgron po gnas pa'i phyogs der bram ze'i khye'u 'ga' zhig mngag tu gsol/ des bram ze'i
91a4('dul ba): khye'u zhig btang ba dang / 'tsho byed kyis ji skad smras pa de thams cad de bzhin du gyur to/ /rgyun shes kyi bus bram ze'i khye'u rnams la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u dag /khyod kyis thos sam/
91a5('dul ba): 'tsho byed ni/ de 'dra bar shes rab can yin no/ /'tsho byed kyis klad pa'i thod pa 'byed pa'i dpyad ma gtogs pa thams cad bslab bo/ /ji tsam na mi zhig klad nad kyis thebs nas rgyun
91a6('dul ba): shes kyi bu'i drung du song ste smras pa/ rgyun shes kyi bus bdag la dpyad mdzod cig /des smras pa/ kye nang rje/ re zhig de ring dong brkos la lci ba dag sta gyon gyis shig dang / sang bdag
91a7('dul ba): gis khyod kyi dpyad bya'o/ /'tsho byed kyis thos nas de de'i phyi bzhin song ste/ kye nang rje/ bdag gis cung zad bslab pa gang yin pa de thams cad ni/ sems can la phan pa'i phyir yin
91b1('dul ba): na| bdag gis klad pa'i thod pa dbye ba ma bslab kyi/ khyod kyis bdag dben pa zhig tu zhog cig dang / khyod kyis las ji ltar byed pa blta'o/ /des smras pa/ de bzhin du bgyi'o/ /des
91b2('dul ba): de phyogs dben pa zhig tu bzhag go / de nas rgyun shes kyi bu 'ongs nas mi de dong du bcug ste thod pa dbye ba'i dpyad kyis thod pa phye nas des skam pas srog chags de blang bar brtsams
91b3('dul ba): pa dang / 'tsho byed kyis smras pa/ mkhan po/ gzu lum du ma len cig /rigs kyi bu 'di deng nyid du 'gum par 'gyur ro/ /des smras pa/ 'tsho byed 'ongs sam/ smras pa/ mkhan
91b4('dul ba): po/ bdag mchis so/ /kho bos srog chags 'di ji ltar blang bar bya/ mkhan po skam pa tsha bar mdzad de/ rgyab tu reg nas rkang lag 'khums par gyur pa dang / de nas 'or cig /
91b5('dul ba): des de bzhin du byas nas sos par gyur to/ /rgyun shes kyi bus smras pa/ 'tsho byed/ kho bo shin tu mgu bar gyur gyi/ khyod khrus byos la shog cig dang / klad pa'i thod pa dbye ba'i dpyad
91b6('dul ba): sbyin no/ /des khrus byas nas 'ongs pa dang / des de la klad pa'i thod pa 'byed pa'i dpyad byin nas smras pa/ 'tsho byed/ bdag cag ni/ 'dis 'tsho ba yin gyi/ yul 'dir khyod kyis
91b7('dul ba): ma bya zhig / mkhan po/ de bzhin du bgyi'o/ /zhes 'tsho byed kyis rgyun shes kyi bu la phyag byas nas rgyal po pad+ma'i snying po'i drung du song nas phyag byas nas bdag gis sman dpyad bslab
92a1('dul ba): lags kyi/ mchi'o/ /de'i tshe rgyal po pad+ma'i snying po dang mi mthun pa mtha' 'khob skya seng zhes bya ba dag cig yod de/ des smras pa/ 'tsho byed bdag dang mi mthun pa
92a2('dul ba): mtha' 'khob pa skya seng zhes bya ba dag cig yod kyi/ 'di ltar khyod ni/ shes rab can nus pa yin pas/ re zhig de phobs la phyis songs shig dang / de lta na/ bdag cag gis 'jig
92a3('dul ba): rten gyi tshul byas par 'gyur ro/ /des de la khas blangs pa dang / de nas des dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa bsdus te btang ba las/ de mtha' 'khob pa skya seng de rnams phabs nas/
92a4('dul ba): gte'u bzung / dpya blangs te/ slar bde bar 'ongs nas khyer te 'ongs pa de bzhin du rgyal po la phul ba dang / de shin tu dga' nas/ de nyid la rjes su yi rang ste des kyang rgyun shes kyi bu
92a5('dul ba): la byin no/ /de nas 'tsho byed rim gyis grong khyer bzang byed du phyin nas de nyid du dbyar gnas te/ de nas des 'byung po thams cad kyi skad ces bya ba'i bstan bcos bslabs nas grong khyer
92a6('dul ba): bzang byed nas chas pa dang / mi zhig shing khur khyer nas grong khyer du 'jug pa/ rus pa dang pags pa'i lhag ma lus pa/ lus kun nas 'dzag pa 'tsho byed kyis mthong nas/ de la smras
92a7('dul ba): pa| kye nang rje/ ci zhig gis gnas skabs 'di lta bur gyur/ des smras pa/ bdag gis kyang mi shes na/ 'on kyang bdag gis shing khur 'di khyer nas bdag kyang 'di 'dra ba'i gnas
92b1('dul ba): skabs su gyur to/ /de shing brtag pa la byang ba yin pas smras pa/ kye nang rje/ ci/ shing khur 'di 'tshong ngam/ 'tshong ngo / /rin ji tsam/ kaR+sha pa Na lnga brgya'o/ /des de nyos nas de nas
92b2('dul ba): bltas nas/ 'byung po thams cad dang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i nor bu mthong nas/ de'i mthu ni/ 'di 'dra ste/ gang gi tshe nad pa'i mdun du bzhag pa de'i tshe/ mar me khyim na yod pa'i rdzas bzhin
92b3('dul ba): du nad ji lta ba bzhin du snang ngo / /de rim gyis yul u dum wa rar phyin pa dang / de na mi bres 'jal ba zhig yod pa des bre bos gzhal nas bre mgo la snun pa 'tsho byed kyis mthong nas smras pa/
92b4('dul ba): kye nang rje/ ci'i phyir de ltar byed/ bdag gi klad pa lhag par g.ya'o/ /tshur shog /blta'o/ /zhes des de bsnyal nas klad pa bltas te/ de nas 'tsho byed kyis 'byung po thams cad dang bar byed
92b5('dul ba): pa'i nor bu de'i klad pa'i steng du bzhag pa dang / ji tsam na srin gyi med cig snang ngo / /de nas des smras pa/ kye nang rje/ khyod kyi klad pa la srin gyi med yod do/ /des rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras
92b6('dul ba): pa/ bdag la dpyad mdzod cig /des khas blangs so/ /'tsho byed kyis bsam pa/ mkhan pos ji skad bstan pa bzhin 'di'i dpyad bya'o snyam nas/ des de la smras pa/ kye nang rje/ re zhig /de ring
92b7('dul ba): dong brkos la lci ba dag sta gon byos shig dang / sang dpyad bya'o/ /des rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas song ngo / /'tsho byed kyis de'i phyi de nyin 'ongs nas de dong du bcug ste klad pa'i thod pa dbye
93a1('dul ba): ba'i dpyad kyis/ klad pa'i thod pa phye nas skam pa tsha bas srin gyi med kyi rgyab la reg par byas te des rkang lag 'khums pa dang / de nas des skam pas blangs te bor
93a2('dul ba): bas sos par gyur to/ /des de la kaR+sha pa Na lnga brgya byin pa dang / des kyang rgyun shes kyi bu la bskur ro/ /de nas 'tsho byed yul ro hi ta ka zhes bya bar phyin pa dang / yul ro hi ta ka na khyim
93a3('dul ba): bdag cig la skyed mos tshal me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / chu phun sum tshogs pa zhig yod de/ de de la lhag par chags pa las/ shi nas de nyid du mi ma yin pa rnams su skyes so/ /de'i
93a4('dul ba): bu ni/ khyim gyi dbon por gyur nas des skyed mos tshal der srung ma'i mi bzhag pa dang / de mi ma yin pa des bsad do/ /gnyis pa bzhag pa dang / de yang bsad nas khyim bdag gi bu des
93a5('dul ba): skyes mos tshal de bor ro/ /ji tsam na mi dmu chus gang ba sman pa thams cad kyis spangs pa zhig skyed mos tshal der song nas nub mo brang btab ste 'dug nas/ kye ma'o/ /bdag ni/ mi ma
93a6('dul ba): yin pas bsad kyang ci ma rung snyam mo/ /de nyid du 'tsho byed kyang nub mo brang btab ste 'dug go /ji tsam na/ mi ma yin pa des/ dmu chu can de bsdigs par brtsams pa dang / dmu chu'i
93a7('dul ba): nad de byung nas smras pa/ 'di bdag gis sngar bzung na/ ci'i phyir 'di bsdig /khyod la ra spu'i dud pas bdug pa 'ga' yang med pa lta/ des ni/ khyod dpag tshad bcu gnyis su
93b1('dul ba): 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /des kyang slar smras pa/ khyod la yang la phug gi sa bon/ mar phyung ba'i dar ba dang btags te sbyin pa 'ga' yang med pa lta/ des ni/ khyod dum bu dum bur 'dzag par 'gyur ro/ /
93b2('dul ba): thams cad 'tsho byed kyis thos nas de nang par sngar langs te khyim bdag de'i drung du song nas smras pa/ khyim bdag /skyed mos tshal me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / chu phun sum tshogs pa ci'i phyir dor/
93b3('dul ba): khyim bdag gis de la ji ltar gyur pa rnams smras pa dang / des smras pa/ khyim bdag/ ra spu'i dud pas bdugs shig dang / mi ma yin pa dpag tshad bcu gnyis su 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /khyim
93b4('dul ba): bdag gis ra spu'i bdug pas bdugs pa dang / mi ma yin pa de dpag tshad bcu gnyis su bros par gyur to/ /khyim bdag des kyang 'tsho byed la kaR+sha pa Na lnga brgya byin pa dang / des de yang rgyun
93b5('dul ba): shes kyi bu la bskur ro/ /de nas 'tsho byed kyis dmu chu can la dris pa/ nang rje/ khyod ci'i phyir mi ma yin pas gnas btab pa'i skyed mos tshal du 'dug /des de la ji ltar gyur pa dag smras pa
93b6('dul ba): dang / 'tsho byed kyis smras pa/ la phug gi sa bon mar phyung ba'i dar ba dang btags pa 'thung shig dang / sos par 'gyur ro/ /des 'thungs pas sos par gyur te/ mi des kyang 'tsho byed la kaR+sha
93b7('dul ba): pa Na lnga brgya byin no/ /des kyang rgyun shes kyi bu la bskur ro/ /de nas 'tsho byed rim gyis bcom brlag tu phyin nas/ bcom brlag gi phyi rol na shing zhig gi drung du ngal bso zhing 'dug go /ji
94a1('dul ba): ltar na gyad kyis gyad brdabs pas de'i nang grol rnams su 'khrugs nas de shi'o/ /zhes phyi rol du phyung ngo / /shing de la yang bya rgod mo phru gu dang bcas pa zhig
94a2('dul ba): 'dug pa las/ de la phru gu de rnams kyis smras pa/ ma/ sha byin cig /des smras pa/ bu/ sha ga la yod/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ ma/ gyad kyis gyad 'di brdabs te/ shi nas phyung ba
94a3('dul ba): yin no/ /bu/ 'dir sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed 'ongs na/ des 'di sos par byed pa'i gnas de yod do/ /ma/ 'di ci zhig gis sos par 'gyur/ gal te de'i nang grol rnams phye mas
94a4('dul ba): reg par byas na'o/ /de thams cad 'tsho byed kyis thos so/ /de nas de langs te ro drung du song nas dris pa/ shes ldan dag /'di ci zhig /de rnams kyis smras pa/ gyad kyis gyad brdabs
94a5('dul ba): pas shi ba yin no/ /'tsho byed kyis smras pa/ zhog cig dang / blta'o/ /de rnams kyis bzhag pa dang / de nas 'tsho byed kyis 'byung po thams cad dang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i nor bu klad
94a6('dul ba): par bzhag nas brtags na/ ji tsam na nang grol rnams 'khrugs par byas pa mthong nas/ des smyug ma'i sbubs su phye ma blugs te khas bus pa dang / phye mas nang grol rnams la
94a7('dul ba): reg nas sos par gyur to/ /des kyang 'tsho byed la kaR+sha pa Na lnga brgya byin pa dang / des kyang rgyun shes kyi bu la bskur ro/ /bcom brlag na khyim bdag cig yod pa de'i chung ma
94b1('dul ba): gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa yin pas/ de de la lhag par chags shing 'dug pa las/ shi nas de nyid kyi mo mtshan gyi srin bur skyes par gyur te/ de gang dang lhan cig dga' mgur
94b2('dul ba): spyod pa de shi bar byed do/ /de nas de dang 'ga' yang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par mi byed do/ /des sman pa 'tsho byed der 'ongs so/ /zhes thos nas/ de de'i drung du song ste smras pa/ 'tsho byed
94b3('dul ba): bdag la bro nad mchis kyi/ dpyad mdzod cig /'tsho byed kyis de mthong zhing smra ba'i tshig thos nas/ chags pas smras pa/ dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te bdag dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad
94b4('dul ba): pa lta na/ dpyad bya'o/ /des smras pa/ g.yar tsha lags so/ /des smras pa/ khyod kyi dpyad gzhan ni/ med do/ /bdag las phangs pa gzhan med pas des khas blangs so/ /de nas des sgron mor
94b5('dul ba): phyung ste/ bzo bcos byas nas mo mtshan gyi sgor sha'i dum bu zhig bzhag pa las/ de nas srin bu de de la chags pa dang / des de blangs nas bor te sos par gyur/ de 'dod pa'i 'dod chags la
94b6('dul ba): lhag par zhen pas brda zhig byas pa dang / des rna ba gnyis bkag ste smras pa/ khyod kho bo'i sring mo dang 'dra ste/ khyod kyi dpyad de yin pas kho bos de ltar byas par zad do/ /des kyang de la kaR+sha pa
94b7('dul ba): Na lnga brgya byin pa dang / des de yang rgyun shes kyi bu la bskur ro/ /de nas 'tsho byed rim gyis chu bo ya mu na'i 'gram du phyin pa dang / des de na mi ro zhig yod pa de'i rting pa'i phyogs na rgyus pa'i breng
95a1('dul ba): yod pa nya rnams kyis drangs pa las de'i mig 'byed pa dang 'dzum pa mthong nas/ 'tsho byed kyis de thams cad brtags te/ ji ltar rgyus pa dang / long mo la sogs
95a2('dul ba): pa'i tshigs kyi 'brel thabs ni/ de kho na ltar 'dug go /snyam nas de rim gyis yangs pa can du phyin pa dang / ji tsam na gyad kyis gyad gcig thal mos bsnun pas mig gi 'bras bu 'phags
95a3('dul ba): pa dang / 'tsho byed de'i drung du song nas/ des rting pa'i rgyus pa'i breng nas drangs pa dang slar tshud par gyur to/ /des de la kaR+sha pa Na lnga brgya byin pa dang / des 'jigs med kyi ma la byin no/ /
95a4('dul ba): yangs pa can na mi zhig yod pa de'i rna bar srin gyi med zhugs te/ der de las phru gu bdun brgya byung bas de rna ba'i nad kyis nye bar gyur nas/ 'tsho byed kyi drung du song ste smras pa/ dpyad
95a5('dul ba): mdzod cig / 'tsho byed kyis bsam pa/ sngar ni/ bdag gis mkhan pos bstan pas las byas kyi/ da ni/ rang gi blos las bya'o/ /snyam nas/ des mi de la bsgo ba/ kye nang rje/ song la lo
95a6('dul ba): ma'i spyil po byos te ras sngon pos g.yogs la de'i 'og tu rnga zhig bzhag ste sa yang dron por gyis shig / des ji skad bstan pa bzhin thams cad byas so/ /de nas 'tsho byed kyis mi de
95a7('dul ba): sa la bsnyal nas/ sa de chus chag chag btab nas de nas rnga brdungs pa dang / srin gyi med kyis dbyar gyi dus la bab bo/ /snyam nas phyir byung ngo / /de nas 'tsho byed kyi rna ba'i drung du sha'i
95b1('dul ba): dum bu zhig bzhag pa dang / de yang slar zhugs te phru gu rnams khrid de byung nas phru gu rnams dang / lhan cig sha'i dum bu la chags pa dang / de nas 'tsho byed kyis de'i mod la sha'i dum bu bor ba
95b2('dul ba): dang / mi de sos par gyur to/ /des kaR+sha pa Na lnga brgya byin pa dang / des 'jigs med kyi ma la byin no/ /de rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin pa dang / rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'tsho byed ji ltar
95b3('dul ba): 'ongs pa thos nas/ des gzhon nu ma skyes dgra la bsgo ba/ bu/ khyod kyi phu bo 'ongs kyi/ bsur song shig /de bsur song ba dang / 'tsho byed kyis gzhon nu ma skyes dgra ji ltar bsur 'ong ba
95b4('dul ba): thos nas/ des bsam pa/ gal te bdag gis de bsu ba rang gir byas na ni/ nam rgyal por gyur pa de'i tshe bdag la gnod pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /snyam nas/ de slar log ste sgo gzhan
95b5('dul ba): zhig nas zhugs so/ /dus gzhan zhig na 'tsho byed skye bo'i tshogs chen pos yongs su bskor te sems g.yang zhing song ba dang / ji tsam na/ bram ze zhig mig nad kyis thebs nas 'tsho byed
95b6('dul ba): kyi drung du song ste/ bdag la sman ston cig /tshig pa zos nas smras pa/ thal bas thob cig /des drang po zhog pas/ thal bas btab pa dang sos par gyur to/ /mig nad kyis thebs pa
95b7('dul ba): gzhan zhig yod pa de yang 'tsho byed kyi drung du song ba bram ze des mthong nas dris pa/ kye nang rje/ gang du 'gro /des ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang / des smras pa/ khyod la 'tsho byed ci dgos/
96a1('dul ba): des kho bo la gang bstan pa de byos shig /de yid ches par gyur nas des thal bas btab pa dang long bar gyur to/ /dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po gzugs can
96a2('dul ba): snying po'i spyi bor phol mig byung ngo / /des blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag /sman pa rnams khug cig /blon po rnams kyis sman pa rnams bkug pa dang / rgyal pos smras
96a3('dul ba): pa| shes ldan dag / nga'i spyi bor phol mig byung gi /dpyad byos shig /de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ sman pa chen po 'tsho byed mchis na/ bdag cag gis bgyi ba ci 'tshal/ rgyal
96a4('dul ba): pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag /'tsho byed khug cig /de rnams kyis de bkug pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ 'tsho byed/ dpyad byos shig /'tsho byed kyis smras pa/ lha/ dam zhig
96a5('dul ba): bca' ste/ gal te lha la bdag nyid kyis khrus bgyid du gnang na bgyi'o/ /de bzhin gyis shig /de nas 'tsho byed kyis skyu ru ras skud cing / smin par 'gyur ba'i rdzas dag btab
96a6('dul ba): ste| smin par 'gyur ba'i rdzas rnams dang bsres pa'i chu bum pa lnga brgya blugs te/ gang gi tshe smin pa de'i tshe na ma tshor bar spu gris reg par byas pa dang rdol to/ /de nas 'tsho bar
96a7('dul ba): 'gyur ba'i rdzas dag btab ste/ 'tsho bar 'gyur ba'i rdzas rnams dang bsres pa'i chu bum pa lnga brgya blugs pa dang / rma de sos shing pags pa 'dra ba dang skra yang mnyam par gyur to/ /
96b1('dul ba): rgyal pos khrus byas ma thag tu smras pa/ 'tsho byed/ dpyad byos shig /des smras pa/ lha/ re zhig bshos gsol cig /rgyal pos zan zos nas/ 'tsho byed/ dpyad byos shig /lha/ bgyis lags
96b2('dul ba): so| |de yid ma ches nas lag pas byugs na/ phyogs gang na rma yod par ma shes so/ /me long blangs te bltas na/ 'on kyang ma mthong ngo / /btsun mo la dris na/ des kyang phyogs gang na rma
96b3('dul ba): yod par ma shes so/ /rgyal po mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes nas blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /'tsho byed sman pa'i rgyal por dbang skur cig /mi long ba des smras pa/ lha/ ci/ sras
96b4('dul ba): la byams pas sam/ 'on te sman mkhas pas dbang bskur ba mdzad/ rgyal pos smras pa/ sman mkhas pas so/ /des smras pa/ gal te de lta lags na/ 'dis bdag ni/ sos par
96b5('dul ba): ma bgyis so/ /'tsho byed kyis smras pa/ kye nang rje/ bdag gis khyod mthong yang ma mthong na/ sos par lta ga la byas/ des smras pa/ de ni mad na/ 'on kyang khyod kyis gang la bstan pa
96b6('dul ba): des bdag la bstan to/ /ci zhig bstan/ che ge mo zhig go /'tsho byed kyis smras pa/ de'i khams kyang gzhan la/ khyod kyi khams kyang gzhan yin gyi/ da 'di dang 'di dag byos shig
96b7('dul ba): dang sos par 'gyur ro/ /des byas nas sos par gyur pa dang / smras pa/ lha/ 'di sman pa'i rgyal por dbang bskur bar mdzad du gsol/ de glang po che la bskyon nas dpal gyi 'byor pa chen
97a1('dul ba): pos sman pa'i rgyal por dbang bskur to/ /rgyal po'i khab na khyim bdag cig yod pa skran nad kyis thebs nas sman pa thams cad kyis spangs pa dang /
97a2('dul ba): des bsam pa/ 'tsho byed kyi drung du 'gro'o/ /gal te dpyad cig byas na ni/ de lta na legs/ gal te ma byas na/ bdag nyid 'chi bar bya'o snyam nas de 'tsho byed kyi drung du song nas/
97a3('dul ba): 'tsho byed/ bdag gi dpyad mdzod cig /des smras pa/ kye nang rje/ khyod kyi sman 'di ni/ rnyed par dka'o/ /des bsam pa/ 'tsho byed kyis kyang bdag spangs na/ 'di la ci byar yod/
97a4('dul ba): dus la bab kyi/ bdag ni/ 'chi'o snyam nas de dur khrod du song ngo / /de na ro sreg pa'i me 'bar bar ne'u le gdug pa zhig dang / srog chags go d+ha tsan+dan zhes bya ba 'thab ste lhung
97a5('dul ba): ba dang / de bkres pas nyen pas de gnyis ka zos te/ lhas dur khrod du char phab pa'i 'od pa'i chu de la 'thungs nas/ dur khrod dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na gnag lhas yod pa der
97a6('dul ba): song ste/ ko dra'i chan dang mar phyung ba'i zho 'thungs pas skran rdol to/ /yar slon/ mar 'khrus nas sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du gyur to/ /dus gzhan zhig na lus 'phags ma'i 'doms
97a7('dul ba): kyi phyogs su phol mig byung ngo / /des rgyal po la smras pa dang / rgyal pos 'tsho byed la bsgo ba/ ma yar mo'i dpyad gyis shig /des khas blangs so/ /de nas zan byas te ma ma la
97b1('dul ba): byin nas khyod kyis 'di'i steng du 'dug tu chug cig / des de 'dug tu bcug pa'i zan 'tsho byed kyis mthong nas bsam pa/ phyogs che ge mo zhig na' snyam mo/ /de nas smin par 'gyur ba'i
97b2('dul ba): rdzas dag btab ste/ smin par shes nas zan gyi nang du gtsags bu sbas te ma ma la bsgo ba/ khyod kyis de 'di la 'dug tu chug la btsun mo 'dug nas slar slong zhig /des de bzhin byas
97b3('dul ba): pa las/ gtsags bus reg ma thag tu phol mig rdol bar gyur to/ /de nas 'tsho bar 'gyur ba'i rdzas dang bsres pa bska ba'i chus bkrus te 'tsho bar 'gyur ba'i rdzas rnams btab pas sos
97b4('dul ba): par gyur to/ /'tsho byed rgyal po'i drung du song ba dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ 'tsho byed/ khyed kyis ma yar mo'i dpyad byas sam/ lha/ bgyis so/ /khyod kyis sgren mor phyung ste ma bltas grang /
97b5('dul ba): lha/ ma bltas so/ /ji ltar byas/ des ji ltar gyur pa rnams smras pa dang / rgyal po mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes nas des blon po rnams la smras pa/ 'tsho byed lan gnyis su sman pa'i rgyal por
97b6('dul ba): dbang skur cig / mi skran can la 'tsho byed kyis sman rnyed par dka'o zhes smras pa gang yin pa des smras pa/ lha/ ci/ sras la sdug pas sam/ 'on te sman mkhas pas dbang bskur bar
97b7('dul ba): mdzad/ rgyal pos smras pa/ sman mkhas pas so/ /gal te de lta lags na/ 'dis bdag ni/ sos par ma bgyis so/ /'tsho byed kyis smras pa/ kye nang rje/ ngas khyod la dpyad ni/ ma byas
98a1('dul ba): kyi| 'on kyang ngas khyod kyi sman ni/ rnyed par dka'o zhes smras so/ /des smras pa/ bdag gi sman ji lta bu dag cig yin/ 'tsho byed kyis smras pa/ gal te zla
98a2('dul ba): ba mar gyi ngo'i tshes bcu bzhi la mi ser skya zhig shi nas de dur khrod du sreg pa na ne'u le gdug pa dang srog chags go d+ha tsan+dan na 'thab nas mer lhung ba dang de gnyis khyod kyis zos la/ dbang phyug chen po'i lhas dur khrod du char phab pa'i 'od pa'i chu de la 'thungs la/
98a3('dul ba): ko dra'i chan zos shing mar phyung ba'i zho 'thungs na/ de lta na khyod mod la sos par 'gyur te/
98a4('dul ba): bdag gis de la bsam nas sman rnyed par dka'o/ /zhes smras pa yin no/ /des smras pa/ shin tu legs par shes te/ de bzhin du bdag gis zos so/ /de nas dga' bar gyur
98a5('dul ba): nas smras pa/ lha/ 'dis sman pa'i rgyal po rngo thogs kyi/ dbang bskur bas dbang bskur du gsol/ lan gnyis su yang sman pa'i rgyal por dbang bskur to/ /gang gi tshe mi dge
98a6('dul ba): ba'i grogs po lhas byin gyis ma skyes dgra bslus nas/ pha chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa srog dang phral ba de'i tshe/ de la skran gyi nad kyis thebs par gyur to/ /des sman pa
98a7('dul ba): rnams la smras pa/ nga la dpyad gyis shig /de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ lha'i gcen po bla na med pa'i 'tsho byed 'di na mchis bzhin du/ bdag cag gis dpyad bgyid rngo ga la
98b1('dul ba): thogs/ des blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ 'tsho byed khug cig /de rnams kyis bkug pa dang / 'tsho byed/ nga la skran nad byung gi /dpyad byos shig /lha/ bgyi'o/ /des bsam
98b2('dul ba): pa| rgyu gnyis kyis skran rdol bar 'gyur te/ lhag par dga' ba'am/ lhag par khros pas yin na/ sems can sdig pa 'di lhag par dga' bar ga la 'gyur gyi/ rnam pa thams cad du
98b3('dul ba): khros par bya'o/ /snyam du bsam nas smras pa/ lha/ dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te gzhon nu 'char byed bzang po'i sha gsol ba ltar na/ dpyad bgyi'o/ /rgyal pos thos nas khros te smras pa/
98b4('dul ba): legs so/ /ngas ni/ pha srog dang phral/ khyod kyis kyang 'char byed bzang po srog dang phrol/ nga yang rang nyid nad kyis shi nas khyod ni/ rgyal por 'gyur mod/ des smras pa/ lha/ dpyad
98b5('dul ba): ni| 'di lags te/ gzhan gyis sos par rngo mi thogs lags so/ /bdag dang 'dra ba'i phangs pa med pas des khas blangs so/ /de nas 'tsho byed kyis gzhon nu 'char byed bzang po/
98b6('dul ba): rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas rgyal po la phul te/ lha/ gzhon nu 'char byed bzang po la legs par gzigs pa de ltar mdzad du gsol/ phyis gzigs par mi 'gyur ro/ /de
98b7('dul ba): nas de bstan nas/ khyim du khrid nas bzhag go /de nas 'tsho byed sha'i don du bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod du song ba las/ bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod ni/ shi ba'i ros stong
99a1('dul ba): pa ma yin pas/ de nas des ro'i sha blangs te yo byad kyi khyad par dag dang g.yos byas nas rgyal po drol bab pa'i dus su bstabs so/ /de nas rgyal po ma
99a2('dul ba): skyes dgras sha khu'i phor pa blangs nas za bar gzas pa dang / 'tsho byed kyis 'phrog nas klad du bsnun te/ sdig pa byed pa khyod kyis pha chos kyi rgyal po srog dang phral la/ bu'i sha
99a3('dul ba): yang za bar byed dam/ de rngams nas smras pa/ gal te de lta na/ ci'i phyir bsad ces mi bzod pa skyes pas de'i skran rdol nas yar slon/ mar 'khrus te kha nas khrag dang bcas par byung ba
99a4('dul ba): de mthong nas brgyal te sa la 'gyel to/ /de nas chu gtor nas dbugs slar byung ba dang / khrus byas te 'phrod pa'i zas byin pas/ sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du gyur to/ /de nas 'tsho
99a5('dul ba): byed kyis gzhon nu 'char byed bzang po/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan cing khrid de rgyal po'i drung du song nas rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ lha/ gzhon nu 'char byed bzang po 'di
99a6('dul ba): lags te/ bdag srog chags grog sbur yang srog dang 'bral bar bgyid mi phod na/ gzhon nu lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ 'on kyang thabs 'dis lha 'tsho bar 'gyur bas/ bdag
99a7('dul ba): gis thabs bshams par bgyis par bas so/ /rgyal po mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes nas des blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ 'tsho byed sman pa'i rgyal por dbang skur cig /blon po rnams
99b1('dul ba): kyis glang po che la bskyon nas/ dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos lan gsum du yang sman pa'i rgyal por dbang bskur bas dbang bskur to/ /des 'tsho byed dregs pa skyes te bdag dang mnyam pa'i
99b2('dul ba): sman pa ni/ 'jig rten na 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin te/ bdag ni/ lus kyi dpyad byed pa rnams kyi mchog yin la/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ sems kyi dpyad mdzad pa rnams kyi mchog yin no/ /
99b3('dul ba): snyam mo/ /des dus gzhan zhig na bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ba las/ de dregs pa'i snyems pas bden pa rnams ma mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ sman pa'i rgyal
99b4('dul ba): po 'tsho byed kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed na/ ci'i phyir bden pa rnams ma mthong bar gyur snyam na/ dregs pa'i snyems pa las gyur par gzigs nas/ de'i dregs pa spang bar bya'o snyam nas/
99b5('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed la bka' stsal pa/ 'tsho byed/ khyod kyis ri'i rgyal po gangs can mthong ngam/ btsun pa/ ma mthong lags so/ /de bzhin gshegs
99b6('dul ba): pa'i na bza' chos gos kyi mtha' nas zungs shig / des bzung ba dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed khrid nas/ ri'i rgyal po gangs can ga la ba der gshegs
99b7('dul ba): pa dang / de na sman rnam pa sna tshogs sgron me bzhin 'bar ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'tsho byed/ sman ji tsam 'dod pa
100a1('dul ba): longs shig / bcom ldan 'das/ 'jigs lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje song la 'tsho
100a2('dul ba): byed la srung ba byos shig / de dang song nas sman rnam pa sna tshogs dag blangs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'tsho byed/ sman 'di'i ming ci yin/ des gsol pa/ bcom
100a3('dul ba): ldan 'das che ge mo lags te/ cho ga 'dis nad che ge mo zhig zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /'di ni/ che ge mo zhig lags te/ nad che ge mo zhig rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan rnams kyi ni/ ming
100a4('dul ba): yang mi shes so/ /ma shes pa gang dag yin pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'tsho byed/ 'di ni/ che ge mo ste/ cho ga che ge mos nad che ge mo zhig rab tu zhi bar 'gyur
100a5('dul ba): ro| |'di yang che ge mo zhig ces bya'o/ /'tsho byed kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sman dpyad kyang mkhyen pa lta/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed
100a6('dul ba): la bka' stsal pa/ 'tsho byed/ sman pa zug rdu 'byin pa/ yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa ni/ rgyal po la 'os pa/ rgyal po la mkho ba/ rgyal po'i yan lag gi grangs su 'gro'o// //
100a7('dul ba): 'dul ba gzhi/ bam po drug cu gnyis pa/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di la/ sman pa zug rdu 'byin pa nad la mkhas pa yin/ nad kun nas slong ba la mkhas pa yin/ nad byung ba spong
100b1('dul ba): ba la mkhas pa yin/ spangs pa phyis mi 'byung ba la mkhas pa yin te/ nad la mkhas pa ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di la/ sman pa zug rdu 'byin pa nad shes shing / nad 'di ni/ 'di lta bu dang /
100b2('dul ba): 'di lta bu yin no zhes de ltar nad la mkhas pa yin no/ /nad kun nas slong ba la mkhas pa ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di la/ sman pa zug rdu 'byin pa nad shes shing / nad 'di ni/ rlung gis kun
100b3('dul ba): nas bslang ba'am/ 'khris pas kun nas bslang ba'am/ bad kan gyis kun nas bslang ba'am/ bdag las gyur pa'am/ gzhan las gyur pa'am/ 'dus pa las gyur pa'o/ /zhes
100b4('dul ba): de ltar nad kun nas slong ba la mkhas pa yin no/ /nad byung ba spong ba la mkhas pa ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di la/ sman pa zug rdu 'byin pa nad shes shing / nad 'di ni/ mig sman nam/ bsku
100b5('dul ba): mnye'am/ skyug sman nam/ bkru sman nam/ snar blugs pa'am/ du bas bdug pa'am/ nan rtsi'i las kyis spang bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes de ltar nad byung ba spong ba la mkhas pa yin
100b6('dul ba): no| |nad spangs pa phyis mi 'byung ba la mkhas pa ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di la/ sman pa zug rdu 'byin pa nad shes shing nad 'di ni/ 'phrod pa'i cho ga 'di lta bu dang / 'di lta bu dag byas te spangs
100b7('dul ba): na| phyis mi 'byung ngo / /zhes de ltar nad spangs pa phyis mi 'byung ba la mkhas pa yin te/ de ltar na/ sman pa zug rdu 'byin pa yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa/ rgyal po la 'os pa yin/ rgyal
101a1('dul ba): po la mkho ba yin/ rgyal po'i yan lag gi grangs su 'gro ba yin no/ /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yan
101a2('dul ba): lag bzhi dang ldan pa yang / sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa bla na med pa zhes bya'o/ /'tsho byed/ bzhi gang dag ce na/ 'di la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
101a3('dul ba): rgyas ni/ 'di ni/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'o/ /zhes bya ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /'di ni/ sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba'o/ /'di ni/ sdug bsngal
101a4('dul ba): 'gog pa'o/ /'di ni/ sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa'o/ /zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /'tsho byed/ sman pa zug rngu 'byin
101a5('dul ba): pas ni/ skye ba'i rtsa ba can gyi sdug bsngal rnams spong ba'i sman mi shes so/ /rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid
101a6('dul ba): mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'i rtsa ba can gyi sdug bsngal rnams spong ba'i sman mi shes so/ /'tsho byed/ de bzhin gshegs pas ni/ skye ba'i skye ba'i rtsa ba can gyi sdug bsngal rnams
101a7('dul ba): spong ba'i sman mkhyen to/ /rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'i rtsa ba can gyi sdug
101b1('dul ba): bsngal rnams spong ba'i sman mkhyen to/ /de lta bas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ sman pa zug rngu 'byin pa bla na med pa zhes bya'o/ /chos
101b2('dul ba): kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ 'tsho byed gzhon nus bskyed/ chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/ /de nas 'tsho byed gzhon nus bskyed kyis chos mthong ba
101b3('dul ba): dang / chos thob pa dang / chos rig pa dang / chos kyi gting sleb pa dang / som nyi las brgal ba dang / the tshom las brgal ba dang / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang / gzhan gyis mi bkri ba
101b4('dul ba): dang / ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/
101b5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag ni/ 'phags so/ /mngon par 'phags so/ /bdag/ bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la
101b6('dul ba): skyabs su mchi na/ bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang bsdos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so/ /de nas sman pa'i rgyal
101b7('dul ba): po 'tsho byed kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / /ri'i rgyal po gangs can kha bas g.yogs te rtag tu lhags pa
102a1('dul ba): che bas/ bcom ldan 'das grang nad kyis snyun gyis thebs pa dang / sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis bsam pa/ dper na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po la bya ba
102a2('dul ba): bzhin/ bdag nyid kho nas bcom ldan 'das la rim gro bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas 'tsho byed kyis me tog ut+pa la sum cu rtsa gnyis dang bkru sman gyi rdzas dag sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la phul
102a3('dul ba): te| bcom ldan 'das/ 'di rnams shangs kyis bsnam du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bsnams pa las thang sum cu gnyis kho na 'khrus par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la zhus
102a4('dul ba): pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ga legs par khrus legs sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'tsho byed/ skyon gang dag g.yos la ma 'khrus pa de dag kyang yod de/ 'khrus
102a5('dul ba): la ma g.yos pa yang yod/ 'khrus la g.yas pa yang yod/ ma 'khrus la ma g.yos pa yang yod do/ /'tsho byed kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te de lta na bu ram
102a6('dul ba): dang / a ru ra gsol la khu ba'i rim pa yang mdzod cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin du mdzad nas snyun gdangs par gyur to/ /'tsho byed kyi kun tu spyod pa ni rgyal po'am/ blon
102a7('dul ba): po gang su'i dpyad byas kyang rung ste/ des de la grong ngam/ grong mchog sbyin par byed pa yin no/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ /'tsho byed kyis lus 'phags kyi rgyal po'i dpyad byas
102b1('dul ba): pa las/ des de la brgya stong ri pa'i gos be'u ras yug po che zhig byin pa dang / des de blangs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
102b2('dul ba): gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ 'tsho byed gzhon nus bskyed kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun
102b3('dul ba): pa/ bdag gi kun tu spyod pa ni rgyal po'am/ blon po gang su'i dpyad bgyis kyang rung ste/ des bdag la grong ngam/ grong mchog stsol ba lags pas/ bdag gis lus 'phags kyi
102b4('dul ba): rgyal po la dpyad bgyis pa dang / des bdag la brgya stong ri ba'i ras shig stsal ba 'di bcom ldan 'das la bdag 'bul zhing mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse
102b5('dul ba): bas nye bar bzung ste 'di bzhes su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'tsho byed gzhon nus bskyed las brgya stong ri ba'i gos be'u ras yug po che bzhes so/ /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun
102b6('dul ba): dga' bo/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gnam logs na bsil yab thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yob cing 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la
102b7('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ brgya stong ri ba'i gos be'u ras yug po che longs la pa'i ched du gris dros shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos blangs te/ sa phyogs gsal la yangs
103a1('dul ba): par song nas gzhal bar brtsams pa las/ chos gos mang du ldang par mthong ngo / /de nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi na bza' chos gos gsum dang / bdag
103a2('dul ba): nyid kyi bla gos mthang gos dang bcas pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan 'dzin gyi ras chung dpung chad cig byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dbyar gyi gnas der ras lnga brgya brnyes
103a3('dul ba): shing / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis kyang du ma zhig rnyed na/ dge slong rnams kyis ji ltar bsgrub par bya ba shes pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
103a4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir rjes su gnang ste/ dge slong rnams kyis khyim pa'i gos gris dras te kha dog ngan par byas pa bcang bar bya'o/ /rgyal po gzugs can snying
103a5('dul ba): po'i kun tu spyod pa ni/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma mthong na/ glang po che las babs nas rkang pa la phyag byed pa yin no/ /de dus gzhan zhig na glang po che la zhon nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
103a6('dul ba): zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byed du song ba las/ ji tsam na lam gyi dbus nas 'tsho ba pa zhig mthong nas de de la gus pa bskyed de/ glang po che las babs nas rkang pa gnyis la
103a7('dul ba): gtugs so/ /de na ma dad pa gang yin pa de dag gis bsam pa/ lha dge slong 'ba' zhig la mngon par dad pa ma yin no/ /dad pa can gang yin pa de dag gis bsam pa ni/
103b1('dul ba): gdon mi za bar lhas dge slong yin snyam ste/ de gus pas glang po che las babs nas rkang pa gnyis la gtugs so snyam nas/ de rnams yid gnyis su gyur te/ rgyal po la smras pa/ lha/ su
103b2('dul ba): la phyag bgyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos la'o/ /lha/ de ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos ma lags te/ 'tsho ba pa lags so/ /de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'di snyam
103b3('dul ba): du sems te/ bdag gis don 'di kho na gsol lo snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na pa der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs
103b4('dul ba): gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag gi kun
103b5('dul ba): tu spyod pa ni/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma mthong na glang po che las babs nas de'i rkang pa la phyag bgyid pa lags pa las/ de ring bdag gus pa skyes nas glang po che las babs te
103b6('dul ba): dge slong lags snyam nas 'tsho ba pa'i rkang pa la gtugs lags kyi/ kye ma'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ 'phags pa rnams kyi chos gos rnams la mtshan
103b7('dul ba): ma cung zad cig gdab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das
104a1('dul ba): cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te song ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge
104a2('dul ba): slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ 'tsho ba pa gang gis bden pa mthong ba las phyag bdag gir byas pa ni nyams te/ mi rung ngo / /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom
104a3('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi gnam logs na bsil yab thogs te bcom ldan 'das la g.yob cing 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun
104a4('dul ba): dga' bo/ khyod kyis lus 'phags kyi ri bo mthong ngam/ btsun pa/ ma mthong lags so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i na bza' chos gos kyi mtha' nas zungs shig/ des bzung
104a5('dul ba): ba dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i khab nas mi snang bar mdzad de/ de nyid nas rdzu 'phrul gyis steng gi nam mkha' la gshegs nas lus 'phags kyi ri bo la
104a6('dul ba): bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe ma ga d+ha'i mi rnams kyi zhing / mnyam zhing nye 'khor mnyam pa/ rnang gi khyad par sna tshogs dag rnang sgal gyis 'brel cing mdzes pa dag gzigs nas/
104a7('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis zhing mnyam zhing nye 'khor mnyam la rnang gi khyad par sna tshogs dag rnang sgal gyis 'brel bar mdzes pa de dag
104b1('dul ba): mthong ngam/ btsun pa/ mthong lags so/ /kun dga' bo/ de lta bas na/ dge slong rnams kyis 'di lta bur chos gos rnams dras te drub par bya'o/ /gnas brtan kun dga' bos
104b2('dul ba): dge slong rnams la smras pa/ khyed kyis 'di lta bur chos gos rnams dros la drubs shig/ dge slong rnams kyis chos gos dag dras te drub par brtsams na/ snam bu rnams kha phyogs
104b3('dul ba): gcig tu bstan pas mi mdzes nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bsam pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ma stsal mod kyi/ 'di kho nas rkyen byas nas gnang bar 'gyur ba'i gnas
104b4('dul ba): de yod do/ /snyam nas/ des snam bu rnams kha phyogs gnyis kar bstan na/ 'on kyang mtha' skor med pas mdzes par ma gyur nas/ mtha' skor byas so/ /de nas byas shing zin pa dang /
104b5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la phul lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ legs so/ /legs so/ /ngas gang gi phyir bka' stsal pa de khyod kyis shes te/ de lta bas
104b6('dul ba): na/ dge slong rnams kyis 'di lta bur chos gos rnams dras la drub par bya'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis chos gos dras shing drubs pa re re bcangs nas lhag ma ni/ ma dras so/ /de nas
104b7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+ha'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/ 'brog gnas su byon nas 'brog gnas na 'brog gnas kyi tshal na bzhugs so/ /'brog gnas 'bab chu dang nye
105a1('dul ba): bas grang zhing rlung ldang bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thun dang po la mthang gos gsol to/ /thun bar ma la bla gos gsol to/ /thun tha ma la tshe dang
105a2('dul ba): ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ nga la snam sbyar gyis g.yogs shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos lag pa gnyis bkrus nas snam sbyar gyis
105a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du g.yogs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis na bza' chos gos gsum gyis mtshan mo de 'das par mdzad do/ /de nas nam nangs nas dgongs pa/ 'jig
105a4('dul ba): rten na shin tu skyid pa/ bde bar 'dod pa gang yin pa su yang rung / de rnams kyi mchog ni/ nga yin te/ nga yang chos gos gsum gyis 'tsho bar spyod na/ nga'i nyan thos rnams lta
105a5('dul ba): smos kyang ci dgos snyam du dgongs nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ de lta bas na/ dge slong rnams kyis dras pa'i chos gos gsum bcang bar bya'o/ /
105a6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis dras pa'i chos gos gsum bcang bar bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal na/ dge slong zhig la chos gos gsum pa med nas des phying pa zhig rnyed nas des dra bar
105a7('dul ba): brtsams so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyang phyogs der gshegs nas smras pa/ dge slong / 'di ci yin/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis dras pa'i chos gos
105b1('dul ba): gsum pa bcang bar bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal na/ bdag la chos gos gsum pa ma mchis nas btsal ba las/ bdag gis phying pa 'di rnyed de dras nas chos gos bgyi'o/ /dge slong / 'di
105b2('dul ba): ni/ dra ba'i 'os ma yin no/ /'on kyang lhan thabs kyis glan pa'i 'os yin pas lhan thabs kyis glan nas bcang bar bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal nas gshegs te/ dge slong gi dge
105b3('dul ba): 'dun bsdus nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag
105b4('dul ba): dge slong che ge mo zhes bya ba la chos gos med nas phying pa la 'dra bar byed kyi/ dge slong dag/ de lta bas na/ mi 'dra ba ni/ lnga ste/ phying pa thams cad dang / snam bu thams cad dang / be'u
105b5('dul ba): ras thams cad dang / seng ras thams cad dang / klam thams cad de/ lhan thabs kyis glan nas bcang bar bya'o// //gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /ko sa
105b6('dul ba): la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi blon po'i mchog ri dwags 'dzin ces bya ba des/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par
105b7('dul ba): byed de/ de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las/ khye'u zhig btsas so/ /zhes bya ba nas de bzhin du khye'u bdun btsas te/ de la drug gi ming ni/ ci dga'
106a1('dul ba): bar btags so/ /tha chung gang yin pa de'i ming ni/ sa ga zhes bya bar btags so/ /ji tsam na/ ri dwags 'dzin gyi chung ma shi nas/ des bu drug gi khyim phub pa
106a2('dul ba): dang / de rnams rang rang gi chung ma rnams dang lhan cig byi dor lhur len cing khyim gyi 'tsho nam mi sems par 'dug go/ khyim bdag ri dwags 'dzin 'gram pa la lag pa gtad nas sems khong
106a3('dul ba): du chud cing 'dug go/ de'i 'grogs bshes bram ze zhig yod pa de 'ongs nas des de sems khong du chud pa mthong nas des smras pa/ khyim bdag/ ci'i phyir sems khong du chud/ bdag gi bu 'di
106a4('dul ba): dag rang rang gi chung ma dang lhan cig byi dor lhur len cing khyim gyi 'tsho nam mi sems par 'dug pas khyim zhig par 'gyur ro/ /des smras pa/ ci'i phyir sa ga khyim mi dbugs/ gal te na yang
106a5('dul ba): lhag par phung krol byed kyang sus shes/ gal te na 'di lhag par legs par byed kyang sus shes/ gal te khyod dad na/ bu mo zhig btsal lo/ /de bzhin du gyis shig/ de tshol zhing
106a6('dul ba): rim gyis yul tsam par phyin to/ /tsam pa na khyim bdag stobs kyi bshes gnyen zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i bu mo sa ga ma zhes bya ba/ gzugs bzang ba/ dar la bab pa/ tshul dang dul
106a7('dul ba): ba dang ldan pa/ mkhas pa/ g.yer ba zhig yod pa de/ bu mo yid 'phrog ma gang 'dod pa rnams dang lhan cig tu skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir chas pa dang / bram ze de yang phyogs der
106b1('dul ba): phyin te/ des bu mo rnams mthong nas/ des bsam pa/ 'di rnams kho na la re zhig brtag par bya'o/ /snyam nas/ de brtag pa lhur len cing dal bus 'jab cing de rnams kyi phyi bzhin du
106b2('dul ba): song ngo / /bud med ni/ phal cher yang ba'i rang bzhin yin pas/ de rnams las kha cig ni/ bang rgyug/ kha cig ni/ mchong bar byed/ kha cig ni/ 'gre/ kha cig ni/ rgod/ kha cig ni/ lus
106b3('dul ba): sgyur bar byed/ kha cig ni/ glu len par byed de/ 'di dag dang / gzhan yang spyod tshul ngan pa dag byed do/ /dul ba phun sum tshogs pa de ni/ gom pa dal gyis de dag dang lhan cig tu 'gro'o//
106b4('dul ba): ji tsam na/ skyed mos tshal du phyin pa dang / bu mo de rnams ni/ rdzing gi 'gram du gos rnams bzhag nas mod la zhugs te rtse bar brtsams so/ /de ni/ ji tsam ji tsam chur nub pa de tsam
106b5('dul ba): de tsam du gos dag brdze zhing 'jug la/ ji tsam ji tsam ldang ba de tsam du gos dag 'bebs shing ldang ste/ de lta bur spyod lam zhi ba yin no/ /de nas khrus kyi brtson pa byas nas gnas
106b6('dul ba): gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bu mo de rnams ni/ thog mar rang zas zos nas de'i 'og tu 'khor gyi skye bo la sbyin par rtsom mo/ /de ni/ 'khor gyi skye bo la sngar byin nas de'i 'og tu rang za bar
106b7('dul ba): rtsom mo/ /de nas zos shing 'thungs nas skyed mos tshal gyi bde ba nyams su myong bar byas nas dong ngo / /ji tsam na/ lam gar chu rgal bar byed pa na/ bu mo de rnams ni/ mchil lham
107a1('dul ba): rnams phud nas brgal lo/ /de ni/ mchil lham dang bcas pas dong ngo / /de dag kun dga'i ra par zhugs pa dang / des ni/ gdugs thogs te a mra'i tshal
107a2('dul ba): du byung ngo / /gzhan dag gis gdugs rnams bor ro/ /de nas rlung dang char bab nas de'i tshe bu mo rnams lha khang du zhugs nas 'dug go/ /de ni/ bla gab med pa na'o/ /bram ze de yang
107a3('dul ba): de'i rjes bzhin du song ba las/ des de'i mtshan nyid dang spyod tshul de lta bu mthong nas de nas ngo mtshar skyes te bu mo de la dri bar brtsams pa/ bu mo/ khyod su'i/ stobs kyi bshes gnyen
107a4('dul ba): gyi bu mo'o/ /bu mo/ khyod la cung zad cig 'dri'i/ ma khro zhig /des 'dzum pa sngon du btang nas smras pa/ khu gu/ 'di la khror ci mchis/ dris shig/ bu mo/ 'di dag thams cad
107a5('dul ba): ni| rgyug pa dang / mchong pa dang / 'gre ba dang / lus sgyur bar byed pa dang / glu len par byed cing / 'di dag dang / gzhan yang spyod tshul ngan pa byed cing 'gro na/ khyod ni/ tshul dang
107a6('dul ba): dul ba phun sum tshogs pas dal bus rgyu zhing / de rnams dang lhan cig skyed mos tshal du 'gro bar byed do/ /des smras pa/ bu mo thams cad ni/ pha dang mas btsong pa'i rdzas yin na/ gal
107a7('dul ba): te bdag gis mchong ngam 'gres nas rkang pa'am/ lag pa chag par gyur na/ bdag la su zhig slong bar 'gyur te/ nges par bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du pha dang / ma kho na'i gson
107b1('dul ba): par 'gyur ro/ /bu mo/ legs te/ de ni/ khong du chud do/ /gzhan yang / 'di 'dri ste/ bu mo 'di dag ni/ gos rnams mtha' gcig tu bzhag nas gos gcig kyang med par mod la zhugs
107b2('dul ba): nas rtse bar rtsom la/ khyod ni/ ji tsam ji tsam chur nub pa de tsam de tsam du gos brdze bar byed do/ /khu gu/ bu med ni/ ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa dang ldan par bya dgos phas/ gal
107b3('dul ba): te bdag gis gos phud pa 'ga' zhig gis mthong na/ mi rigs par 'gyur ro/ /bu mo/ khyod la de na su zhig lta/ khu gu/ re zhig khyod kho nas kyang bdag mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /bu mo/
107b4('dul ba): legs te/ de yang khong du chud do/ /gzhan yang / 'di 'dri ste/ bu mo 'di dag ni/ rang sngar zos nas de'i 'og tu 'khor gyi skye bo la zan sbyin par byed la/ khyod ni/ 'khor gyi skye bo
107b5('dul ba): la sngar zan byin nas de'i 'og tu rang za bar byed do/ /khu gu/ bdag cag ni/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bus 'tsho bas bdag cag la rtag tu dus ston mchis la/ 'di dag ni/ tshegs
107b6('dul ba): 'byung ba'i 'bras bus 'tsho ba lags pas/ brgya lam na lan 'ga' rgya chen po 'thob pa'i phyir ro/ /bu mo/ legs te/ de yang khong du chud do/ /gzhan yang / 'di 'dri ste/ 'jig rten
107b7('dul ba): thams cad ni/ skam la mchil lham gyon la/ khyod ni/ chu la gyon pa de ci/ khu gu/ 'jig rten blun mod/ chu kho na la mchil lham bgo 'tshal te/ ci'i slad du zhe na/ thang la sdong
108a1('dul ba): dum dang / tsher ma dang / rdo ba dang / zug rdo dang / nya phyis kyi dum bu dang / srin kog gi dum bu rnams mngon la/ chu la ni/ de dag mi mngon pas des na/ chu kho na la
108a2('dul ba): mchil lham bgo bar bgyi'i/ thang la ni/ ma lags so/ /bu mo/ legs te/ de yang khong du chud do/ /gzhan yang / 'di 'dri ste/ bu mo de dag ni/ nyi ma la gdugs thogs na/ khyod
108a3('dul ba): ni| kun dga'i ra ba'i shing gi grib ma la thogs par byed na/ 'di la rigs pa ci zhig yod/ khu gu/ 'jig rten blun mod/ kun dga'i ra ba kho nar gdugs bcang 'tshal te/ de ci'i slad
108a4('dul ba): du zhe na/ kun dga'i ra ba ni/ rtag tu spre'u dang bya rnams kyis gang bas/ bya rnams ni/ gcin rtug 'thor zhing rus pa'i dum bu dag 'thor ro/ /spre'u rnams kyang bshang ba dang gci
108a5('dul ba): ba byed cing / 'bras bu'i za 'phro dag 'thor bar byed la/ rang bzhin gyis rgod bag can yin pas phan tshun yal ga gzhan du 'gro bar byed pa na/ shing dum dag ltung bar byed
108a6('dul ba): do| |bla gab ma mchis pa la ni/ de dag ma mchis so/ /brgya la mchis na yang de res 'ga' zhig 'bab par bas te/ des na/ kun dga' ra ba kho nar gdugs bcang bar bgyi'i
108a7('dul ba): bla gab ma mchis par ni ma lags so/ /bu mo/ legs te/ de yang khong du chud do/ /gzhan yang / 'di 'dri ste/ bu mo 'di dag ni/ rlung dang char pa byung na/ lha khang du
108b1('dul ba): 'jug na/ khyod ni/ bla gab med par 'dug go/ khu gu/ bla gab ma mchis pa kho nar gnas par bgyi'i/ lha khang du 'jug par ni/ ma lags so/ /bu mo/ 'di la rigs pa ci yod
108b2('dul ba): khu gu/ lha khang stong pa 'di dag ni/ rtag tu dwa dang / nal phrug dang / g.yon can rnams kyis mi stong lags te/ gal te bdag zhugs pa'i yan lag dang / nyid lag dag la
108b3('dul ba): 'ga' zhig gis reg na/ de lta na/ bdag gi pha ma dag la mi snyan par mi 'gyur ram/ nyis na/ bla gab med par srog dang bral ba ni/ bla'i/ lha khang stong par mi 'jug go /de
108b4('dul ba): nas bram ze de/ de'i spyod tshul gyis rangs shing yid bde ba skyes nas khyim bdag stobs kyi bshes gnyen gyi khyim du zhugs te bu mo thob par 'dod pa'i spro ba dang bcas pas bde
108b5('dul ba): legs su gyur cig/ bde legs su gyur cig ces smra ba dang / khyim 'khor gyi skye bos smras pa/ bram ze/ re zhig bslang ba'i dus ni/ ma yin na/ ci zhig slong / bu mo slong
108b6('dul ba): ngo| |su zhig gi ched du/ mnyan yod na blon po'i mchog ri dwags 'dzin ces bya ba de'i bu sa ga zhes bya ba'i 'o/ /de rnams kyis smras pa/ de dang / bdag cag ni/ rigs mnyam
108b7('dul ba): pa yin na/ 'on kyang yul ha cang yang thag ring ches so/ /des smras pa/ ring po kho na la bu mo sbyin par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nye na re zhig gal te bde bar gyur pa thos pa
109a1('dul ba): na| dga' ba bskyed par zad/ nye na sdug bsngal bar gyur na/ sbyin pa dang / mchod pa dang / bkur sti bya bas dub par 'gyur zhing / nor 'ged
109a2('dul ba): bar yang 'gyur ro/ /de rnams kyis smras pa/ gal te de lta na sbyin no/ /de nas bram ze de/ bde legs su gyur cig ces smras nas song ste rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin nas lam
109a3('dul ba): gyis dub pa bsal te/ blon po'i mchog ri dwags 'dzin gyi drung du song nas de nas bu mo'i za ba dang / gnas pa'i spyod tshul dang / gzugs bzang zhing dar la bab pa dang / mdzes
109a4('dul ba): pa dang / mkhas pa dag ji lta ba bzhin du bsnyad nas smras pa/ bdag gis nyon mongs pa chen pos yul dang / tshong rdal sna tshogs su rgyus pas sdug bsngal gyis de rnyed kyi/ da ni/
109a5('dul ba): song la longs shig/ de nas blon po'i mchog ri dwags 'dzin gyis nyi ma dang / tshes grangs dang / yud tsam dang / rgyu skar dag bstun nas tsam par 'ongs te/ dpal gyi 'byor
109a6('dul ba): pa chen pos sa ga'i chung ma blangs so/ /de mi yul du 'gro ba'i tshe mas bslab pa/ bu mo/ khyod kyis nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis la rtag tu phyag bya/ me la bsnyen bkur bya/ me long dri
109a7('dul ba): ma 'phyi bar bya/ gos dkar po bgo bar bya/ blang bar bya'i/ sbyin par mi bya/ tshig bsrung bar bya/ langs nas su la yang stan bstab par mi bya/ zhim po bza' bar bya/ bde
109b1('dul ba): bar nyal bar bya/ them skas gzugs par bya'o/ /de nas ri dwags 'dzin gyis thos nas/ des bsam pa/ bu mo 'di lta ba log par 'dzin du bcug ste/ bdag gis 'di lta ba log pa
109b2('dul ba): dang phral la yang dag pa'i lta ba 'dzin du gzhug go/ snyam du bsam nas de blangs te chas so/ /de nas de'i ma sdug pas snying dkrugs shing mig mchi mas gang bas mgul nas 'khyud nas
109b3('dul ba): ngu bzhin gyi nga ros smras pa/ bu mo/ khyod mthong ba'i tha ma ni/ 'di yin no/ /des de la shes par bya ba'i phyir smras pa/ yum/ re zhig khyod 'dir 'khrungs sam/ 'on te nye du'i khyim du/ bu mo/
109b4('dul ba): nye du'i khyim du'o/ /khyod kyi khang pa de yin nam/ 'on te 'di yin/ 'di yin no/ /bdag kyang 'dir skyes la der bdag gnas par gsal/ 'du ba mchis na gdon mi za bar mtha' 'bral
109b5('dul ba): bar 'gyur na/ bshums su ci mchis/ cang ma gsungs shig/ de nas ri dwags 'dzin ni/ thang la song ngo / /sa ga ma ni/ khyim thab dang / rang gi khyim nas thob pa'i 'khor gyi skye bo
109b6('dul ba): dang lhan cig tu grur dong ba las/ de na rgod ma rte'u smad byung nas ring po ma lon pa zhig grur gzhug par byas pa dang / rte'u thang la mi rga'o snyam nas bsgrims kyang 'jug tu ma btub
109b7('dul ba): pa dang / ku co byung ba sa ga mas thos nas des smras pa/ ci'i phyir ku co 'di byung / de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa rnams smras pa dang / sa ga mas smras pa/ rte'u sngar chu gcig dang
110a1('dul ba): rang nyid 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /de rnams kyis de bzhin byas pa dang zhugs so/ /de nas ri dwags 'dzin gyis de rnams la dris pa/ ci'i phyir khyed cag
110a2('dul ba): ring zhig lon nas 'ongs/ rta rgod ma grur mchong du ma btub pas so/ /'o na ji ltar mchong / tsam pa mas thabs bshams pa zhig bstan te rte'u sngar bcug pas so/ /tsam
110a3('dul ba): pa mo ni/ mkhas pa yin no/ /ji tsam na mgron po rnams lam gar nub mo brang btab ste gnas pa la ri dwags 'dzin gyi mal bya skyibs shig tu bcas pa sa ga mas mthong nas
110a4('dul ba): dris pa/ 'di su'i mal/ ri dwags 'dzin gyi'o/ /spos shig/ ci'i phyir/ gal te gnyid kyis log pa la bya skyibs steng du rdib na gdon mi za bar non pas 'chi bar 'gyur te/
110a5('dul ba): bdag la gang zhig blangs na gyos po khyim du ma phyin par lam gar shi ba 'di lta bu'i bu mo bag mar blang zhes ji srid 'tsho'i bar mi snyan pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mal de yang
110a6('dul ba): spos pa las gad pa zhig pa dang skye bo'i tshogs chen pos khyim bdag non to zhes kun tu brgyugs pa dang / khyim bdag gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ bdag 'di na 'dug gi/
110a7('dul ba): ma skrag par mal rtogs shig/ mal spos so/ /sus/ sa ga mas so/ /tsam pa ma ni/ mkhas pa yin no/ /yang skyed mos tshal rnying pa zhig tu nub mo brang btab ste 'khod pa
110b1('dul ba): las/ ri dwags 'dzin gyi mal lha khang stong pa zhig tu bcas pa sa ga mas mthong nas dris pa/ 'di su'i mal/ dpon po'i 'o/ /spos shig/ ci'i phyir/ gal te lha khang rdib ste de non na
110b2('dul ba): shi bar 'gyur te/ bdag la zhes bya ba nas mi snyan pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i gong ma bzhin du'o/ /mal de yang spos pa las/ lha khang zhig pa dang skye bo'i tshogs chen
110b3('dul ba): pos brgyugs pa dang zhes bya ba nas tsam pa ma ni/ mkhas pa yin no/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /ji tsam na/ rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin nas lam gyis dub pa bsal te/
110b4('dul ba): mdza' bshes dang / nye du dang / gnyen gyi skye bo spras nas sa ga ma rang gi rigs dang 'tsham pa'i khyim gyi las dag byed do/ /ri dwags 'dzin gyi mna' ma drug gis res mos res mos su khyim
110b5('dul ba): mi'i zan sbyor ba las/ sa ga ma la yang de bzhin du bsgo ste/ khyod kyi res kyang zhag bdun pa la sbyor cig/ de'i res la 'bab tu nye ba dang / gyos po dang / sgyug mo dang / khyim bdag
110b6('dul ba): rnams kyi dri'i lhag ma gang yin pa de dag ril bur byas nas nyi ma re re zhing bskams so/ /nyi ma re re zhing nod pa'i phye gang yin pa de las kyang pre kha phri ste bzhag la/ lhag ma mar dang bsres
110b7('dul ba): pas de dang tshad mnyam par gyur to/ /sang lta bu res bab pa na/ chang btung la reg par bya ba dang / khyim thab dang rang gi me tog gi phreng ba rnying pa gang yin pa de dag bsil bar bzhag nas
111a1('dul ba): ji tsam na nam langs pa dang / las byed pa rnams la sgyu rtsi dang / dri dang / me tog dang / zas dang / chang dag byin no/ /de rnams shin tu mgu nas bdag cag ring
111a2('dul ba): zhig lon nas khyim bdag gi chung ma rnying pas bzhin bltas so/ /zhes de rnams kyis de'i nyin par las nyis 'gyur du byas so/ /ji tsam na/ ri dwags 'dzin gyis phyi dro'i dus su las kyi
111a3('dul ba): mtha' la bltas pa na/ las mang du zin pa mthong nas des dris pa/ ci/ khyed cag gis gla mi gzhan dag cig bkug gam/ sus kyang ma bkug go/ gang gis na/ las nyis 'gyur du
111a4('dul ba): byas pa 'di la rgyu ci zhig yod/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ dpon po/ zas ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i las bgyid do/ /de ji lta bu yin/ de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa rgya cher smras pa dang / ri dwags
111a5('dul ba): 'dzin gyi bu rnams kyis rang rang gi chung ma la smras pa las/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ sa ga mas ji ltar bgyis pa de bzhin du gal te bdag cag gis kyang khyim nas brkus la gla mi
111a6('dul ba): rnams dga' bar bgyis pa dang / bdag la yang jo bo dang / khyed gla mi rnams dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas ri dwags 'dzin gyis sa ga ma la dris pa/ bu mo/ khyod kyis kha zas rnams
111a7('dul ba): ji ltar bshams/ des rgyas par smras pa dang / ri dwags 'dzin mgu nas/ des de kho na khyim gyi bya ba rnams byed du bcug ste/ nang mi thams cad la smras pa/ khyed cag las gang
111b1('dul ba): zhig sa ga mas byin pas mgu ba ni/ des gnas par gyis la/ de dang rjes su mthun par yang gyis shig/ ji tsam na/ khyim gyi dpon mor gyur nas spyod tshul dang / gnas pa dang / des
111b2('dul ba): pas nang mi thams cad dga' bar gyur to/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ sa ga ma'i khyim steng nas ngang pa rnams kyis byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling nas ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu dag
111b3('dul ba): khyer nas dong pa las/ rgyal po'i khab na 'dug pa'i ngang pas de dag mthong nas skad phyung ba dang / de rnams kyis kyang skye gnas mthun pa'i gcugs pas brnag ma thub ste skad phyung ba dang /
111b4('dul ba): rgyal po'i khab kyi khang thog tu 'bras kyi snye ma rnams lhung bar gyur to/ /de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la re re byin pa dang / ri dwags 'dzin gyis rang gi skal ba sa ga ma la byin no/ /des za ma
111b5('dul ba): tog gi nang du bcug ste zhing pa rnams la bsgo ba dang / de rnams kyang shin tu mgu ste/ de rnams kyis zhing chung ngu zhig legs par bstan nas dus shes par byas te btab pa dang / lhas
111b6('dul ba): dus bzhin du char phab pas sa bon dang mthun par phun sum tshogs par skyes so/ /phyi de lo la rab tu mang po skye bar gyur to/ /yang phyi de lo la ni/ de bas kyang mang por gyur te/ de bzhin
111b7('dul ba): du ji tsam na/ bang ba thams cad ngang pas khyer te 'ongs pa'i 'bras sA lus gang bar gyur to/ /ji tsam na/ ko sa'i rgyal po gsal rgyal nad kyis thebs nas des sman pa rnams bkug ste
112a1('dul ba): dris pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ gal te ngang pas 'tshal te mchis pa'i sA lu rnyed na/ de la 'jam bsgral nas gsol cig dang / sos par 'gyur
112a2('dul ba): lags so/ /rgyal pos blon po rnams bkug nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ khyed la ngang pas khyer te 'ongs pa'i sA lu'i snye ma byin pa de dag khyed kyis ci byas/ de na kha cig gis smras
112a3('dul ba): pa/ lha/ bdag cag gis ni/ lha khang du phul lo/ /gzhan dag gis smras pa/ bdag cag gis me'i nang du stsal to/ /gzhan dag gis smras pa/ bdag cag gis sgo gang du btags
112a4('dul ba): so| |ri dwags 'dzin gyis smras pa/ lha/ bdag gis sa ga ma la stsal na/ re zhig des cir bgyis/ rma bar 'tshal lo/ /des sa ga ma la dris pa dang / des smras pa/ jo bo/ ci/ ngang
112a5('dul ba): pas 'tshal te mchis pa'i sA lu 'tshal ba zhig mchis sam/ rgyal po snyun gyis thebs pa la sman pa rnams kyis ngang pas khyer te 'ongs pa'i sA lu bstan to/ /de nas sa ga mas gser
112a6('dul ba): snod kyi nang du ngang pas khyer te 'ongs pa'i 'bras kyis bkang nas rgyal po la bskur ba las/ rgyal pos zos nas sos par gyur to/ /dus gzhan zhig na/ rgyal po la ljongs kyi mi rnams
112a7('dul ba): kyis rta rgod ma ma smad gnyis shig phul ba las/ de la ma ni/ gang yin/ rte'u ni/ gang yin pa 'gas kyang ma shes nas/ rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag/
112b1('dul ba): legs par rtogs la nga la gsol cig/ blon po rnams kyis nyin thog thag tu dpyad na/ dub ste gtan la ma phebs so/ /ri dwags 'dzin ni/ phyi dro khyim du song ba dang sa ga mas rkang pa gnyis
112b2('dul ba): la gtugs nas smras pa/ jo bo/ ci ste de ring ring zhig lon nas gshegs/ des ji ltar gyur ba rnams rgyas par smras pa dang / sa ga mas smras pa/ jo bo/ 'di la dpyad du ci zhig mchis/
112b3('dul ba): de gnyis chas mnyam par stsal dang / bu gang lags pa de ni/ myur du 'tshal nas ma'i skal pa la 'tshal lo/ /ma gang lags pa de ni/ mi 'tshal par mgo steg ge mchis te/ rtags ni/ de
112b4('dul ba): lags so/ /ri dwags 'dzin gyis blon po rnams la smras nas/ de rnams kyis kyang ji skad bstan pa bzhin brtags nas/ de nas nam nangs pa dang rgyal po la smras pa/ lha/ 'di ni/ ma lags
112b5('dul ba): so| |'di ni/ bu lags so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ khyed cag gis ji ltar shes/ lha/ 'di lta bu dang 'di lta bu lags so/ /khar tsang ci ste ma shes/ lha/ bdag cag gis 'tshal bar rngo ga la
112b6('dul ba): thogs/ sa ga mas de skad bstan lags mod/ rgyal pos smras pa/ tsam pa ma ni/ mkhas pa yin no/ mi zhig chu 'gram du klam bzhag nas khrus byed pa dang / mi gzhan zhig 'ongs nas
112b7('dul ba): des klam des mgo la dkris nas de nyid du khrus bya bar brtsams so/ /mi de khrus byas nas langs na/ klam de ma mthong ngo / /mi des smras pa/ kye nang rje/ ci tshol/ klam mo/ khyod kyi
113a1('dul ba): klam ga la yod/ gal te khyod kyi klam yod par gyur na/ ji ltar ngas mgo la dkris nas zhugs pa de bzhin du khyod kyis kyang klam gyis mgo la dkris nas zhugs
113a2('dul ba): par 'gyur ro/ /des smras pa/ 'o ni nyid/ kho bo'i klam yin no/ /de gnyis khyod kyi nga'i zhes rtsod par gyur nas de gnyis rgyal po'i drung du song ngo / /rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/
113a3('dul ba): shes ldan dag/ legs par rtogs la gang gi yin pa de la byin cig/ de rnams kyis brtag par brtsams nas gcig la dris pa dang / des smras pa/ bdag gi lags so/ /gcig
113a4('dul ba): shos la yang dris pa dang / des smras pa/ bdag gi lags so/ /zhes khyod kyi dang / nga'i zhes pa la nyi ma 'das te/ blon po rnams dub nas dgongs ka gtan la ma phebs bzhin du khyim
113a5('dul ba): du song ngo / /sa ga mas ri dwags 'dzin gyi zhes bya ba nas dris te zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ des ji ltar gyur pa rnams smras pa dang / sa ga mas smras pa/ jo bo/ 'di la
113a6('dul ba): dpyad du ci zhig mchis/ de gnyis la gcig kyang phyed khyer cig/ gcig shos kyang phyed khyer cig ces gsungs shig dang / gang gi lags pa de'i mchid nas ni/ de ci'i phyir
113a7('dul ba): bdag gi klam dral zhes mchi'o/ /gang gi ma lags pa de'i glo ba la ni/ re zhig bdag gis byed thob na yang der zad/ 'dir bdag la ci zhig god snyam ste/ de ltar brtag par
113b1('dul ba): bgyi'o/ /ri dwags 'dzin song nas blon po rnams la smras nas zhes bya ba nas rgyal pos smras pa/ tsam pa mo ni/ mkhas pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /rgyal po la tshong pa gru
113b2('dul ba): bas tsan+dan gyi sdong dum zhig skyes su phul ba dang / de'i mgo gang yin/ mjug gang yin ma shes nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ ji lta bu yin rtogs shig/ de rnams kyis nyin
113b3('dul ba): thog thag dpyad na/ ma shes nas dgongs ka khyim du dong ngo / /sa ga mas zhes bya ba nas ri dwags 'dzin gyis dris pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /des ji ltar gyur pa rnams rgya cher
113b4('dul ba): smras pa dang / sa ga mas smras pa/ jo bo/ 'di la dpyad du ci mchis/ chab tu 'or cig dang / rtsa ba gang lags pa ni/ 'bying bar 'gyur ro/ /thor to gang lags pa de ni/ steng du 'byung bar
113b5('dul ba): 'gyur ro/ /de la brtag pa ni/ de lags so/ /ri dwags 'dzin gyis blon po rnams la smras nas zhes bya ba nas rgyal pos smras pa/ tsam pa mo ni/ mkhas pa yin no/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong
113b6('dul ba): ma bzhin du'o/ /ri bor na khyim bdag cig yod pa de/ de dang rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs pa las de la bu pho yang med/ bu mo yang med de/ de bu mngon par 'dod pas chun ma
113b7('dul ba): zhig blangs pa dang / de la chung ma chen ma shos rang bzhin gyi phrag dog can zhig pas/ de'i mngal ma rung bar bya ba'i sbyor ba zhig byas pa las/ de'i mngal shin tu rnam par dag pa las
114a1('dul ba): sems can dang ldan par gyur nas ji tsam na/ zla ba dgu 'das pa dang / khye'u zhig btsas so/ /des bsam pa/ sha 'khon rnams la ni/ 'di lta ste/ chen chun 'di
114a2('dul ba): tha chad yin pas/ gdon mi za bar ma yar mos thabs gang yang rung ba zhig gis gsod par 'gyur na/ bdag gi khyim thab bam/ bdag gis ci byar yod/ bdag gis nam du ni/
114a3('dul ba): srung / ye de kho na la sbyin par bya'o snyam nas/ de dang khyim thab lhan cig gros byas te rung nas chen ma shos la smras pa/ che zhe/ bdag gi bu 'di/ khyod la byin gyi/ gsos shig/
114a4('dul ba): des bsam pa/ khyim ni/ gang la bu yod pa de kho na'i yin par zad pas/ khyim gyi bdag mor 'gyur bas gso'o/ /snyam nas des de gsos pa las/ de'i pha yang shi bar gyur te/
114a5('dul ba): de gnyis khyim gyi phyir rtsod par gyur nas gcig gis smras pa/ 'di/ kho mo'i bu yin no/ /gcig shos kyis smras pa/ 'di/ kho mo'i bu yin no/ /rgyal po'i drung du song ba dang rgyal pos
114a6('dul ba): blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag/ dengs la gang yin pa rtogs shig/ de rnams kyis dpyad pa las/ nyi ma 'das kyang gtan la ma phebs nas dgongs ka khyim du dong pa
114a7('dul ba): dang / sa ga ma ri dwags 'dzin la dris te zhes bya ba nas 'di la dpyad du ci mchis zhes bya ba'i ngar gong ma bzhin du ste/ de gnyis la/ kho bo cag gis ni/ gang gi bu yin pa mi shes kyi/
114b1('dul ba): khyed cag gnyis las gang stobs che ba de khyer la songs shig ces gsungs shig dang / lag pa gnyis nas bzung nas 'dren par bgyid de/ de sdug bsngal gyis du bar gyur pa dang / de'i ma gang
114b2('dul ba): lags pa de ni/ brtse ba mchis pas 'di gson na/ nam zhig mthong bar 'gyur grang snyam nas gtong bar bgyid do/ /gcig shos de ni/ brtse ba ma mchis pas gang gi tshe mi gtong ba
114b3('dul ba): de'i tshe/ de la lcag gis bzhus shig dang / ji ltar gyur pa smra bar 'gyur te/ 'di la brtag pa ni/ 'di lags so/ /ri dwags 'dzin gyis blon po rnams la smras pa dang zhes bya ba nas/
114b4('dul ba): rgyal pos smras pa/ tsam pa mo ni/ mkhas pa yin no/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /dus gzhan zhig na/ ri dwags 'dzin nad kyis thebs nas de la sman pas nyi ma gcig
114b5('dul ba): sman byin pa las theg gi bar gyur to/ /phyi de nyin par sman ma yin pa byin pas na bar gyur to/ /sa ga mas bsam pa/ jo bo/ ci'i slad du nyin gcig ni/ theg gi bar gyur la/ nyin
114b6('dul ba): gcig ni/ na bar gyur snyam nas/ des sman gang dag gis theg gi bar gyur pa'i rtags de dag bzung nas de nas de sman pa rnams bsgo nas slar log nas rang nyid kyis dpyad byas
114b7('dul ba): pa las sos par gyur to/ /ri dwags 'dzin gyis bsam pa/ gang gis na/ bdag nyin gcig ni/ theg gi/ nyin gcig ni/ na bas gang gi tshe sman pa mi 'ongs pa de'i tshe theg gi ba 'di la
115a1('dul ba): rgyu ci zhig yod snyam ste/ des sa ga ma la dris pa zhes bya ba nas tsam pa mo ni/ mkhas pa yin no/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /ko sa la'i rgyal po
115a2('dul ba): gsal rgyal gyi glang po che'i bla dpal skyed ces bya ba de la dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po gshe bar gyur to/ /zhes sa ga mas thos nas/ de ri dwags 'dzin la smras pa/ jo bo/ blon po thams
115a3('dul ba): cad la mthar gyis bka' 'bab par 'gyur gyi/ dpal skyed la lha bzod pa mdzad du stsal ba'i rigs so/ /des smras pa/ bu mo/ bzod pa byed du gzhug go/ de nas des rgyal po la
115a4('dul ba): smras pa/ lha/ dpal skyed ni/ lha la glo ba nye ba lags na/ de la bzod pa mdzad du gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bzod par bya'o/ /lha/ gal te bzod par mdzad na/ de'i dbang thang de
115a5('dul ba): dag stsal du gsol/ de bzhin du sbyin no/ /dpal skyed kyis ji ltar sa ga mas bdag la rgyal po bzod pa byed du bcug pa shes nas de de la lan glan pa'i bsam pas gnas so//
115a6('dul ba): dus gzhan zhig na/ ri dwags 'dzin pho mtshan la nad byung ste/ de'i rim gros ga ma byed pa las de 'dzem par gyur to/ /des smras pa/ jo bo/ 'di la 'dzem du ci mchis/ ci/ pha'i rim
115a7('dul ba): gro bu bu mos mi bgyid dam/ 'on kyang de 'dzem par gyur to/ /des bsam pa/ 'di bdag gis rim gro byar mi btub pas/ de'i chung ma zhig blang ngo snyam nas/ de dpal skyed kyi
115b1('dul ba): khyim du song ba dang / des 'ongs pa legs so/ /zhes bya ba'i tshig smras nas/ stan bstabs te 'dug go/ dpal skyed la bu mo zhig yod pa des/ de la smras pa/ bu mo/ sa ga mo'i rkang pa gnyis la
115b2('dul ba): zungs shig/ sa ga mas smras pa/ bdag gis 'di'i rkang pa la bzung bar 'gyur ba'i gnas gang lags pa de ni/ mchis so/ /zhes smras nas yang smras pa/ bkra shis par gyur cig/ bkra
115b3('dul ba): shis par gyur cig/ dpal skyed kyis smras pa/ ci zhig slong / bu mo slong ngo / /su zhig gi ched du/ des smras pa/ gyos po'i ched du'o/ /de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ dpal skyed kyi chung mas
115b4('dul ba): smras pa/ dgog cig na/ de la ci ste sbyin/ sa ga mas smras pa/ mi rnams kyi lang tsho ni/ nor yin pas/ dpyad du ci yod/ byin cig/ dpal skyed kyis smras pa/ bzang mo/ bdag
115b5('dul ba): cag la sa ga mas phan btags kyi/ byin cig/ gal te de lta na sbyin par bgyi'o/ /de nas ri dwags 'dzin gyis dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos bag mar blangs nas de de'i rim gro byed par
115b6('dul ba): gyur te/ sa ga ma ni/ de ltar mi byed do/ /ri dwags 'dzin gyis smras pa/ bu mo/ bdag la tshig byin cig/ des smras pa/ jo bo/ cung zad nyams par ma gyur tam/ bu mo/ khyod la mas
115b7('dul ba): bslab pa gang yin pa de cung zad blangs te mi gnas sam/ jo bo/ thams cad blangs lags te/ nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis la phyag byos shig ces mchi ba gang lags pa ni/ mna' ma'i
116a1('dul ba): nyi ma dang zla ba lta bu ni/ gyos sgyug lags pas/ re zhig bdag gis phyag bgyis lags so/ /me la bkur sti bya'o/ /zhes mchi ba gang lags pa ni/
116a2('dul ba): bud med kyi khyim thab me lta bu lags te/ khyim thab la ha cang bsnyen par mi bgyi/ ha cang ring bar yang mi bgyi ste/ bdag ni/ khyim thab la me lta bur bsnyen bkur bgyid do/ /
116a3('dul ba): me long 'phyi bar bya'o/ /zhes mchi ba gang lags pa ni/ sdum pa ni/ me long lta bu lags pas rtag tu zhal zhal bgyi zhing phyag dar bgyi ba lags te/ sdum pa de la bdag
116a4('dul ba): gdugs gcig bzhin du byi dor bgyid lags so/ /gos dkar po bgo bar bya'o/ /zhes mchi ba gang lags pa ni/ khyim gyi las bgyid pa na/ gos gzhan dag kho nas so/ /
116a5('dul ba): lha mchod pa dang khyim thab kyi drung du mchi ba na ni/ gos dkar po rnams bgo bar bgyi ba ste/ de yang bdag bgyid lags so/ /blang bar bya'o/ sbyin par mi bya'o/ /zhes mchi ba gang
116a6('dul ba): lags pa la/ ci zhig blang bar bgyi zhe na/ 'jig rten las tshig ngan pa smras pa'o/ /tshig ngan pa ni/ su la yang smra bar mi bgyi ba ste/ de yang bdag gis yang dag par blangs te
116a7('dul ba): gnas lags so/ /tshig bsrung bar bya'o/ /zhes mchi ba gang lags pa ni/ gsang ba'i tshig mi 'phel bar bgyi ba ste/ bdag la ngag bsdam par mchis lags so/ /langs nas
116b1('dul ba): su la yang stan bstab par mi bya'o/ /zhes mchi ba gang lags pa ni/ de 'di skad ces/ khyod rigs kyi mna' ma yin pas khyod gnas dben pa na 'dug par bya'o/ /zhes mchi ba lags te/ bdag
116b2('dul ba): dben pa kho na na mchis lags so/ /zhim po bza' bar bya'o/ /zhes mchi ba gang lags pa ni/ shin tu bkres nas bza' bar bgyi ba ste/ bdag ni/ rtag tu khyim gyi skye bo zas 'tshal ba'i
116b3('dul ba): 'og tu 'tshal lo/ /bde bar nyal bar bya zhes mchi ba gang lags pa ni/ mtshan mo khyim gyi dgos pa thams cad bgyis nas snod brtul te ci nas kyang yang ldang mi dgos par khyod
116b4('dul ba): nyal bar bya'o/ /zhes bgyi ba lags te/ 'di ni/ legs par gzhag pa'o/ /'di ni/ nyes par gzhag pa'o/ /zhes bdag de kho na bzhin du bgyid do/ /them skas bca' bar bya'o//
116b5('dul ba): zhes mchi ba gang lags pa ni/ 'di skad ces/ khyod sngon dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa des lha'i 'gro ba thob nas 'dir mi'i 'jig rten du skyes pa 'di ni/ las kyis yin pas/
116b6('dul ba): 'dir yang khyod kyis sbyin pa dag sbyin/ bsod nams dag bya ste/ sdig pa mi bya'o/ /'di ni/ dbyig gi ya gad mtho ris kyi them skas lta bu yin no/ /zhes bgyi ba lags te/ de yang bdag
116b7('dul ba): rngo ci thogs kyis bgyid do/ /sa ga ma/ legs so/ legs so/ /khyod kyi ma mkhas pa yin na/ gang gi phyir mas ldem por smras pa rtogs pas na/ khyod ni/ lhag par yang mkhas pa
117a1('dul ba): yin no/ /'dul ba gzhi/ bam po drug cu gsum pa/ de nas ri dwags 'dzin 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis
117a2('dul ba): gnang na/ sa ga ma la bdag gis ma zhes 'bod do snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas
117a3('dul ba): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ mna' ma la ma zhes 'bod du rung lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te chos lnga dang
117a4('dul ba): ldan na ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ nad g.yog byed pa dang / thab rir bab pa'i chung ma len pa dang / srog gi skyabs byed pa dang / nor srung ba dang / shes rab kyi bgo bsha' byed pa'o/ /
117a5('dul ba): bar sdom lnga la/ nad g.yog dang ni chung ma dang / /srog dang nor ni sbyin pa dang / /shes rab bsgrub par byed pa dang / lnga po 'di dag mar bshad do/ /de nas ri dwags 'dzin ko sa la
117a6('dul ba): rgyal po gsal rgyal gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha/ bdag ni/ sa ga ma la ma zhes 'bod par 'tshal lo/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ sa
117a7('dul ba): ga mas nga la yang rim gro byas pas/ phyi mo la dris la ngas kyang de la sring mo zhes 'bod do/ /des phyi mo la dris pa dang / des smras pa/ khyod kyis bos kyang rung / ma bos kyang rung / de ni/ khyod
117b1('dul ba): kyi sring mo kho na yin no/ /ring du 'phur tshangs sbyin mngag gzhug ma'i bu mo dang 'dus pa las/ de las bu pho zhig btsas te/ de'i ming stobs kyi bshes gnyen du btags pa las/ de rgyal
117b2('dul ba): po mes kyis nyes pa 'ga' zhig gi phyir spyugs pa las/ tsam par song nas gnas pa de'i bu mo ni/ 'di yin te/ des na khyod kyi sring mor 'ong ngo / /de nas rgyal po glang po che la zhon nas dril
117b3('dul ba): sgrog tu bcug pa/ sa ga ma 'di/ ri dwags 'dzin gyi ni/ ma/ rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi ni/ sring mo yin no/ /des sngon gyi kun dga' ra bar gtsug lag khang brtsigs nas phyogs bzhi'i
117b4('dul ba): dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul ba dang / de bzhin du gnas brtan rnams kyis kyang mdo sde'i nang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na ri dwags 'dzin gyi ma sa ga ma'i sngon gyi kun
117b5('dul ba): dga' ra ba'i khang bzang na bzhugs so/ /zhes gdags pa byas so/ /dus gzhan zhig na/ sa ga ma las sgo nga sum cu rtsa gnyis byung ngo / /zhes ri dwags 'dzin gyis thos nas lag pa 'gram
117b6('dul ba): pa la gtad nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug ste/ yul gyi bzang mo la phung ba ci 'dra ba dag byung bar gyur snyam nas ri dwags 'dzin gyis dor bar brtsams pa dang / sa ga mas smras pa/
117b7('dul ba): jo bo/ ma dor bar bcom ldan 'das la zhus shig /des bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ ma dor bar gzeb bu sum cu rtsa gnyis byos la/
118a1('dul ba): shing bal gyis bkang ste/ gzeb bu rnams kyis nang du sgo nga re re zhig la sa ga mas dus gsum du lag pas byugs shig ces sgos shig dang / de nas nyi ma bdun
118a2('dul ba): pa lags nas/ gzhon nu sum cu rtsa gnyis 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /des de bzhin du byas pa las/ nyi ma bdun pa lags pa dang gzhon nu sum cu rtsa gnyis byung nas bsring bskyed de/ /de nar
118a3('dul ba): son pa dang / rtsal po che thub brlag pa sha stag tu gyur to/ /dus gzhan zhig na/ de rnams shing rtar zhugs te phyir byung nas slar 'jug pa dang / mdun na 'don gyi bu shing rtar zhugs
118a4('dul ba): nas phyir byung ba dang / ji tsam na/ phan tshun shing rta'i mda' gnyis thug pa dang / mdun na 'don gyi bus smras pa/ zur cig /de rnams kyis kyang smras pa/ khyod nyid zur cig /mdun na
118a5('dul ba): 'don gyi bus/ 'jal to zhes byas nas tshig rtsub po smra bar bsam pa dang / de nas sa ga ma'i bu rnams kyis shing rta'i mda' nas bzung ste 'phangs pas phyag dar gyi phung po'i steng du brdab
118a6('dul ba): bsnun te/ de de nas gos kyis mgo bskyur te pha'i drung du song nas mig mchi mas gang bas smras pa/ yab/ sa ga ma'i bu rnams kyis bdag 'di 'dra ba'i gnas skabs su bgyis so//
118a7('dul ba): bu/ ci'i phyir/ des rgyas par smras pa dang / des smras pa/ bu/ gal te de lta na/ thabs shig bsham pa byas la de rnams mthar gyis kha gdag gi /mya ngan ma byed cig /de de rnams
118b1('dul ba): la klan ka tshol ba lhur len cing gnas so/ /dus gzhan zhig na/ ko sa'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la ri bor ba log par gyur nas/ rgyal pos de la dmag kha chen zhig bkye ba las/ rdugs
118b2('dul ba): rab tu rdugs nas slar log go / de bzhin du lan bdun gyi bar du dmag kha chen po bkye ba las/ rdugs/ rab tu rdugs te slar log nas rgyal po rang nyid dpung gi tshogs yan lag
118b3('dul ba): bzhi dang byung ba dang / sa ga ma'i bu nang du 'jug pa de rnams kyis de mthong nas smras pa/ lha/ gang du gshegs/ ri bor rnams 'bebs su'o/ /lha/ bzhugs shig /bdag cag mchi'o//
118b4('dul ba): de bzhin du gyis shig /des de rnams la dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa gtad nas de rnams dong ste ri bor ba rnams phab nas gte'u bzung / dpya blangs te slar 'ongs pa dang / mdun
