118b5('dul ba): na 'don gyis smras pa/ lha/ 'di dag ni/ 'phags pa rtsal po che dag cig ste/ re zhig lha'i dka' bas bsgrubs pa gang lags pa de ni/ 'di dag gis 'bring gis bsgrubs kyi/ lhas 'di
118b6('dul ba): la dgongs shig / rgyal po rnams ni/ khum 'phrig can yin pas/ snying la bzhag ste slar mdun na 'don la dris pa/ de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ /des smras pa/ lha/ de la ji ltar bsgrub
118b7('dul ba): par bgyi/ gal te de dag 'tshal bar gyur na/ lha/ rgyal srid las phyung nas rang nyid rgyal srid bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po de mi dga' nas bsam pa/ de ltar 'gyur srid kyi/ ji ltar
119a1('dul ba): gsad par bya zhe na/ thabs bshams pa sems shing / gsang 'phel du dogs pas su la yang mi 'dri bar de dag nyid kyis dpyad pa las/ blo skyes pa/ 'di
119a2('dul ba): kho nar mgron du bos la brdungs te gtang ngo snyam nas/ des sa ga ma la spring pa/ che zhe/ bu rnams sang 'dir zan zo zhig /des bsam pa/ sang ni/ bu rnams zhang po'i der za bar
119a3('dul ba): 'gyur gyi/ bdag gis kyang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol lo/ /snyam du bsam nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der stong ste phyin pa dang / bcom
119a4('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ri dwags 'dzin gyi ma sa ga ma la chos
119a5('dul ba): dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis zhes bya ba nas yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas ri dwags 'dzin gyi ma sa ga ma
119a6('dul ba): stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun
119a7('dul ba): dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas ri dwags 'dzin gyi ma sa ga
119b1('dul ba): la gnang ngo / /zhes bya ba nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /rgyal po'i pho nya de rnams kyi drung du 'ongs
119b2('dul ba): nas/ khye'u shog cig ces bos so/ /de nas rgyal pos dug ha la lha la dang zas su sbyar bas rmongs par byas nas/ mgo rnams bcad de/ de nas gzeb bkang nas steng du phu bo shos kyi
119b3('dul ba): mgo bzhag ste rgya skyegs la rgyas btab nas sa ga ma la bskur ba dang / sa ga mas bsam pa/ gdon mi za bar lhas sring mo'i bu rnams la bgo ba zhig bskur ba yin gyi/ bdag gis
119b4('dul ba): kyang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la bgo bar dbul lo/ /snyam nas/ de nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bde bar bzhugs par rig nas gtsang
119b5('dul ba): zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba rnams kyis zhes bya ba nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyur bar rig nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /gzeb
119b6('dul ba): kha phye bar brtsams pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ gal te sa ga mas bden pa ma mthong bar bu bsad pa mthong na/ bden pa rnams kyi snod du mi 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de yod
119b7('dul ba): do/ /snyam du dgongs nas sa ga ma la bka' stsal pa/ re zhig 'dug la chos nyon la phyis ci dga' bgyis shig /des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas chos mnyan
120a1('dul ba): pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas zhes bya ba nas
120a2('dul ba): bden pa mthong bar mdzad do/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas bden pa mthong nas gzeb kha phye ba dang / bu'i mgo rnams mthong nas de nas gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das
120a3('dul ba): 'du byed thams cad ni/ 'di ltar mi rtag pa lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis sa ga
120a4('dul ba): ma'i bu rnams brdungs pa ni/ nyes so/ /gal te ma brdungs par gyur na/ 'di rnams kho nas grogs byas pas de'i lag mthil du sa mtha' dag 'jog par 'gyur ba zhig /de nas
120a5('dul ba): ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal lus rdul gyis g.yogs shing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas
120a6('dul ba): phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po/ khyod
120a7('dul ba): lus rdul gyis g.yogs shing gang nas 'dir 'ongs/ btsun pa/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/ yul gyi dbang phyug dang / mthu dang brtson 'grus thob pa/ sa'i dkyil
120b1('dul ba): 'khor chen po legs par phab ste gnas pa rnams kyis rgyal po'i bgyi ba dang / rgyal po'i sgrub pa tha dad pa gang dag lags pa de dag bdag gis bgyis te yongs su rdzogs nas lus rdul
120b2('dul ba): gyis g.yogs shing mchis pa lags so/ /rgyal po chen po/ de'i phyir khyod nyid la dri bar bya'i/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de lan thob cig /rgyal po chen po/ dper na/ khyod la 'dir
120b3('dul ba): shar phyogs nas mi yid ches pa/ yid brtan du rung ba/ brtan pa/ 'jig rten la mi slu ba zhig 'ongs nas 'di skad ces/ lha/ bdag da gzod 'di nas shar phyogs su mchi na/ de nas
120b4('dul ba): bdag gis ri brag chen po ma chag pa/ ser ka ma mchis pa/ phrag ma mchis pa/ shin tu mkhregs pa/ gcig tu stug pa zhig sa'i bar dang / nam mkha'i bar gyi sems can thams cad
120b5('dul ba): dang / srog chags thams cad dang / 'byung po thams cad dang / rtswa dang / shing dang / yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma ji snyed pa thams cad phye mar klog cing mchi ba mthong gi/ lha khyod
120b6('dul ba): kyi bgyi ba'am/ sgrub pa gang lags pa de mdzod cig ces zer la/ de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs nas mi zhig 'ongs te zhes bya ba nas bgyi ba'am/ sgrub pa de
120b7('dul ba): mdzod cig zer te/ rgyal po chen po/ 'jigs pa chen po'i yang chen po/ mi zad par byed pa mi bzad pa de lta bu nye bar gnas na/ mi nyid thob pa ni/ rnyed par dka' na khyod kyis ci zhig
121a1('dul ba): bya| btsun pa/ 'jigs pa chen po'i yang chen po/ mi bas par bgyid pa/ mi bzad pa de lta bu nye bar gnas na/ mi nyid thob pa rnyed par dka' ba lags pas/
121a2('dul ba): don spyad pa dang / chos spyad pa dang / bsod nams spyad pa dang / dge ba spyad pa dang / bzang po spyad pa dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa la brtson par byed pa ma lags par gzhan ci
121a3('dul ba): zhig bgyir mchis/ rgyal po chen po/ khyod ci'i phyir 'di skad ces/ btsun pa/ 'jigs pa chen po'i yang chen po de lta bu'i zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa la brtson par
121a4('dul ba): bgyi zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /btsun pa/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ sa'i dkyil 'khor chen po legs par
121a5('dul ba): phab ste gnas pa de rnams kyis glang po che rnams dang / glang po cher 'gyed pa dang / rta pa rnams dang / rta par 'gyed pa dang / shing rta pa thams cad dang / shing rta par 'gyed pa dang / dpung
121a6('dul ba): bu chung rnams dang / dpung bu chung du 'gyed pa dang / gsang tshig mkhan rnams dang / gsang tshig mkhan du 'gyed pa dang / nor rnams kyis nor bu rgyal tha dad pa gang lags pa de dag
121a7('dul ba): thams cad de'i tshe 'gyed pa'i mthu ma mchis pa dang / stobs ma mchis pa dang / pha rol gnon pa ma mchis pa lags pas/ de'i slad du bdag 'di skad ces/ btsun pa/ 'jigs
121b1('dul ba): p a chen po'i yang chen po de lta bu nye bar gnas na zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa la brtson par bgyi ba ma lags par gzhan ci zhig bgyir mchis zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma
121b2('dul ba): bzhin du'o/ /rgyal po chen po/ de bzhin du srog chags 'di dag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rga ba dang / 'chi bas 'joms pa yin no/ /rgyal po chen po/ de ltar rga ba dang / 'chi
121b3('dul ba): bas 'joms pa na/ skyes pa gang dag gi don spyad pa dang zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa la brtson par bya ba ma yin par gzhan ci zhig byar yod ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin
121b4('dul ba): du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pas bka' stsal pa/ ji ltar che zhing rgya che ba/ /ri bo nam mkha' las 'ongs pa/ /kun nas yang dag 'ongs pa yis/ /sa ni phye mar
121b5('dul ba): rlog pa na/ /de la glang po ches mi rdzi/ /dpung bu chung dang shing rta dang / /rtas min gsang tshig mkhan dang ni/ /nor gyis 'gyed pas rgyal mi thob/ /de bzhin rga dang 'chi ba yis/ /mi
121b6('dul ba): rnams 'joms par byed pa na/ /rgyal rigs bram ze rje'u rigs dang / /dmangs rigs gdol pa g.yung po dang / /tshul khrims 'chal dang tshul khrims ldan/ /khyim pa de bzhin brtul
121b7('dul ba): zhugs can/ /lang tsho nyid dang rgan po dang / /de bzhin bar ma'i mi rnams la/ /cung zad kyang ni 'dzem med par/ /thams cad mngon du 'joms par byed/ /de lta bas na mkhas pa'i
122a1('dul ba): mi| |bdag gi don la lta ba yis/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun ni/ /bla med dag la dad bya zhing / /lus dang ngag dang yid dag gis/ /dam pa'i chos ni spyad
122a2('dul ba): byas na/ /'di na smad par mi 'gyur zhing / /mtho ris song nas dga' bar 'gyur/ /de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga'
122a3('dul ba): ste rjes su yi rang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ stan las langs nas song ngo / /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa/
122a4('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ ri dwags 'dzin gyi ma sa ga mas las ci zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas/ sgo nga sum cu rtsa gnyis byung la/ de rnams
122a5('dul ba): las kyang bu pho sum cu rtsa gnyis byung ste/ rtsal po che thub brlag pa sha stag tu gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smon lam gyi dbang gis so/ /gang du smon lam
122a6('dul ba): btab lags/ dge slong dag /sngon byung ba/ wA ra NA si'i grong khyer du khyim bdag gcig gi bu shi nas/ de'i chung ma de rtag tu mngon par 'dod par gyur to/ /gang gi tshe yang dag
122a7('dul ba): bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag mdzad nas/ shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dbyings su mya
122b1('dul ba): ngan las 'das pa de'i tshe/ wA ra NA sir rgyal po kri kri zhes bya ba byung ste/ des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi mchod rten rin po che sna bzhi las brtsigs so/ /de nas
122b2('dul ba): bud med bu med pa bu mngon bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de yang rgas par gyur nas mchod rten de la byi dor byas nas 'dug go / des 'dun pa'i slong mo byas nas mchod rten de la mchod pa byas
122b3('dul ba): te smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi mchod rten la bya ba byas pa gang yin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des/ bdag bu mang por gyur cig ces byas te
122b4('dul ba): song nas grong khyer du zhugs so/ /de na bud med cig nad kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas nyen nas ngu ba dang / des gzhan zhig la dris pa/ ci'i phyir 'di ngu bar gyur/ des ji ltar gyur pa rnams
122b5('dul ba): smras pa dang / des bsam pa/ gal te bdag kyang bu byung bar gyur na/ bdag kyang sdug bsngal 'di lta bu nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/ /snyam pa las/ ji tsam na/ sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi dga'
122b6('dul ba): 'dun gyi mchod rten de la mchod pa byed pa na bud med de yang de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na 'dug go / de rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/
122b7('dul ba): bdag cag tshan po che chen po'i stobs dang ldan par gyur cig ces byas so/ /de de rnams la dris pa/ bu dag /khyed kyis smon lam ci zhig btab/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ yum/ 'di dang
123a1('dul ba): 'di dag go / des smras pa/ bu dag /gal te de ltar na/ khyed cag gi mar bdag kho na gyur cig /yum/ de bzhin du gyur cig ces smras nas de rnams
123a2('dul ba): dong ngo / /des bsam pa/ re zhig bud med de lan gcig btsa' na yang sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas nyen nas de ltar ngu na/ bdag la lan sum cu rtsa gnyis btsa' na/ ji ltar bya zhes
123a3('dul ba): de de ltar rnam par rtog pa na/ mchod rten dang nye ba na bya gag mo zhig yod pa sgo nga 'byung ba de/ thang gcig tsam gyis sgo nga sum cu rtsa gnyis byung la/ smre sngags kyang mi 'don to/ /des
123a4('dul ba): bsam pa/ 'byung ba'i thabs 'di ni/ rung ba yin no/ /snyam du rig nas mchod rten de la dad pa drag pos smon lam gdab par brtsams pa/ ji ltar bya gag mo 'di thang gcig tsam
123a5('dul ba): gyis sgo nga sum cu rtsa gnyis byung ba de bzhin du bdag gi sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang ci sgo ngar 'byung bar gyur cig ces byas so/ /dge slong dag /de ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na
123a6('dul ba): bud med rgan mo gang yin pa de ni/ sa ga ma 'di nyid yin no/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi dga' 'dun gang yin pa de ni/ sa ga ma'i bu 'di rnams kho na yin te/ 'dis de na smon lam btab
123a7('dul ba): pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas sgo nga sum cu rtsa gnyis byung ngo / /btsun pa/ sa ga ma'i bu rnams kyis las ci zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas nongs pa ma
123b1('dul ba): bgyis shing / skyon ma mchis par rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bkum nas de rnams kyi mgos gzeb bkang ste/ sa ga ma la bskur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge
123b2('dul ba): slong dag / 'di dag kho nas las rnams byas shing bsags pa dag ni zhes bya ba nas/ lus can rnams la 'bras bur 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /dge slong dag /
123b3('dul ba): sngon byung ba ri bor zhig na chang tshong zhig gnas so/ /chom rkun pa rab tu mang po chang tshol zhing de'i drung du 'ongs nas dris pa/ chang yod dam/ chang tshong gi chung mas smras pa/ yod do/ /
123b4('dul ba): zhes de rnams la chang blud na/ 'dzar ba med nas/ des glang zhig bstan te/ 'di sod cig /de rnams kyis smras pa/ mtshon cha med do/ /des gta' blangs nas mtshon cha byin pa dang / de
123b5('dul ba): rnams kyis de gsod par brtsams so/ /de gsod pa na sems la bdag gsod pa gang yin pa 'di dag thams cad ni/ chang tshong gi chung ma 'di yin gyi/ bdag gang du 'di rnams kyi mgo
123b6('dul ba): bcad nas gzeb bkang ste/ 'di la bskur bar 'gyur ba der skye bar gyur cig ces bsam mo/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi glang gang yin pa de ni/ ko sa la'i
123b7('dul ba): rgyal po gsal rgyal 'di nyid yin no/ /chom rkun pa gang yin pa de rnams ni/ sa ga ma'i bu 'di dag rnams yin no/ /de'i tshe de'i dus kyi chang tshong gi chung ma gang yin pa de ni/ sa ga ma 'di
124a1('dul ba): nyid yin no/ /zhes rgyas par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan+da ka'i gnas na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe drang srong
124a2('dul ba): mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'i bsti gnas na drang srong zhig yod do/ /de de na 'chag pa las bsti gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba'i sa rdzab can gyi phyogs shig tu gcin khu chu dang bcas
124a3('dul ba): pa zhig gcis so/ /glo bur du ri dwags mo skom pas nyen pa zhig phyogs der 'ongs te/ de skom pas nyen pas de 'thungs nas mo'i dbang po la bsnams so/ /sems can rnams kyi
124a4('dul ba): las kyi rnam par smin pa ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ sems can dang ldan par gyur to/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ phyogs de nyid du 'ongs nas khye'u zhig byung ba dang / des de
124a5('dul ba): bsnams na skal ba mi mthun pa'i sems can yin nas bor te song ngo / /ji tsam na/ drang srong de bsti gnas de na 'chag pa las/ khye'u de mthong nas/ 'di su'i bu yin zhes de bsam
124a6('dul ba): pa la zhugs pa las/ ji tsam na/ bdag gi yin par mthong nas/ des de bsti gnas su bzhag ste/ bsnun bsnyod bskyed nas de'i mgo ri dwags kyi 'dra bas ri dwags mgo /ri
124a7('dul ba): dwags mgo zhes bya bar grags so/ /dus gzhan zhig na drang srong shi nas/ ri dwags mgos klad pa'i thod pa rdob pa'i rig pa bslab ste/ de thod pa brdabs nas thams cad lung
124b1('dul ba): ston par byed de/ gal te re zhig sgra drag por gyur na/ gyen du 'gro ba ltar skye bar 'gyur bar lung ston par byed do/ /'on te 'bring du gyur na/ gyen du 'gro ba mir skye bar lung ston par
124b2('dul ba): byed de/ de ni/ bde 'gro'i rtags so/ /ngan 'gro'i rtags ni/ gal te re zhig sgra mi gsal bar gyur na/ 'og tu 'gro ba sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur bar lung ston par byed do/ /
124b3('dul ba): 'on te sgra 'bring du gyur na/ 'og tu 'gro ba dud 'gror skye bar 'gyur bar lung ston par byed do/ /'on te sgra chung bar gyur na/ 'og tu 'gro ba yi dwags su skye bar lung ston par byed do/ /de
124b4('dul ba): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de 'dul ba'i dus mkhyen nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ song la rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi
124b5('dul ba): 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa'i mgo bzhi khyer cig /btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas/ mgo bzhi khyer te drang srong
124b6('dul ba): de'i drung du song nas khyed kyis lung ston cig / des rgyun du zhugs pa'i thod pa la brdabs nas smras pa/ 'di ni/ lha rnams su skye'o/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i yang de bzhin no/ /phyir mi
124b7('dul ba): 'ong ba'i yang de bzhin no/ /dgra bcom pa'i thod pa la yang brdabs na/ ma shes rnams par ma shes nas ngo tshabs de 'di snyam du sems te/ gang phyir 'di yi 'gro ba ma shes pa/ /bdag
125a1('dul ba): cag bstan pa de las nyams gyur tam/ /'on te slob dpon rigs las ma skyes sam/ /'on te rtags rnams de 'dra ma yin nam/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos
125a2('dul ba): smras pa/ gang phyir 'di yi 'gro ba ma shes pa/ /khyod kyis rig pa kun legs goms ma byas/ /re zhig rig pa mtha' dag rtogs byos la/ /khyod kyis phyi nas 'jig rten lung ston cig /
125a3('dul ba): ri dwags mgos smras pa/ khyod kyis rig pa thams cad la byang ba 'ga' mthong ba yod dam/ des smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
125a4('dul ba): rig pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /de nas ri dwags mgo/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dud
125a5('dul ba): 'gro yi dwags dmyal ba lha mi skye bo'i 'gro 'tshal na/ /rig pa'i skyon gyis sems can spyod pa drug pa ma 'tshal gyi/ /gtso bo srid pa gsum gyi mtsho chen pha rol byon pa po/ /pha rol smra
125a6('dul ba): kun las rgyal drug pa ma 'tshal de ci gsung / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ me ru bsregs ba lcags kyi me/ /lcags kyi tho bas brdungs byas nas/ /rims kyis nye bar
125a7('dul ba): zhi pa yi/ /'gro ba ji ltar mi mngon pa/ /de bzhin 'dod pa'i 'dam tshogs las/ /brgal te yang dag rnam grol ba/ /mi g.yo go 'phang thob rnams kyi/ /'gro ba gdags su yod ma
125b1('dul ba): yin/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la ri dwags mgos 'di skad ces gsal te/ /btsun pa/ bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen
125b2('dul ba): par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lta na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu phyung / bsnyen par rdzogs
125b3('dul ba): par mdzad de/ de rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas/ rgyal po'i khab tu ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas/ mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te/ rim gyis rgyu
125b4('dul ba): zhing gshegs pa dang / mnyan yod du byon nas/ mnyan yod kyi ri dwags 'dzin gyi ma'i sngon gyi kun dga' ra ba'i khang bzang na bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das bla gab med pa
125b5('dul ba): na 'chag cing rgyu skar rnams gyur pa gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa ri dwags mgo la bka' stsal pa/ ri dwags mgo /ji srid cig na lhas char 'bebs par 'gyur
125b6('dul ba): soms shig / des bsam nas/ btsun pa/ 'jig rten 'di ma rung / 'di rab tu ma rung lags te/ rgyu skar rnams ji ltar gnas ba dang sbyar na/ lo bcu gnyis su char mi 'bab
125b7('dul ba): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyu skar rnams mthun par byin gyis brlabs nas bka' stsal pa/ yang shes par gyis shig /des gsol pa/ lo drug tu lags so/ /de bzhin
126a1('dul ba): du bcom ldan 'das kyis yang smras pa dang gsol pa/ lngar lags so/ /de bzhin du zhag bdun gyi bar du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong
126a2('dul ba): rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /gnas mal rnams skyabs yod par spos shig /de ring kho nar lhas phye ma'i tshogs lta bu'i char 'bebs par 'gyur te/ de la khrus byed pa
126a3('dul ba): gang yin pa de rnams la 'bras dang / phol mig 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /ri dwags mgo/ de ltar na/ rgyu skar rnams ni/ 'gyur ba/ g.yo ba/ mi brtan pa yin te/ srog kyang
126a4('dul ba): g.yo ba/ mi brtan pa yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / ri dwags mgo mngon par dad par gyur to/ /de ltar mngon par dad par gyur pas dgra
126a5('dul ba): bcom pa mngon sum du byas so/ /de nas rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba rab tu myong nas/ tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ ri dwags rnams ni nags khrod brten/ /'dab chags
126a6('dul ba): rnams ni mkha' la brten/ /rnam par sgom pa chos la brten/ /dgra bcom mya ngan 'das la brten/ /ri dwags 'dzin gyi ma sa ga mas bcom ldan 'das ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu zhing
126a7('dul ba): gshegs te/ mnyan yod du byon nas mnyan yod na bdag kho na'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs po zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
126b1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ri dwags 'dzin gyi ma sa ga ma la chos
126b2('dul ba): dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan ces bya ba nas yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas ri
126b3('dul ba): dwags 'dzin gyi ma sa ga ma stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das
126b4('dul ba): dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na/ gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sa ga ma la cang mi gsung bas
126b5('dul ba): gnang ngo / /zhes bya ba nas nor bu'i chu snod bzhag ste/ bcom ldan 'das la bu mo mngag gzhug ma dus tshod gsol ba dus tshod gsol du bcug go /ji tsam na/ bu mo mngag gzhug ma
126b6('dul ba): de sngon gyi kun dga' ra bar song nas sgo gseb nas bltas na/ dge slong rnams sgren mor khrus byed pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bsam pa/ gdon mi za bar 'phags pa rnams ni/
126b7('dul ba): bzhud la/ 'tsho ba pa nal phrug 'di dag gis gtsug lag khang 'dir btab bo/ /snyam nas/ de rings pa'i ngas par 'ongs te smras pa/ jo mo mkhyen par mdzod cig /'phags pa
127a1('dul ba): rnams ni/ bzhud la/ 'tsho ba pa nal phrug rnams kyis gtsug lag khang 'dir btab lags so/ /sa ga mas bsam pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas/ gdugs
127a2('dul ba): tshod ma gsol bar bzhud par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni/ gnas med cing skabs med do/ /gdon mi za bar 'dis dge slong sgren mo rnams mthong ngo / /snyam nas/ des dus tshod gsol
127a3('dul ba): pa skyes pa gzhan zhig btang ste/ des/ btsun pa/ gdugs tshod lags shing mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba nas bcom
127a4('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ rgan pa'i mthar 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
127a5('dul ba): to/ /btsun pa/ bdag ni/ sbyin pa chen po brgyad bca' bar 'tshal te/ glo bur pa la stsal pa dang / mchi bar chas pa la stsal pa dang / bro 'tshal ba la stsal pa dang / bro g.yog la stsal
127a6('dul ba): ba dang / stsang gnas kyi 'jams nar ma dang / sman nar ma dang / dge slong rnams la dbyar gyi gos ras chen dang / dge slong ma rnams la khrus ras so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
127a7('dul ba): stsal pa/ sa ga ma khyod kyis yon tan ci zhig mthong na/ glo bur du 'ongs pa la sbyin pa sbyin/ btsun pa/ glo bur du mchis pa'i dge slong ni/ spyod yul mi mkhas pa dang / lam srang mi
127b1('dul ba): mkhas pa lags pas des bdag gi bsod snyoms la longs spyad na/ spyod yul la mkhas pa dang / lam srang la mkhas par 'gyur lags so/ /sa ga ma/ de thugs su chud de/ legs so/ legs
127b2('dul ba): so/ /don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na/ 'gro bar chas pa la sbyin pa sbyin/ btsun pa/ dge slong mchi bar chas pa bsod snyoms tshol du mchis na/ mgron po rnams dang bral bar 'gyur zhing / tshogs
127b3('dul ba): dang bral na phongs par 'gyur bas/ des bdag gi bsod snyoms la longs spyod na/ tshogs dang bral bar mi 'gyur lags so/ /sa ga ma/ de yang thugs su chud de/ legs so/ /legs so/ /don
127b4('dul ba): gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na/ nad pa la sbyin pa sbyin/ btsun pa/ dge slong bro 'tshal ba bsod snyoms tshol du mchis na/ nyon mongs pa'am 'gum par yang 'gyur bas/ des bdag gi bsod
127b5('dul ba): snyoms la longs spyad na/ bro nad las ldang ba dang bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur lags so/ /sa ga ma/ de yang thugs su chud de/ legs so/ /legs so/ /don gyi dbang ci zhig
127b6('dul ba): mthong na/ nad g.yog la sbyin pa sbyin/ btsun pa/ dge slong bro g.yog bgyid pa rang gi ched du bsod snyoms tshol du mchis na/ bro 'tshal ba'i bgyi ba nyams par 'gyur bas des bdag gi bsod
127b7('dul ba): snyoms la longs spyod na 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ /sa ga ma/ de yang thugs su chud de/ legs so/ /legs so/ /don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na/ dge 'dun la nas thug nar ma sbyin/
128a1('dul ba): btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams la drod chung ba yang mchis/ drod che ba yang mchis te/ de la re zhig drod chung ba gang lags pa de rnams ni/ nas
128a2('dul ba): thug 'tshal na drod skye bar 'gyur la/ drod che ba gang lags pa de rnams ni/ nyams skye bar 'gyur lags so/ /sa ga ma/ de yang thugs su chud de/ legs so/ /legs so/ /don gyi dbang
128a3('dul ba): ci zhig mthong na/ dge 'dun la sman nar ma sbyin/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams la bro nad mang ba dang / bro nad nyung ba mchis te/ de la bro nad mang po gang lags pa
128a4('dul ba): de rnams la ni/ re zhig 'tshal ches/ bro nad nyung ba gang lags pa de rnams kyis longs spyad na/ lhag par yang bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur lags so/ /sa ga ma/ de yang
128a5('dul ba): thugs su chud de/ legs so/ /legs so/ /don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na/ dge slong rnams la dbyar gyi gos ras chen sbyin/ btsun pa/ de ring kho na bdag gi bu mo mngag gzhug
128a6('dul ba): bgyid pa dus tshod gsol bar btang ba las/ des dge slong rnams sgren mor khrus bgyid pa mthong nas de slar mchis te bdag la/ 'phags pa rnams ni/ bzhud la/ 'tsho ba pa nal
128a7('dul ba): phrug rnams kyis gtsug lag khang du btab po/ /zhes mchi bas de rnams dbyar gyi gos ras chen gyis bkab par 'gyur lags so/ /sa ga ma/ de yang thugs su chud de/ legs
128b1('dul ba): so/ /legs so/ /don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na/ dge slong ma rnams la khrus ras sbyin/ btsun pa/ dus 'di gcig na khyim pa mo rab tu mang po dag /dge slong ma rab tu mang po rnams
128b2('dul ba): chu bo gnas ldan la sgren mor khrus bgyid pa las/ khyim pa mo de rnams kyis bgad cing bgad nas mdzub ker gyis dge slong ma rnams kyi 'dom nye bar ston te/ de dag gis nye bar
128b3('dul ba): bstan pa rnams/ pag khums par gyur pas de rnams bdag gi khrus ras kyis bkab nas khrus bgyid par 'gyur lags so/ /sa ga ma/ legs so/ /legs so/ /khyod kyis bsod
128b4('dul ba): nams bya ba'i dngos po brgyad smras pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bdun rnams la yang dag par snang zhing / 'di dag ni/ rdzas las byung
128b5('dul ba): ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bdun po gang dag la bsod nams sam/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu'am/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'di tsam mo/ /zhes tshad gzung
128b6('dul ba): bar mi nus kyi/ 'on kyang bsod nams mang ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba rnams kyi nang du 'dus so/ /btsun pa/ bdag gis 'di skad ces/ bcom
128b7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis dge slong che ge mo de/ dge slong 'di yang kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs nas rgyun du zhugs pa rnam par mi ltung ba'i chos can/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gzhol
129a1('dul ba): pa re ltar thogs na srid pa lan bdun par 'gyur te/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du lan bdun du nying mtshams sbyor zhing 'khor nas sdug bsngal gyi mthar byed par 'gyur
129a2('dul ba): ro/ /zhes lung bstan pa thos te/ de mnyan yod du res 'ga' mchi zhing slar yang mchi bar 'gyur la/ des bdag gi glo bur du mchi ba'i zas zhes bya ba nas dbyar gyi gos ras chen dang / dge
129a3('dul ba): slong mas khrus ras longs spyod par 'gyur lags so/ /zhes bya ba'i bar te/ thos nas kyang dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba rgya chen po dge ba nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par 'gyur
129a4('dul ba): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong che ge mo/ dge slong 'di ni/ kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs nas 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug bsrabs pa'i phyir 'ong bar
129a5('dul ba): 'gyur te/ 'jig rten 'dir lan gcig 'ongs nas sdug bsngal gyi mthar byed par 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan pa de yang mnyan yod du res 'ga' mchi zhing slar mchi la/ des bdag
129a6('dul ba): gi glo bur ba'i zas zhes bya ba nas dbyar gyi gos ras chen dang / dge slong mas khrus ras zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin te/ thos nas kyang dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba rgya chen po dge
129a7('dul ba): ba nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong che ge mo/ dge slong 'di ni/ tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pas phyir
129b1('dul ba): mi 'ong bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten 'dir phyir mi 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan pa de yang res 'ga' mnyan yod du mchi zhing slar mchi la/ des bdag gi glo bur pa'i zas zhes bya ba nas
129b2('dul ba): dbyar gyi gos ras chen dang / dge slong mas khrus ras zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ thos nas kyang dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba rgya chen po dge ba nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob
129b3('dul ba): par 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong che ge mo de/ dge slong 'di ni/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas nas phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya
129b4('dul ba): ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan pa de yang res 'ga' mnyan yod du mchi zhing slar yang mchi la/ des bdag gi glo bur ba'i zas zhes bya ba nas dbyar gyi
129b5('dul ba): gos ras chen dang / dge slong mas khrus ras zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ thos nas kyang dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba rgya chen po dge ba nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par 'gyur
129b6('dul ba): lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ri dwags 'dzin gyi ma sa ga ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/
129b7('dul ba): yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas yangs pa can gang na ba der rgyu zhing
130a1('dul ba): gshegs te/ rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na yangs pa can du byon nas/ yangs pa can gyi spre'u rdzing gi 'gram gyi khang pa brtsegs pa na bzhugs so/ /de nas
130a2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das snga dro na bza' bsham thabs mnams/ chos gos dang lhung bzed bsnams nas yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la zhugs so/ /de'i tshe dge slong rab tu mang po kun dga'
130a3('dul ba): ra ba'i sgo na gnas mal mi gtsang bas gos pa rnams 'khru ba dang / skem pa dang / 'ding bar byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rab tu mang po kun dga' ra ba'i sgo na gnas mal
130a4('dul ba): mi gtsang bas gos pa rnams 'khru ba dang / skem pa dang / 'ding bar byed pa gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang yang 'di snyam du dgongs te/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag pags
130a5('dul ba): pa dang / sha dang / khrag zad zad du sbyin par btang zhing bsod nams byas pa gang yin pa de la dge slong rnams bag med cing ma brtags par spyod par byed do/ /snyam du dgongs nas
130a6('dul ba): yangs pa can du bsod snyoms spyad de zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad nas zas phyi ma'i bsod snyoms spangs shing / lhung bzed dang / na bza' chos gos mkhos su phabs nas zhabs bsil te/
130a7('dul ba): nang du yang dag 'jog la gtsug lag khang du zhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs ka nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan
130b1('dul ba): bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /'dir snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos
130b2('dul ba): thogs te yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa las/ ngas dge slong rab tu mang po dag kun dga' ra ba'i sgo na gnas mal mi gtsang bas gos pa rnams 'khru ba dang / skem pa dang /
130b3('dul ba): 'ding bar byed par mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du dgongs te/ bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can dag pags pa dang / sha dang / khrag zad zad du sbyin par btang zhing bsod
130b4('dul ba): nams byas pa gang yin pa de la dge slong rnams bag med cing ma brtags par spyod par byed do/ /dge slong dag /dad pas byin pa la bag yod par spyod pa dang / dus su spyod pa dang / skabs
130b5('dul ba): skabs su spyod pa dang / brtags te spyod pa dang / cung zad spyod pa ni/ legs so legs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dad pas byin pa la bag yod pas spyad par bya ba'i bsngags pa
130b6('dul ba): gsungs nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ de lta bas na/ dge 'dun gyi gnas mal la gding ba med par longs spyad par mi bya'o/ /gnas mal mi gtsang bas
130b7('dul ba): gos na/ de'i mod kho na la bkru bar bya ste/ gzhan du 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro bza' sham thabs mnabs/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams
131a1('dul ba): nas zhabs 'bring byed pa'i dge slong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa las bcom ldan 'das kyis mi rgyab
131a2('dul ba): nag por gyur pa zhig ring po kho na nas gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis mi rgyab nag po pha bi mthong ngam/
131a3('dul ba): btsun pa/ mthong lags so/ /kun dga' bo/ mi pha bi ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la rab tu byung bar gyur te/ de nas 'dis dge 'dun gyi gnas
131a4('dul ba): mal la/ ming tsam gyi gding ba dang / dri ma can gyi gding ba dang / shur bu dang / rgya cang dang / lcug gu'i gding bas bting nas longs spyad pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas tshe
131a5('dul ba): rabs lnga brgyar rgyab nag por gyur to/ /da dung yang 'di rgyab nag por gyur to/ /zhes rig par mdzad nas/ yangs pa can du bsad snyoms mdzad do zhes bya ba nas nang du yang
131a6('dul ba): dag 'jog las bzhengs nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das
131a7('dul ba): kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /de ring nga snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa las/
131b1('dul ba): de na ngas mi rgyab nag por 'dug pa zhig mthong ste/ de ni yang rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la dge slong du gyur pa las/ de nas des dge 'dun gyi gnas mal la ming tsam
131b2('dul ba): gyi gding ba dang zhes bya ba nas tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar du rgyab nag por gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ dge slong rnams kyis deng phan chad ming
131b3('dul ba): tsam gyi gding ba dang / dri ma can gyi gding bas dge 'dun gyi gnas mal la longs spyad par mi bya'o/ /longs spyad na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /'on kyang gding ba gnyis kyis
131b4('dul ba): longs spyad par bya ste/ stug na ni/ rim gcig gis so/ /seng ba zhig na ni /rim gnyis kyis so/ /dge slong rnams gding ba bkra zhing bkra ba kha tshar ma bcad pa dag 'chang bar byed pa
131b5('dul ba): bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smod par byed/ gzhogs 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sngon po'am/ 'dam kha'am/
131b6('dul ba): kha bsgyur ba'i gding ba gris dras pa bcang bar bya ste/ gzhan du na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong zhig g.yan pa'i nad kyis nyen pas/ de'i chos gos rnams rnag dang khrag
131b7('dul ba): gis reg nas dri mi zhim pa sbrang ma rnams 'du zhing de bsod snyoms la zhugs pa de bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smod par byed/ gzhogs 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar
132a1('dul ba): byed pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/ g.yan
132a2('dul ba): pa dgab pa bcang bar bya ste/ zhag lnga'am/ drug lon nas bkru bar bya'o/ /gzhan du na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong mdze nad kyis nyen pa dag dge 'dun gyi gnas mal dang /
132a3('dul ba): khyams dang / rdzing dang / sgo khang dang / bang rim dang / 'chag sa rnams dang / shing drung gi gnas rnams ni dri mi zhim pa dang / sbrang ma rnams 'khor bas gnas shing longs spyod par
132a4('dul ba): byed pa de dag / bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smod par byed/ gzhogs 'phyas byed pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom
132a5('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /dge slong mdze nad kyis thebs pa rnams kyi phyir ngas kun du spyod pa'i chos dag bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong mdze nad kyis thebs pas/
132a6('dul ba): dge 'dun gyi gnas mal dang / gnas khang la longs spyad par mi bya/ khyams rnams dang / ji skad du bsgrags pa'i khyams la sogs par gnas par mi bya/ dge 'dun gyi chab
132a7('dul ba): khungs sa dang / snam phyi sar 'jug par mi bya zhing / dge 'dun gyis de la gnas dben pa byin nas rim gro bya'o/ /dge slong mdze nad kyis thebs pas/ kun du spyod pa'i chos ji ltar
132b1('dul ba): bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po re bzhi pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
132b2('dul ba): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bde bar gshegs pa'i na bza' chos gos lhag par bcang du rung lags sam/ nye bar 'khor/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ mon
132b3('dul ba): dar gyi chos gos gsum du byin gyis brlabs nas chos gos lhag par byin gyis brlabs te bcang du rung lags sam/ nye bar 'khor/ ci dgar zad de/ de bzhin du 'dod pa bzhin du bal
132b4('dul ba): dang sha na'i ras la yang rung ngo / /sdom la/ gso ma skra yi chos gos dang / /gcer bu skra 'bal lo ma'i gos/ /mthang gos bcas dang g.yang gzhi dang / /gso ras seng ras pa char sngo/ /gleng
132b5('dul ba): gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /dge slong zhig bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/
132b6('dul ba): phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong des 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag gso ma'i chos gos 'chang bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
132b7('dul ba): stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug /'di lta ste/ gso ma'i chos gos 'di ni/ mu stegs pa'i rtags yin no/ /de lta bas na/ dge slong gis gso ma'i chos gos bcang bar mi bya'o/ /bcangs
133a1('dul ba): na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /yang dge slong zhig 'ongs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis skra'i
133a2('dul ba): chos gos 'chang bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug /'di ni/ mu stegs pa'i rtags yin no/ /zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du
133a3('dul ba): 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag gcer bu bgyid par 'tshal lo/ /bcom
133a4('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug /'di lta ste/ gcer bu 'di ni/ mu stegs pa'i rtags yin no/ /gzhan yang ngas chos gos gsum rjes su gnang na/ ci'i phyir khyod
133a5('dul ba): gcer bu byed/ de lta bas na/ dge slong gis gcer bu mi bya'o/ /byas na/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/ /de nas dge slong de gcer bu ma gnang ba dang bslab pa rnams spangs te nyams par
133a6('dul ba): gyur to/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ dge slong 'di/ gcer bu ma gnang ba dang bslab pa rnams
133a7('dul ba): spangs te nyams par gyur pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'di nyid ngo tsha med
133b1('dul ba): pa'i skyon gyis chung ma ma thob pa de nyon cig / dge slong dag /sngon byung ba/ ngang pa'i rgyal po yul 'khor skyong zhes bya ba byung ste/ de'i bu mo rang khyim thab tshol lo/ /zhes yul phyogs sna
133b2('dul ba): tshogs na gnas pa'i bya rnams kyis thos nas 'dus par gyur to/ /so so nas bsam pa/ de'i khyim thab tu bdag 'gyur ro/ /snyam mo/ /des rma bya zhig mthong nas des smras pa/ 'di ni/
133b3('dul ba): bdag gi khyim thab tu 'gyur ro/ /de la gzhan dag gis 'dis khyod khyim thab tu 'dam mo/ /zhes smras pa dang / so so nas des mjug ma bsgrengs nas gar byed par brtsams pa dang /
133b4('dul ba): yul 'khor skyong gis mthong nas smras pa/ 'di ni/ ci zhig gi phyir gar byed/ gzhan dag gis smras pa/ khyod kyi bu mo'i khyim thab tu gyur pas so/ /des smras pa/ ngo tsha dang khrel dang mi
133b5('dul ba): ldan pas/ 'di la bdag gi bu mo mi sbyin no/ /zhes pa rma bya des thos nas/ yul 'khor skyong gi drung du song nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ dbyangs snyan yid 'ong kha dog mdzes pa dang / /
133b6('dul ba): 'dab ma 'dom gang tshad ldan mgrin pa ni/ /nor bu bai DUR+Ya dang 'dra gyur na/ /ci slad khyod kyi sras mo bdag mi stsal/ /yul 'khor skyong gis smras pa/ dbyangs snyan yid 'ong kha dog mdzes
133b7('dul ba): pa dang / /'dab ma 'dom gang tshad ldan mgrin pa ni/ /nor bu bai DUR+Ya dang 'dra gyur kyang / /'dzem med skyon gyis khyod la mi sbyin no/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus
134a1('dul ba): kyi rma bya gang yin pa de ni/ dge slong 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang 'di ngo tsha med pa'i skyon gyis chung ma ma thob nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde nas bya'i tshogs
134a2('dul ba): kyi nang nas byung ngo / /da lta'i yang 'dis gcer bu ma gnang nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bas dge slong gi tshogs kyi nang nas byung ngo / /yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan
134a3('dul ba): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag skra 'bal bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas 'breg par rjes su gnang na/ ci'i phyir
134a4('dul ba): khyod skra 'bal/ skyes bu gti mug /'di lta ste/ skra 'bal ba 'di ni/ mu stegs pa'i brtul zhugs yin no/ /de lta bas na/ dge slong gis skra 'bal bar mi bya'o/ /'bal
134a5('dul ba): na| 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag lo ma'i bgo ba 'chang bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom
134a6('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug /'di ni/ mu stegs pa'i brtul zhugs yin no/ /zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong
134a7('dul ba): ma bzhin du'o/ /yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag bla gos mthang gos dang bcas pas 'tsho bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom
134b1('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug /ngas chos gos gsum rjes su gnang na/ ci'i phyir khyod bla gos mthang gos dang bcas pas 'tsho bar byed/ de lta bas na/ dge slong gi
134b2('dul ba): bla gos mthang gos dang bcas pa'i chos gos kyis 'tsho bar mi bya'o/ /'tsho bar byed na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// //yang dge slong zhig gis bcom
134b3('dul ba): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag g.yang gzhi 'chang bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gti mug /'di ni/ mu stegs pa'i rgyal
134b4('dul ba): mtshan yin no/ /zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun
134b5('dul ba): pa| bdag gso ma'i seng ras kyi chos gos 'chang bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni/ mu stegs kyi rgyal mtshan yin no/ /zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs
134b6('dul ba): can du 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol pa/ btsun pa/ bdag pa char 'chang bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom
134b7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug /'di lta ste/ pa char 'di ni/ khyim pa'i chos yin te zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin
135a1('dul ba): du'o/ /yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag chos gos thams cad sngon por 'chang bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom
135a2('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni/ khyim pa 'chang bar byed do/ /de lta bas na/ dge slong gis chos gos thams cad sngon por bcang bar mi bya'o/ /zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs
135a3('dul ba): can du 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de bzhin du thams cad ser ba'am/ thams cad dmar ba'am/ dkar ba ni/ rung ba ma yin pa nyid do/ /sdom la/ kha tshar
135a4('dul ba): ring dang gdengs ka dang / /ral ga gtsug tor thod dang ni/ /ra bal gos dang rda bal klam/ /mchin nad kun dga' mthang gos bcas/ /yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das
135a5('dul ba): la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag kha tshar ring po'i chos gos 'chang bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni/ mu stegs pa'i rtags yin
135a6('dul ba): no| |zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun
135a7('dul ba): pa| bdag kha tshar gdengs ka lta bu'i chos gos 'chang bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /skyes bu gti mug /'di ni/ mu stegs pa'i rtags yin no/ /
135b1('dul ba): zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag ral
135b2('dul ba): ga 'chang bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug /'di ni/ khyim pa'i rtags yin no/ /zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /zhes
135b3('dul ba): bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/ /yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag gtsug tor bgyid par 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das
135b4('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug /'di ni/ khyim pa'i rtags yin no/ /zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /yang dge slong
135b5('dul ba): zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag thod 'chang bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug /'di ni/ khyim pa'i
135b6('dul ba): rtags yin no/ /zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/
135b7('dul ba): bdag ra bal gyi gos bcang bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug /'di ni/ khyim pa'i rtags yin no/ /zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can
136a1('dul ba): du 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /yang dge slong zhig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag rnga bal
136a2('dul ba): gyi klam 'chang bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu gti mug /'di ni/ khyim pa'i rtags yin no/ /zhes bya ba nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur
136a3('dul ba): ro| |zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' mchin nad can/ dge slong med pa'i gnas sgo 'phar med pa zhig tu dbyar gnas par dam bcas te/
136a4('dul ba): de phyi rol tu byung ba dang / de'i snam sbyar rkun pos khyer ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis dge slong med pa'i gnas
136a5('dul ba): sgo 'phar med par dbyar gnas par dam mi bca' zhing / snam sbyar med par gang du yang 'gro bar mi bya'o/ /song na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun
136a6('dul ba): dga' bo mchin nad can na ba de'i nad g.yog tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo byed pa las char bab pa dang / de snam sbyar gyon te 'gro ba'i spro ba med nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
136a7('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ mthang gos bla gos su bcas pas 'gro bar bya'o/ /gzhan yang snam sbyar gzhag tu rung ba ni/ lnga ste/ dge slong dang bcas pa'i gnas sgo 'phar dang bcas pa
136b1('dul ba): dang / char bab pa'am char 'bab tu dogs pa dang / 'bab chu'i pha rol tu 'gro bar 'dod pa dang / sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas dang / dge 'dun gyis gnang ba byin par gyur pa'o/ /bar sdom
136b2('dul ba): gyi tshigs su bcad pa/ dbyar dang dge tshul nyid dag gi /'byung ba gnyis po dag dang ni/ /rnyed pa chung dang 'gyod pa dang / /dge 'dun rnyed dang de de yin/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge
136b3('dul ba): slong rnams kyis chos gos kyi rnyed pa sbyin par bya'o zhes gsungs na/ dge slong rnams kyis dgag dbye byas pa'i mod kho na la ljongs rgyur dong ba dang / de rnams kyi rnyed pa sus kyang ma blangs na/
136b4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i rnyed pa len du gzhug pa'i phyir dge slong la bcol nas 'gro bar bya'o/ /ma bcol ba'i dge slong gzhan dag gis blangs pa dang / dge slong rnams
136b5('dul ba): phan tshun rtsod par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma bcol ba'i dge slong gis rnyed pa blang bar mi bya'o/ /blangs na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcol ba'i dge
136b6('dul ba): slong gzhan dag gis ma blangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de rnams kyis thams cad mngon par bya'o/ /dge tshul rnams dong nas sus kyang rnyed pa ma blangs so/ /bcom
136b7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de rnams kyi mkhan po dang / slob dpon dag gis blang bar bya'o/ /dge slong dag rnyed pa chung du dag 'gyed par byed pa na/ rnyed pa chung du yin no/ /
137a1('dul ba): snyam nas dong ba rnams kyi ma byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang la bcol ba de rnams kyis blang bar bya'o/ /gzhan dag gis ma bcol
137a2('dul ba): bar dong ba dang / de rnams kyi sus kyang ma blangs la/ dge slong rnams kyis kyang 'gyod pas ma blangs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blang bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par
137a3('dul ba): mi bya'o/ /rnyed pa chung du gzhan dag bgor mchog nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzhan dag dang bsres la gtsug lag khang na gnas pa rnams kyis bgo bar bya ste/
137a4('dul ba): de la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /bcol bas rnyed pa chung du ma blangs na/ ma sha ka lnga'i rin yan chad ni/ nges par bda' bar bya'o/ /ri bor zhig na khyim bdag cig yod pa des gtsug lag
137a5('dul ba): khang zhig brtsigs nas/ de na gal te dge slong brgya gnas na/ ras yug brgya 'bul lo/ /de bzhin du dge slong gcig gnas na yang ras yug brgya kho na 'bul lo/ /zhes bya ba'i bar
137a6('dul ba): du'o/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ gtsug lag khang de nyid du rgan zhugs gnyis shig dbyar gnas pa las/ khyim bdag des ras yug brgya bskur ba de gnyis kyis blangs nas/
137a7('dul ba): phan tshun dpyad nas gcig gis smras pa/ rnyed pa 'di ni/ dge 'dun gyir 'gyur ro/ /gcig shos kyis smras pa/ bdag cag kho na'i 'gyur ro/ /gal te de lta na longs shig /des
137b1('dul ba): smras pa/ phan tshun rtsod par mi 'gyur grang / ji tsam na gcig gis kyang ma blangs/ de gnyis kyis yang dpyad pa/ de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ gcig gis smras pa/ dge slong rnams bos la
137b2('dul ba): de rnams dang lhan cig bgo'o/ /gcig shos kyis smras pa/ de bzhin du byas na su 'gro/ gang gzhon pa'o/ /gos rnams sus srung / gang gzhon pas so/ /de ltar mi nus kyi/ gang
137b3('dul ba): gzhon pa ni/ 'gro'o/ /gang rgan pa des ni/ gos rnams srung ngo / /de bzhin du bya'o/ /zhes gzhon pa shos dge slong rnams 'bod pa'i phyir mnyan yod du song ngo / /drug sde rnams kyi kun tu
137b4('dul ba): spyod pa ni/ drug sde rnams kyis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo res mos res mos kyis mi stongs par byed pa yin pas/ nye dga' rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na 'dug pa des/ rgyang ring po
137b5('dul ba): kho na nas mgo spra ba'i me tog ltar skya ba/ smin ma 'phyang ba zhig mthong nas bsam pa/ dge slong gnas brtan 'di 'ga' zhig 'ong gi /de bsur 'gro'o/ /snyam nas/ gnas brtan/ byon
137b6('dul ba): pa legs so/ /byon pa legs so/ /slob dpon phyag 'tshal lo/ /des bsam pa/ 'di ni/ slob dpon yang mi shes/ mkhan po yang mi shes te/ 'di ni/ rgan zhugs shig yin no/ /
137b7('dul ba): snyam du rig nas smras pa/ rgan zhugs/ khyod gang nas 'ongs/ ri bor che ge mo zhig nas so/ /ci/ de na gtsug lag khang yod dam/ gtsug lag khang yod do/ /ci/ de gtsug lag
138a1('dul ba): gang yin nam/ 'on te phongs pa yin/ des ji ltar gyur pa rnams smras pa dang / khyod don ci zhig la 'ongs/ dge slong rnams dang bgo ba'i phyir ro/ /
138a2('dul ba): gal te de lta na/ nga kho nas khyod la snying brtse ba'i phyir 'gro bar bya'o/ /slob dpon/ legs so/ /nye dgas bsam pa/ gal te 'di bdag gi thad nas gzhan du song na/ skye bo'i
138a3('dul ba): tshogs chen pos shes par 'gyur gyi/ legs par bsrung bar bya'o/ /snyam nas des de ngal bsor bcug ste dus ma yin pa'i btung ba dag blud nas/ ci nas kyang bre mo gtam gyis
138a4('dul ba): nam sros kyi bar du brongs nas mal bzang po bshams te rkang pa bkru ba dang / rkang pa bsku ba byin nas ji tsam gnyid log par gyur pa de srid du bsdad do/ /de nas nye dga' gsang
138a5('dul ba): 'phel bar mi 'gyur grang snyam pa'i 'tsher bas mtshan mo de 'das bar byas so/ /de nas de nang par sngar langs te rgan zhugs khrid nas rings pa rings par song ste/ rim gyis ri bor du
138a6('dul ba): phyin pa dang / de nas gtsug lag khang du gnas pa'i rgan zhugs gcig shos des/ 'ongs pa legs so/ /zhes kun dga' bar 'gyur pa'i tshig smras nas/ de gnyis ngal
138a7('dul ba): sros pa dang / khong gsum can/ yang gnas gcig tu 'tshogs nas nye dgas smras pa/ rnyed pa bgos shig /gnas brtan/ bgo'o/ /nye dgas rgan zhugs gcig la smras
138b1('dul ba): pa/ rgan zhugs/ khyod kyis bgos shig /gnas brtan/ bdag mi bgod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag la nyes pa byung na mi rung ngo / /gcig shos la yang smras pa/ rgan zhugs/ khyod
138b2('dul ba): kyis bgos shig / des kyang de bzhin du smras pa dang / nye dgas smras pa/ khyod ni/ nyes pa byung bas 'jigs kyi/ nye dga' ni/ spyi'u tshugs su sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur bar
138b3('dul ba): 'dod dam ci/ nye dgas bsam pa/ rgan zhugs 'di gnyis bsdongs kyi/ dbyen bya'o/ /snyam nas/ de nas de gnyis kyi rgyun du rung ba'i las byed pa'i g.yog po mthong nas gcig gi drung du song
138b4('dul ba): ste dris pa/ rgan zhugs/ khyod kyis 'dir ci dag byas/ gnas brtan/ bdag gis gtsug lag khang dag tu rtag tu chag chag btag/ phyag dar dang / ba'i lci ba 'jam pos byug pa byas so/ /rgan
138b5('dul ba): zhugs/ gal te chag chag dang / phyag dar byas pa kho nas rnyed pa thob na lta/ nye dgas gtsug lag khang thams cad chag chag dang / phyag dar bya'o/ /'on kyang 'dir rnyed pa byung ba gang yin pa
138b6('dul ba): de ni/ rgan zhugs/ gcig shos de'i mthus yin te/ de gtsug lag khang du dus dus su chos 'don pa'i sbyin pa byed pas chos 'don pa don du gnyer ba'i lha spro ba dang ldan par gyur te/ des
138b7('dul ba): na rnyed pa rnyed par gyur gyi/ 'dis ci byin pa de blang bar bya ste/ 'khang par mi bya'o/ /des de gnad la bab pas skyengs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go /de nas gcig shos kyi drung du song nas smras
139a1('dul ba): pa| rgan zhugs/ khyod kyis 'dir ci dag byas/ gnas brtan/ bdag gis 'di ru dus dus su chos bsgrags pa'i sbyin pa byas so/ /rgan zhugs/ gal te chos bsgrags
139a2('dul ba): pas rnyed pa thob na lta/ nye dgas 'greng ba dang / 'gro ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal bas dus thams cad du chos bshad do/ /rnyed pa gang cung zad grub pa de thams cad ni/ rgan zhugs gcig
139a3('dul ba): shos de'i mthus yin te/ des gtsug lag khang 'dir chag chag dang / phyag dar dang / ba'i lci ba 'jam pos byug pa byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag dar byed pa la yon tan lnga yod
139a4('dul ba): de| lnga gang zhe na/ bdag nyid kyi sems dang bar 'gyur ba dang / gzhan gyi sems dang bar 'gyur ba dang / lha rnams yid dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / mdzes par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
139a5('dul ba): gsog par 'gyur ba dang / lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bka' stsal to/ /de lta bas na/ gtsug lag khang phyag dar byas pas
139a6('dul ba): yon bdag mngon par dad par gyur la/ lha yid dga' bar gyur te/ des na der rnyed pa byung bar gyur to/ /de bas na de'i mthus 'dir rnyed pa byung bas des ci byin pa de blang bar bya ste/
139a7('dul ba): 'khang bar mi bya'o/ /de yang gnad la phab pas skyengs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go /de gnyis spobs pa med par byas nas smras pa/ rgan zhugs dag /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol
139b1('dul ba): ba'i las mi 'khrugs pa gsungs pa'i thabs gzhan yod pas gsol ba byas la bgo'o/ /de gnyis kyis sngar smra phab pas smras pa/ gnas brtan/ ci dgyes pa de bzhin du mdzod cig /de nas
139b2('dul ba): nye dgas cha gsum du byas te/ cha gnyis kyi bar du ni/ rang nyid 'dug go /de gnyis kyi bar du ni/ cha gcig bzhag nas gsol ba bya bar brtsams pa/ rgan zhugs/ khyed nyon cig /khyed gnyis dang 'di gcig/
139b3('dul ba): 'di gnyis dang kho bo gcig ste/ de ltar na gsum gsum mo/ /'di ni/ gsol ba'o/ /de nas cha gnyis ni/ bdag nyid kyis blangs so/ /cha gcig ni/ de gnyis la byin pa dang / de gnyis kyis
139b4('dul ba): smras pa/ gnas brtan/ 'di kho na las bdag cag gnyis rtsod par 'gyur gyi/ khyod kho nas bdag cag la bgos shig /des bgo bar brtsams nas/ de nas ras yug gcig kha khyer du 'dug
139b5('dul ba): pa de yang blangs nas ras rnams bam por bcings te song ngo / /de nas rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang / de dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/ btsun pa nye dga'/ khyod kyis su zhig shi ba
139b6('dul ba): mthong / des ji ltar gyur ba rgyas par smras pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ khyod de ltar byed pa brtags pa yin nam/ mi mdza' ba rnams kyi mgrin pa rdog pas mnan nas so/ /skabs de/
139b7('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba ni/ dge slong rnams gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal byed pa las
140a1('dul ba): gyur gyi/ de lta bas na/ dge slong gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal mi bya'o/ /thob rgyal byas na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/
140a2('dul ba): the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ tshe dang ldan pa nye dgas rgan zhugs de gnyis chos kyi sgo nas bslus pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das
140a3('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ 'das pa'i dus na ji ltar 'dis rgan zhugs gnyis bslus pa de nyon cig /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba/ 'bab
140a4('dul ba): chu'i ngogs shig na sram gnyis shig gnas pa las/ de gnyis gang gi tshe chu'i nang du zhugs pa na nya skam la thon par 'gyur zhing / gang gi tshe skam la dong ba de'i tshe chu'i nang du dong nas cung zad
140a5('dul ba): kyang mi rnyed do/ /de nas de gnyis kyis gros byas pa/ bdag cag las gcig ni/ chu'i nang du 'gro'o/ /gcig shos kyis ni/ skam la ste/ rnyed pa gang yin pa de ni/ spyir bya'o/ /de na gcig
140a6('dul ba): ni/ chur song ngo / /gcig shos ni/ skam la ste/ de la chur zhugs pa gang yin pas nya rnams dkrogs te skam la bton nas/ de rnams skam la gnas pas bsad do/ /chu la gnas pa ni/
140a7('dul ba): chu la gnas pa nyid kyis so/ /ji tsam na nya'i phung po chen por gyur pa dang / gcig gis smras pa/ khyod kyis bgos shig /gcig shos kyis smras pa/ bdag mi bgod do/ /ci'i
140b1('dul ba): phyir/ bdag la nyes pa byung na mi rung ngo / /des kyang smras pa/ gal te de lta na/ bdag la yang nyes pa 'di nyid yin no/ /de gnyis sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa las/ ji tsam na wa bzhin
140b2('dul ba): rgyas zhes bya ba/ de gnyis kyi drung du 'ongs nas des smras pa/ tsha bo dag /ci ste khong du chud cing 'dug /zhang po/ bdag cag ni/ nya rnyed pas so/ /ci ste mi bgod/ zhang po/ nyes pas 'jigs
140b3('dul ba): so/ /khyod ni/ nyes pas 'jigs la/ bzhin rgyas ni/ rkang pas spyi'u tshugs su sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur bar 'dod dam ci/ bzhin rgyas kyis bsams pa/ 'di gnyis bsdongs kyi/ dbye
140b4('dul ba): bar bya'o/ /snyam nas/ de nas de gnyis kyi rtag tu g.yog byed pa rus sbal zhig mthong nas/ gcig gi drung du song ste dris pa/ tsha bo/ khyod kyis 'dir ci dag byas/ zhang po/ bdag chur zhugs
140b5('dul ba): te bdag chur zhugs nas nya rnams dkrogs te skam la thon pa dang / 'dis bsad do/ /tsha bo/ gal te chur zhugs pas cung zad thob na lta/ bzhin rgyas rtag tu chu nang du 'gro'o/ /skam la
140b6('dul ba): 'gro ba de ni/ sdong dum gyi 'jigs pa dang / tsher ma'i 'jigs pa dang / gcan gzan gyi 'jigs pa dang / mi'i 'jigs pa dang / ngam grog gi 'jigs pa yod do/ /gzhan yang / gal te
140b7('dul ba): des ma bsad na/ khyod kyis dkrogs kyang ci phan/ mdor na 'dir nya rnyed pa gang yin pa de rnams ni/ de'i mthu yin pas/ 'dis ci byin pa de blang bar bya ste/ 'khang par mi bya'o/ /des de gnad
141a1('dul ba): la phab pas skyengs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go / de nas gcig shos kyi drung du song nas smras pa/ tsha bo/ khyod kyis 'dir ci dag byas/ zhang po/ bdag gis skam la
141a2('dul ba): song ste bdag gis skam la thon pa'i nya rnams bsad do/ /tsha bo/ gal te skam la song nas cung zad thob na lta/ bzhin rgyas rtag tu skam la 'gro'o/ /chur 'gro ba de ni/ dba' klong gi 'jigs
141a3('dul ba): pa dang / rus sbal gyi 'jigs pa dang / chu srin byis pa gsod kyi 'jigs pa dang / chu srin kum+b+hi ra'i 'jigs pa dang / chu'i 'jigs pa yod do/ /gzhan yang / gal te des ma dkrogs
141a4('dul ba): na| khyod kyis ji ltar gsad/ mdor na 'dir nya rnyed pa gang yin pa de rnams ni/ de'i mthu yin pas des ci byin pa de blang bar bya ste/ 'khang par mi bya'o/ /des de gnad la phab pas skyengs
141a5('dul ba): nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go / bzhin rgyas kyis smras pa/ tsha bo dag /'di la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis mi g.yo bar bgo ba'i thabs yod do/ /de sngar sma phab pas smras pa/ zhang
141a6('dul ba): po| ci dgyes pa de bzhin du mdzod cig / bzhin rgyas kyis cha gsum du bgos te/ nya'i mjug ma rnams gcig tu byas/ mgo bo rnams gcig tu byas/ bar gyi cha rnams gcig
141a7('dul ba): tu byas nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ thang la rgyu bas mjug ma ste/ gting du rgyu bas mgo bo'o/ /bar gyi lus ni gang yin pa/ /de ni chos la gnas pas bkur/ /bzhin rgyas kyis
141b1('dul ba): bsam pa/ 'di gnyis bslus pas bdag rnyed pa dang ldan no/ /snyam nas des nya chen po zhig gi rked pa khyer te ma'i drung du song ba dang / de nas de'i ma mgu nas tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis dris pa/
141b2('dul ba): bzhin rgyas khyod ni gang nas 'ongs/ /mgo yang med cing mjug med pa'i/ /nya po che zhig thogs nas ni/ /shin tu don grub ga las 'ongs/ /des smras pa/ gang phyir blun po rtsod gyur cing / /chos
141b3('dul ba): dang chos min mi shes pas/ /rgyal po'i mdzod ni 'phel ba ltar/ /des ni chog shes 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /des kyang tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ rgyas pas blta na sdug pa khyod/ /pha rol mnan
141b4('dul ba): pa shin tu legs/ /de gnyis kyang ni mgu gyur la/ /khyed kyang rnyed pa phun sum tshogs/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi wa bzhin rgyas gang yin pa de ni/ nye dga' 'di
141b5('dul ba): nyid yin no/ /sram gnyis po gang yin pa de ni/ rgan zhugs 'di gnyis yin te/ de na yang de gnyis 'dis bslus la/ da ltar yang de gnyis bslus so/ /gleng gzhi ni/
141b6('dul ba): mnyan yod na'o/ /ri por zhig na khyim bdag cig yod pa des gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs nas/ der dge slong brgya dbyar gnas par dam bcas so/ /khyim bdag de'i blo skyes pa/ ras
141b7('dul ba): yug brgya bsgrubs te dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol nas/ dge slong re re la yang ras yug re re bskon no/ /snyam mo/ /ji tsam na nye dgas khyim bdag che ge mo zhig gis dge slong
142a1('dul ba): gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol te/ re re la yang ras yug re re bskon no/ /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang bsam pa/ gal te de las ras yug cig ma grub
142a2('dul ba): na| bdag nye dga'am yin no/ /snyam nas de mgron du ma bos bzhin du song ngo / /khyim bdag gis dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol nas ras rnams 'brim pa na/ nye dgas
142a3('dul ba): ras gcig blangs nas myur ba myur bar song ngo / /ji tsam na dge slong gcig gi ras chad do/ /khyim bdag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag /bdag gis ras brgya legs par bgrangs te
142a4('dul ba): 'tshal te mchis na/ 'phags pa 'ga' zhig gis ras yug gnyis bsnams par ma gyur grang / dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ khyim bdag /de ltar su zhig byed/ 'on kyang btsun pa nye
142a5('dul ba): dga' khyod kyis spyan drangs sam/ 'phags pa dag /bdag gis spyan ma drangs so/ /des ras de khyer nas song ngo / /de nas khyim bdag de smod par brtsams pa'i skabs de/ dge slong
142a6('dul ba): rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba ni/ dge slong dag mgron du ma bos par gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal
142a7('dul ba): byed pa las gyur gyi/ de lta bas na/ dge slong gis mgron du ma bos par gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal mi bya'o/ /thob rgyal byed na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /dge slong rnams
142b1('dul ba): the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' g.yar ma drangs par gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob rgyal bgyid pa
142b2('dul ba): la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang nye dgas mgron du ma bos par gzhan gyi rnyed pa la thob
142b3('dul ba): rgyal byas pa de nyon cig / dge slong dag /sngon byung ba/ ri bor zhig na bram ze 'khor la dbang bsgyur ba zhig yod de/ des bram ze'i khye'u brgya zla ba gsum du mgron du bos te zan byin nas
142b4('dul ba): de'i blo skyes pa/ bram ze'i khye'u re re la yang ras yug re re bskon no/ /snyam mo/ /de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na/ bram ze rgan po zhig gnas pa des thos nas/ de rgan po'i mthar 'dug
142b5('dul ba): ste/ thog mar zos nas ras yug gcig khyer nas song ngo / /bram zes ras rnams 'brim par byed pa na/ ji tsam na bram ze'i khye'u gcig gi ras chad nas des dris pa/ shes ldan dag /bdag
142b6('dul ba): gis ras yug brgya legs par bgrangs te 'ongs na/ bram ze'i khye'u 'ga' zhig gis ras yug gnyis blangs bar ma gyur grang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ de ltar su zhig bgyid/ 'on kyang khyod
142b7('dul ba): kyis bram ze rgan po mgron du bos sam/ bdag gis mgron du ma bos so/ /des ras yug de thog mar blangs nas song ngo / /bram ze des smad par brtsams so/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems
143a1('dul ba): de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bram ze rgan po gang yin pa de ni/ nye dga' 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang de mgron du ma bos so/ /da lta na yang ngo / /gleng gzhi
143a2('dul ba): ni| mnyan yod na'o/ /ri bor zhig na khyim bdag cig yod pa des/ gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs nas der dge slong gcig dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa las/ de ldang ba phun
143a3('dul ba): sum tshogs pa zhig pas/ des nyi ma re re zhing gtsug lag khang byug pa dang phyag dar byed do/ /gtsug lag khang de ni/ sa phyogs dben zhing bzang ba'i phyogs su brtsigs la/ shing
143a4('dul ba): sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa ngang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / khu byug rnams skad 'byin pa/ me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs kyis mdzes par
143a5('dul ba): byas pa yin no/ /ji tsam na ded dpon 'byor pa rgya chen po dang ldan pa zhig /gtsug lag khang der dgongs btab pa las/ des gtsug lag khang de mdzes pa dang / nye ba'i tshal mdzes
143a6('dul ba): pa dag mthong nas mngon par dad par gyur te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun ma mthong yang de'i ched du rnyed pa phal mo che zhig bskur nas de nang par sngar langs te song ngo / /dge slong de/ 'dzem
143a7('dul ba): bag can zhig pas/ rnyed pa 'di ni/ dge 'dun gyi yin no/ /zhes 'gyod pas ma blangs par bgo ba'i phyir dge slong rnams tshol bar byed pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom
143b1('dul ba): ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te dge slong gis ba'i lci ba'i khang par dbyar gnas par dam bcas par gyur kyang der gal te bram ze dang / khyim
143b2('dul ba): bdag rnams kyis dge 'dun gyi ched du rnyed pa nyung ngu'am/ phal mo cher phul na/ de na gnas pa gcig gam/ gnyis sam/ rab tu mang po gang yin pa de rnams kho na'i ste/ de la 'gyod par
143b3('dul ba): mi bya'o/ /sdom la/ bye ba rnams la skal ba ni/ /sbyin dang drang srong rgyu ba las/ /dge 'dun dang ni chos gos kyi/ /rnyed pa brgyad du bya ba'o/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom
143b4('dul ba): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ dbyar gyi nang logs su dge 'dun bye bar gyur na/ rnyed pa stsal bar bgyi'am/ mi stsal bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
143b5('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ nye bar 'khor/ kha cig la ni/ sbyin no/ /kha cig la ni/ mi sbyin no/ /gang la stsal bar bgyi/ chos dang mthun pa'i phyogs la'o/ /btsun pa/ dbyar gyi nang logs su dge
143b6('dul ba): slong gis bslab pa phul te nyams par gyur na/ rnyed pa stsal bar bgyi'am/ mi stsal bar bgyi/ nye bar 'khor/ kha cig la ni/ sbyin no/ /kha cig la ni/ mi sbyin no/ /gang la stsal bar bgyi/
143b7('dul ba): gang yun ring du gnas pa la'o/ /btsun pa/ dbyar gyi nang logs su dge slong gum par gyur na/ rnyed pa stsal bar bgyi'am/ rnyed pa stsal bar mi bgyi/ nye bar 'khor/ kha cig la ni/ sbyin
144a1('dul ba): no| |kha cig la ni/ mi sbyin no/ /gang la stsal bar bgyi/ /gang yun ring du gnas pa la'o/ /ri bor zhig na khyim bdag cig yod pa des/ yo byad thams
144a2('dul ba): cad dang ldan pa'i gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ljongs rgyu zhing song ba las/ gtsug lag khang der phyin pa dang / khyim bdag des zas byin nas ras
144a3('dul ba): yug lnga brgya byin pa dang / des ras yug lnga brgya po de rnams gtsug lag khang de nyid du phul nas song ngo / /ji tsam na de'i lhan cig gnas pa drang srong len dang / drang srong byin gnyis
144a4('dul ba): ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba las/ ri bor de nyid du phyin nas khyim bdag des de gnyis la'ang zan byin nas ras yug lnga brgya byin no/ /dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /khyed
144a5('dul ba): kyi mkhan pos khyim bdag de la ras yug lnga brgya thob pa de rnams bdag cag kho na la bgos kyi/ de ring gi rnyed pa 'di rnams bdag cag kho nas thob par 'gyur ro/ /de gnyis kyis smras
144a6('dul ba): pa| mkhan po ni/ bsod nams che ba/ shes rab dang ldan pa yin te/ des lan 'ga' khyed cag la byin par zad do/ /de rnams kyis slar lan glan par brtsams pa'i skabs de/ dge
144a7('dul ba): slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /rnyed pa brgyad po 'di dag ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ mtshams kyis thob pa'i
144b1('dul ba): rnyed pa dang / khrims kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa dang / rten gyis rnyed pa dang / dge 'dun gyir brtags pa dang / dge slong gir brtags pa dang / dbyar gyi dang / mngon sum dang / so sor bstan pa'o/ /
144b2('dul ba): mtshams kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gnas gnyis la gso sbyong gcig pa ste/ gtsug lag khang de gnyis kyi rnyed pa gang yin pa de ni/ gtsug lag khang de gnyis ka'i gnyug
144b3('dul ba): mar gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyi yin no/ /de la gnyug mar gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis brgya la gso sbyong tha dad par dam bcas na/ de la rnyed pa grub pa gang yin pa de ni/ gtsug
144b4('dul ba): lag khang de nyid du sbyin no/ /gso sbyong tha dad pa nyid kyis de'i gnyung mar gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyi longs spyod par bya ste/ 'di ni/ mtshams kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o/ /khrims
144b5('dul ba): kyis thob pa'i rnyed pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong rnams kyis 'di lta bu'i khrims su bca' ba/ khyed kyi ni/ khyim che ge mo zhig go/ kho bo cag gi ni/ khyim che ge mo zhig go /lam po che
144b6('dul ba): dang / tshong 'dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo ni/ spyi'i yin no/ /zhes bya ba nas dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa las/ gal te bram ze dang khyim bdag de rnams kyis dam bcas pa rnams
144b7('dul ba): kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ dam bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ dam ma bcas pa rnams la chu drangs na/ rnyed pa gang dbang
145a1('dul ba): bar 'gyur zhe na/ dam bcas pa rnams kho na'o/ /dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ dam

145a3('dul ba): bam po re lnga pa/ dam bcas pa rnams kyi gnas su dam bcas pa dang / dam ma bcas pa'i dge slong rnams zan byin nas/ dam bcas pa rnams la rnyed pa phul la/ dam ma bcas pa

146b7('dul ba): pa gang zhe na/ dge slong skyes pa'am/ bud med dam/ ma ning gang la brten te dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa des rnyed pa byin pa gang yin pa de ni/ de kho na'i yin te/ 'di ni/ rten gyis thob
147a1('dul ba): pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o/ /dge 'dun gyir brtags pa'i rnyed pa gang zhe na/ rnyed pa gang zhig nges la dmigs kyis phye ba ste/ 'di ni/ dge 'dun gyir brtags
147a2('dul ba): pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o/ /dge slong gir brtags pa'i rnyed pa gang zhe na/ rnyed pa gang zhig nges la dmigs kyis phye nas gnas khang pa'i 'o/ /yang thog pa'i 'o/ /khang pa brtsegs pa'i 'o/ /
147a3('dul ba): zhes brtags pa ni/ de na dge slong gnas pa gang yin pa de kho na'i ste/ 'di ni/ dge slong gir brtags pa'i rnyed pa zhes bya'o/ /dbyar gyi rnyed pa gang zhe na/ rnyed pa gang zhig dbyar gnas

147a7('dul ba): zhes bya'o/ /sdom la/ gnas nas phyung dang shi ba dang / bgo ba dang ni bsre ba dang / /gnas nas phyung dang dge tshul dang / /dbyung ba gsol dang shi ba'o/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod
147b1('dul ba): na'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ 'di ltar/ gnas gcig na gnas nas phyung ba rab tu mang po dang / rang bzhin du gnas pa rab tu mang po
147b2('dul ba): mchis pa la/ de rnams las gnas nas phyung ba zhig gum pa de'i yo byad gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/ nye bar 'khor/ rang bzhin du gnas pa rnams so/ /btsun pa/ gnas nas phyung ba ni/ gnyis
