149b6('dul ba): nya gtang bar bya'o/ /dam ma bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na/ ma bgos pa/ nyes par bgos pa yin no/ /dam bcas pa rnams 'ged par byed na/ bgos pa/ legs par bgos pa yin no/ /bsres
149b7('dul ba): te 'ged par byed na/ ma bgos pa/ nyes par bgos pa yin no/ /phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsngo bar byed na/ legs par bsngos pa yin no/ /sdom ni/ nye dga' dang ni byin gyis brlabs//
150a1('dul ba): bar ma sbyin dang blang bya dang / /bdag shi sbyin pa med pa dang / /spang ba dang ni mi gsum mo/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /nye dga'i spyi bor phol mig cig byung
150a2('dul ba): nas de sman pa'i gan du song nas bzhin bzang / kho bo la sman ston cig/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ mar khu gsol cig dang sos par 'gyur ro/ /nye dgas bsam pa/ gal te de ring
150a3('dul ba): kho na 'thungs nas de ring nyid du sos par gyur na/ sang mar dang gos bslang ba ji ltar rung bar 'gyur gyi/ re zhig bslangs la phyi nas btung bar bya'o/ /snyam du shes nas/ bsod nams
150a4('dul ba): chen po dang ldan pa des/ lhan cig gnas pa rnams kun du mngags pa dang de rnams kyis mar gyi bum pa dang / rma g.yogs pa'i gos phal mo che bslangs so/ /phyi de nyin par sman
150a5('dul ba): pas dris pa/ 'phags pa/ khyod snyun gdangs sam/ khyod kyis mar gsol tam/ bzhin bzang / ma 'thungs so/ /'phags pa/ ma legs pa zhig bgyis kyi/ deng nyis 'gyur du gsol
150a6('dul ba): cig/ des lhan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas rnams la smras pa/ sman pas ji skad smras pa thos sam/ mkhan po/ /thos pa lags so/ /kho bo'i nad 'di ni/ cher skyes par gyur te/ mar
150a7('dul ba): dang rma g.yogs pa'i gos mang du dgos kyi/ slongs shig/ de rnams kyis mar dang gos phal mo che bslangs so/ /de sang gi thabs la chags par gyur pas/ nyi ma de la yang ma 'thungs
150b1('dul ba): pas/ de'i nad rab tu skyes par gyur to/ /ji tsam na yang sman pa 'ongs nas dris pa/ 'phags pa/ mar gsol tam/ bzhin bzang / ma 'thungs so/ /'phags pa/ ma legs pa zhig bgyis
150b2('dul ba): so| |des smras pa/ bzhin bzang / de ring ni/ sum 'gyur du btung ngo / /sman pas smras pa/ 'phags pa/ gal te mar gyi sgrom gyi nang du nub par zhugs kyang da ni khyod la srog ma mchis so//
150b3('dul ba): des smras pa/ gshin rje'i g.yog 'dra ba khyod kyi mgul pa rdog pas mnan la mar 'thungs dang sos par 'gyur ro/ /sman pa des/ 'jal to/ /zhes byas nas khros te song ngo / /de nas nye dgas
150b4('dul ba): mar khus lhung bzed bkang ste 'thungs pa las/ ma zhu nas shi'o/ /de la gser mang du yod de/ cha gcig ni/ chos gos las so/ /cha gnyis pa ni/ nad kyi rkyen sman las so/ /cha gsum pa ni/
150b5('dul ba): brdung du byas pa dang ma byas pa las te/ gser srang sum khri byung ngo / /zhes blon po rnams kyis thos nas rgyal po la smras pa/ lha/ 'phags pa nye dga' gum pa las/ de la gser mang du byung
150b6('dul ba): ste| gser srang sum khri mchis kyi/ de la bka' stsal ba'i rigs so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te de lta na dengs la de'i gnas khang rgyas thob cig/ dge slong rnams de khyer te sreg tu dong
150b7('dul ba): ngo| |de rnams kyang lhags nas gnas khang rgyas btab bo/ /dge slong rnams kyis de dur khrod du bsregs nas gtsug lag khang du 'ongs pa na/ gnas khang rgyal po'i rgyas btab pa mthong
151a1('dul ba): nas skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun
151a2('dul ba): dga' bo/ khyod song la nga'i tshig gis rgyal po gsal rgyal la nad med par gyur cig ces byos la/ 'di skad ces/ rgyal po chen po/ gang gi tshe khyod rgyal po'i bya ba byed pa de'i tshe khyod kyis
151a3('dul ba): dge slong nye dga' la bltas sam/ 'on te gang gi tshe khyod bag ma gtong ba'am/ bag ma len pa de'i tshe nye dga' la lan 'ga' khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho ba'i chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang
151a4('dul ba): gnas mal dang / na ba'i rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad rnams kyis bstabs sam/ 'on te na ba la rim gro byas sam zhes gyis shig/ gal te ma bgyis so/ /zhes smra na/ de la rgyal po chen po/
151a5('dul ba): khyim pa rnams kyi khyim gyi bya ba dang / rab tu byung ba rnams kyi tha dad pas sems las chung ngus gnas par gyis shig/ rnyed pa 'di ni/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams dbang bar 'gyur
151a6('dul ba): bas gtogs 'dod thongs shig ces smros shig/ btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal
151a7('dul ba): rgyal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas ji skad bka' stsal pa bzhin smras pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ji skad stsal pa de bzhin du bgyis
151b1('dul ba): te/ bdag gtogs 'dod mi bgyid do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rgyal pos lan gsol ba bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka'
151b2('dul ba): stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ khyod kyis dge slong nye dga' shi ba'i yo byad bgos shig/ dge slong rnams kyis dge 'dun gyi dbus su phyung ste bsgyur nas bgos so/ /gnas bcas kyi dge slong rnams
151b3('dul ba): kyis nye dga' shi nas de la gser mang du byung ste/ gser srang sum khri dge slong rnams kyis bgos so/ /zhes thos nas de rnams myur bar mnyan yod du lhags nas smras pa/ bdag cag kyang btsun
151b4('dul ba): pa nye dga'i tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa yin pas bdag cag kyang de'i rnyed pa la dbang bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong rnams kyis bsdus te de dag dang lhan cig yang bgos so/ /yangs pa can pa dang / wA
151b5('dul ba): ra NA si pa dang / rgyal po'i khab pa dang / tsam pa pa'i dge slong rnams kyis kyang yang dang yang bsdus nas bgos te/ de ltar grong khyer chen po drug na gnas pa'i dge slong rnams 'dus so/ /dge slong
151b6('dul ba): rnams sdud cing 'ged pa na/ lung nod pa dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / yid la byed pa bor pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
151b7('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ rnyed pa bgo ba'i rgyu ni/ lnga ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ gaN+Di dang / rgyud chags gsum dang / mchod rten dang / tshul shing dang / lnga pa ni/ gsol ba'o/ /shi ba'i gaN+Di brdungs pa na 'ongs pa
152a1('dul ba): gang yin pa de la rnyed pa sbyin te/ rgyud chags gsum 'don pa dang / mchod rten la phyag byed pa dang / tshul shing 'brim pa dang / gsol ba byed pa na yang de bzhin no//
152a2('dul ba): dge slong dag/ de lta bas na/ shi ba'i yo byad thams cad gsol ba byas te/ bgos na mi 'khrugs par 'gyur ro/ /'di ltar yang bya ste/ gnas mal bshams la zhes bya ba nas dge 'dun
152a3('dul ba): thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /shi ba'i yo byad rgan pa'i mthar bzhag ste/ dge slong gcig gis rgan pa'i mthar 'dug pa la gsol ba
152a4('dul ba): bya'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gnas 'dir dge slong nye dga' gum ste/ gum pa de'i yo byad gda' ba dang / mi gda' ba mchis pa 'di lags te/ gal te dge 'dun
152a5('dul ba): gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong nye dga' gum pa'i yo byad kyi rdzas gda' ba dang / mi gda' ba la gum pa'i yo
152a6('dul ba): byad du byin gyis brlab pa'o/ /'di ni/ gsol ba'o/ /dge slong dag/ 'di ni/ shi ba'i yo byad bgos zin pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ gsol ba'o/ /gsol ba byas nas dge slong 'ongs pa gang yin
152a7('dul ba): pa de la ni/ rnyed pa mi sbyin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ gang na ba dge 'dun mi mthun pas gsol ba bgyid pa ma mchis
152b1('dul ba): pa der gum pa'i yo byad bgo bar bgyi'am/ bgo bar mi bgyi lags/ nye bar 'khor/ thog ma dang tha ma byas nas bgo bar bya'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis thog ma dang tha ma ma shes nas/ bcom ldan
152b2('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yo byad gcig bsgyur te de las cung zhig/ dge 'dun gyi rgan pa dang / dge 'dun gyi gzhon pa la byin nas ci dga' bar bgo bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /
152b3('dul ba): gsol ba'am/ thog ma dang tha ma ma byas pa'i shi ba'i yo byad kyi rnyed pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi slob ma thams cad dbang bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod
152b4('dul ba): pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' ma 'os pa'i chags pas gum par gyur pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /da
152b5('dul ba): ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang ma 'os pa'i chags pas shi ba de nyon cig/ dge slong dag/ sngon byung ba/ rngon pa zhig gis mda' dug can gyis glang po che'i gnad du
152b6('dul ba): bsnun pa dang / de nas de gnad la bab pa'i tshor bas nyen cing mda'i phyi rjes bzhin du song nas rngon pa de srog dang phral lo/ /ji tsam na ma stes te/ chom rkun pa lnga brgya ri bor zhig bcom nas
152b7('dul ba): phyogs der phyin pa dang / de rnams kyis glang po che de mthong ngo / /mu ge dang bcas pa'i dus byung bas de rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ sha 'di rnyed kyi/ nyis brgya lnga bcus glang po che'i sha
153a1('dul ba): bcad la btso'o/ /nyis brgya lnga bcus ni/ chu blang ngo / /de na glang po che'i sha gcod cing 'tshed pa gang yin pa de rnams/ 'di snyam du sems te/ shes ldan dag/
153a2('dul ba): bdag cag 'di 'dra ba'i las byas pas/ rkun rdzas rab tu mang po 'di grub kyi/ de dag la ci'i phyir sbyin/ sha las ci yog pa zos la/ lhag ma dug gis gdab po/ /de dag gis sha dug
153a3('dul ba): can zos pa dang 'chi bas rkun rdzas bdag gir 'gyur ro/ /zhes de rnams kyis ci yog pa'i sha zos nas/ lhag ma dug gis btab bo/ /gang dag chu la dong ba de rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du
153a4('dul ba): dpyad nas chu ci yog pa 'thungs nas/ lhag mar dug blugs te 'ongs nas/ gang dag sha zos pa de rnams kyis kyang chu 'thungs la/ gang dag chu 'thungs pa de dag gis kyang sha zos nas thams cad
153a5('dul ba): shi bar gyur to/ /ji tsam na wa zhig dus kyi zhags pas bcings nas phyogs der 'ongs nas/ des ro de dag thams cad mthong ngo / /de nas chags pas bskyed pa'i yid bde bas bsam pa/
153a6('dul ba): bdag la rnyed pa phal mo che yod kyi/ rim bzhin du bya'o/ /snyam nas/ des gzhu mchog khar bcug ste/ gzhu rgyud kyi rtod pa rgyus pa bca' bar brtsams te/ de nas rgyus pa chod pa dang mchog
153a7('dul ba): mas rkan la zug nas shi bar gyur to/ /lhas tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ bsag par yang ni bya ba ste/ /lhag par bsag par mi bya'o/ /gsog la chags pa'i wa long ba/ /gzhu yis
153b1('dul ba): bsad par gyur la ltos/ /dge slong dag/ ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi wa gang yin pa de ni/ nye dga' 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang lhag par 'di chags pas shi'o/ /da ltar yang 'di lhag par
153b2('dul ba): chags pas shi bar gyur to/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /de'i tshe dge slong nad kyis thebs pa/ sdug bsngal ba/ nad tshabs che ba zhig yod pa de/ dge slong gis rim gro byas na/ 'on kyang shi
153b3('dul ba): bar gyur nas de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos rgan pa'i mthar khyer ba dang / de nas chos gos gcig bshang gci dag gis 'bags shing sbrang ma rnams 'du bar gyur to/ /de nas gos 'ged pas
153b4('dul ba): rim gro byed pa de la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ khyod kyis rgyud ngan pa byas te chos gos ma bkrus kyi/ khrus shig/ des smras pa/ yo byad ni/ khyod 'ged na/ kho bos bkru'am/ khyod nyid kyis khrus shig/ skabs
153b5('dul ba): de| dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nad g.yog la yo byad drug byin la/ lhag ma dge slong gis bgo bar bya'o/ /gal te nad
153b6('dul ba): g.yog mang bar gyur na/ thams cad kyi spyir yo byad drug bgo bar bya'o/ /dge slong bshes gnyen dang bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa gzhan dag cig shi na/ de rnams kyi yo byad dang / dge tshul
153b7('dul ba): gyi yo byad dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad mang po rgan pa'i mthar spungs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi nad g.yog gis yo byad drug bkur bar bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal to/ /zhes des 'dam zhing
154a1('dul ba): 'dam zhing bzang po rnams blangs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzang po rnams las sbyin par mi bya'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis ngan pa las byin
154a2('dul ba): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngan pa rnams las sbyin par mi bya ste/ 'on kyang bar ma dag las sbyin par bya'o/ /nad pa ma tshor bar dge 'dun gyi gnas mal kho na la shi bar
154a3('dul ba): gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nad g.yog gis nad pa'i rtags la mkhas par bya ste/ myur ba myur bar brtag par bya'o/ /de'i bya ba nyams par mi bya ste/ lus kyi gnas
154a4('dul ba): skabs shes nas gang zag gi gnas mal la bsnyal bar bya'o/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /dge slong nad pa zhig yod pa des lus kyi gnas skabs la brtags nas/ dge slong zhig
154a5('dul ba): la smras pa/ re zhig kho bo ji tsam 'tsho'i bar du rim gro gyis shig/ kho bo'i lhung bzed dang chos gos ni/ kho bo shi nas khyod ci bder gyis shig/ des de'i rim gro bya bar brtsams pa las/ ji tsam
154a6('dul ba): na dge slong de shi'o/ /de nas gos 'ged pas de la smras pa/ dge slong de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos bgo dgos kyi/ phul cig/ des smras pa/ des kho bo la ci bder byed du bcug go/ zhes pa'i
154a7('dul ba): skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dang / de gson po'i tshe nyid na ma byin na/ shi nas sbyin pa lta smos
154b1('dul ba): kyang ci dgos/ bdag shi nas 'di'i yin no/ /zhes bya ba'i sbyin pa 'di ni/ med pa yin pas blangs te bgos la dge slong de'i rang gi skal ba sbyin par bya'o/ /de'i tshe dge slong nad kyis thebs pa/ sdug
154b2('dul ba): bsngal ba/ nad tshabs che ba zhig yod pa de/ shes pa chung bas de'i sman med nas/ de'i lus kyi gnas skabs la brtags te rim gro byed pa la smras pa/ bdag la ci yang med kyi/ bdag gi ched du mchod
154b3('dul ba): pa gyis shig/ des khas blangs pa las/ de shi nas ngan song rnams su skyes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ dge slong shi ba gang yin pa des rim
154b4('dul ba): gro byed pa la ji skad smras/ de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa gsol ba dang / dge slong dag/ dge slong de log par ltung ngo / /gal te tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis de'i ched du dkon mchog
154b5('dul ba): gsum la mchod pa byas par gyur dang / dad pas log par ltung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig/ de lta bas na/ dge slong gis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa na ba nam yang yal bar mi gzhag ste/ nad g.yog
154b6('dul ba): sbyin par bya'o/ /des de la dris te/ gal te de la sman med na/ yon bdag la bslang bar bya'o/ /gal te grub na de lta na legs/ ci ste ma grub na/ dge 'dun gyi las sbyin no/ /ci ste yang ma grub na/
154b7('dul ba): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten nam/ dri gtsang khang gang gi gdugs sam/ rgyal mtshan nam/ rgyan gang yin pa de dge 'dun gyis phog la sbyin par bya zhing / rim gro byed pas bsgyur nas
155a1('dul ba): rim gro dang / ston pa mchod par bya'o/ /sos par gyur na de la/ 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yin te/ khyod kyi yo byad du spyad do/ /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /gal te de la 'byor pa
155a2('dul ba): yod na/ des 'bad de bsab par bya'o/ /gal te med na/ de'i spyad pa legs par spyad pa yin te/ pha'i la bu bzhin du rigs pa yin pas de la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod
155a3('dul ba): na'o/ /dge slong nad kyis thebs pa/ sdug bsngal ba/ nad tshabs che ba/ tshor bas nyen pa zhig yod pa de la lhung bzed bzang po zhig yod de/ de de la lhag par chags nas rim gro byed pa la
155a4('dul ba): smras pa/ kho bo'i lhung bzed 'on cig/ des ma byin pa dang / de de la ngan sems skyes shing lhung bzed la lhag par chags pa shi nas/ de lhung bzed de nyid du sbrul zhig tu skyes so/ /dge slong
155a5('dul ba): rnams kyis de sreg tu khyer nas/ bsregs te gtsug lag khang du lhags nas dge slong gi dge 'dun 'dus so/ /gos 'gyed pas shi ba'i yo byad rgan pa'i mthar spungs so/ /de nas bcom
155a6('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ song la dge slong rnams la dge slong sus kyang de'i lhung bzed bzhag pa'i snod ma dbye zhing / de bzhin
155a7('dul ba): gshegs pa nyid kyis 'byed par 'gyur ro/ /zhes sgos shig/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong rnams la bsgos so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phye ba dang / sbrul zhig
155b1('dul ba): mgo'i gdengs ka cher byas nas 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis se gol gyi sgras bslangs nas bka' stsal pa/ mi gti mug can/ lhung bzed 'di spongs la songs shig/ dge
155b2('dul ba): slong rnams kyis 'ged par 'gyur ro/ /de 'khrugs nas ci dga' ba'i spyod lam gyis song ste/ nags stug po zhig tu zhugs nas/ des de khros pa'i me sbar bas nags de rab tu 'bar te/
155b3('dul ba): de nyid du tshig nas dge slong rnams la ngan sems skyes pas dmyal ba rnams su skyes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ srid pa thams
155b4('dul ba): cad la skrag par gyis shig/ srid pa'i yo byad gang gi phyir sems can gcig gi lus de/ gnas gsum po nags stug por khros pa'i me dang / dmyal bar sems can dmyal ba'i me
155b5('dul ba): dang / dur khrod du me phal pas sreg par gyur ba thams cad las yid byung bar bya'o/ /de lta bas na/ dge slong gis yo byad la lhag par chags pa bskyed par mi bya zhing / gang la skye ba de
155b6('dul ba): yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /ma spangs na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang / gal te nad pa rang gi yo byad slong na/ rim gro byed pas myur ba myur bar sbyin par bya'o/ /ma byin
155b7('dul ba): na| 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /de'i tshe dge slong nad pa zhig gnas khang du shi nas mi ma yin pa rnams kyi nang du skyes so/ /gos 'ged pas lhung
156a1('dul ba): bzed dang chos gos bgo'o/ /zhes dge slong de'i gnas khang du 'jug par brtsams pa las/ de kun nas dkris pa drag pos dbyug pa blangs te langs nas des smras
156a2('dul ba): pa| re zhig kho bo dur khrod du yang ma phyung bar lhung bzed dang chos gos 'ged par byed dam/ de dngangs nas bros pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
156a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ re zhig thog mar dge slong gi ro phyung nas phyi nas de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos bgo bar bya'o/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /de'i tshe dge slong
156a4('dul ba): zhig shi nas/ dge slong rnams kyis de phyung ste dur khrod du de bzhin du bor nas gtsug lag khang du lhags te gos 'ged pas chos gos dang lhung bzed bgo'o/ /zhes de'i gnas khang du
156a5('dul ba): zhugs pa dang / de mi ma yin pa rnams su skyes pas/ dbyug pa blangs te langs nas des smras pa/ re zhig kho bo'i ro la mchod pa yang ma byas par chos gos dang lhung bzed 'ged par
156a6('dul ba): byed dam zhes pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong rnams kyis sngar de'i ro la mchod pa byas la/
156a7('dul ba): de'i 'og tu lhung bzed dang chos gos bgos dang / nyes dmigs 'dir mi 'gyur ro/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /de'i tshe dge slong nad pa zhig gnas khang du shi nas de dge slong
156b1('dul ba): rnams kyis dur khrod du khyar te ro la mchod pa byas bsregs nas/ de nas gtsug lag khang du lhags pa dang / gos 'ged pas de'i gnas khang du zhugs pa las/ des dbyug pa blangs te langs
156b2('dul ba): nas re zhig bdag gi ched du chos bsgrags pa ma byas par chos gos rnams 'ged par byed dam zhes pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
156b3('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i ched du chos bsgrags pa dang / de'i ched du yon bsngo ba byas nas chos gos rnams bgo bar bya'o/ /sdom la/ nad pa dang ni tshong dpon dang / /dngos po'i skyin pa
156b4('dul ba): lag gi bla/ /mtshams bzhi dag tu bya ba dang / /pho nya brgyad du bya ba'o/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /de'i tshe khyim bdag cig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim du gdugs
156b5('dul ba): tshod la spyan drangs pa las/ dge slong gi dge 'dun ni/ lhags so/ /bcom ldan 'das ni/ rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa na bzhugs nas bsod snyoms kyi sku skal bzhes so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
156b6('dul ba): 'das rnams ni/ rgyu lngas rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa na bzhugs nas bsod snyoms kyi sku skal bzhes te/ lnga po gang zhe na/ nang du yang dag 'jog par bzhed pa dang / lha rnams la chos 'chad par bzhed
156b7('dul ba): pa dang / gnas mal la gzigs par bzhed pa dang / nad pa la gzigs par bzhed pa dang / nyan thos rnams 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed pa ste/ skabs 'dir ni/ nad pa la
157a1('dul ba): gzigs pa dang / bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bzhed nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa na bzhugs nas bsod snyoms kyi sku skal
157a2('dul ba): bzhes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun dong nas ring po ma lon par mkhyen nas lde mig bsnams te kun dga' ra ba nas kun dga' ra ba dang / gtsug lag khang
157a3('dul ba): nas gtsug lag khang dang / spyil po nas spyil po dang / 'chags nas 'chags rnams su 'chag cing gshegs pa na gtsug lag khang chen po gang na ba der phyin pa dang / de na dge slong
157a4('dul ba): nad tshabs che ba/ shes pa chung ba/ rang gi gcin dang ngan skyugs kyi nang du nub pa zhig gis/ bcom ldan 'das mthong nas bcom ldan 'das/ bdag la mgon ma mchis so/ /bde bar
157a5('dul ba): gshegs pa/ bdag la mgon ma mchis so/ /zhes skad ngan bton pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong / nga khams gsum gyi mgon po'i rjes su khyod rab tu byung
157a6('dul ba): na| ci'i phyir de skad du/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag la mgon ma mchis so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ bdag la mgon ma mchis so/ /zhes ngu skad 'don/ btsun pa/ bdag la tshangs pa
157a7('dul ba): mtshungs par spyod pa 'ga' yang rim gro bgyid pa'am/ lta ba ma mchis so/ /dge slong / khyod kyis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa 'ga' la rim gro dang lta ba byas pa yod dam/ btsun
157b1('dul ba): pa| ma mchis lags so/ /de bas na/ khyod gnas skabs 'di lta bur gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kye ma'o/ /lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis mtsho chen po ma dros pa nas chu khyer te
157b2('dul ba): 'ong zhing ri spos kyi ngad ldang las sa khyer te 'ong bar gyur cig / ces 'jig rten ba'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad do/ /chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs
157b3('dul ba): bskyed pa mdzad pa de'i tshe brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs te/ lha rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs sems kyis shes so/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis mtsho chen
157b4('dul ba): po ma dros pa nas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gser gyi ril ba bkang ste/ ri spos kyi ngad ldang las sa blangs nas myur ba myur bar bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs te 'dug nas
157b5('dul ba): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shig dang de'i rim gro bdag gis bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka/ 'di khyod kyi phyir rab tu byung ba ma yin gyi/
157b6('dul ba): 'on kyang nga'i phyir yin no/ /gzhan yang / khyod kyis 'di sngon ma mthong la/ lha rnams ni/ gtsang sbra la dga' ba yin pas 'dug cig /ngas 'di'i rim gro bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
157b7('dul ba): na bza' chos gos brdzes nas phyag 'khor lo dang / bkra shis dang / g.yung drung 'khyil ba can/ bsod nams brgya phrag du mas bsgrubs pa/ skrag pa rnams la dbugs 'byin par mdzad
158a1('dul ba): pas dge slong de bzung ste/ gcin dang ngan skyugs nas phyung nas mtha' gcig tu bzhag ste/ smyug gi tshal pas bzhar nas sa dkar pos dril phyis byas te bkrus
158a2('dul ba): so| |de nas skyil mo krung 'char bcug nas de'i chos gos rnams bkrus te phyogs de yang pa'i lci ba 'jam pos byug pa mdzad do/ /de nas phyag dang zhabs bsil nas lha rnams kyi dbang
158a3('dul ba): po brgya byin la nad pa la rim gro bya ba sngon du 'gro ba'i chos bshad pas yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug nas gtsug lag khang du zhugs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
158a4('dul ba): bos bsod snyoms kyi sku skal gyi bsod snyoms khyer te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ngo / /chos nyid kyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ bsod snyoms mnos nas khyer te 'ong
158a5('dul ba): ba'i dge slong la so so yang dag par dga' bar mdzad pa 'dis so so yang dag par dga' bar mdzad de/ dge slong / ji ga dge slong gi dge 'dun kha zas bsod pas legs par tshim par byas
158a6('dul ba): sam zhes yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad pa yin pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ ci/ dge slong gi dge 'dun kha zas bsod
158a7('dul ba): bas legs par tshim par byas sam/ btsun pa/ de bzhin du zhal zas bsod pas dge slong gi dge 'dun legs par tshim par bgyis lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsod snyoms
158b1('dul ba): kyi phyed bzhes te tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ song la gtsug lag khang che ge mo zhig na dge slong nad tshabs che ba zhig yod pa de la bsod snyoms phyed po 'di khyer la
158b2('dul ba): zos nas 'di skad ces/ tshe dang ldan pa/ khyod kyi rim gro ston pa nyid kyis mdzad de bsod snyoms kyi phyed kyi bgo bsha' yang mdzad do/ /zhes gyis shig /btsun pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang
158b3('dul ba): ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas bsod snyoms kyi phyed khyer te/ de la bsod snyoms byin nas ji skad bka' stsal pa yang smras so// //'dul ba gzhi/
158b4('dul ba): bam po re drug pa/ de nas dge slong de/ 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ni/ khams gsum gyi bla ma nyid kyis rim gro mdzad de/ bsod snyoms kyi phyed kyang gnang gi/ bdag dad pas byin pa longs spyad nas
158b5('dul ba): le los dus 'das par byed pa ni/ bdag la rigs pa ma yin pas/ ma la bdag nam gyi cha stod dang / nam gyi cha smad la mi nyal bar sbyor ba la brtson par gnas par bya'o/ /snyam nas/ de nam gyi cha
158b6('dul ba): stod dang / cha smad la mi nyal bar sbyor ba la brtson par gnas pa na/ 'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa g.yo ba dang mi g.yo ba 'di nyid rig ste 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa dang / ltung ba dang / rnam
158b7('dul ba): par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos nyid du zil gyis mnan nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom par gyur to/ /dgra bcom par gyur nas khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang
159a1('dul ba): bral pa/ bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems/ tsan+dan dang ste'ur mnyam pa/ ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs dral bar gyur
159a2('dul ba): cing / rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa dang / 'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang / dbang po dang / nye ba'i dbang po dang
159a3('dul ba): bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /
159a4('dul ba): nad pa 'di dag la ni/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa khyed cag kho na ma gtogs par ma med/ pha med/ rtsa lag gzhan med do/ /de lta bas na/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis
159a5('dul ba): phan tshun du rim gro bya ste/ mkhan pos ni/ lhan cig gnas pa'i 'o/ /lhan cig gnas pas ni/ mkhan po'i 'o/ /slob dpon gyis ni/ nye gnas kyi'o/ /nye gnas kyis ni/ slob dpon gyi'o/ /
159a6('dul ba): mkhan po gcig pas ni/ mkhan po gcig pa'i 'o/ /slob dpon gcig pas ni/ slob dpon gcig pa'i'o/ /gtam 'dres pas ni/ gtam 'dres pa'i'o/ /phebs par smras pas ni/ phebs
159a7('dul ba): par smra ba'i'o/ /smos 'drin gyis smos 'drin gyi'o/ /'khor dang bral ba/ shes pa chung ba gang yin pa de ni/ dge 'dun gyis nad kyi gnas skabs la brtags nas rim gro pa gcig gam/
159b1('dul ba): gnyis sam/ mang po sbyin te/ mthar na dge 'dun gyis kyang rim gro bya'o/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bcom
159b2('dul ba): ldan 'das nyid kyis dge slong de'i lus kyi rim gro mdzad nas/ des dgra bcom pa mngon sum du bgyis pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /da ltar 'ba' zhig
159b3('dul ba): tu ma zad de/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang ngas 'di'i rim gro byas nas de mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas pa de nyon cig /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba/ bsti gnas me tog dang / 'bras
159b4('dul ba): bu dang / chu phun sum tshogs pa/ shing sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa zhig na drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa zhig gnas so/ /des slob ma'i rim gro byas nas sos pa dang / de nas
159b5('dul ba): des mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas so/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi drang srong gang yin pa de ni/ nga nyid yin no/ /drang srong de'i slob ma gang yin pa de ni/ dge
159b6('dul ba): slong 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang ngas de'i rim gro byas so/ /da ltar yang byas so/ /gzhan yang / dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das lhag par nad pa
159b7('dul ba): rnams la byams par mdzad pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang nga lhag par nad pa rnams
160a1('dul ba): la byams par byed pa de nyon cig / dge slong dag /sngon byung ba/ yul shi bi pa'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po'i pho brang na rgyal po shi bi zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba
160a2('dul ba): dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ de slong ba pa rnams la mi gtong ba cung zad kyang med de/ nad pa rnams la ni/ khyad par du byed do/ /ji tsam
160a3('dul ba): na khyim bdag nad pa sman pa thams cad kyis spangs pa zhig rgyal po'i drung du song nas lha/ bdag la dpyad mdzod cig /rgyal pos sman pa rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag /dpyad byos shig /
160a4('dul ba): de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ 'di'i sman ni/ dkon lags so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ dkon pa de dag ci 'dra ba zhig yin/ lha/ gang zhig btsas tshun chad sngon lan 'ga' yang su la yang
160a5('dul ba): khro ma myong ba de'i khrag las nas thug bgyis te zla ba drug tu stsal na/ de lta na 'di sos par 'gyur lags kyi/ gzhan gyis ni/ ma lags so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ de'i sman dkon pa ni/
160a6('dul ba): bden no/ /de nas bdag nyid kyi spyod pa la brtag par brtsams na/ bdag nyid kyi spyod pa la brtags par dka' bar gyur nas/ des ma ma la dris par brtsams pa/ ma ma/ nga dus 'di srid
160a7('dul ba): kyi bar du sngon lan 'ga' yang khros pa yod dam/ gzhon nu/ khyod gang gi tshe bdag gi par du byon pa de nas bdag kyang sngon su la lan 'ga' yang khro ma myong na/ khyod lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/
160b1('dul ba): de nas ma'i drung du song nas smras pa/ yum/ bdag dus 'di srid kyi bar du sngon su la yang 'ga' yang khros pa mchis sam/ gzhon nu/ khyod gang gi tshe bdag gi rum du zhugs pa de nas bdag
160b2('dul ba): kyang sngon su la yang khro ma myong na/ khyod lta smos kyang ci dgos/ des bsam pa/ sman rnyed de/ /snyam du rig nas sman pa rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag /ngas rang la brtags na/ nga sngon su
160b3('dul ba): la yang khro ma myong bas/ nga'i yan lag lnga'i rtsa gtor cig /lha/ bdag cag ni/ mi phal pa zhig gi don du lha'i sku la mtshon mi 'debs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ bzo'i gnas
160b4('dul ba): dang / las kyi gnas de dang de rnams la mkhas pa yin pas/ rgyal po rang nyid kyis rtsa gtar te/ khrag de zla ba drug tu nyi ma re re zhing de la nas thug blud pas sos par gyur to/ /dge slong dag /ji
160b5('dul ba): snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po gang yin pa de ni/ nga nyid yin te/ de na yang nga nad pa rnams la byams par byed na/ da lta lta zhig smos kyang ci dgos/ gzhan yang shi bi'i rgyal po'i
160b6('dul ba): bu gzhogs phyed bskams par gyur nas/ rgyal pos sman pa rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag /gzhon nu'i dpyad kyis shig /de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ bcud thams cad mar dang sgrol
160b7('dul ba): cig / lo bcu gnyis su bcud thams cad bsags na/ 'di'i yang shang shang te'u'i sha ma rnyed do/ /sman pa rnams kyis bya ba rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dang / me long dang bya gag khyer te/
161a1('dul ba): rgya mtsho'i 'gram du dengs la/ der rnyi tshugs te bya gag gi mdun du me long zhog cig dang / bya gag rang gi gzugs brnyan mthong nas 'di bya gag yin no/ /snyam
161a2('dul ba): ste| skad phyung ba dang shang shang te'us bya gag gi skad thos nas ngo mtshar che bas bya gag gi drung du 'ong bar 'gyur te/ de gzung ba'i thabs ni/ 'di yin no/ /de rnams kyis de bzhin du
161a3('dul ba): byas pa las/ ji tsam na/ las kyi zhags pas zin pa'i srog chags shang shang te'u thogs nas de rnams kyis de khyer te song ngo / /'di ni/ chos nyid yin te/ 'jig rten gnas pa chags
161a4('dul ba): nas ring po ma lon pa'i tshe dud 'gro rnams kyang smra shes pas srog chags shang shang te'u sa smras pa/ bdag gar bkri/ de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang / des smras pa/ thong zhig/
161a5('dul ba): sha'i mthu yod par byed pa zhes bya ba'i sman dang / rin po che rnams smra'o/ /de rnams kyis smras pa/ re zhig khyod kyis sman de dag ci 'dra bar blta'i/ ston cig /des smras pa/ bdag gis khrus
161a6('dul ba): byas pa'i chu ni/ sha'i mthu yod pa yin gyi/ de khyer la dengs shig /rin po che ni/ 'di dag yin no/ /de dag rgyal pos 'jigs pas rin po che rnams bor te shang shang te'u de nyid khyer
161a7('dul ba): te dong pa las/ rim gyis yul shi bi'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin nas de rnams kyis srog chags shang shang te'u rgyal po la phul te/ des bstan pa'i sman gang yin pa de yang
161b1('dul ba): smras so/ /de nas rgyal pos shang shang te'u la dris pa dang smras pa/ lha/ bdag bkrus pa'i chab sha stobs can du bgyid pa lags so/ /rgyal pos chu snod bdun chu bzang pos bkang bar
161b2('dul ba): bzhag go / ji tsam na de dag tu ji srid legs par ngal sos pa de srid du khrus byas nas/ de nas lus kyi stobs shes pa dang mod la 'phur te khang pa'i steng du 'dug nas/ 'jigs pa dang bag
161b3('dul ba): tsha ba dang bral te tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ re zhig thog ma bdag blun te/ /phyi nas bya ba 'di dag go /de nas rgyal po sman pa ste/ /blun po'i dkyil 'khor legs par rdzogs/ /zhes smras
161b4('dul ba): nas song ngo / /de nas rgyal pos sman pa rnams bkug ste dris pa/ shes ldan dag /shang shang te'us khrus byas pa'i chu de/ sha'i mthu yod par byed pa de bden nam/ de rnams kyis smras pa/
161b5('dul ba): lha/ mad lags kyi/ mar dang sgrol cig /de rnams kyis bcud thams cad mar dang btsos te rgyal po'i bu la blud par zhugs so/ /ji tsam na gangs ri'i sul zhig na rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya
161b6('dul ba): gnas pa las/ de na gcig gzhogs phyed bskams par gyur to/ /de la rang sangs rgyas de rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ ljongs su song la sman pa la smos te sman ston cig dang sos
161b7('dul ba): par 'gyur ro/ /des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /skye bo mang po la mi sdug pa/ skye bo mang po mi 'dod pa/ skye bo mang bo mi dga' ba/ skye bo mang po'i yid du mi 'ong ba/ sems can thams cad
162a1('dul ba): kyi thun mong gi chos 'di lta ste/ 'chi ba zhes bya ba gang yin pa de 'ong ste/ bdag nad dang bcas te khyer bar gyur na/ ci'i phyir grong khyer gyi mthar 'gro/ de rnams kyis
162a2('dul ba): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ de lta mod kyi/ 'on kyang ji tsam du skyes bu gang zag tshul khrims dang ldan pa yun ring du 'tsho ba de tsam du bsod nams mang po gsog go/ ji tsam du bsod nams
162a3('dul ba): mang po bsags pa de tsam du mtho ris rnams su yun ring du dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes de de rnams kyis skul ma btab nas ljongs su babs te/ rim gyis yul shi bi'i dbyangs kyi rgyal
162a4('dul ba): po'i pho brang du phyin to/ /de nas lam gyis dub pa ngal sos nas sman pa'i drung du song ste/ bzhin bzang / kho bo 'di 'dra ba'i nad kyis thebs kyi/ sman ston cig /des smras pa/ 'phags
162a5('dul ba): pa| khyod kyi snyun nad 'di ci 'dra ba kho na rgyal po'i sras kyi yang de kho na 'dra nas lo bcu gnyis kyis bcud thams cad mar dang btsos pa mchis kyi/ bzhud la slongs shig dang / gal te
162a6('dul ba): skal pa'i khyad par gyis bcud de thob na/ des na khyod 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /de rgyal po'i pho brang du song nas sgo gar bsdad do/ /rgyal po de'i kun tu spyod pa ni/ slong ba po'i skye bo sbron
162a7('dul ba): du gzhug pa'i phyir sgor rgyun du dril 'dogs te/ gang gi tshe slong ba po sgo na 'dug pa de'i tshe de dkrol bar byed do/ /ji tsam na rang sangs rgyas 'ongs nas dril de dkrol to/ /de nas
162b1('dul ba): rgyal po'i bus pha dang ma la smras pa/ yab yum/ slong ba po zhig mchis kyi/ ci zhig slong smros shig /de gnyis kyis smras pa/ bu/ bdag cag gis lo bcu gnyis su rdzas rnams bsags te
162b2('dul ba): btsos nas byas pa'i bcud 'di re zhig 'thungs shig dang / phyi nas slong ba po nang du bkug la ci slong ba rma'o/ /de ngo mtshar dang / bkra shis dang / bde legs su gyur pa dag byas nas
162b3('dul ba): mar 'thung bar 'dod na/ slong ba po'i skye bo'i re bas lus kyi gnad du phog nas mar de ma 'thungs par smras pa/ yab yum/ re zhig slong ba po nang du bkug gi bar du mi 'tshal lo/ /rgyal
162b4('dul ba): pos sgo ba la bsgo ba/ slong ba po nang du thongs shig /de nang du zhugs pa dang / rgyal po'i bus lus mdzes pa dang / sems dang ba dang / spyod lam zhi bas zhugs pa mthong nas/ des
162b5('dul ba): smras pa/ 'phags pa/ ci zhig bzhed/ des rgyas par smras pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ bcud ni/ khyod kho na la 'os kyi/ bdag la ma lags kyi/ dbul gyi/ bzhes shig /des
162b6('dul ba): lhung bzed bzed pa dang / rgyal po'i bu bsam pa drag pos lhung bzed der bcud blugs so/ /bdag nyid chen po des kyang rgyal po'i bu la sems can thams cad la phan pa dang ldan pa'i
162b7('dul ba): sems bskyed pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i smon lam ni/ 'grub par 'gyur la/ de yang tshul khrims rnams rnam par dag pa'i phyir gnyis ka yang sos par gyur to/ /dge slong dag
163a1('dul ba): ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po gzhon nu gang yin pa de ni/ nga nyid yin te/ de na yang nga nad pa rnams la byams par byed na/ da lta lta
163a2('dul ba): smos kyang ci dgos/ btsun pa/ rgyal bu dang rang sangs rgyas des las ci zhig bgyis na/ des na gnyi ga mnyam du bros thebs la/ mnyam du sos par gyur lags/ bcom
163a3('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /'di gnyis kho nas sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su las tshogs bsags pa/ rkyen yongs su sgyur ba/ 'od pa bzhin du nye bar
163a4('dul ba): gnas pa gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags pas/ 'di gnyis nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/
163a5('dul ba): dge slong dag /las byas shing bsags pa dag ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/ me'i khams la mi 'gyur/ rlung gi
163a6('dul ba): khams la mi 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar/ las dag ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni/ zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ las
163a7('dul ba): rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/ /chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/ /rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/ /'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba/ wA ra NA si'i grong
163b1('dul ba): khyer du rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba byung ste/ de la bu gnyis yod pa las/ nu bo shos gang yin pa de/ rgyal srid la dga' bar gyur to/ /mdun na 'don la yang bu gnyis yod pa las/
163b2('dul ba): nu bo shos gang yin pa de/ mdun na 'don 'dod par gyur te/ sems can rnams ni/ khams kyi sgo nas shed 'phrod pa yin pas/ de nas phan tshun du yid gcugs par gyur nas rgyal
163b3('dul ba): bus smras pa/ thabs ci zhig byas na/ des na nga rgyal por 'gyur/ des smras pa/ khyod kyis gal te bdag mdun na 'don du gzhug na ni/ thabs mchis kyi/ snyan du gsol bar bgyi'o/ /
163b4('dul ba): des smras pa/ de ltar bya ste/ gzhug gi /smros shig /des smras pa/ bdag gis khyod kyi gcen zha bor bgyis dang / khyod rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /des rjes su yi rang ngo / /de nas rgyal
163b5('dul ba): bu phu bo shos/ des sman ma yin pa byin nas zha bor gyur to/ /dus gzhan zhig na/ rgyal po shi nas blon po rnams kyis/ de ni/ zha bor gyur to/ /snyam nas/ nu bo shos rgyal por dbang
163b6('dul ba): bskur to/ /des kyang mdun na 'don gyi nu bo shos gang yin pa de/ mdun na 'don du bcug go /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po dang mdun na 'don lhan cig tu bre mo gtam smra zhing
163b7('dul ba): 'dug pa las/ rgyal pos phu bo zha ba de mthong ngo / /des de mthong nas 'gyod par gyur te/ bdag gis rgyal srid kyi phyir phu bo zha bar byas pa gang yin pa de ni/ ma legs pa zhig byas
164a1('dul ba): so| |lha/ bdag kyang 'gyod par gyur gyi/ gal te lha dgyes na/ 'di phyir sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du bgyi'o/ /des smras pa/ gnang gi /byos shig /des
164a2('dul ba): de la sman byin nas sos par gyur to/ /de nas de gnyis kyis rang sangs rgyas shig la byar byas nas smon lam gdab par brtsams pa/ gang yang bdag gis yon gnas dam pa
164a3('dul ba): 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i las 'di'i rnam par smin pas/ phyug cing nor mang la/ longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye zhing / zha bor byas pa'i sdig pa'i las 'di'i rnam par smin pa
164a4('dul ba): yang nyams su mi myong bar gyur cig ces byas so/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po'i bu gang yin pa de ni/ nga nyid yin no/ /mdun na 'don gyi bu gang
164a5('dul ba): yin pa de ni/ rang sangs rgyas 'di nyid yin no/ /de gnyis kyis gros byas nas rgyal po gzhon nu la sman ma yin pa byin pa gang yin pa des na/ mnyam du zha bor gyur to/ /yang 'gyod
164a6('dul ba): par gyur pas de gnyis kyis gros byas te slar sman byin pa gang yin pa des na/ /mnyam du sos par gyur to/ /dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ las gcig tu nag ba rnams kyi rnam
164a7('dul ba): par smin pa ni/ gcig tu nag pa yin la/ gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi gcig tu dkar ba dang / 'dres ma rnams kyi 'dres ma ste/ dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ las gcig
164b1('dul ba): tu nag pa rnams dang / 'dres ma rnams ni/ spangs la/ las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag / khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o// //
164b2('dul ba): gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /de'i tshe mnyan yod na/ khyim bdag tshong dbon zhes bya ba/ phyug cing nor mang ba longs spyod che ba/ yongs su bzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi
164b3('dul ba): bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig gnas so/ /des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de bu med cing bu mngon par 'dod pas zhi ba dang / chu lha dang /
164b4('dul ba): lus ngan dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa la gsol ba 'debs shing / lha'i bye brag gzhan yang / 'di lta ste/ kun dga' ra ba'i lha dag dang / tshal gyi lha dag dang / bzhi
164b5('dul ba): mdo'i lha dag dang / sum mdo'i lha dag dang / gtor ma len pa'i lha dang / lhan cig skyes pa dang / chos mthun pa'i lha dag dang / rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba'i lha dag la yang gsol ba
164b6('dul ba): 'debs so/ /'jig rten na gang dag gsol ba 'debs pa'i rgyu las/ bu pho dang / bu mo dag skye'o zhes bya ba'i gtam de lta bu yod do/ /de ni/ de lta ma yin te/ gal te de ltar gyur du
164b7('dul ba): zin na/ re re la yang / 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du bu stong stong yod par 'gyur ro/ /'on kyang gnas gsum po dag mngon du gyur pa las/ bu
165a1('dul ba): pho dang / bu mo dag skye bar 'gyur te/ gsum po de dag gang zhe na/ pha dang ma gnyis chags par gyur cing 'dus pa dang / ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan
165a2('dul ba): pa dang / dri za nye bar gnas par gyur pa ste/ gnas gsum po dag mngon du gyur pa las/ bu pho dang bu mo dag skye bar 'gyur ro/ /des gang gi tshe lha rnams la gsol ba byas kyang bu pho
165a3('dul ba): dang bu mo med pa de'i tshe/ lha thams cad spangs te bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad par gyur to/ /ji tsam na dge slong zhig gi drung du song ste/ 'phags pa/ legs par gsungs
165a4('dul ba): pa'i chos 'dul ba la bdag rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal lo/ /bzhin bzang / de bzhin du gyis shig/ ces des de rim gyis skra bregs nas bslab pa'i gzhi rnams sbyin par brtsams
165a5('dul ba): pa las/ rims chen pos thebs nas rab tu byung ba'i bar chad du gyur pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
165a6('dul ba): stsal pa/ re zhig sos kyi bar du bslab pa'i gzhi rnams mi sbyin zhing / de'i rim gro bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i rim gro bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal na/ dge slong rnams kyis sus
165a7('dul ba): bya ba ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong rnams dang / sman pas so/ /sman pa rnams nyin par sman byas na/ mtshan mo nad la bab par gyur to/ /de rnams
165b1('dul ba): kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa/ 'di'i dpyad bdag cag gis gdugs la bgyis na/ mtshan mo bro la bab par gyur gyi/ gal te 'di khyim du bskyal na/ bdag cag gis nyin mtshan du 'di'i dpyad
165b2('dul ba): bgyi'o/ /zhes pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim du skyol la der yang de'i rim gro byed par sbyin par bya'o/ /
165b3('dul ba): de'i nad de yun ring por gyur nas/ skra ring por ring por skyes nas/ khyim bdag de/ khyim bdag mgo reg ces bya bar grags so/ /de gang gi tshe rtsa ba dang / sdong bu dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog
165b4('dul ba): dang / 'bras bu'i sman gyis bsnyen bkur byas pa las slar la na bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ des bdag ni/ 'chi'o zhes bya bar rang gis cha chod nas/ de na des 'chi kha'i tshe rang gi nor thams cad
165b5('dul ba): glegs bu la bris te/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du bskur ro/ /de ni/ shi'o/ /blon po rnams kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la smras pa/ lha/ khyim bdag mgo reg bu ma mchis par gum ste/
165b6('dul ba): de la dbyig dang / gser dang / glang po che dang / rta dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang / go cha la sogs te/ phal mo che zhig mchis pa de thams cad glegs bu la bris nas/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi
165b7('dul ba): tshal du 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la phul lo/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ 'phags pa nye dga' dbang ba/ glegs bu la ma bris pa yang ma thob na/ glegs bu la bris pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'on
166a1('dul ba): kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ba gang yin pa de longs shig pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
166a2('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ de la ci dag yod/ bar sdom la/ gzhi dang gnas mal gos dang ni/ /lcags nag lcags dang lham mkhan dang / /rdza mkhan 'breg mkhan shing mkhan
166a3('dul ba): sogs/ /tshon rtsi mdung shing bar bur dang / /rkang gnyis rnams dang rkang bzhi dang / /zas dang btung ba sman dang ni/ /bran dang gdang ba dbang rgya dag /ci rigs par ni bgo bar bya/ /
166a4('dul ba): dbyig rnams dang ni gser rnams dang / /gzhan yang brdungs byas brdungs ma byas/ /dge 'dun 'dus nas bgo 'o zhes/ /drang srong chen pos bka' stsal to/ /dge slong rnams kyis
166a5('dul ba): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ci rigs par bgo bar bya ste/ de la zhing gi gzhi dang / khyim gyi gzhi dang / tshong khang gi gzhi dang / gnas mal dang / lcags nag
166a6('dul ba): gi mgar ba'i lag spyad dang / lcags mgar gyi lag spyad dang / rdza mkhan gyi lag spyad dang / shing mkhan gyi lag spyad dang / smyug ma mkhan gyi lag spyad dang / bran pho dang / bran
166a7('dul ba): mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dang / kha zas dang / btung ba dang / 'bru rnams ni/ mi bgo bar phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi phyir spyir gzhag par bya'o/ /ras yug
166b1('dul ba): dang / ras yug chen dang / ko sgro dang / mchil lham dang / 'bru mar gyi snod dang / ril ba dang / bya ma bum rnams ni/ dge 'dun tshogs pas bgo bar bya'o/ /mdung shing ring po gang yin pa de
166b2('dul ba): dag ni/ 'dzam bu lta bu'i sku'i gzugs brnyan gyi rgyal mtshan gyi shing bya'o/ /thung ngu gang yin pa de dag ni/ 'khar gsil gyi yu bar byas la dge slong rnams la sbyin par bya'o/ /khye'u dang bu mo
166b3('dul ba): ni/ dge 'dun gyis mi bsgyur te/ ci rigs pa zhig blangs nas ci bde bar gtang bar bya'o/ /rkang bzhi pa rnams las/ glang po che dang / rta dang / rnga mo dang / bong bu dang / dre'u rnams ni/ rgyal po
166b4('dul ba): la dbul bar bya'o/ /ba lang dang / ma he dang / ra dang / lug rnams ni/ phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi phyir spyir gzhag ste/ mi bgo'o/ /'thab stan dang / go cha dang / gzhan yang / rgyal
166b5('dul ba): po la 'os pa gang yin pa de thams cad ni/ rgyal po la dbul bar bya'o/ /mtshon cha rnams ni/ gzhag la/ de rnams gri'u dang / khab dang / 'khar gsil du brdungs te dge 'dun la brim par
166b6('dul ba): bya'o/ /tshon rnams las/ tshon rtsi chen po gang kus dang / mtshal dang / mthing shing la sogs pa de dag ni/ sku'i gzugs brnyan gyi dri gtsang khang du gzhag par bya'o/ /thod le kor dang / btsag
166b7('dul ba): dang / rams ni/ dge 'dun gyis bgo bar bya'o/ /chang ni/ yongs blugs las dong du gzhug par bya ste/ tshar gyur na longs spyad par bya'o/ /tshar ma gyur na dor bar bya'o/ /dge slong dag /nga
167a1('dul ba): ston pa yin par khas len pa rnams kyi chang mi sbyin zhing / tha na rtswa mchog gis kyang mi btung ngo / /sman rnams ni/ nad khang rung bar gzhag par bya zhing / de nas dge
167a2('dul ba): slong rnams kyis longs spyad par bya'o/ /rin po che rnams las mu tig ma gtogs par nor bu dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung g.yas su 'khyil ba la sogs pa ni/ cha gnyis su byas te/ gcig
167a3('dul ba): ni/ chos la'o/ /gcig shos ni/ dge 'dun la'o/ /chos kyi gang yin pa des ni/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung bri bar bya'o/ /seng ge'i khri brgyan par bya'o/ /dge 'dun gyi gang yin pa de ni/ dge
167a4('dul ba): slong rnams kyis bgo bar bya'o/ /glegs bam rnams las sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab kyi glegs bam rnams ni/ mi bgo bar phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi ched du spyir mdzod
167a5('dul ba): du bzhugs par bya'o/ /phyi rol pa'i bstan bcos kyi glegs bam rnams ni/ btsongs la bgo bar bya'o/ /chags rgya ni/ myur du 'grub par nus pa gang yin pa de ni/ rdzas 'ged pa'i
167a6('dul ba): tshe dge slong rnams kyis bgo bar bya'o/ /mi nus pa gang yin pa de ni/ phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi ched du spyir mdzod du gzhag par bya'o/ /gser dang / dbyig dang / gzhan
167a7('dul ba): yang rdungs su byas pa dang / rdungs su ma byas pa gang yin pa de ni/ cha gsum du byas te/ gcig ni/ sangs rgyas la'o/ /gnyis pa ni/ chos la'o/ /gsum pa ni/ dge 'dun la'o/ /sangs
167b1('dul ba): rgyas kyi gang yin pa des ni/ dri gtsang khang dang / dbu skra sen mo'i mchod rten rnams kyi ral pa dang / 'drums pa slar bcos par bya'o/ /chos kyi gang yin pa des ni/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung bri par bya'o//
167b2('dul ba): seng ge'i khri brgyan par bya'o/ /dge 'dun gyi gang yin pa de ni/ dge slong rnams kyis bgo bar bya'o/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyam yod na'o/ /gang gi tshe ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal
167b3('dul ba): rgyal gyis chu bzang gi dus ston btsugs pa de'i tshe/ de na dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams mang du tshogs par gyur to/ /de'i tshe dge slong khrums stod dge
167b4('dul ba): slong mas bkur ba yin pas chu bzang gi dus ston btsugs pa'i dge slong ma rab tu mang pos/ tshe dang ldan pa khrums stod la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa/ chu bzang gi dus ston la spyan
167b5('dul ba): 'dren gyi/ gshegs so/ /des smras pa/ bdag gi chos gos dang lhung bzed phyir su la bcol/ dge slong ma bcu gnyis sde rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa/ thugs las chung ngur mdzod cig/
167b6('dul ba): bdag cag gis gzhag par bgyi'o/ /des de rnams la gzhag pa dang / de rnams kyis kyang skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo la gtad do/ /chen mos kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la'o/ /tshe dang
167b7('dul ba): ldan pa kun dga' bos kyang gtsug lag khang zhig tu bzhag go / de nas de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa khrums stod chu bzang gi dus ston la 'ongs pa dang / de na dge slong ma rnams kyis mgron du bos pa
168a1('dul ba): yin pas/ gcig gis smras pa/ 'phags pa/ deng bdag gis zhal tshus bgyi'o/ /gzhan dang gzhan dag gis kyang g.yar tshus la bos so/ /gzhan zhig gis smras
168a2('dul ba): pa/ 'phags pa/ bdag gi gdugs tshod gsol cig /de bzhin du gzhan dang gzhan dag gis kyang smras so/ /gzhan zhig gis smras pa/ 'phags pa/ bdag gi dus ma lags pa'i btung ba
168a3('dul ba): gsol cig / de bzhin du gzhan dang gzhan dag gis kyang smras nas/ des de rnams kyi sems bsrung ba'i phyir g.yar tshus rnams las cung zad cung zad blangs/ des de bzhin du dro yang
168a4('dul ba): zos/ dus ma yin pa'i btung ba blud pa yang 'thungs pa dang / de dag tseg tseg pa yor langs nas de yang lam gyis dub pa des mang por zos nas ma zhu bar gyur te/ bsung de shi'o/ /de
168a5('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyis dur khrod du bsregs nas chos bsgrags pa byas nas rim gyis gtsug lag khang du lhags so/ /gos 'ged pas nad g.yog la smras pa/ de'i lhung bzed dang chos
168a6('dul ba): gos 'on cig / des smras pa/ des bcu gnyis sde rnams kyi lag tu bzhag go/ /de rnams la dris pa dang / smras pa/ bdag gis skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo'i lag tu bzhag go/ de nas skye
168a7('dul ba): rgu'i bdag mo chen mos smras pa/ bdag gis 'phags pa kun dga' bo la gtad do/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/ bdag gis gtsug lag khang che ge mo zhig tu bzhag go
168b1('dul ba): zhes pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shi ba'i yo byad kyi skyin par dge slong kun dga' bo byin gyis brlab
168b2('dul ba): par bya'o/ /byin gyis brlab pa yang 'di ltar bya ste/ gaN+DI brdungs la dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang / dge slong gcig gis gsol ba bya'o/ /'di ltar bya ste/
168b3('dul ba): gnas mal bshams pa byas la/ gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/ dge 'dun rnams tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang / dge slong gcig gis
168b4('dul ba): gsol ba byas te las bya'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gnas 'dir dge slong khrums stod gum na/ de'i lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / gos kyi rin dang bcas pa/
168b5('dul ba): kun dga' bo'i sug ba na mchis kyi/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong khrums stod gum pa'i
168b6('dul ba): yo byad lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / gos kyi rin du bcas pa'i dngos po'i skyin par dge slong kun dga' bo byin gyis brlab par bgyi'o/ /'di ni/ gsol ba'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
168b7('dul ba): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ dge slong yang gzhan du gum/ lhung bzed dang chos gos kyang gzhan na mchis/ dngos po'i skyin pa'ang gzhan na mchis na/
169a1('dul ba): de'i chos gos dang lhung bzed gang dbang bar 'gyur lags/ nye bar 'khor/ dngos po'i skyin ba'i dge slong ngam/ khyim pa gang na yod pa'o/ /
169a2('dul ba): gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /de'i tshe dge slong lag gi bla zhig shi'o/ /dge slong rnams de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos la 'gyod pas ma bgos pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la
169a3('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun thams cad bsogs la/ ci 'dres sam ma 'dres par gyur pa de/ brtag par bya'o/ /gal te
169a4('dul ba): 'dres te dge 'dun gyi ni/ mchod rten gyir byas la/ mchod rten ni/ dge 'dun gyir gyur na/ de lta bu chos dang mi mthun pa yin pas/ de'i lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / gos kyi rin
169a5('dul ba): dang bcas pa cha gsum du byas te/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun no/ /dge 'dun gyi ni/ dge slong rnams kyis bgo bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni/ sangs rgyas la mchod pa dang dri
169a6('dul ba): gtsang khang dang / mchod rten gyi lag gi bla'i sar spyad par bya'o/ /dam pa'i chos kyi ni/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung bri bar bya/ seng ge'i khri brgyan par bya'o/ /gal te 'dres par ma gyur na/
169a7('dul ba): thams cad dge slong rnams kho nas bgo bar bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /de'i tshe dge slong rab tu mang po dag ljongs rgyu zhing
169b1('dul ba): dong ba las/ rim gyis mnyan yod kyi grong khyer dang nye ba zhig tu phyin pa dang / de rnams kyi nang nas dge slong zhig shi'o/ /de rnams kyis bsam pa/ gtsug lag khang na 'dug pa'i tshangs pa mtshungs
169b2('dul ba): par spyod pa rnams kyang skal pa 'dod par 'gyur du 'ong gi/ gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol tu bgo bar bya'o/ /snyam pa las/ mnyan yod de na gnas pa'i ba lang gi rdzi dang / phyugs rdzi dang / rtswa
169b3('dul ba): thun dang / shing thun dang / lam gyis 'tsho ba dang / lam gol bas 'tsho ba'i mi rnams kyis kun nas gang zhing / de rnams gang dang gang du 'dug nas 'ged par byed pa de dang der skye bo'i
169b4('dul ba): tshogs chen pos yongs su bskor bar gyur nas/ de rnams kyis bsam pa/ gtsug lag khang dang nye ba zhig tu bgo'o/ /snyam nas/ de rnams kyis gtsug lag khang dang nye ba zhig tu bgo bar
169b5('dul ba): brtsams pa dang / dge bskos kyis mthong nas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /ci zhig byed/ de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur ba smras pa dang / des smras pa/ bdag kyang mtshams su 'ongs pa yin na
169b6('dul ba): zhes des 'khangs kyang de rnams kyis ma byin pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtshams kyi nang la mtshams
169b7('dul ba): kyi nang du shes te shi ba'i yo byad 'ged par byed na/ ma bgos pa/ nyes par bgos pa yin te/ slar yang mtshams na 'dug pa rnams dang lhan cig bgo bar bya ste/ gzhan du na/ 'gal
170a1('dul ba): tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du mtshams kyi nang la yid gnyis kyis 'ged par byed na/ ma bgos pa/ nyes par bgos pa yin te/ slar yang mtshams
170a2('dul ba): na 'dug pa rnams dang lhan cig bgo bar bya ste/ gzhan du na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /mtshams kyi phyi rol la mtshams kyi nang gi 'du shes kyis 'ged par byed na/ ma bgos
170a3('dul ba): pa/ nyes par bgos pa yin te/ slar yang mtshams na 'dug pa rnams dang lhan cig bgo bar bya ste/ gzhan du na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /mtshams kyi phyi rol la yid gnyis
170a4('dul ba): kyis 'ged par byed na/ ma bgos pa/ nyes par bgos pa yin te/ slar yang mtshams na 'dug pa rnams dang lhan cig bgo bar bya ste/ gzhan du na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /
170a5('dul ba): gleng gzhi ni/ mnyan yod na'o/ /de'i tshe dge slong gis dge slong la dge slong gi lag nas chos gos dag bskur ba na/ dge slong des/ gang gis bskur ba de la yid gcugs pas spyad
170a6('dul ba): pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ dge slong des yid gcugs par bya ba
170a7('dul ba): ma yin pa la yid gcugs par bskyed de/ 'di ltar/ des gang gis bskur ba de la yid gcugs par spyad do/ /'on kyang dge slong gis dge slong la dge slong gi lag nas chos/
170b1('dul ba): gos dag bskur ba na/ gang la bskur ba de la yid gcugs pas spyad na/ legs par spyad pa yin no/ /gang gis bskur ba de la yid gcugs pas spyad na/ nyes par spyad pa yin no/ /dge
170b2('dul ba): slong gis dge slong la chos gos dag bskur bar byed na/ gang la bskur ba de ni/ shi la/ gang gis bskur ba de la yid gcugs pas spyad na/ nyes par spyad pa yin no/ /gang la bskur
170b3('dul ba): ba de'i shi ba'i yo byad du rung bar byin gyis rlob par byed na/ legs par byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/ /dge slong gis dge slong la chos gos dag bskur bar byed pa na/ gang gis bskur
170b4('dul ba): ba de ni/ shi la/ gang gis bskur ba de'i shi ba'i yo byad du rung bar byin gyis rlob par byed na/ nyes par byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/ /dge slong gis dge slong la chos gos dag bskur bar
