170b6('dul ba): par spyad pa yin no/ /dge slong gis dge slong la chos gos dag bskur ba na/ gang la bskur ba de ni/ shi la/ gang la bskur ba de'i shi pa'i yo byad du rung bar byin gyis rlob par byed na/
170b7('dul ba): legs par byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/ /gang gis bskur ba de'i shi ba'i yo byad du byin gyis rlob par byed na/ nyes par byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/ /dge slong gis dge slong la chos
171a1('dul ba): gos dag bskur bar byed pa na/ gang la bskur ba des slar bzlog la/ gang gis bskur ba de yang shi nas gang la bskur ba de la yid gcugs pas spyod na/ nyes
171a2('dul ba): par spyad pa yin no/ /gang la bskur ba de'i shi ba'i yo byad rung bar byin gyis rlob par byed na/ legs par byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/ /dge slong gis dge slong la chos gos dag bskur
171a3('dul ba): par byed pa na/ gang la bskur ba des slar bzlog nas de shi la/ gang gis bskur bar byed pa de'ang shi na/ de'i shi ba'i yo byad du rung bar byin gyis rlob par byed na/ nyes par byin gyis brlabs
171a4('dul ba): pa yin no/ /gang gis bskur ba de'i shi ba'i yo byad du rung bar byin gyis rlob par byed na/ legs par byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/ /gos kyi gzhi rdzogs so// //sra brkyang gi gzhi'i sdom ni/ gnas bcas pa dang kha cig dang / /rdol pa dang ni blangs pa dang / /dus dang gang zag ma mo'i gzhi/ /nyi shu dag tu byas pa dang / /bgos pa dag ni bcu gnyis
171a5('dul ba): te| |gnas bcas dbyar gnas dam bcas pa/ /ston pa blta bar 'dod pa na'ang / /'dam rdzab kyis ni ngal gyur pa/ /de la der ni chos gos gnang / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
171a6('dul ba): rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dbyar bzhugs par zhal gyis bzhes so/ /de'i tshe dge slong rab tu mang po dag gnas bcas su dbyar gnas par
171b1('dul ba): dang bcas te/ dbyar gyi zla ba gsum po dag 'das nas chos gos byas pa dang ldan/ chos gos zin pa dang ldan nas lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te rtswa stug po dang rdzab chen por tsha bas ngal bar
171b2('dul ba): gyur cing / rdul gyis lus g.yogs bzhin du mnyan yod gang na bder rgyu zhing song ste/ rim gyis rgyu zhing song ba dang mnyan yod du phyin to/ /de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag gis chos gos
171b3('dul ba): dang lhung bzed mkhos su phab nas rkang pa bkrus te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong nas lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig
171b4('dul ba): tu 'dug go / chos nyid kyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ glo bur du lhags pa'i dge slong rnams la so so yang dag par dga' bar mdzad pa 'dis so so yang dag par dga' bar
171b5('dul ba): mdzad de/ dge slong dag /khyed da gzod gnas 'ongs/ gnas gang du dbyar gnas gnas/ btsun pa/ bdag cag ni/ gnas bcas nas da gzod mchis lags te/ bdag cag gnas
171b6('dul ba): bcas na dbyar mchis mchis lags so/ /dge slong dag /khyed cag gnas su ji gang zhes la reg par dbyar gnas sam/ bsod snyoms kyis brel bar ma gyur mod/ btsun pa/ mad
171b7('dul ba): par gsol to/ /bdag cag gnas bcas na bde ba la reg par dbyar gnas shing / bdag cag bsod snyoms kyis kyang brel ba ma mchis lags so/ /'on kyang bdag cag lhung bzed dang chos gos
172a1('dul ba): thogs te rtswa stug po dang rdzab chen por tsha bas ngal bar gyur cing / rdul gyis lus g.yogs pas ljongs rgyu zhing mchis te rim gyis rgyu zhing mchi ba na/ tshegs chen pos 'dir
172a2('dul ba): mchis lags so/ / //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po re bdun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs ba/ kye ma/ nga'i nyan thos rnams lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te rtswa stug bo
172a3('dul ba): dang rdzab chen por tsha bas ngal bar gyur cing / lus rdul gyis g.yogs pas ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba ni/ nyon mongs kyi/ ma la ngas dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang /
172a4('dul ba): sbyin pa po rnams kyi sbyin pa'i chos longs spyad par bya ba'i phyir dge slong rnams la sra brkyang gnang bar bya'o/ /'di ltar/ sra brkyang bting na/ phan yon lnga yod de/ zhag bcu las thal na
172a5('dul ba): ma yin pa dang / zla ba las thal na ma yin pa dang / nub mo bral na ma yin pa dang / blo gos mthang gos dang bcas pa'i chos gos kyis ljongs rgyur 'gro ba dang / chos gos rung ba ma yin pa ji
172a6('dul ba): tsam 'dod pa 'chang ba na ma yin pa'o/ /gzhan yang / phan yon lnga yod de/ tshogs shing za na ma yin pa dang / yang yang za na ma yin pa dang / khyim rnams su mgron du ma bos par 'gro na
172a7('dul ba): ma yin pa dang / ji tsam 'dod pa'i chos gos btsal ba dang / ston zla 'bring bo nas dpyid zla ra ba'i bar gyi nang der sra brkyang bting ba rnams kyi rnyed pa yin no/ /snyam du dgongs zhes
172b1('dul ba): dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ ngas rjes su gnang ste/ dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang / sbyin pa po rnams kyi sbyin pa'i chos longs spyod
172b2('dul ba): par bya ba'i phyir dbyar gnas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis sra brkyang gding bar bya'o/ /'di ltar/ sra brkyang la phan yon lnga yod de/ zhag bcu thal na ma yin pa dang zhes bya ba nas sra brkyang bting ba
172b3('dul ba): rnams kyi rnyed pa yin no/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis sra brkyang gding bar bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal na/ dge slong rnams kyis sra brkyang ji ltar gding ba ma shes
172b4('dul ba): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi chos gos kyi rnyed pa yod pa gang yin pa de las gding bar bya'o/ /gding ba ni/ 'di ltar bya ste/ re zhig thog mar mthun
172b5('dul ba): pa'i go ba bya ste/ chos gos 'di ni/ dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi chos gos kyi rnyed pa byung ba lags te/ gal te dge 'dun bzhed na/ chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang gding bar bya'o/ /de nas
172b6('dul ba): phyi de nyin gnas mal bshams nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/ dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang / dge slong gcig gis
172b7('dul ba): gsol ba byas te las bya'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ chos gos 'di ni/ dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi chos gos kyi rnyed pa byung ba lags te/ dge 'dun gyi chos gos 'dis sra
173a1('dul ba): brkyang bgyid nas sra brkyang gding bar bzhed na/ des na sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chas ba la chos gos rnying pa rnams dang 'bral ba yang mi 'byung na/ gsar pa rnams dang
173a2('dul ba): lta smos kyang ci 'tshal bar gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar/ dge 'dun gyis chos gos 'di sras brkyang du mdzad de/ chos
173a3('dul ba): gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'ding ngo / /des na sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas chas pa la chos gos rnying pa rnams dang 'bral ba yang mi 'byung na/ gsar pa rnams dang lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/
173a4('dul ba): 'di ni/ gsol ba'o/ /las ni 'dir ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnam gsan du gsol/ chos gos 'di ni/ dbyar gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa byung ba lags la/ dge 'dun yang
173a5('dul ba): sra brkyang bgyi bar bzhed de/ dge 'dun gyis chos gos 'di sra brkyang du mdzad pas chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyis ra brkyang 'ding ngo / /des na sras brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chas pa la
173a6('dul ba): chos gos rnying pa rnams dang 'bral ba yang mi 'byung na/ gsar pa rnams dang lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ tshe dang ldan pa rnams las/ gang dag chos gos 'di sras brkyang du bgyi zhing / chos gos 'dis
173a7('dul ba): dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang bting ste/ des na sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chas pa las chos gos rnying pa rnams dang 'bral ba yang mi 'byung na/ gsar pa rnams dang lta smos kyang ci 'tshal bar
173b1('dul ba): bzod pa de dag ni/ cang ma gsungs shing / gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni/ gsungs shig /dge 'dun gyis chos gos sras brkyang du mdzad nas chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi sras brkyang 'ding ste/
173b2('dul ba): des na sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chas pa las chos gos rnying pa rnams dang 'bral ba yang mi 'byung na/ gsar pa rnams dang lta smos kyang ci 'tshal bar dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas 'di
173b3('dul ba): ltar/ cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /de'i 'og tu sra brkyang 'ding ba'i dge slong bsko bar bya ste/ chos lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong ni/ sra brkyang 'ding par ma bskos pa ni/ bsko bar mi
173b4('dul ba): bya zhing / bskos pa ni/ dbyung bar bya'o/ /lnga gang zhe na/ dbyar gyi ma yin pa dang / dbyar ral ba dang / dbyar phyi mar gnas par dam bcas pa dang / dbyar tha dad par gnas pa dang / bslab pa byin pa'o/ /
173b5('dul ba): gzhan yang / chos lnga dang ldan na/ bsko bar mi bya ste/ spo ba pa dang / gzhi nas spo ba pa dang / mgu bar bya ba spyod pa dang / gzhi nas mgu bar bya ba spyod ba dang / gnas nas phyung ba'o/ /gzhan yang / chos lnga
173b6('dul ba): dang ldan na/ bsko bar mi bya ste/ 'dun pas 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba dang / sras brkyang bting ba dang ma bting ba mi shes pa'o/ /yang / /chos
173b7('dul ba): lnga dang ldan pa'i dge slong ni/ sras brkyang 'ding par ma bskos pa ni/ bsko bar bya zhing / bskos pa ni/ dbyung bar mi bya'o/ /lnga gang zhe na/ 'dun pas mi 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang / gti mug
174a1('dul ba): gis mi 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas mi 'gro ba dang / sra brkyang bting ba dang ma bting ba shes pa'o/ /bsko ba ni/ 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bshams te zhes bya ba nas dge
174a2('dul ba): 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ re zhig thog mar spro bar bya ste/ ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod/ dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'ding bar spro'am
174a3('dul ba): gal te spro na/ des spro'o/ /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ sra brkyang 'ding ba'i dge slong
174a4('dul ba): ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ dge 'dun gyis sras brkyang 'ding par spro na/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang par mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar dge 'dun gyis
174a5('dul ba): dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba sra brkyang 'ding bar bskos te/ sra brkyang 'ding pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba/ dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'ding par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni/ gsol ba'o/ /las ni/ 'di ltar
174a6('dul ba): bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ sra brkyang 'ding pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'ding par spro na/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba/
174a7('dul ba): sra brkyang 'ding par bskos te/ sra brkyang 'ding pa ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'ding bar 'gyur na/ tshe dang ldan pa rnams las/ gang dag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba sra brkyang 'ding
174b1('dul ba): par bsko bar bzo pa de dag ni/ cang ma gsungs shig /gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni/ gsungs shig /dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang 'ding pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba/ dge
174b2('dul ba): 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'ding bar bskos te/ 'di ltar/ cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /de nas gsol bas sras brkyang 'ding pa'i dge slong la sra brkyang sbyin par bya'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams
174b3('dul ba): gsan du gsol/ dge 'dun gyis chos gos 'di ni/ sra brkyang du mdzad lags la/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di yang sra brkyang 'ding par bskos lags te/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab
174b4('dul ba): cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la chos gos 'di sra brkyang gi slad du stsal to/ /'di ni/ gsol ba'o/ /ngas dge slong
174b5('dul ba): sra brkyang 'ding ba'i kun tu spyod pa'i chos dag bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong sras brkyang 'ding pas sra brkyang la thams cad du thog mar 'gro bar bya ste/ bkru'o/ /brkyang ngo / /dra'o/ /drub bo/ /kha sgyur ro/ /chung ngu na
174b6('dul ba): khab kyis srub gnyis sam/ gsum yang btsem par bya'o/ /lan gnyis sam gsum du sems bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas ston zla 'bring po zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes bco lnga la go bar bya ste/ tshe dang ldan pa
174b7('dul ba): dag / sang kho bos sra brkyang 'ding gi /khyed cag so so'i chos gos sngags phyung zhig /de nas sra brkyang 'ding pa'i dge slong gis/ sra brkyang dri dang me tog gis gtor zhing / dri zhim po'i bdug pas
175a1('dul ba): bdugs nas gnas mal bshams te/ gaN+Di brdungs nas dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/ dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur
175a2('dul ba): pa dang rgan pa'i mthar gzhag par bya'o/ /de nas rgan pa'i mthar 'dug nas sra brkyang blangs te/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge 'dun gyis chos gos 'di ni/ sra brkyang du mdzad
175a3('dul ba): la| bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yang / sra brkyang 'ding bar bskos te/ sra brkyang 'ding pa bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang 'ding bar 'gyur ro/ /gding
175a4('dul ba): ngo| |bting ngo / /de skad lan gnyis lan gsum du brjod par bya'o/ /de nas bting nas dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi mdun du 'dug ste 'di skad ces/ /gnas brtan dgongs su gsol
175a5('dul ba): chos gos 'di ni/ dge 'dun gyis sras brkyang du mdzad la/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yang / sra brkyang 'ding bar bskos pa lags te/ bdag gis chos gos 'dis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang bting
175a6('dul ba): lags so/ /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /des/ legs par bting ngo / /shin tu bting ste/ 'di la rnyed pa dang / phan yon yod pa gang yin pa de ni/ bdag cag gi yin no/ /zhes brjod par bya zhing / de bzhin
175a7('dul ba): du lan gnyis lan gsum du dge 'dun gsar bu'i bar du thams cad kyis legs par bting ngo / /shin tu bting ste/ 'di la rnyed pa dang / phan yon yod pa gang yin pa de ni/ bdag cag gi yin
175b1('dul ba): no| |zhes brjod par bya'o/ /sra brkyang 'ding ba'i dge slong gis sra brkyang thogs te/ chab khung sar ma yin/ snam phyi sar ma yin te/ tshang bang du 'jug par mi bya'o/ /mtshams kyi phyi rol du 'gro bar mi bya'o
175b2('dul ba): gal te song na/ der gnas par mi bya'o/ /sra brkyang 'ding ba'i dge slong gis kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na/ 'gal tsha bas can du 'gyur ro/ /
175b3('dul ba): de nas sra brkyang 'ding ba'i dge slong gis dpyid zla ra ba zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes bco lnga la yang go bar bya ste/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /sang kho bo sra brkyang 'byin gyi/ khyed cag so so'i chos gos rnams byin gyis
175b4('dul ba): rlobs shig / de la rnyed pa byung ba gang yin pa de ni/ dge 'dun gyis bgo bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa/ du zhig gi sra brkyang ma bting
175b5('dul ba): lags/ nye bar 'khor/ lnga'i ste/ dbyar gyi ma yin pa dang / dbyar ral ba dang / dbyar phyi mar gnas par dam bcas pa dang / dbyar tha dad par gnas par dam bcas pa dang / sra brkyang de 'ding ba
175b6('dul ba): na mngon sum du ma gyur pa'i'o/ /gzhan yang / 'di lnga'i ma bting ba yin te/ spo ba pa dang / spo ba spyad zin pa dang / mgu bar bya ba spyod pa dang / mgu bar bya ba spyad zin pa dang / bslab pa byin pa'i'o/ /
175b7('dul ba): btsun pa/ du zhig gi rnyed pa mchis la/ phan yon ma mchis lags/ nye bar 'khor/ lnga'i ste/ dbyar gyi ma yin pa dang / dbyar ral ba dang / dbyar phyi mar gnas par dam bcas pa dang / dbyar tha dad par bcas
176a1('dul ba): pa dang / sra brkyang de 'ding ba na mngon sum du ma gyur pa'i'o/ /gzhan yang / lnga po 'di dag gi ste/ spo ba pa dang / spo ba spyad zin pa dang / mgu bar bya ba spyod pa dang / mgu bar
176a2('dul ba): bya ba spyad zin pa dang / bslab pa byin pa'i'o/ /btsun pa/ du zhig gi rnyed pa yang ma mchis la/ phan yon yang ma mchis lags/ nye bar 'khor/ lnga'i ste/ ma mthong bas gnas nas phyung ba dang /
176a3('dul ba): phyir mi byed pas gnas nas phyung ba dang / sdig pa'i lta bar song ba ma bor bas gnas nas phyung ba dang / dbyar tha dad par gnas pa dang / dge 'dun dbye na chos ma yin pa'i phyogs pa'i'o/ /dge
176a4('dul ba): slong rab tu mang po dag ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba na chom rkun pa rnams kyis bcom nas/ de dag rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas tshe dang ldan pa dag /'ongs pa
176a5('dul ba): legs so/ /'ongs pa legs so/ /ji ga bde bar spyad dam/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /bde bar spyad pa ni/ ci 'dra ba zhig /bdag cag ni/ chom rkun pa rnams kyis bcom mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag/
176a6('dul ba): bdag cag la rnyed pa mang du byung ste/ gal te sra brkyang phyung na/ khyed la chos gos kyi bgo bsha' bya ba zhig ces pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / bcom
176a7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na/ rjes su gnang ste/ chom rkun pa dag gis bcom pa'i dge slong rnams kyi phyir sra brkyang dbyung bar bya'o/ /dbyung ba ni/ 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas
176b1('dul ba): mal bshams la gaN+Di brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/ dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/
176b2('dul ba): dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gnas 'dir dge 'dun mthun pas 'di srid du sra brkyang bting ba las/ dge slong rab tu mang po chom rkun pa dag gis bcom nas lhags na/ gal te dge 'dun
176b3('dul ba): gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / 'di ltar/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong chom rkun gyis bcom pa rnams kyi slad du sra brkyang 'byin par mdzad do/ /'di ni/ gsol
176b4('dul ba): ba'o/ /las ni/ 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ gnas 'dir dge 'dun mthun pas 'di srid du sra brkyang bting ba las/ dge slong rab tu mang po chom rkun pa dag gis bcom
176b5('dul ba): nas lhags te/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong chom rkun pa dag gis bcom pa rnams kyi slad du sra brkyang 'byin par mdzad na/ tshe dang ldan pa dag las/ gang dag dge slong chom rkun pa dag gis bcom pa
176b6('dul ba): rnams kyi phyir sra brkyang 'byin par bzod pa de dag ni/ cang ma gsungs shig /gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni/ gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis dge slong
176b7('dul ba): chom rkun pa dag gis bcom pa rnams kyi slad du sra brkyang 'byin par mdzad de/ gang gi slad du cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /de nas rnyed pa byung ba gang yin pa de/ bgo bar bya ste/
177a1('dul ba): bgos nas gang 'dod pa des rang gi skal pa las chom rkun pa dag gis bcom pa'i dge slong rnams la bgo bsha' bya'o/ /sdom la/ rdol pa dang ni sril zos dang /
177a2('dul ba): mtha' skor lhan rlo lhan ring dang / /gso ma'i seng ras zegs pa dang / /rnying dang spangs dang dengs pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun
177a3('dul ba): pa| chos gos rdol pas sra brkyang gding du rung lags sam/ nye bar 'khor/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ chos gos srog chags kyis 'tshal pa dang / chos gos cha ga btab pa dang / chos gos
177a4('dul ba): lhan pa rlo bos btab pa dang / chos gos lhan ring can dang / gso ma'i seng ras kyi chos gos dang / chos gos zegs pa dang / chos gos rnying pa dang / chos gos spangs pa dang / chos gos
177a5('dul ba): dengs pas sra brkyang gding du rung lags sam/ nye bar 'khor/ mi rung ngo / /sdom la/ blings dang dus ma yin pa dang / /gang zag gi ni chos gos gsum/ /mi rung ba dang ma dras dang / /
177a6('dul ba): khru lngar ma chog mi bya dang / /blo mthun min dang mi gding dang / /mtshams kyi phyi rol mi skye'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa/
177a7('dul ba): blings pa'i chos gos kyis sra brkyang gding du rung lags sam/ nye bar 'khor/ mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ dus ma lags pa'i chos gos dang / gang zag gi snam sbyar dang / bla gos dang /
177b1('dul ba): mthang gos dang / mi rung ba'i chos gos dang / ma dras pa dang / khru lnga ma mchis pa dang / blo mthun par ma bgyis pa'i chos gos dang / sra brkyang 'ding ba ma bskos pa dang / mtshams kyi slad
177b2('dul ba): rol du blo mthun par bgyis pa'i chos gos kyi sra brkyang dang / mtshams kyi slad rol tu bskos pa'i sra brkyang 'ding bas/ sra brkyang gding du rung lags sam/ nye bar 'khor/ mi rung ngo / /sdom
177b3('dul ba): la| dus kyi dang ni zla ba gsum/ /gsar pa dang ni brtags pa nyid/ /phongs pa dang ni gso ma'i ras/ /gang zag gi ni chos gos gsum/ /btsun pa/ dus kyi chos gos kyis dge 'dun gyi sra brkyang
177b4('dul ba): gding du rung lags sam/ nye bar 'khor/ rung ngo / /btsun pa/ dgung zla gsum 'das nas dge 'dun gyi chos gos kyi rnyed pa gang lags pa des/ sra brkyangs gding du rung lags sam/ nye bar 'khor/
177b5('dul ba): rung ngo / /chos gos gsar pa rung ngo / /gsar pa brtags pa rung ngo / /phongs pa'i chos gos rung ngo / /gso ma'i seng ras snam sbyar mi rung ngo / /btsun pa/ gang zag gi snam sbyar gyis sra brkyang
177b6('dul ba): gding du rung lags sam/ nye bar 'khor/ gal te dge 'dun la phul bar gyur na rung ngo / /bla gos dang mthang gos kyang de bzhin no/ /sdom la/ gang zag gi dang khyim pa dang / khru lnga pa dang khru
177b7('dul ba): lnga'i lhag / blo mthun byas pa'i gding ba dang / /mtshams kyi nang nyid skye ba'o/ /btsun pa/ gang zag gi chos gos kyis sra brkyang gding du rung lags sam/ mi rung ngo / /gal te dge 'dun la
178a1('dul ba): phul bar gyur na'o/ /khyim pa'i gos kyis mi rung ngo / /gal te dge 'dun la phul bar gyur na rung ngo / /khru lnga pas rung ngo / /khru lnga las lhag pas rung ngo / /blo mthun
178a2('dul ba): par byas pa'i sra brkyang gi chos gos dang sra brkyang 'ding bas rung ngo / /mtshams kyi nang du blo mthun par byas pa'i sra brkyang gi chos gos kyis rung ngo / /mtshams kyi nang du sra brkyang
178a3('dul ba): 'ding pa bskos pas rung ngo / /ma mo brgyad kyi gzhis sra brkyang phyung bar 'gyur te/ brgyad gang zhe na/ song ba dang / rdzogs pa dang / nges pa dang / nyams pa dang / thos pa dang / mtshams
178a4('dul ba): 'das pa dang / re thag chad pa dang / brgyad pa ni/ sra brkyang phyung ba nyid de/ song ba'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba dang / rdzogs pa'i mtha' can dang / nges pa'i mtha' can dang / nyams
178a5('dul ba): pa'i mtha' can dang / thos pa'i mtha' can dang / mtshams 'das pa dang / re thag chad pa dang / brgyad pa ni/ sra brkyang phyung zin pa nyid yin no/ /song ba'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung
178a6('dul ba): ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par lhung bzed dang chos gos blangs te phyir mi 'ong bar mtshams kyi phyi rol
178a7('dul ba): tu song ba de'i ni/ song ba'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos
178b1('dul ba): gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas phyir 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o/ /snyam pa las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag slar mi 'ong ste/ 'on kyang chos gos bya'o//
178b2('dul ba): snyam pa de'i ni/ rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /nges pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma
178b3('dul ba): byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o/ /snyam pa las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong zhing chos gos kyang mi bya'o/ /snyam pa de'i
178b4('dul ba): ni| nges pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos
178b5('dul ba): gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o/ /snyam pa las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar yang mi 'ong la chos gos kyang mi bya'o/ /snyam nas/
178b6('dul ba): des de rtsom zhing brtsams pa dang nyams pa de'i ni/ nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /thos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge
178b7('dul ba): slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ongs te chos gos bya'o/ /snyam pa las/ dge 'dun mthun pas sra
179a1('dul ba): brkyang phyung la/ des dge 'dun mthun pas sra brkyang phyung ngo / /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang legs par phyung ngo / /shin tu phyung ngo / /zhes rjes su yi rang ba byas
179a2('dul ba): pa de'i ni/ thos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /mtshams 'das pa pa'i sra brkyang phyung ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma
179a3('dul ba): byas/ chos gos ma zin par phyir 'ong ngam mi 'od snyam pa las/ mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song ba de'i ni/ mtshams 'das pa pa'i sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /re thag chad pa pa'i sra brkyang
179a4('dul ba): phyung ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o/ /snyam
179a5('dul ba): pa las/ de'i chos gos re ba gang yin pa de/ thams cad kyi thams cad du chad pa de'i ni/ re thag chad pa pa'i sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /brgyad pa sra brkyang phyung ba nyid gang zhe na/
179a6('dul ba): 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song ba las/ de yang slar 'ongs shing sra brkyang phyung ba nyams
179a7('dul ba): su myong ba de'i ni/ brgyad pa sra brkyang phyung ba nyid yin no/ /sdom la/ ma byas pa ni nyi shu dang / /brtsams pa dag ni nyi shu dang / /re ba yod pa nyi shu dang / /re ba med pa nyi shu yin/ /
179b1('dul ba): 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o/ /snyam pa las/ de 'di snyam
179b2('dul ba): du sems te/ slar mi 'ong mod kyi/ 'on kyang chos gos bya'o/ /snyam pa de'i ni/ rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas
179b3('dul ba): chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o/ /snyam pa las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong zhing chos gos kyang mi bya'o/ /
179b4('dul ba): snyam pa de'i ni/ nges pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu
179b5('dul ba): song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o/ /snyam pa las/ des de rtsom zhing de'i brtsams pa nyams pa de'i ni/ nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong sra
179b6('dul ba): brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o/ /snyam pa las/ dge 'dun mthun pas sra brkyang phyung
179b7('dul ba): la| des dge 'dun mthun pas sra brkyang phyung ngo / /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang legs par phyung ngo / /shin tu phyung ngo / /zhes rjes su yi rang ba byas pa de'i ni/ thos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra
180a1('dul ba): brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong
180a2('dul ba): zhing chos gos bya'o/ /snyam pa las/ de der song nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong zhing / 'on kyang chos gos ni bya'o/ /snyam pa de'i ni/ rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba
180a3('dul ba): yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o/ /snyam pa las/
180a4('dul ba): de der song nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong zhing chos gos kyang mi bya'o/ /snyam pa de'i ni/ nges pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting
180a5('dul ba): ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o/ /snyam pa las/ de der song nas rtsom zhing de'i brtsams pa nyams pa
180a6('dul ba): de'i ni/ nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song
180a7('dul ba): nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o/ /snyam pa las/ dge 'dun mthun pas sra brkyang phyung la/ des dge 'dun mthun pas sra brkyang phyung ngo / /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang legs
180b1('dul ba): par phyung ngo / /shin tu phyung ngo / /zhes rjes su yi rang ba byas pa de'i ni/ thos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong gis sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos
180b2('dul ba): gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o/ /zhes sems la bzhag pa las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong zhing / 'on kyang chos gos bya'o/ /snyam pa de'i ni/
180b3('dul ba): rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas de slar 'ong zhing chos
180b4('dul ba): gos bya'o/ /zhes sems la bzhag pa las/ de der song nas 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong zhing chos gos kyang mi bya'o/ /snyam pa de ni/ nges pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta
180b5('dul ba): ste| dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o/ /zhes sems la bzhag pa las/ des de rtsom zhing
180b6('dul ba): de'i brtsams pa nyams pa de'i ni/ nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi
180b7('dul ba): rol tu song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o/ /zhes sems la bzhag pa las/ dge 'dun mthun pas sra brkyang phyung la/ des dge 'dun mthun pas sra brkyang phyung ngo / /zhes thos so/ /thos
181a1('dul ba): nas kyang legs par phyung ngo / /shin tu phyung ngo / /zhes rjes su yi rang ba byas pa de'i ni/ thos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong sra
181a2('dul ba): brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o/ /zhes sems la bzhag pa las/ de der song nas 'di snyam
181a3('dul ba): du sems te/ slar mi 'ong ste/ 'on kyang chos gos bya'o/ /snyam pa de'i ni/ rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma
181a4('dul ba): byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o/ /zhes sems la bzhag pa las/ de der song nas 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong zhing chos
181a5('dul ba): gos kyang mi bya'o/ /snyam pa de'i ni/ nges pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams
181a6('dul ba): kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o/ /zhes sems la bzhag pa las/ de der song nas rtsom zhing de'i brtsams pa nyams pa de'i ni/ nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba
181a7('dul ba): yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o/ /zhes sems la bzhag
181b1('dul ba): pa las/ dge 'dun mthun pas sra brkyang phyung la/ des dge 'dun mthun pas sra brkyang phyung ngo / /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang legs par phyung ngo / /shin tu phyung ngo / /zhes rjes su yi rang ba byas pa de'i ni/
181b2('dul ba): thos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par ci slar 'ong ngam/ 'on te slar mi 'ong zhes sems
181b3('dul ba): la the tshom za bzhin mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song ba las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong ste/ 'on kyang chos gos ni bya'o/ /snyam pa 'di'i ni/ rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /
181b4('dul ba): 'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par ci slar 'ong ngam/ 'on te slar mi 'ong zhes sems la the tshom za bzhin du mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song ba
181b5('dul ba): las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong zhing chos gos kyang mi bya'o/ /snyam pa de'i ni/ nges pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas
181b6('dul ba): chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par ci slar 'ong ngam/ 'on te slar mi 'ong zhes sems la the tshom za bzhin mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song ba las/ des de rtsom zhing de'i brtsams pa nyams pa de'i
181b7('dul ba): ni| nyams pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par ci slar 'ong ngam/ 'on te slar mi 'ong
182a1('dul ba): zhes sems la the tshom za bzhin mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song ba las/ dge 'dun mthun pas sra brkyang phyung la/ des dge 'dun mthun pas sra brkyang phyung ngo / /
182a2('dul ba): zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang legs par phyung ngo / /shin tu phyung ngo / /zhes rjes su yi rang ba byas pa de'i ni/ thos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang
182a3('dul ba): bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas zhes bya ba thams cad brjod par bya'o/ /'on kyang snga ma'i nyi shu la ni chos gos ma byas/ chos gos
182a4('dul ba): ma zin par zhes bya'o/ /'dir ni/ chos gos ma zin par zhes bya ba bor te/ chos gos brtsams pa zhes bya ba bcug ste/ rnam pa 'dis nyi shu pa gzhan bya'o/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting
182a5('dul ba): ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o/ /snyam pa'i re ba yod pa las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong ste/ 'on
182a6('dul ba): kyang chos gos ni bya'o/ /snyam pa de'i ni/ rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin te/ re ba yod pa zhes bya ba'i khyad par 'dis snga ma bzhin du nyi shu pa gzhan bya'o/ /'di lta ste/ dge
182a7('dul ba): slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o/ /snyam pa'i re ba med par mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song ba las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/
182b1('dul ba): slar mi 'ong zhing 'on kyang chos gos ni bya'o/ /snyam pa de'i ni/ rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin te/ re ba med pa zhes bya ba'i khyad par 'dis/ snga ma bzhin du nyi shu pa gzhan bya'o/ /sdom la/ bya
182b2('dul ba): ba dag ni bcu gnyis dang / /btsal ba dang ni de bzhin gzhan/ /yul la lngar ni bya ba ste/ /gnas mal yang ni lnga yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos
182b3('dul ba): gos ma zin par bya ba zhig la mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o/ /snyam pa las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong ste/ 'on kyang chos gos ni bya'o/ /snyam pa de'i ni/ rdzogs
182b4('dul ba): pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par bya ba zhig la mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong zhing chos
182b5('dul ba): gos bya'o/ /snyam pa las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong zhing chos gos kyang mi bya'o/ /snyam pa de'i ni/ nges pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting
182b6('dul ba): ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par bya ba zhig la mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o/ /snyam pa las/ des de rtsom zhing de brtsams pa nyams pa de'i ni/ nyams
182b7('dul ba): ba'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par bya ba zhig la mtshams kyi phyi rol du song nas slar 'ong zhing chos
183a1('dul ba): gos bya'o/ /snyam pa las/ dge 'dun mthun pas sra brkyang phyung la/ des dge 'dun mthun pas sra brkyang phyung ngo / /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang legs par phyung ngo / /
183a2('dul ba): shin tu phyung ngo / /zhes rjes su yi rang ba byas pa de'i ni/ thos pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma
183a3('dul ba): zin par bya ba zhig la mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o/ /snyam pa las/ de der song nas 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong ste/ 'on kyang chos gos ni bya'o/ /snyam
183a4('dul ba): pa de'i ni/ rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /der song nas zhes bya ba'i khyad par 'dis rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi gsungs pa ji lta ba bzhin du nges pa'i mtha' can dang / nyams
183a5('dul ba): pa'i mtha' can dang / thos pa'i mtha' can yang de bzhin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par bya ba zhig gi ched la mtshams kyi phyi
183a6('dul ba): rol tu song nas/ ci slar 'ong ngam/ 'on te slar mi 'ong zhes sems la the tshom za ba las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong ste/ 'on kyang chos gos bya'o snyam pa de'i ni/ rdzogs pa'i mtha'
183a7('dul ba): can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /sems la the tshom za bas rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gsungs pa'i ji lta bar nges pa'i mtha' can dang / nyams pa'i mtha' can dang / thos pa'i mtha'
183b1('dul ba): can yang de bzhin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas chos gos ma zin par brtsal ba zhig la mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas/
183b2('dul ba): slar 'ong zhing chos gos bya'o/ /snyam pa las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong ste/ 'on kyang chos gos ni bya'o snyam pa de'i ni/ rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang
183b3('dul ba): phyung ba yin no/ /btsal ba'i zhes bya ba'i khyad par 'dis snga ma bzhin du bcu gnyis pa gzhan no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos
183b4('dul ba): gos ma zin par slar mi 'ong bar yul bltar mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song ba de'i ni/ song ba'i mtha' can kyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong sra brkyang bting ba'i
183b5('dul ba): gnas nas chos gos ma byas/ chos gos ma zin par yul bltar mtshams kyi phyi rol tu song nas/ ci slar 'ong ngam/ 'on te slar mi 'ong zhes sems la the tshom za ba las/ de 'di
183b6('dul ba): snyam du sems te/ slar mi 'ong ste/ 'on kyang chos gos bya'o/ /snyam pa de'i ni/ rdzogs pa'i mtha' can gyi sra brkyang phyung ba yin te/ nges pa'i mtha' can dang / nyams pa'i
183b7('dul ba): mtha' can dang / thos pa'i mtha' can yang de bzhin no/ /yul lta ba'i lnga ji lta bar gnas lta ba'i lnga yang de bzhin no/ /sra brkyang gi gzhi rdzogs so// //
184a1('dul ba): 'dul ba gzhi/ bam po re brgyad pa/ bam po drug bcu brgyad pa/ko'u sham+b+hi'i gzhi'i sdom ni/ ko'u sham+b+hir ni 'thab krol gyi/ dge slong rtsod pa sna tshogs dang / /khye'u dang
184a2('dul ba): rtsod par byed pa dang / /ring po len gyi spyod pa dang / /ngan spong lan cha khang pa dang / /bsrungs dang tshal stug glang chen dang / /ma 'gag pas ni de byas dang / /mnyan yod du ni zhi bar byas/ /
184a3('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ko'u sham+b+hi'i dbyangs ldan gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe ko'u sham+b+hi'i dge slong gdug pa rnam par gnon pa/ mdo sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa/
184a4('dul ba): ma mo 'dzin pa zhig yod de/ de'i grogs byed pa'i dge slong mang po yang gdug pa rnam par gnon pa/ mdo sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ ma mo 'dzin pa yin no/ /yangs pa can na/ yangs
184a5('dul ba): pa can gyi dge slong gdug pa rnam par gnon pa/ mdo sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ ma mo 'dzin pa zhig yod de/ de'i grogs byed pa'i dge slong mang po yang gdug pa rnam par gnon
184a6('dul ba): pa| mdo sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ ma mo 'dzin pa yin no/ /de nas yangs pa can gyi dge slong dus gzhan zhig na/ ljongs rgyu zhing song ba dang / ko'u sham+b+hir phyin te/ de lam gyis
184a7('dul ba): dub pa ngal sos nas/ ko'u sham+b+hi'i dge slong gi drung du song ste son ba dang / phan tshun so so yang dag par dga' bar byas nas/ mdo sde dang / 'dul ba dang / chos mngon pa rnams gtan
184b1('dul ba): la dbab par brtsams te/ de na gcig gis smras pa/ mdo sde 'di ni/ 'di skad du gdon par bya ste/ mdo sde 'di'i don ni/ 'di yin no/ /gcig shos kyis smras pa/ mdo sde 'di ni/ de skad du gdon
184b2('dul ba): par mi bya ste/ mdo sde 'di'i don ni/ 'di ma yin no/ /kho bo'i ni/ rigs so/ /khyod kyi ni/ mi rigs so/ /kho bo'i ni/ 'brel ba yin no/ /khyod kyi ni/ 'brel ba ma yin no/ /zhes de gnyis phan tshun du ma
184b3('dul ba): mthun par gyur nas/ ko'u sham+b+hi'i dge slong gis yangs pa can gyi dge slong la klan ka tshol ba lhur len cing 'dug go/ dge 'dun gyis kyang 'di lta bu'i khrims su bca' ba byas te/ gang gis khrus kyi
184b4('dul ba): bum pa chu 'grib pa dang / nyung ba dang / chu med pa mthong ba des chus bkang ste gnas ji lta ba bzhin du gzhag par bya ba'am/ dge bskos la khrus kyi bum pa stong par 'dug go/ zhes bsgo bar bya'o/ /gal
184b5('dul ba): te bdag nyid kyis ma bkang ngam/ dge bskos la ma bsgo bar gyur na/ de ni/ ma gus pa yin te/ ma gus pa'i phyir de bdag cag gis ltung byed kyi ltung ba 'chag su gzhug go zhes bcas so/ /ji tsam
184b6('dul ba): na khyim bdag cig gis sangs rgyas la sogs dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs so/ /de na dge slong kha cig ni/ zas la dong ngo / /kha cig ni/ 'gro bar chas so/ /yangs pa can
184b7('dul ba): gyi dge slong khrus kyi bum pa blangs nas snam phyi sar zhugs pa dang / de'i lhan cig gnas pas rings rings ltar 'ongs nas sgra phyung ba/ mkhan po/ dge slong kha cig ni/ zas la dong lags so/ /
185a1('dul ba): kha cig ni/ 'dong bar chas kyi/ tshur spyon/ bzhud do/ /de de dang lhan cig khrus kyi bum pa gnas gcig tu bzhag ste chas so/ /ko'u sham+b+hi'i dge slong de yang phyogs
185a2('dul ba): de nyid du phyin pa dang / de nas yangs pa can gyi dge slong des khrus kyi bum pa blangs te/ gtsug lag khang du 'jug par brtsams pa dang / lhan cig gnas pas smras pa/ mkhan po gar bzhud/ des
185a3('dul ba): smras pa/ bu/ kho bo la ko'u sham+b+hi'i dge slong 'di klan ka chog pas khrus kyi bum pa 'gangs su 'gro'o/ /ci/ 'di thams cad kyi thams cad du stong ngam/ thams cad kyi thams cad du stong pa
185a4('dul ba): ma yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang chu 'dis chu'i bya ba byed mi nus so/ /mkhan po/ thams cad kyi thams cad du stong par ma gyur pas 'tshal te/ bdag cag ni/ mkhan po'i phyogs dang / dpung dang / grogs
185a5('dul ba): bgyid pa lags kyi/ tshur spyon/ bzhud do/ /des de nyid du bzhag nas de dang lhan cig tu dong ngo / /ko'u sham+b+hi'i dge slong gis mthong nas/ khrus kyi bum pa de la mnams so/ /de nas mi bzod pa
185a6('dul ba): skyes te/ 'jal to zhes byas nas khrus kyi bum pa bkang ste chu'i bya ba byas nas song ngo / /de nas zan zos nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gtsug lag khang du lhags pa dang / dge slong rnams la bsgrags
185a7('dul ba): pa| tshe dang ldan pa dag/ yangs pa can gyi dge slong des/ dge 'dun gyi nang khrims dral to/ /de nas rgan rim ji lta ba bzhin du 'dud pa byas nas rim gyis de'i drung du son pa dang smras pa/ tshe dang
185b1('dul ba): ldan pa skabs phye zhig/ ltung ba ris lnga la skabs phye'o/ /khyod la de ring ltung ba byung gi/ ltung ba yang slar chos bzhin du gyis shig/ ltung ba ma mthong ngo / /dge 'dun gyis khrims su bca' ba
185b2('dul ba): gang gis khrus kyi bum pa chu 'grib pa dang / chu nyung ba dang / chu med pa mthong na/ bdag nyid kyis chus bkang ste/ gnas ji lta ba bzhin du gzhag par bya ba'am/ dge bskos la tshe dang ldan pa/
185b3('dul ba): khrus kyi bum pa stong par 'dug go zhes bsgo bar bya'o/ /bdag nyid kyis kyang ma bkang la dge bskos la yang ma bsgo na/ de ni/ ma gus pa yin te/ ma gus pa'i phyir de bdag cag gis ltung byed
185b4('dul ba): kyi ltung ba 'chags su gzhug go/ zhes bcas pa ma yin nam/ des smras pa/ de ha cang stong pa ma yin no/ /stong par ma gyur kyang rung ste/ chu des chu'i bya ba byed mi nus so/ /de cang mi smra bar
185b5('dul ba): 'dug go/ ko'u sham+bi'i dge slong ni/ ko'u sham+b+hi na gnyug ma pa dang / 'khor mang po yin pas/ des de la nan gyis gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas pa dang / yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams
185b6('dul ba): 'khrugs par gyur nas/ de na ko'u sham+b+hi'i dge slong rnams dang / 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung bar gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ ltung ba byung ngo zhe'am/
185b7('dul ba): ltung ba ma byung ngo zhe'am/ gnas nas dbyung ba yin zhe'am/ gnas nas dbyung ba ma yin no/ /zhes gang yang ltung ba byung ba dang / ltung ba med pa dang / gnas nas dbyung ba dang /
186a1('dul ba): gnas nas dbyung ba ma yin pa la/ gnas nas phyung ba gang yin pa ni/ chos ma yin pa'i las 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os pas phyung ngo zhes pa'i skabs de/ dge
186a2('dul ba): slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong dang / gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang /
186a3('dul ba): gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i yang rjes su phyogs pa rnams pho nyas bkug ste/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dge slong dag /khyed 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang /
186a4('dul ba): rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung nas 'di lta ste/ ltung ba byung ngo zhe'am zhes bya ba nas 'khrugs pa gzhag par 'os pas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ bden nam/ btsun pa
186a5('dul ba): mad lags so/ /dge slong dag /'thab krol ma byed cig /mtshang ma 'dru zhig /ma rtsod cig /ma 'gyed cig /gzhan yang / ngas gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong gi kun tu
186a6('dul ba): spyad pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong gnas nas phyung bas 'di snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o/ /gnas nas 'byin pa'i dge slong 'di ni/ gdug pa rnam par gnon pa/ mdo
186a7('dul ba): sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ ma mo 'dzin pa yin la/ de'i grogs byed pa'i dge slong mang po yang gdug pa pha rol gnon pa/ mdo sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ ma mo 'dzin
186b1('dul ba): pa yin te/ gal te bdag gis ltung ba chos bzhin slar ma byas na/ des na dge 'dun 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung bas gnas par 'gyur gyi/ ma la bdag
186b2('dul ba): gis ltung ba phyir chos bzhin du bya'o/ /gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong gi kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur
186b3('dul ba): ro| |de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong dang / gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang / gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i yang rjes su
186b4('dul ba): phyogs pa rnams gzengs bstod nas/ gnas nas 'byin pa'i dge slong dang / gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang / gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i yang
186b5('dul ba): rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams pho nyas bkug ste/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dge slong dag /khyed 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung nas/ 'di
186b6('dul ba): lta ste/ ltung ba byung ngo zhe'am zhes bya ba nas gzhag par 'os pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ bden nam/ btsun pa/ mad lags so/ /dge slong dag /'thab krol ma byed
186b7('dul ba): cig / mtshang ma 'dru zhig /ma rtsod cig /ma 'gyed cig /gzhan yang / ngas gnas nas 'byin pa'i dge slong gi kun du spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ gnas nas 'byin pa'i
187a1('dul ba): dge slong gis 'di snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o/ /gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong 'di ni/ gdug pa rnam par gnon pa/ mdo sde 'dzin pa dang / 'dul ba 'dzin pa
187a2('dul ba): dang / ma mo 'dzin pa yin la/ 'di'i grogs byed pa'i dge slong mang po yang gdug pa rnam par gnon pa/ mdo sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ ma mo 'dzin pa yin gyi/ gal te bdag gis de
187a3('dul ba): la mi 'dod pa gleng ngam dran par byas na/ des na dge 'dun 'thab krol dang / rtsod pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'gyed pa byung bas gnas par 'gyur gyi/ ma la bdag gis 'di la mi
187a4('dul ba): 'dod pa gleng bar mi bya/ dran par mi bya'o/ /gnas nas 'byin pa'i dge slong gis kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin du yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na/ 'gal
187a5('dul ba): tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal na/ 'on kyang dge slong de rnams 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung
187a6('dul ba): bas gnas shing / da dung gso sbyong la yang gso sbyong ma yin par byed pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
187a7('dul ba): gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong dang / gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang / gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i yang rjes su phyogs pa rnams pho nyas
187b1('dul ba): bkug ste/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dge slong dag /khyed la ngas de skad ces bka' stsal kyang / 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung bas gnas
187b2('dul ba): shing / da dung gso sbyong la yang gso sbyong ma yin par byed pa bden nam/ btsun pa/ mad lags so/ /dge slong dag /'thab krol ma byed cig /mtshang ma 'dru zhig /ma rtsod cig /ma
187b3('dul ba): 'gyed cig / dge slong dag /khyed cag 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung zhing gnas nas/ las su bya ba gang dag yin pa gso sbyong dang / dgag dbye
187b4('dul ba): dang / gsol ba dang / gsol ba dang gnyis dang / gsol ba dang bzhi'i las byas pa rnams ma byas pa dang 'khrugs par 'gyur zhing / dge slong dag /khyed dang dge slong de rnams su de rnams
187b5('dul ba): dang khyed du tha dad du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag /gnyis po 'di dag ni/ tha dad par gnas pa yin te/ gang zhig bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid tha dad pa'i
187b6('dul ba): gnas su bzhag pa dang / gang zhig dge 'dun gyis chos kyis bzhag pa'o/ /bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid tha dad pa'i gnas su bzhag pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong / dge slong
187b7('dul ba): rnams 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung zhing phyogs dang phyogs gzhan du gnas pa na ched du bsam ste/ chos kyi phyogs nas chos ma yin pa'i phyogs
188a1('dul ba): su 'gro ba ste/ de lta bu ni/ bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid tha dad pa'i gnas su bzhag pa yin no/ /dge 'dun gyis chos kyis bzhag pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge 'dun
188a2('dul ba): gyis ma mthong bas gnas nas phyung ba dang / phyir mi byed pa dang / sdig pa can gyi lta bar song ba mi 'dor bar gnas nas dbyung ba ste/ 'di ni/ dge 'dun gyis chos kyis yin no/ /dge
188a3('dul ba): slong dag / gnyis po 'di dag ni/ mthun par gnas pa yin te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ gang zhig bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid mthun pa'i gnas su bzhag pa dang / gang zhig dge 'dun gyis
188a4('dul ba): chos kyis bzhag pa'o/ /bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid mthun pa'i gnas su bzhag pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong / dge slong rnams 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa
188a5('dul ba): dang / 'gyed pa byung zhing phyogs dang phyogs gzhan du gnas pa na/ ched du bsam ste/ chos ma yin pa'i phyogs nas chos kyi phyogs su 'gro ba ste/ 'di ni/ bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid
188a6('dul ba): mthun pa'i gnas su bzhag pa yin no/ /dge 'dun gyis chos kyis bzhag pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge 'dun gyis ma mthong bas gnas nas phyung ba 'byin pa dang / phyir mi byed pa

188b5('dul ba): dang | 'gyed pa byung bas gnas so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /khyim bdag cig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge 'dun khyim du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa las/ dge slong gi
188b6('dul ba): dge 'dun ni/ dong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das ni/ rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa na bzhugs te/ bsod snyoms kyi sku skal nod par mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ rgyu lngas rdzas
188b7('dul ba): kyis bsgrubs pa na bzhugs shing bsod snyoms kyi sku skal nod par mdzad pa yin zhes bya ba nas skabs 'dir ni/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos rnams 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar
189a1('dul ba): bzhed nas/ rdzas kyis bsgrubs pa na bzhugs shing bsod snyoms kyi sku skal nod par mdzad do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de na rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba'i dge slong
189a2('dul ba): rnams zas kyi phyir khyim gyi nang du zhugs pa dang / 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung bar gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ ltung ba byung ngo zhe'am/ ltung ba ma byung ngo / /
189a3('dul ba): zhes bya ba nas gzhag par 'os pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ de ni/ phan tshun rdeg pa la zhugs so/ /de nas dge slong bsod snyoms nod pas bsod snyoms khyer nas bcom ldan
189a4('dul ba): 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bsod snyoms mtha' gcig tu bzhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ spyan sngar 'dug go /chos nyid kyis/
189a5('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ bsod snyoms nod pa'i dge slong la so sor yang dag par dga' bar mdzad pa 'dis so sor yang dag par dga' bar mdzad de/ dge slong
189a6('dul ba): ji ga dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsod pa'i kha zas kyis tshim par byas sam/ zhes gsungs pa yin pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bsod snyoms nod pa'i dge slong la so so yang
189a7('dul ba): dag par dga' bar mdzad pa 'dis so so yang dag par dga' bar mdzad de/ dge slong / ji ga dge slong gi dge 'dun la kha zas bsod pas tshim par byas sam/ btsun pa med
189b1('dul ba): par dge slong gi dge 'dun la zhal zas bsod pas tshim par bgyis na/ 'on kyang rgol ba dang / phyir rgol ba'i dge slong rnams sdum pa'i nang du 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa
189b2('dul ba): dang / 'gyed pa byung nas 'di lta ste/ ltung ba byung ngo zhe'am/ zhes bya ba nas gzhag par 'os pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de ni/ phan tshun du rdeg pa la zhugs lags so/ /de
189b3('dul ba): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad nas gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol du zhabs gnyis bkrus te/ nang du yang dag par 'jog gi phyir gtsug lag khang du zhugs so/ /de nas bcom
189b4('dul ba): ldan 'das dgongs ka nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong
189b5('dul ba): rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /khyed kha zas la khyim du zhugs pa na 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung bar gyur nas/ 'di lta ste/ ltung
189b6('dul ba): ba byung ngo zhe'am zhes bya ba nas de ni phan tshun du rdeg pa la zhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar du bden nam/ btsun pa/ mad lags so/ /dge slong dag /'thab krol ma byed cig /mtshang ma 'dru
189b7('dul ba): zhig / ma rtsod cig /ma 'gyed cig /gzhan yang / ngas rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba'i dge slong rnams khang pa'i nang du 'jug pa'i kun du spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ rgol ba dang /
190a1('dul ba): phyir rgol ba'i dge slong rnams kyis khang pa'i nang du zhugs nas gang du lus kyi kun du spyod par rung ba ma yin pa de lta bu'i skabs mi 'byung bar stan par chad yod par
190a2('dul ba): 'dug par bya'o/ /rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba'i dge slong rnams kyis khang pa'i nang du zhugs nas kun du spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na/
190a3('dul ba): 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsungs na/ 'on kyang dge slong rnams 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung bas
190a4('dul ba): gnas pa'i skabs de/ bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /'thab krol ma
190a5('dul ba): byed cig / mtshang ma 'dru zhig /ma rtsod cig /ma 'gyed cig /dge slong dag /khyed cag 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung bas gnas nas
190a6('dul ba): rtsod pa byung zhing byung ba ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul bas dul bar bya ba dang / zhi bar bya ba dang / nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i gnas 'di med do/ /dge slong dag /khyed cag 'thab krol
190a7('dul ba): med pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba med pa dang / rtsod pa med pa dang / 'gyed pa med par gyur cing gnas na rtsod pa byung zhing byung ba ston pa'i bstan pa chos 'dul bas dul bar bya ba dang /
190b1('dul ba): zhi bar bya ba dang / nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i gnas 'di yod do/ /dge slong dag/ sngon byung ba/ yul ka shi'i rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba dang / yul ko sa la'i rgyal po ring po len gnyis phan
190b2('dul ba): tshun rtsod par gyur te/ rgyas par ni/ lung bar ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa'i le'u las ring po len gyi mdo 'byung ba bzhin no/ /de rnams kyis 'di skad ces smras te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
190b3('dul ba): 'di skad ces/ tshangs sbyin rga ba sdug bsngal te/ /nor rnams yongs su gtugs pa dang / /gnyen rnams kyang ni ma mthong dang / yul gzhan shi ba sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes bka' stsal pa
190b4('dul ba): zhig kyang mchis so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ tshig mi mthun la phyogs mnyam yang / /'di gtso min zhes sems byed pa/ /dge 'dun
190b5('dul ba): dbye bar gyur na ko/ mthu chung cung zad cis mi bsam/ /srog chags rus pa gcog pa dang / /rta dang ba lang nor 'phrog dang / /yul 'khor phung bar byas rnams kyang / /'dum par
190b6('dul ba): 'gyur ba nyid yod na/ /chos 'di rnam par shes gyur pa/ /khyed cag ci yi phyir mi 'gyur/ spyod yul ston par byed pa'i gsung / /chags las ldog pa lhur len pa/ /brtags
190b7('dul ba): na mkhas par snang ba ni/ /gang la rtsod pa de ma shes/ /gzhan dag bdag cag 'di la ni/ /brtson zhes bya bar mi shes kyi/ /gang dag gis ni 'di shes pa/ /de la gzu bo mi
191a1('dul ba): dgos so/ /bdag spyos bdag la kha byas dang / /bdag rgyal bdag ni pham gyur pa/ /de la gang dag 'khon 'dzin pa/ /de dag sha 'khon zhi mi 'gyur//
191a2('dul ba): bdag spyos bdag la kha byas dang / /bdag rgyal bdag ni pham gyur pa/ /de la gang dag 'khon mi 'dzin/ /de dag sha 'khon zhi bar 'gyur/ /'khon du 'dzin pas sha 'khon dag/
191a3('dul ba): 'dir ni gzhan yang zhi mi 'gyur/ /bzod pas sha 'khon zhi 'gyur ba/ /'di ni g.yung drung chos yin no/ /'khon du 'dzin pas sha 'khon nam yang zhi mi 'gyur/ /'khon du 'dzin
191a4('dul ba): med rnams kyi sha 'khon zhi bar 'gyur/ /'khon la chags pa lus can rnams la phan mi 'gyur/ /de lta bas na mkhas pa 'khon du 'dzin mi byed/ gal te grogs po 'grus skyong lhan
191a5('dul ba): cig spyod pa dang / /legs par gnas pa brtan pa rnyed par gyur na ni/ /zag par 'gyur ba thams cad zil gyis mnan byas nas/ /de dang yid dga' dran dang ldan zhing spyad par bya//
191a6('dul ba): gal te grogs po 'grus skyong lhan cig spyod pa dang / /legs par gnas pa brtan pa rnyed par ma gyur na/ /rgyal pos yul 'khor rgya chen spangs par gyur ba bzhin/ /gcig pur
191a7('dul ba): 'dug par bya zhing sdig pa rnams mi bya/ /gal te btsal te bdag 'dra ba'am/ /lhag par rnyed par ma gyur na/ /byis pa stongs mor 'gyur med pas/ /gcig pur spyad pa brtan
191b1('dul ba): par spyad/ /gcig pu spyod pa legs 'gyur gyi/ /byis pa bstangs pa legs min pas/ /ma tang dgon pa'i glang chen ltar/ /sems las bsnyungs te gcig pus spyad/ /de skad ces
191b2('dul ba): bka' stsal pa dang / ko'u sham+b+hi'i dge slong gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ni/ chos kyi rje lags/ /bde bar gshegs pa ni/ chos kyi rje
191b3('dul ba): lags na/ 'di rnams bdag cag la tshig ngan pa dang / mi snyan pa mchi na/ bdag cag gis de rnams la ci'i slad du bzod par bgyi lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge
191b4('dul ba): slong de rnams kyi spyod tshul dang log par sgrub pa des/ thugs mi dgyes shing thugs la ma bab pas de nyid nas rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la gshegs te mnyan yod gang na ba der rgyu
191b5('dul ba): zhing gshegs/ rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang mnyan yod du byon nas/ mnyan yod kyi rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /bcom
191b6('dul ba): ldan 'das der gshegs pa dang / ko'u sham+b+hi'i dge slong rnams dang yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams 'di lta bu'i spyod lam du gyur te/ snga dro ni/ zas kyi phyir bsod snyoms la 'jug/
191b7('dul ba): zas kyi 'og tu ni/ sgo bcad nas 'thab mo 'gyed par gyur to/ /de rnams kyi tshul dang / spyod pa dang / log par sgrub pa des lo bcu gnyis 'das so/ /ko'u sham+b+hi'i bram ze
192a1('dul ba): dang khyim bdag rnams 'dun khang du 'dus nas phan tshun gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag/ bdag cag ni/ bcom ldan 'das la na bza' chos gos
192a2('dul ba): dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad rnams dbul bar shin tu dad na/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis spyod yul 'di lo bcu
192a3('dul ba): gnyis kyi bar du spangs te/ da dung yang ma byon no/ /kha cig gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ bcom ldan 'das 'dir gshegs par ga la 'gyur/ 'di na da ltar ko'u sham+b+hi'i
192a4('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyi tshul dang / spyod pa dang / log par sgrub pa 'di lta bur byed de/ snga dro zas kyi phyir bsod snyoms la zhugs la/ zas kyi 'og tu sgo bcad nas 'thab mo 'gyed
192a5('dul ba): do| |kha cig gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ de rnams la nyes pa yod pa ma yin gyi/ 'on kyang bdag cag gis lan te/ bdag cag gis de rnams la bsod snyoms byin
192a6('dul ba): pa'am/ tshig smras pas so/ /tshur bdag cag gis khrims shig bcas la gzhag ste/ sus kyang de rnams la bsod snyoms mi sbyin zhing tshig kyang mi smra'o zhes de rnams
192a7('dul ba): kyis khrims su bcas nas bzhag go/ de nas phyi de ko'u sham+b+hi'i dge slong rnams bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / sus kyang ma smras la bsod snyoms kyang ma byin te/ de
192b1('dul ba): rnams ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus pa nyid kyis bsod snyoms la zhugs pa de ltar bkrus pa nyid kyis sgor byung ste/ bsod snyoms gcig kyang ma rnyed do/ /de nas de rnams 'dus nas ko'u sham+b+hi'i bram
192b2('dul ba): ze dang khyim bdag rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ re zhig nor zad par gyur na bsod snyoms mi ster ba ni/ rigs na/ bdag cag gis nyes pa ci byas na/ tshig kyang mi ster/ de rnams
192b3('dul ba): kyis smras pa/ gang dag gis tshul dang / spyod pa dang / log par sgrub pas ston pa thugs mi dgyes shing thugs la ma bab na/ steng gi nam mkha' las gshegs te lo bcu gnyis 'das na/
192b4('dul ba): da dung yang slar ma gshegs par khyed cag kyang shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong yin par bdag nyid khas 'che'am/ de rnams cang mi smra bar 'khod nas/ de rnams kyi drung nas dong ste smras pa/ tshe dang
192b5('dul ba): ldan pa dag/ de rnams kyis bdag cag brgyad pa ni/ thog tu bab ste/ gang zhig sa la 'gyel ba de/ de nyid la brten te ldang bas mdor na mnyan yod du dong la/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge
192b6('dul ba): slong gi dge 'dun la bzod pa gsol lo/ /de nas ko'u sham+b+hi'i dge slong rnams de nyid kyi nub mo 'das pas/ lhung bzed dang chos gos khyer te ko'u sham+b+hir ma zhugs par mnyan yod gang
192b7('dul ba): na ba der rgyu zhing dong ngo / /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ ko'u sham+b+hi'i dge slong 'thab krol byed pa/ mtshang 'dru bar byed pa/ rtsod par byed pa/ 'gyed par byed pa/ rtsod pa'i
193a1('dul ba): gzhi byed pa rnams 'ong ngo zhes thos nas/ gang dag gis bcom ldan 'das thugs phyung bar bgyis te 'dir gshegs pa de dag ngo tsha med pas mtho 'tsham pa'i
193a2('dul ba): phyir bdag cag la gleng bar 'gyur gyi/ ma la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol lo snyam du bsam nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi
193a3('dul ba): zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/
193a4('dul ba): bdag gis ko'u sham+b+hi'i dge slong 'thab krol bgyid pa/ mtshang 'dru bar bgyid pa/ rtsod par bgyid pa/ 'gyed par bgyid pa/ rtsod pa'i gzhi bgyid pa rnams 'dir mchi'o/ /zhes thos
193a5('dul ba): lags/ gang dag gis bcom ldan 'das thugs phyung bar bgyis te 'dir byon pa de dag ngo tsha ma mchis pas mtho 'tsham pa nyid du bdag cag la gleng bar bgyid/ dran par bgyid na/ de
193a6('dul ba): rnams la bdag cag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ kun dga' bo/ de dag la dge slong rnams kyis lag brdas gnas mal tha ma zhig bstan pa ma gtogs par gtam 'dre bar mi bya/
193a7('dul ba): phebs par smra bar mi bya/ blta bar mi bya/ rnam par blta bar mi bya/ gal te bdag cag ni/ rgan na/ ci'i phyir gnas mal gyi tha ma sbyin zhes smra na/ gang dag gis tshul dang /
193b1('dul ba): spyod pa dang / log par sgrub pas/ ston pa thugs mi dgyes shing thugs la ma bab nas 'dir gshegs shing khyod shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong yin par bdag nyid khas 'che'am/ ston pa
193b2('dul ba): thugs rje can des 'di gnang ba nyid kyang khyed dbang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes smros shig /skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mis/ ko'u sham+b+hi'i dge slong 'thab krol byed pa mtshang 'dru bar
193b3('dul ba): byed pa/ rtsod par byed pa/ 'gyed par byed pa/ rtsod pa'i gzhi byed pa rnams 'ong ngo / /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/ song la de rnams la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub
193b4('dul ba): par bya/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o snyam nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/
193b5('dul ba): phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mis/ 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag gis ko'u sham+b+hi'i dge slong 'thab krol bgyid pa/ mtshang 'dru bar
193b6('dul ba): bgyid pa/ rtsod par bgyid pa/ 'gyed par bgyid pa/ rtsod pa'i gzhi bgyid pa rnams mchi'o/ /zhes thos lags na/ bdag gis de rnams la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ go'u ta mi khyod
193b7('dul ba): kyis/ ko'u sham+b+hi'i dge slong rnams la 'khor gyi gtso bo yin pas mthong ma thag tu stan dor ba ma gtogs par gtam 'dre bar mi bya/ phebs par smra bar mi bya/ blta bar mi bya/ rnam par
194a1('dul ba): blta bar mi bya'o/ /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ ko'u sham+b+hi'i dge slong 'thab krol byed pa/ mtshang 'dru bar byed pa/ rtsod par byed pa/ 'gyed
194a2('dul ba): par byed pa/ rtsod pa'i gzhi byed pa rnams 'ong ngo / /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ song la bdag gis de rnams la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ bcom ldan 'das la
194a3('dul ba): zhu'o/ /snyam du bsam nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs
194a4('dul ba): gcig tu 'dug nas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag gis ko'u sham+b+hi'i dge slong 'thab krol bgyid pa/
194a5('dul ba): mtshang 'dru bar bgyid pa/ rtsod par bgyid pa/ 'gyed par bgyid pa/ rtsod pa'i gzhi bgyid pa rnams mchi'o/ /zhes thos lags na/ bdag gis de rnams la ji ltar bsgrub
194a6('dul ba): par bgyi/ khyim bdag/ khyod kyis ko'u sham+b+hi'i dge slong rnams la sbyin pa dang / mi mthun pa med pas bsod snyoms ni sbyin gyi/ gtam 'dri bar mi bya/ phebs par smra bar mi bya/
194a7('dul ba): blta bar mi bya/ rnam par blta bar mi bya'o/ /de nas ko'u sham+b+hi'i dge slong rnams rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin nas der lhung bzed dang / chos gos mkhos su phab ste/ rkang pa
194b1('dul ba): bkrus nas dris pa/ gnas mal 'gyed pa su yin/ phyag tshang dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa kun dga' bo lags so/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo gang na ba der song ste/ phyin na tshe dang
194b2('dul ba): ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bdag cag la gnas mal byin cig/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de rnams la lag brdas gnas mal tha ma zhig
194b3('dul ba): bstan par brtsams pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo/ bdag cag rgan pa yin na/ ci'i phyir bdag cag la gnas mal tha ma dag sbyin/ de smras pa/ khyed
194b4('dul ba): cag kyang shAkya'i sras kyi dge slong yin par zhes bya ba nas/ de yang khyed dbang bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de rnams yid chad cing sdug bsngal bas mtshan mo
194b5('dul ba): 'da' bar byed do/ /de nas gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong gis nam gyi cha smad kyi dus su rang gi rgyud la brtags nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru
194b6('dul ba): ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung nas 'di lta ste/ ltung ba byung ngo zhe'am/ ltung ba ma byung ngo zhe'am/ gnas nas dbyung ba yin no zhe'am/ gnas nas dbyung ba ma yin no zhes
194b7('dul ba): bya ba bdag ni ltung ba ma byung ba ma yin te/ ltung ba byung ba yin zhing gnas nas mi dbyung ba ma yin te/ gnas nas dbyung ba yin la/ gnas nas phyung ba gang yin pa de yang chos dang mthun
195a1('dul ba): pa'i las mi 'khrugs pa gzhag par mi 'os pas phyung gi/ ma la bdag gis mthun pa'i sdum bya'o/ /snyam du bsam nas/ nang par sngar langs te gnas nas
195a2('dul ba): phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang / gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i yang rjes su phyogs pa rnams gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su
195a3('dul ba): phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i yang rjes su phyogs pa rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag 'dir mdang sum nam gyi cha smad kyi
195a4('dul ba): dus su bdag gis rang gi rgyud la brtags nas 'di snyam du sems te/ gleng gzhi gang las 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung nas 'di lta ste
195a5('dul ba): ltung ba byung ngo zhe'am/ ltung ba ma byung ngo zhe'am/ gnas nas dbyung ba yin no zhe'am/ gnas nas dbyung ba ma yin no zhes bya ba/ bdag ni ltung ba ma byung ba ma yin te/ ltung ba
195a6('dul ba): byung ba yin zhing / gnas nas ma dbyung ba ma yin te/ gnas nas dbyung ba yin la/ gnas nas phyung ba gang yin pa yang chos dang mthun pa'i las mi 'khrugs pa/ gzhag par mi
195a7('dul ba): 'os pas phyung gi/ ma la bdag gis mthun par sdum bya'o/ /snyam na/ khyed cag ci smra/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ legs kyi/ de bzhin du bgyi'o/ /de nas gnas
195b1('dul ba): nas phyung ba'i dge slong dang / gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang / gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i yang rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams/ gnas
195b2('dul ba): nas 'byin pa'i dge slong dang / gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang / gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pa rnams gang na ba der
195b3('dul ba): dong ste phyin nas/ gnas nas 'byin pa'i dge slong dang / gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang / gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong
195b4('dul ba): rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag/ 'dir mdang sum nam gyi cha smad kyi dus su bdag gis rang gi rgyud la brtags nas 'di snyam du sems te/ gleng gzhi gang
195b5('dul ba): bas 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba byung nas zhes bya ba nas 'dum par sdum bya bar sems na zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ khyed cag ci smra/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ legs
195b6('dul ba): kyi| de bzhin du bya'o/ /de nas gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong dang / gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang / gnas nas phyung ba'i rjes su phyogs pa'i yang
195b7('dul ba): rjes su phyogs pa rnams dang / gnas nas 'byin pa'i dge slong dang / gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs pa'i dge slong rnams dang / gnas nas 'byin pa'i rjes su phyogs
196a1('dul ba): pa'i yang rjes su phyogs pa rnams/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs
196a2('dul ba): gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ 'dir mdang sum nam gyi cha
196a3('dul ba): smad kyi dus su bdag gis rang gi rgyud la brtags nas 'di snyam du sems te zhes bya ba nas mthun par sdum bgyi bar zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ bdag gis dge slong 'di dag thams
196a4('dul ba): cad la mthun par bgyi ba spro bar bgyis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /legs so legs so/ /gang zhig dge slong rnams 'thab krol dang / mtshang
196a5('dul ba): 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung bas gnas shing / phyogs dang phyogs gzhan la gnas pa rnams kyi sdum byed pa de ni/ bsod nams mang po/ tshad med pa/ grangs med pa/ gzhal du med
196a6('dul ba): par skyed par 'gyur ro/ /gang 'ga' zhig gis skra dum bu brgyar gtubs pa thog ma dang thog mar sbyor ba byed pa de bzhin du gang zhig dge slong rnams 'thab krol dang zhes bya ba nas mthun
196a7('dul ba): par sdum byed pa de ni/ bsod nams mang ngo / tshad med pa/ grangs med pa/ gzhal du med pa skyed par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /dge slong dag /'on kyang ngas
196b1('dul ba): gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong gi kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong gis dge 'dun la dbyung ba gsol bar bya'o/ /gsol ba ni/ 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal
196b2('dul ba): bshams la gaN+DI brdungs nas dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/ dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang / rgan rim ji lta ba bzhin du gus pa
196b3('dul ba): dang bcas pas 'dud pa byas la/ rgan rim gyis mdun du thal mo sbyar te/ tsog tsog por 'dug la 'di skad ces/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ bdag gi gleng gzhi gang las
196b4('dul ba): 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung nas 'di lta ste/ ltung ba byung ngo zhe'am/ ltung ba ma byung ngo zhes bgyi ba'am/ gnas nas dbyung ba lags so zhe'am/
196b5('dul ba): gnas nas phyung ba ma lags so zhes bgyi ba/ bdag ni/ ltung ba ma byung ba ma lags te/ ltung ba ma byung ba lags shing / gnas nas mi dbyung ba ma lags te/ gnas nas dbyung ba lags
196b6('dul ba): la| gnas nas phyung ba gang lags pa yang chos dang mthun pa'i las mi 'khrugs pa gzhag par mi 'os pas phyung ste/ gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba
196b7('dul ba): dge 'dun las dbyung ba gsol na/ dge 'dun btsun pa thugs brtse ba can thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ bdag dbyung du gsol/ chos ji lta ba bzhin dang / 'dul ba ji lta ba
197a1('dul ba): bzhin phyir bgyi'o/ /zhes de skad lan gnyis lan gsum du brjod par bya'o/ /de nas dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa
197a2('dul ba): rnams gsan du gsol/ tshe dang ldan pa 'di'i gleng gzhi gang las 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung nas/ 'di lta ste/ ltung ba byung ngo zhe'am/ ltung ba ma
197a3('dul ba): byung ngo zhe'am/ gnas nas dbyung ba lags zhe'am/ gnas nas dbyung ba ma lags so zhes bgyi ba/ 'di ni ltung ba ma byung ba ma lags te/ ltung ba byung ba lags shing gnas nas mi dbyung
197a4('dul ba): ba ma lags te/ gnas nas dbyung lags la/ gnas nas dbyung ba gang lags pa yang chos dang mthun pa'i las mi 'khrugs pa/ gzhag par mi 'os pas phyung ste/ gnas nas phyung
197a5('dul ba): ba'i dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ dge 'dun las dbyung ba gsol na/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge
197a6('dul ba): 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'byin par mdzad do/ /'di ni gsol ba'o/ /las bya ba ni/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ tshe dang ldan pa 'di'i gleng
197a7('dul ba): gzhi gang las 'thab krol byung ba zhes bya ba nas/ dge slong gnas nas phyung ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ dge 'dun las dbyung ba gsol te/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis
197b1('dul ba): dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'byin par mdzad na/ tshe dang ldan pa rnams las gang dag gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'byin par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsungs
197b2('dul ba): shig / gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig /'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste/ de bzhin du las brjod pa gnyis dang gsum gyi bar du brjod par bya'o/ /dge 'dun gyis
197b3('dul ba): bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis gnas nas byung ba'i dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba phyung lags te/ 'di ltar/ cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /dge slong dag /ngas dge
197b4('dul ba): slong dbyung ba'i las byas pa'i kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ dbyung ba'i las byas pa'i dge slong gis/ dge 'dun las mthun pa gsol bar bya'o/ /gsol ba ni 'di ltar bya
197b5('dul ba): ste| gnas mal bshams la gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/ dge 'dun thams cad tshogs shing mthun par gyur pa dang zhes bya ba nas/ thugs
197b6('dul ba): brtse ba can zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ de skad lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas so/ /de nas dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan
197b7('dul ba): du gsol/ tshe dang ldan pa 'di'i gleng gzhi gang las 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung nas 'di lta ste/ ltung ba byung ngo zhe'am/ ltung ba ma byung ngo
198a1('dul ba): zhe'am/ gnas nas dbyung ba lags so zhe'am/ gnas nas dbyung ba ma lags so/ /zhes bgyi ba 'di ni/ ltung ba ma byung ba ma lags te/ ltung ba byung ba
198a2('dul ba): lags shing / gnas nas ma dbyung ba ma lags te/ gnas nas dbyung ba lags la/ gnas nas phyung ba gang lags pa de yang chos dang mthun pa'i las mi 'khrugs pa gzhag par mi
198a3('dul ba): 'os pas phyung ste/ gnas nas phyung ba'i dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ dge 'dun las dbyung ba gsol nas/ dge 'dun gyis dbyung ba'i 'phrin las mdzad lags te/ dbyung ba'i
198a4('dul ba): 'phrin las mdzad lags pa'i dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun las mthun pa gsol na/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod
198a5('dul ba): cig dang / dge 'dun gyis dbyung ba'i 'phrin las mdzad lags pa'i dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la mthun pa stsol bar mdzad do/ /'di ni/ gsol ba'o/ /las bya ba ni/ dge 'dun
198a6('dul ba): btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ tshe dang ldan pa 'di'i gleng gzhi gang las 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung nas 'di lta ste/ ltung ba byung ngo zhe'am
198a7('dul ba): zhes bya ba nas dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dbyung ba'i 'phrin las mdzad lags pa'i dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la mthun pa stsal lags te/ 'di ltar
198b1('dul ba): cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /dge 'dun gyis dbyung ba'i las byas zin pa gang yin pa de la/ dge 'dun gyis mthun pa sbyin par bya ste/ de la 'gyod
198b2('dul ba): bar mi bya'o/ /ngas dge 'dun gyis mthun pa byin pa'i dge slong gi kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ dge 'dun gyis mthun pa byin pa'i dge slong gis gso sbyong gsol ba'o/ /gsol ba ni/
198b3('dul ba): 'di ltar bya ste/ gnas mal bshams la zhes bya ba nas dge 'dun gyis mthun pa stsal ba bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun las mthun pa'i gso sbyong gsol na/ dge 'dun btsun pa thugs
198b4('dul ba): brtse ba can thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ mthun pa stsal ba'i dge slong bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la mthun pa'i gso sbyong stsal du gsol/ de skad lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas zhes
198b5('dul ba): bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o/ /dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ tshe dang ldan pa 'di'i gleng gzhi gang las 'thab
198b6('dul ba): krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung nas 'di lta ste/ ltung ba byung ngo zhe'am zhes bya ba nas dge 'dun gyis mthun pa stsal pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i bar gong ma
198b7('dul ba): bzhin du ste/ dge 'dun las mthun pa'i gso sbyong gsol na/ gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na/ dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis mthun pa
199a1('dul ba): stsal ba dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la dge 'dun gyis mthun pa'i gso sbyong stsol bar mdzad do/ /'di ni/ gsol ba'o/ /las bya ba ni/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams
199a2('dul ba): gsan du gsol/ tshe dang ldan pa 'di'i gleng gzhi gang las 'thab krol dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa byung nas 'di lta ste/ ltung ba byung ngo zhe'am/ ltung ba ma byung ngo
199a3('dul ba): zhe'am zhes bya ba nas mthun pa stsal ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di/ dge 'dun las mthun pa'i gso sbyong gsol te/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis mthun pa stsal ba'i dge slong ming 'di zhes
199a4('dul ba): bgyi ba la mthun pa'i gso sbyong gsol bar mdzad na/ tshe dang ldan pa dag las/ gang dag las mthun pa stsal ba'i dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la/ 'jug pa'i gso sbyong stsal bar bzod
199a5('dul ba): pa de dag ni/ cang ma gsungs shig /gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni/ gsungs shig /'di ni/ las brjod pa dang po ste/ de bzhin du las brjod pa gnyis dang gsum gyi bar du
199a6('dul ba): brjod par bya'o/ /dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/ dge 'dun gyis mthun pa stsal ba'i dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la mthun pa'i gso sbyong stsal lags te/ 'di ltar/ cang mi
199a7('dul ba): gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/ /dge 'dun gyis mthun pa byin pa'i dge slong gang la mthun pa'i gso sbyong byin pa de dang dge 'dun lhan cig gcig tu 'dug la gso sbyong dang /
199b1('dul ba): dgag dbye dang / gsol ba dang / gsol ba dang gnyis dang / gsol ba dang bzhi'i las bya ste/ de la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ /mi mthun par byed na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /
199b2('dul ba): dge slong gis bkra shis kyi gso sbyong dang / mthun pa'i gso sbyong dang / mi bde ba la gso sbyong bya ba ma gtogs par gso sbyong ma yin par gso sbyong mi bya'o/ /byed na/ 'gal tshabs can
199b3('dul ba): du 'gyur ro/ /ko'u sham+b+hi'i gzhi rdzogs so// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po re dgu pa/ las kyi gzhi'i sdom ni/ ka shi'i gnas pa'i grong khyer na/ /sde 'joms kyis ni
