297b4('dul ba): bzed thogs te/ rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs nas/ rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms spyad de zas kyi bya ba byas nas/ zas phyi ma'i bsod snyoms spangs te gnas mal ji ltar longs spyad pa
297b5('dul ba): mkhos su phab nas lhung bzed dang chos gos blangs te mnyan yod gang na pa der rgyu zhing song ngo / /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin lam rgyags mang po khyer nas nub mo nub mo zhing mnyan yod du song
297b6('dul ba): ste phyin nas/ de mnyan yod du ma zhugs pa nyid du kun dga' ra ba nas kun dga' ra ba dang / nags tshal nas nags tshal dang / skyed mos tshal nas skyed mos tshal dang / 'chags nas 'chags na
297b7('dul ba): dpyod cing 'di skad ces smras so/ /mnyan yod dang ha cang yang mi ring la ha cang yang mi nye ba dang / nyin par lang long nyung zhing ku co nyung ba dang / mtshan mo gcom chung ba dang / sgra chung ba dang / sbrang bu
298a1('dul ba): dang | sha sbrang dang / rlung dang / nyi ma dang / sdig sbrul gyi reg pa chung ba'i sa phyogs de gang na yod pa der bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang brtsig go /
298a2('dul ba): zhes pa las/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ gzhon nu rgyal byed kyi kun dga' ra ba ni/ mnyan yod dang ha cang yang mi ring / ha cang yang mi nye la/ nyin par lang long nyung zhing ku co nyung
298a3('dul ba): ba dang / mtshan mo gcom chung ba dang / sgra chung ba dang / sbrang bu dang / sha sbrang dang / rlung dang / nyi ma dang / sdig sbrul gyi reg pa nyung bar mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/
298a4('dul ba): 'dir bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang brtsig go/ snyam nas/ de rang gi khyim du ma song ba nyid du gzhon nu rgyal byed gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / gzhon nu rgyal
298a5('dul ba): byed la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gzhon nu/ bdag la kun dga' ra ba stsol cig/ der bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang rtsig lags so/ /des smras pa/ khyim bdag/
298a6('dul ba): de ni| nga'i kun dga' ra ba ma yin te/ skyed mos tshal yin mod kyi/ de nga'i yin no/ /lan gnyis lan gsum du yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ gzhon nu rgyal byed la 'di
298a7('dul ba): skad ces smras so/ /gzhon nu/ bdag la skyed mos tshal stsol cig /bdag gis der bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang rtsig lags so/ /khyim bdag/ kun dga' ra ba de/
298b1('dul ba): gser bye ba gshibs kyang mi gtong ngo / /yang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ gzhon nu rgyal byed la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gzhon nus kun dga' ra ba'i rin bcad zin gyi/ gser dang
298b2('dul ba): dbyig longs shig / kun dga' ra ba ni/ bdag gi lags so/ /sus rin bcad/ khyod kyis rin bcad mod/ de gnyis rin bcad do/ /ma bcad do/ zhes rtsod par gyur nas zhal che gcod pa'i sna
298b3('dul ba): chen po la gtogs pa'i mi gang na ba der song ba dang / de'i bar du 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi 'di snyam du sems te/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang rtsig
298b4('dul ba): par brtson gyi/ de'i grogs bya'o/ /snyam nas/ de nas zhal che gcod pa sna chen po la gtogs pa'i cha byad du bdag nyid mngon par sbrul nas dgos pa'i phyir 'dus so/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon
298b5('dul ba): med zas sbyin dang / gzhon nu rgyal byed gnyis zhal che gcod pa sna chen po la gtogs pa'i mi'i drung du song nas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ zhal che gcod pa'i sna chen po la
298b6('dul ba): gtogs pa rnams la don de rgyas par smras pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ gzhon nu kun dga' ra ba ni/ rin bcad zin gyi/ gser dang dbyig longs shig /kun dga' ra ba ni/ khyim bdag
298b7('dul ba): gi yin no/ /de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ shing rta dang / khu ra dang / skye dang / gze ba dang / rnga mo dang / glang dang / bong bu rnams la gser mang po bkal te/
299a1('dul ba): 'ongs nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad bye ba'i gshibs pas gshibs par brtsams pa dang / sa phyogs 'ga' zhig ma g.yogs pas/ ma bkram pa nyid du 'dug
299a2('dul ba): go/ de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin don de sems shing yud tsam zhig cang mi smra bar 'dug ste/ gang gis ma bkram pa'i sa phyogs 'di bkram nas slar yang spa bar bya mi dgos pa'i
299a3('dul ba): gter ha cang nyung ba yang ma yin/ ha cang mang po yang ma yin pa de gang yin snyam pa dang / gzhon nu rgyal byed kyis bsam pa/ gdon mi za bar khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ni/ /ci'i phyir
299a4('dul ba): kun dga' ra ba'i ched du 'di snyed kyi nor gyi phung po yongs su gtang zhes 'gyod pa skyes so/ /snyam du bsam nas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyim bdag/ khyod
299a5('dul ba): gal te 'gyod pa skyes na/ gser dang dbyig khyer cig /kun dga' ra ba ni/ nga nyid kyi yin no/ /gzhon nu/ bdag ni/ 'gyod pa ma skyes te/ 'on kyang don 'di sems shing / yud tsam zhig
299a6('dul ba): cang mi smra bar 'dug pa ni/ gang gis ma bkram pa'i sa phyogs 'dir bkram nas slar yang sba bar bya mi dgos pa'i gter ha cang nyung ba yang ma yin/ ha cang mang po yang ma yin pa de gang yin
299a7('dul ba): snyam mo/ /de nas gzhon nu rgyal byed 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni/ mchog ma yin pa ma yin la/ chos bstan pa yang mchog ma yin pa ma yin te/ de la
299b1('dul ba): da ltar khyim bdag 'di/ kun dga' ra ba'i ched du 'di snyed kyi nor gyi phung po chen po yongs su gtong ngo / /snyam du bsam nas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyim bdag/
299b2('dul ba): ma bkram pa'i sa phyogs kho bo la byin cig/ der kho bos bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir sgo khang brtsig par bya'o/ /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gzhon nu rgyal byed la ma bkram pa'i sa phyogs byin
299b3('dul ba): nas/ der gzhon nu rgyal byed kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir sgo khang rtsig tu bcug go/ de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang rtsig par brtsams pa
299b4('dul ba): dang / mu stegs can zhe sdang drag pos kun nas bslangs pa'i yid can rnams 'dus nas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gang na ba der dong ste lhags pa dang smras pa/ khyim bdag /khyod kyis dge
299b5('dul ba): sbyong go'u ta ma'i phyir gtsug lag khang ma rtsigs shig / ci'i phyir/ kho bo cag gis grong khyer rnams bgos te/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i ni/ rgyal po'i khab yin no/ kho bo cag ni/ mnyan yod yin no//
299b6('dul ba): des smras pa/ khyed cag gis grong khyer rnams bgos kyi/ bdag gi nor ma bgos pas/ bdag gang la mngon par dga' ba'i chos kyi phung po brtsig go /de rnams rgyal po'i drung du dong ba dang / de la
299b7('dul ba): yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis pham par byas pa dang / mu stegs spyi rtol can/ mu cor smra ba rnams kyis smras pa/ khyim bdag/ khyod 'dod rgur byed du mi gzhug ste/ dge sbyong go'u
300a1('dul ba): ta ma'i nyan thos kyi mchog 'ongs nas/ gal te de'i shags kyis kho bo cag pham par gyur na/ gtsug lag khang rtsigs shig /des smras pa/ rung gi/ re zhig 'phags
300a2('dul ba): pa shA ri'i bu kho na la brtag go / de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag btsal
300a3('dul ba): nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ mu stegs can
300a4('dul ba): rnams 'di skad ces/ khyim bdag khyod 'dod rgur byed du mi gzhug ste/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i nyan thos kyi mchog 'ongs nas/ gal te de'i shags kyis kho bo cag pham par gyur na/ gtsug
300a5('dul ba): lag khang rtsigs shig ces mchi na/ de la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsam pa/ ci/ 'di rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba cung zad yod dam/ 'on te med ces bsam pa las/
300a6('dul ba): yod par mthong ngo / /su zhig la rag las par 'gyur snyam na/ bdag kho na la rag las par mthong ngo / /yang bsam pa/ ci/ 'di snyed cig kho na bdag la rag las pa'i tshig gis 'dul bar
300a7('dul ba): 'gyur ram/ 'on te gzhan yang tshig gis 'dul ba yod snyam pa las/ yod de/ dus ji srid cig na tshogs par 'gyur snyam na/ zhag bdun lon nas so/ /snyam du bsam nas smras pa/ khyim
300b1('dul ba): bdag/ de bzhin du bya ste/ 'on kyang zhag bdun pa'i nyin par bya'i/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin/ dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes te/ mu stegs can rnams gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang / mu
300b2('dul ba): stegs can rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/ /shes ldan dag/ shA ri'i bu na re/ rung gi/ de bzhin du bya'o/ /'on kyang zhag bdun pa'i nyin par bya'o/ /zhes zer ro/ /de rnams bsam pa/ 'di
300b3('dul ba): la ni/ rgyu gnyis yod par 'gyur te/ yang na ni/ de 'bros 'dod do/ /yang na ni/ de phyogs tshal 'dod do/ /de ma yin na/ dus der gdab ci dgos/ bdag cag kyang phyogs btsal lo/ /zhes de
300b4('dul ba): rnams phyogs btsal bar brtsams te/ de rnams kyis phyogs btsal ba dang / kun tu rgyu mig dmar mthong nas de rnams kyi de la smras pa/ khyod dang bdag cag ni/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa
300b5('dul ba): yin gyi/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i nyan thos kyi mchog bdag cag gi brtsad pa'i phyir bkug na/ de phyogs tshol gyi/ khyod kyang bdag cag gi grogs gyis shig /dus ji tsam zhig na/ 'di nas
300b6('dul ba): zhag bdun pa'i nyin par ro/ /rung gi/ /de bzhin du bya ste/ gang gi tshe khyed cag 'dus pa byung ba de'i tshe kho bo la sbron cig /mu stegs can rnams bag tsha ba dang / sems khral skyes nas nyin re
300b7('dul ba): zhing phyogs tshol ba dang nyi ma bgrang bar byed do/ /ji tsam na zhag bdun lon pa dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bla gab med pa'i sa phyogs yangs par stan shom du bcug go/ tshe dang
301a1('dul ba): ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i ched du yang seng+ge'i khri bshams so/ /yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i mu stegs can rnams kyang 'dus so/ /mnyan yod na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dang /
301a2('dul ba): de'i nyen kor na gnas pa'i srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag kyang kha cig ni/ ngo mtshar skyes/ kha cig ni/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas bskul nas 'dus par gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA
301a3('dul ba): ri'i bu khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'khor dang bcas pas mdun du bdar nas rtsod pa'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs te/ 'dul ba'i skye bo rnams la bltas nas dran pa sngon du btang ste spyod lam zhi
301a4('dul ba): bas seng+ge'i khri la 'dzegs nas 'dug pa dang / 'khor thams cad sems mi g.yeng bar tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la rtog cing 'dug go /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ mu stegs can rnams
301a5('dul ba): la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /re zhig byed dam/ 'on te 'jig /de rnams kyis smras pa/ kho bo cag gis bya'i/ /khyod kyis bshig cig /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsam pa/ gal
301a6('dul ba): te bdag gis byas na/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang 'jig mi nus na/ kun tu rgyu mig dmar gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam du bsam nas kun tu rgyu mig dmar la 'di skad ces
301a7('dul ba): smras so/ /khyod kyis byos shig /ngas gzhig go /de mig 'phrul la byang ba yin pas/ des shing sa ha ka ra shin tu me tog gis rgyas pa zhig sprul pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus
301b1('dul ba): rlung dang char drag po phab ste/ des de rtsa ba nas phyung nas phan tshun rnam par gtor te rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi yul du yang ma gyur to/ /de nas des pad+ma'i rdzing zhig sprul pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus
301b2('dul ba): glang po che bzang po zhig sprul nas des de kun tu brnal nas ming gi lhag ma zhig bzhag go / des sprul mgo bdun pa zhig sprul pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus nam mkha' lding zhig sprul te/ des de
301b3('dul ba): blangs so/ /des ro langs shig sprul pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus sngags kyi phur bas btab pa las/ nyes par sbyar ba'i ro langs ni/ bdag nyid la gsod par byed pas des de nyid bsnyegs
301b4('dul ba): pa dang / de nas de 'jigs skrag /phongs shing ba spu zing zhes byed nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos gtugs nas 'phags pa/ skyabs su mchi lags kyi/ yongs su
301b5('dul ba): bskyab tu gsol/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus sngags kyi phur ba phyung ba dang ro langs de zhi bar gyur to/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de la chos bshad de/ de dad pa skyes nas smras pa/ 'phags
301b6('dul ba): pa shA ri'i bu/ legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la bdag rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gis dngos po 'thob pa lta na/ bdag 'phags pa shA ri'i bu'i spyan sngar tshangs par
301b7('dul ba): spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus rab tu phyung / bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas gdams ngag byin pa dang / des brtson pa dang / 'bad pa dang / brtsal ba byas pas
302a1('dul ba): nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon du byas nas dgra bcom par gyur te/ khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba/ bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/
302a2('dul ba): nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan dang ste'ur mnyam pa/ rig pas ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs dral cing / rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang
302a3('dul ba): dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa dang rnyed pa la chags pa dang / bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dbang po dang nye dbang po'i lha dang bcas pa rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang /
302a4('dul ba): mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to/ /de nas de'i 'khor rnams ngo mtshar gyi mig bgrad nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la mngon par dad par gyur te smras pa/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bus ni/ smra ba'i khyu
302a5('dul ba): mchog chen po tshar bcad do/ /snyam du rig nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i gdong du lta bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'khor de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams
302a6('dul ba): dang rang bzhin shes nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa byas so/ /de thos nas sems can brgya phrag du mas khyad par chen po thob ste/ kha
302a7('dul ba): cig ni/ nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /kha cig gis ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu'o/ /kha cig gis ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu'o/ /kha cig /
302b1('dul ba): gis ni/ skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs so/ /kha cig gis ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/ /kha cig gis ni/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /kha cig
302b2('dul ba): gis ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /kha cig gis ni/ rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas so/ /'khor de phal cher yang sangs rgyas la gzhol/ chos la
302b3('dul ba): 'bab/ dge 'dun la bab par bkod do/ /mu stegs can rnams kyis bsam pa/ 'di bdag cag gis shags kyis tshar gcad par mi nus kyi/ thabs shig bsham par bya ste/ gtsug lag khang 'di nyid du
302b4('dul ba): gla mi'i las byas la de nas glags rnyed nas 'di bgags te gsad par bya'o/ /snyam nas thams cad 'dus te/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi drung du song nas son pa dang smras pa/ khyim bdag / khyod
302b5('dul ba): kyis bdag cag gi 'tsho ba'i gzhi thams cad bcad de/ de bas snying brtse bar gyis shig dang / khyod kyi gtsug lag khang du gla mi'i las bya'o/ /kho bo cag 'di na ring zhig tu gnas gnas
302b6('dul ba): pas yul bor na mi rung ngo / /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/ re zhig 'phags pa shA ri'i bu la brtag par bya'o/ /zhes de tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang na ba der song ste phyin
302b7('dul ba): pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa/ mu stegs can rnams kyis mchid nas/ bdag cag gi 'tsho ba'i gzhi thams cad bcad de/ de bas na snying brtse bar
303a1('dul ba): gyis shig dang / khyod kyi gtsug lag khang du gla mi'i las bya'o/ /kho bo cag 'di na ring zhig tu gnas gnas pas yul bor na mi rung ngo / /zhes mchi'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA
303a2('dul ba): ri'i bus ji 'di rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba cung zad yod dam/ 'on te med ces bsam pa la zhugs na/ yod par mthong ngo / /su zhig la rag las snyam na/ bdag kho na la'o/ /snyam nas/ des
303a3('dul ba): bsam ste smras pa/ khyim bdag /de la 'gal pa ci yod kyi/ de bzhin du gyis shig /de rnams gtsug lag khang der gla mi'i las bya bar brtsams pa na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus lcag
303a4('dul ba): thogs kyi mi gtum po zhig sprul nas/ des de rnams las byed du gzhug par brtsams so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shI ri'i bus de rnams kyi gdul ba'i dus shes nas de dang nye ba'i shing drung zhig na 'chag
303a5('dul ba): cing 'dug pa las/ de rnams kyis de mthong nas de rnams kyis bsam pa/ dben pa na 'dug pas 'di gsad pa'i dus ni/ 'di yin no/ /snyam nas de rnams kyis de'i drung du dong nas bskor te
303a6('dul ba): 'dug go / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsam pa dang / 'di rnams sems ci 'dra ba zhig gis bdag gi drung du lhags snyam na/ ji tsam na gsad pa'i sems kyis yin par mthong nas/ des
303a7('dul ba): lcag thogs de rbad nas/ des de rnams las bos dang zhes thag bcug pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bus bskyab tu gsol/ /des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ re
303b1('dul ba): zhig song la ngal bsor chug cig / de rnams kyis bsam pa/ 'di ni/ 'di lta bur bdag nyid che ba yin te/ bdag cag gis ni/ 'di gsad par bsam na/ 'di ni/ bdag cag la byams par sems
303b2('dul ba): so/ /snyam du rig nas dad par gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ de rnams kyis bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin shes nas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so
303b3('dul ba): sor rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa byas te/ de thos nas de rnams kyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon
303b4('dul ba): sum du byas te/ de rnams kyis bden pa mthong ste smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po
303b5('dul ba): 'thob pa lta na/ bdag cag btsun pa shA ri'i bu'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ /de rnams tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas/ gdams
303b6('dul ba): ngag byin te/ de rnams kyis/ brtson pa dang / 'bad pa dang / brtsal ba byas pas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa/ g.yo ba dang mi g.yo ba 'di nyid rig ste/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa
303b7('dul ba): dang / ltung ba dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos nyid kyis zil gyis mnan te/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom par
304a1('dul ba): gyur nas khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba/ bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan dang
304a2('dul ba): ste'ur mnyam pa/ rig pas ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs dral cing / rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa dang / rnyed pa la chags pa dang / bkur
304a3('dul ba): sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dbang po dang / nye dbang po'i lha dang bcas pa rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
304a4('dul ba): bus/ gtsug lag khang gi thig skud kyi mtha' gcig nas bzung / mtha' gcig nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bzung ba dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'dzum par brtsams
304a5('dul ba): so/ /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams ni/ rgyu med rkyen med par
304a6('dul ba): 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu ci'i rgyu/ ci'i rkyen gyis 'dzum pa mdzad/ khyim bdag /de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sam/ de bzhin
304a7('dul ba): gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams ni/ rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad de/ khyod kyis 'dir thig skud bzung ba na/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su yang gser gyi khang pa grub par gyur
304b1('dul ba): to/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ngo mtshar skyes pa'i mig bgrad de smras pa/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu/ gal te de lta na/ de'i slad du yang thig skud brkyang pa dang lhag par sems mngon par
304b2('dul ba): dad par bgyi'o/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ yang thig skud de bzung ba dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ lhag par dad pa drag po'i shugs kyis sems mngon par dad par byas
304b3('dul ba): te/ dad pa de'i mjug thogs kho nar gser gyi khang pa de rin po che sna bzhi las byas par gyur nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus kyang de la go bar byas so/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin
304b4('dul ba): gong nas gong du bsod nams rab tu 'phel ba'i rgyud kyis/ gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang / khang phran drug cu rtsig tu bcug ste/ des gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang / khang
304b5('dul ba): phran drug cu brtsigs nas/ yo byad thams cad kyis rgyas par byas te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras pa/
304b6('dul ba): 'phags pa shA ri'i bu/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs na bshul tshad ji tsam du 'byon par 'gyur/ /khyim bdag/ dper na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po mchi ba'i tshad tsam mo/ /'khor los
304b7('dul ba): bsgyur ba'i rgyal po mchi ba'i tshad ji tsam/ khyim bdag /'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po ni/ nyi ma gcig gis rgyang grangs bcu'i lam du 'gro'o/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon med
305a1('dul ba): zas sbyin gyis/ gang yang mnyan yod nas rgyal po'i khab de'i bar gyi gshegs dgongs brtsigs nas zha sa dag byed du bcug /sbyin gtong gi khang pa dag rtsig tu
305a2('dul ba): bcug / dus tshod gsol ba'i mi dag bkod/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan ngag gis brgyan/ tsan+dan gyi chus chag chag btab /shin tu dri zhim po'i pog phor dag nye bar
305a3('dul ba): bkod/ rta babs dag byed du bcug /dus dang thun tshod kyis sman dag kyang 'jog tu bcug go /de ltar tshogs bsags nas mi zhig la bsgo ba/ kye nang rje/ tshur khyod bcom ldan 'das
305a4('dul ba): gang na ba der song la phyin pa dang / kho bo'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byos la/ gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ /bskyod pa yang ngam/
305a5('dul ba): 'tsho'am/ stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes zhus la/ 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du gshegs su gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge
305a6('dul ba): 'dun dang thabs cig la bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / snyun dpyad kyis rkyen sman dang / yo byad rnams kyi bskur sti bgyid do/ /zhes kyang
305a7('dul ba): gsol cig / jo bo/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes mi des khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi ltar mnyan nas/ /rgyal po'i khab gang na ba der chas te rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin pa
305b1('dul ba): dang / de nas lam gyis dub pa ngal sos nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ mi des bcom ldan
305b2('dul ba): 'das la gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas zhes bya ba nas reg par gnas sam zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin
305b3('dul ba): du'o/ /kye/ mi khyod dang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin bde bar gyur cig /btsun pa/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi mchid nas/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du gshegs su gsol/ /bcom ldan
305b4('dul ba): 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la zhes bya ba nas bkur sti bgyid do/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis mi de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas mi des
305b5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan snga nas song ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das
305b6('dul ba): dul ba 'khor dul ba/ zhi ba 'khor zhig ba/ dbugs phyin pa 'khor dbugs phyin pa/ rnam par dul ba 'khor rnam par dul ba/ dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor
305b7('dul ba): 'dod chags dang bral ba/ dang ba 'khor dang ba/ khyu mchog ba lang gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / glang po che'i glang po che'i phug gu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / seng+ge'i mche ba can gyi
306a1('dul ba): tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / ngang ba'i rgyal po ngang pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / nam mkha' lding bya'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / bram ze slob ma'i
306a2('dul ba): tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / sman pa mkhas pa nad pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / dpa' bo dmag mi'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / lam mkhan 'gron po'i tshogs kyis bskor
306a3('dul ba): ba lta bu dang / ded dpon tshong pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / tshong dpon skye bo'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / khams kyi rgyal phran blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /
306a4('dul ba): 'khor los bsgyur ba bu stong gis bskor ba lta bu dang / zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / nyi ma 'od zer stong gis bskor ba lta bu dang / yul 'khor skyong dri za'i tshogs kyis
306a5('dul ba): bskor ba lta bu dang / 'phags skyes bo grul bum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / mig mi bzang klu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis
306a6('dul ba): bskor ba lta bu dang / thag bzang ris lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi tshogs
306a7('dul ba): kyis bskor ba lta bu dang / rgya mtsho g.yo ba med pa lta bu dang / sprin chu dang bcas pa lta bu dang / glang po che dam pa dregs pa dang bral ba ltar/ dbang po rnams shin tu dul bas spyod
306b1('dul ba): lam gyi tshul ma 'khrugs pa/ sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan cing / dpe byad brgyad cus rnam par mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa'i sku/ nyi ma'i
306b2('dul ba): 'od zer stong pas lhag pa'i 'od can/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas mdzes pa/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / thugs chen
306b3('dul ba): po dang ldan pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa dang / mnyan yod na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dang / lha brgya stong phrag du mas zhabs
306b4('dul ba): 'bring byas nas mnyan yod kyi grong khyer du gshegs so/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod kyi grong khyer du gshegs nas mngon par 'du mdzad pas/ grong khyer gyi sgo'i them pa la zhabs
306b5('dul ba): g.yas pas mnan pa de'i tshe/ sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ sa chen po 'di rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ ldeg/ rab tu ldeg /kun tu rab tu ldeg ste/ shar phyogs mtho na nub
306b6('dul ba): phyogs dma'/ nub phyogs mtho na shar phyogs dma'/ lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'/ byang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'/ mtha' mtho na dbus dma'/ dbus mtho na mtha' dma'
306b7('dul ba): bar gyur nas 'jig rten 'di thams cad 'jig rten gyi bar dang bcas te/ snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/ /bar snang la yang lha'i rnga rdung zhing / nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa'i lhas ni/ steng
307a1('dul ba): nas lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mud dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / a ka ru'i phye ma dang / rgya spos kyi phye ma dang / tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang / gur gum gyi phye ma dang / ta
307a2('dul ba): ma la'i lo ma dang / lha'i me tog mnad ra ba rnams 'thor zhing lha'i gos rnams kyang 'thor ro/ /bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa na 'di dag dang / gzhan yang ya mtshan 'di lta bu
307a3('dul ba): dag byung bar gyur to/ /gzhan yang / dog pa rnams ni/ yangs par gyur to/ /dma' mo rnams ni/ mthon por gyur to/ /mthon po rnams mnyam par gyur to/ /glang po che yang
307a4('dul ba): skad 'byin/ rta yang skad 'byin/ khyu mchog rnams kyang skad 'byin te/ khang pa na yod pa'i rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs pa rnams kyang rang sgra 'byin to/ /long ba rnams kyis ni/ mig thob bo/ /
307a5('dul ba): 'on pa rnams kyis ni/ rna bas thos so/ /lkugs pa rnams kyis ni/ smra shes par gyur to/ /dbang po ma tshang ba rnams ni/ dbang po rnams tshang bar thob bo/ /chang gis myos pa rnams ni/ myos
307a6('dul ba): pa dang bral bar gyur to/ /dug 'thungs pa rnams ni/ dug zhi bar gyur to/ /phan tshun 'khon byung ba rnams ni/ byams pa thob par gyur to/ /sbrum ma rnams ni/ bde bar btsas par gyur
307a7('dul ba): to/ /btson du bcings pa rnams ni/ bcings pa las thar to/ /nor med pa rnams ni/ nor rnyed de/ 'di dag dang / gzhan yang / bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa na ngo
307b1('dul ba): mtshar brgya stong dag byung bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das bkur sti chen po de lta bus mnyan yod du gshegs so/ /gshegs nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid
307b2('dul ba): la bzhugs so/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin mdza' bshes dang / nye du dang / gnyen gyi skye bos yongs su bskor nas gser gyi bya ma bum blangs te chu sbreng bar brtsams pa las/ de
307b3('dul ba): 'dzag tu ma btub nas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin yid mi bde ste bsam pa/ bdag gis las nyes pa dang bcas pa cung zad byas par ma gyur grang snyam pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
307b4('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag /khyod kyis las nyes pa dang bcas pa cung zad byas pa med de/ 'on kyang khyod kyis phyogs 'dir 'dug nas/ sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
307b5('dul ba): rgyas rnams la phyogs 'di phul ba yin gyi/ phyogs gzhan zhig tu 'dug la sbrengs shig /des phyogs gzhan zhig tu 'dug ste sbrengs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis yan lag
307b6('dul ba): lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung dbyangs kyis rgyal byed kyi tshal rjod par mdzad de/ rgyal byed kyi tshal rjod par mdzad pa na/ gzhon nu rgyal byed kyis bsam pa/ kye ma/ bcom ldan 'das
307b7('dul ba): kyis der bdag gi ming thog mar smos kyang ci ma rung snyam pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhon nu rgyal byed kyi bsam pa thugs su chud nas/ dge slong dag /'di ni/ rgyal bu
308a1('dul ba): rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba yin no/ /zhes der ming thog ma smos pa mdzad do/ /gzhon nu rgyal byed kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis der/
308a2('dul ba): bdag gi ming thog mar smos pa mdzad pa thos nas shin tu dga' bar gyur te/ dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba skyes pa des nor gyi rigs thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir rin
308a3('dul ba): po che sna bzhi'i sgo khang byed du bcug go / de bzhin du sdud pa byed pa rnams kyis kyang / mdo sde'i nang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga'
308a4('dul ba): ra ba na bzhugs so/ /zhes gdags par byas so/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ khyim bdag
308a5('dul ba): mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyogs 'di sngon nam phul lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /sngon byung
308a6('dul ba): ba/ bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur
308a7('dul ba): ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung nas/ de 'khor dge slong drug khri nyis stong dang phyogs 'dir
308b1('dul ba): gshegs so/ /de'i tshe mnyan yod 'dir khyim bdag rgyal zhes bya ba byung ste/ des sa phyogs 'di rgyang grags drug gser dang / dbyig gshibs pas rgyal bu gzhon nu las nyos nas yang dag par
308b2('dul ba): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la phul te de nyid kyi spyan sngar rab tu byung nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas so/ /khyim bdag rgyal gyi tsha bo zhig
308b3('dul ba): de bsten pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs la shin tu dad pa skyes nas/ des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten rtsig
308b4('dul ba): tu bcug ste/ des bsam pa/ gang gis na/ bdag gis 'di nyid mtshan du sgrib pa med par mthong bar 'gyur ba'i thabs de ci yod snyam pa dang / de la brten pa rgya mtsho'i 'gram na 'dug pa zhig
308b5('dul ba): gis nor bu rin po che 'bar ba zhig skyes su bskur nas/ des de mchod rten la brtags pa dang / de'i mthus des dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten de nyid mtshan du sgrib pa med par mthong ngo / /de nas
308b6('dul ba): dad pa skyes nas smon lam btab pa/ ji ltar sa phyogs 'di bdag gi zhang pos rgyal bu gzhon nu las gser dang / dbyig gshibs pas nyos nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par
308b7('dul ba): gzigs/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul ba de bzhin du/ bdag gis kyang sa phyogs 'di/ gser dang / dbyig gshibs pas gzhon nu las nyos nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
309a1('dul ba): sangs rgyas bdun la 'bul bar 'gyur zhing / de rnams kyi phyi ma shos gang yin pa de'i spyan sngar bdag rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon
309a2('dul ba): sum du byas par gyur cig / ces btab bo/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag rgyal gyi tsha bo gang yin pa de ni/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di nyid yin
309a3('dul ba): no/ /de tshun chad bskal pa sum cu rtsa gcig pa la ston pa gtsug tor can zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo / /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ de 'khor
309a4('dul ba): dge slong drug khri dang sa phyogs 'dir gshegs so/ /de'i tshe khyim bdag rgyas pa zhes bya ba byung ste/ des phyogs 'di dpag tshad phyed dang gsum nor bu gshibs pas rgyal bu gzhon nu
309a5('dul ba): las nyos nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtsug tor can nyan thos kyi 'khor dang bcas pa la phul lo/ /dge slong dag /de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag rgyas pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de
309a6('dul ba): gzhan zhig yin snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di nyid yin no/ /de'i 'og tu bskal pa sum cu rtsa gcig pa de nyid la ston pa
309a7('dul ba): thams cad skyob ces bya ba nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo / /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ de 'khor dge slong drug khri dang sa phyogs 'dir gshegs so/ /de'i tshe
309b1('dul ba): khyim bdag mchu zhes bya ba byung ste/ des phyogs 'di rgyang grags gnyis su mu tig gshibs pas gzhon nu las nyos nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad skyob nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang
309b2('dul ba): bcas pa la phul lo/ /dge slong dag /de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag mchu zhes bya ba de/ gzhan zhig yin snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag mgon med
309b3('dul ba): zas sbyin 'di nyid yin no/ /de'i 'og tu bskal pa bzang po 'di la ston pa 'khor ba 'jig ces bya ba nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo / /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ de
309b4('dul ba): 'khor dge slong bzhi khri dang phyogs 'dir gshegs so/ /de'i tshe khyim bdag srid sbyin zhes bya ba byung ste/ des phyogs 'di ba lang gis bkang bas gzhon nu las nyos te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
309b5('dul ba): rgyas 'khor ba 'jig nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul lo/ /dge slong dag /de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag srid sbyin zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na/ khyed kyis de ltar mi blta
309b6('dul ba): ste/ 'on kyang de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di nyid yin no/ /de'i 'og tu bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu rnams kyi tshe lo sum khri thub pa na/ ston pa gser thub ces bya ba
309b7('dul ba): nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo / /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ de 'khor dge slong sum khri dang phyogs 'dir gshegs so/ /de'i tshe khyim bdag phur bu zhes bya ba
310a1('dul ba): byung ste/ des phyogs 'di gos bting bas gzhon nu las nyos nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser thub nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul lo/ /dge slong
310a2('dul ba): dag / de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag phur bu zhes bya bar gyur ba de/ gzhan zhig yin snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di nyid
310a3('dul ba): yin no/ /de'i 'og tu bskal ba bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo
310a4('dul ba): zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ de 'khor dge slong nyid khri dang phyogs 'dir gshegs so/ /de'i tshe khyim bdag chu stod ces bya ba zhig byung ste/ des sa phyogs 'di rgyang grags phyed gser gyis
310a5('dul ba): bkram pas gzhon nu las nyos te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul lo/ /dge slong dag /de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag chu stod ces bya bar
310a6('dul ba): gyur pa de/ gzhan zhig yin snyam na/ khyed kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di nyid yin no/ /dge slong dag /da ltar de bzhin gshegs
310a7('dul ba): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi
310b1('dul ba): ston pa/ ston pa nga yang 'jig rten du byung nas nga 'khor stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang phyogs 'dir gshegs pa na/ da ltar yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/ rmon pa dor bcu drug gis smos pa'i
310b2('dul ba): khyon bye ba gshibs pas gshibs nas gzhon nu rgyal byed las nyos te nga nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul lo/ /dge slong dag /ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ skye rgu rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na/
310b3('dul ba): ston pa byams pa zhes bya ba 'khor dgra bcom pa khrag khrig phrag dgu dang / ther 'bum chen po phrag drug phyogs 'dir gshegs par 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe khyim bdag nor bzang zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/
310b4('dul ba): des phyogs 'di dpag tshad gsum gser dang / dbyig gshibs pas gzhon nu las nyos nas byams pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la 'bul bar 'gyur zhing / de nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung
310b5('dul ba): ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag /de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag nor bzang zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba de/ gzhan zhig yin snyam
310b6('dul ba): na/ khyed kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di nyid/ khyim bdag nor bzang zhes bya ba yin par 'gyur ro/ /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gter bdag bo dang
310b7('dul ba): bcas pa dang / bdag po med pa dang / thang la yod pa dang / chu na yod pa dang / gang dag rgyang ring po na yod pa dang / gang dag thag nye ba na yod pa yang mthong bas/ kun tu khyim bdag mgon med
311a1('dul ba): zas sbyin gyis/ gter bdag po dang bcas pa dang / bdag po med pa dang / thang la yod pa dang / chu na yod pa dang / gang dag rgyang ring po na yod pa dang / gang dag thag nye
311a2('dul ba): ba na yod pa mthong ngo / /zhes grags so/ /de'i tshe mu stegs can gyi dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / spyod ba pa dang / kun tu rgyu sna tshogs rtog khang du 'dus te 'khod pa rnams/ 'di lta bu'i skabs kyi
311a3('dul ba): gtam dag gleng bar byed/ shes ldan dag/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin mtshan gang dag dang ldan na/ gter bdag po dang bcas pa dang / bdag po med pa dang / thang la yod pa dang / chu
311a4('dul ba): na yod pa dang / gang dag rgyang ring po na yod pa dang / gang dag thag nye ba na yod pa mthong bar gyur/ de'i tshe bram ze'i khye'u phyugs sten zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du tshogs shing 'dug par gyur
311a5('dul ba): nas des smras pa/ shes ldan dag /khyed cag sems las chung ngus 'khod cig dang / kho bos khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin mtshan gang dag dang ldan na/ gter bdag po dang bcas
311a6('dul ba): pa dang / bdag po med pa dang / thang la yod pa dang / chu na yod pa dang / gang dag rgyang ring po na yod pa dang / gang dag thag nye ba na yod pa mthong bar 'gyur ba brtags la khyed la smra bar
311a7('dul ba): bya'o/ /zhes de khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'gro ba dang 'dug pa la brtag pa lhur len cing / rjes bzhin rjes bzhin 'brang ngo / /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ khyim bdag mgon
311b1('dul ba): med zas sbyin/ chu bo a dzi ra ba tir khrus byas nas byung ba la/ des de'i rgyab tu thal mos brgyab pa dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis mthong bzhin du cang mi smra bar 'dug go /des smras pa/
311b2('dul ba): khyim bdag /khyod ni/ mkhas pa yin zhing / bzod pa dang / nges pa dang ldan pa yin pa des na/ gter bdag po dang bcas pa dang / bdag po med pa dang / thang la yod pa dang / chu na yod pa dang /
311b3('dul ba): gang dag rgyang ring po na yod pa dang / gang dag thag nye ba na yod pa mthong ngo / /des mu stegs can rnams la go bar byas pa dang / mu stegs can kha ngom can rnams kyis kyang kun tu smras pas/
311b4('dul ba): khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ni/ bzod pa dang / des pa dang ldan pas/ des na gter bdag po dang bcas pa dang / bdag po med pa dang / thang la yod pa dang / chu na yod pa dang / gang dag
311b5('dul ba): rgyang ring po na yod pa dang / gang dag thag nye ba na yod pa mthong ngo / /zhes kun tu sgra grags pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
311b6('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /mu stegs can brgya stong phrag bye bas kyang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin mtshan gang dang ldan na/ gter mthong bar 'gyur ba shes par sla ba ma
311b7('dul ba): yin no/ /'on kyang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi mig gi 'bras bu rin po che ltar bkra ba dang / dbyig gi skad yod de/ des na/ gter bdag po dang bcas pa dang / bdag med pa
312a1('dul ba): dang / thang la yod pa dang / chu na yod pa dang / gang dag rgyang ring po na yod pa dang / gang dag thag nye ba na yod pa mthong ngo // //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po
312a2('dul ba): don drug pa/ dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis las ci
312a3('dul ba): zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas mig gi 'bras bu rin po che ltar bkra zhing dbyig gi skad dang ldan par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ khyim
312a4('dul ba): bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/ rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/ 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/ gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags
312a5('dul ba): pas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/ dge slong dag/ las byas shing bsags pa dag ni/ phyi
312a6('dul ba): rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/ me'i khams la mi 'gyur/ rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas
312a7('dul ba): shing bsags pa dag ni/ zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams kho na la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/ /chud mi za ba'ang tshogs
312b1('dul ba): dang dus/ rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/ /'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/ /dge slong dag/ sngon byung ba/ ri bor zhig na/ khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba yongs su bzung ba yangs shing
312b2('dul ba): rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig gnas te/ des sos ka'i dus la bab pa'i tshe me tog gi shing rnams 'bus shing / ngang pa dang / khrung khrung dang /
312b3('dul ba): rma bya dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / khu byug dang / shang shang te'u rnams skad 'byin pa'i nags tshal gyi gzhir nang mi dang lhan cig dong ngo / /sangs rgyas rnams byung ba med pa na/ rang sangs
312b4('dul ba): rgyas dman pa dang ngan pa la snying brtse ba/ bas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba/ 'jig rten rnams kyi yon gnas gcig pu dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur bas/ ji tsam na rang sangs rgyas shig
312b5('dul ba): ljongs rgyu zhing song na ri bor der phyin nas/ de skyed mos tshal de'i phyogs shig na 'dug go/ skyed mos tshal srung ba'i mis khyim bdag de la smras pa/ dpon po/ phyogs 'di na rab tu byung ba zhi ba'i
312b6('dul ba): bdag nyid can zhig bzhugs so/ /des thos nas/ de yid dga' bar gyur cing dad pa skyes te/ bdag gi skyed mos tshal na 'di 'dra ba'i rab tu byung ba gnas pa ni/ bdag skal ba can yin no snyam
312b7('dul ba): mo/ /bdag nyid chen po de yang phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su zhugs te yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /de nas khyim bdag des mdza' bshes dang / nye du dang /
313a1('dul ba): gnyen dang / nang mi rnams dang lhan cig tu bkur sti chen po byas nas bsregs te/ me de'o mas bsad nas rus pa de rnams shel las byas pa'i bum pa'i nang du rin po
313a2('dul ba): che dang bsres te blugs pa dang / rus pa de rnams 'od dang ldan zhing sgra 'byin par gyur to/ /de nas des drung du gtugs nas smon lam btab pa/ ji ltar rus pa 'di rnams rin po che dang bsres
313a3('dul ba): nas shin tu 'od dang ldan zhing sgra 'byin pa de bzhin du/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gi mig gi 'bras bu rin po che ltar bkra zhing / dbyig gi skad dang ldan par gyur cig /ces byas so/ /dge
313a4('dul ba): slong dag/ ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag gang yin pa de ni/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di nyid yin te/ 'dis rang sangs rgyas la bya ba byas nas smon lam btab pa
313a5('dul ba): gang yin pa de dang / khyim bdag rgyal gyi tsha bor gyur pa na des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la nor bu 'bar ba btags pa gang
313a6('dul ba): yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas/ mig gi 'bras bu rin po che ltar bkra zhing dbyig gi skad dang ldan par gyur to/ /dge slong dag/ de lta bas na/ las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam
313a7('dul ba): par smin pa ni/ gcig tu gnag pa yin la/ gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni/ gcig tu dkar ba dang / 'dren ma rnams kyi ni/ 'dren ma yin te/ de lta bas na/ dge slong dag 'di
313b1('dul ba): ltar bslab par bya ste/ las gnag pa dang 'dren ma gang yin pa rnams ni/ spangs la/ las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la btsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag/ khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o//
313b2('dul ba): bar gyi sdom ni/ rgyal dang rgyas pa chu dang ni/ /srid sbyin dang ni phur bu dang / /chu stod dang ni zas sbyin dang / /phyi ma pa ni nor bzang yin/ /dbyig rnams dang ni gser dang ni/ /gsum pa nor bu mu
313b3('dul ba): tig yin/ /ba dang nas dang gos dang ni/ /bye ba dbyig gis bsdus pa yin/ /gang gi tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bye ba'i gshibs pas gshibs nas/ gzhan nu rgyal byed las
313b4('dul ba): nyos te sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul ba de'i tshe/ yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i dad pa can mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba dag mnyan yod du lhags na/ de rnams las
313b5('dul ba): kha cig mngon par dad par gyur nas/ smras pa/ 'phags pa/ bdag cag gis kyang 'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyi slad du/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du gzhi cung zad rtsig go/ dge slong rnams
313b6('dul ba): kyis smras pa/ rin gyis sa nyos la rtsigs shig/ 'phags pa/ rin ji tsam stsal lags/ dbyig 'di snyed do/ /'phags pa/ re zhig 'di snyed kyi 'byor pa bdag cag la lta ga la mchis/
313b7('dul ba): de lta mod kyi/ gal te phyogs 'di thob na brtsig go/ zhes pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag la
314a1('dul ba): rtogs la gal te/ byin na rtsigs shig/ dge slong rnams kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la brtags pa dang / des smras pa/ gal te bdag la brten te bram
314a2('dul ba): ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can rnams dge 'dun gyi phyir bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po bgyid na stsal to/ /gang zag gi phyir bgyid na mi stsal to/ /zhes pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams
314a3('dul ba): kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/ dge 'dun gyi phyir ni/ brtsig par bya'o/ /gang zag gi phyir ni/ yon
314a4('dul ba): bdag la brtags te/ gal te byin na/ brtsig par bya'o/ /ma byin na/ brtsig par mi bya'o/ /glo bur ba'i dge slong mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba dag mnyan yod du lhags pa na/ de rnams
314a5('dul ba): smos 'drin ji lta ba bzhin dge slong rnams kyi drung du dong ba dang / gzhan dag la smos 'drin med pa de dag phongs par gyur nas/ byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ glo
314a6('dul ba): bur ba rnams kyi phyir ma bgos pa'i gnas gzhag par bya'o/ /ri bor zhig na gtsug lag khang zhig yod pa der dge slong rnams dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa las/ ji tsam na ri bor
314a7('dul ba): der dbyar gyi nor legs su 'jigs pa byung nas/ de na gnas pa'i dge slong rnams skrag nas dgag dbye ma byas par mnyan yod du lhags pa dang / de rnams dge slong rnams kyis lam
314b1('dul ba): gyis dub pa ngal bsor bcug ste/ lam gyis dub pa ngal sos nas/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag/ bdag cag la gnas mal skos shig/ de rnams kyis dbyar gyi nang logs yin
314b2('dul ba): no/ /snyam nas ma bskos pa dang / glo bur ba'i dge slong rnams smod par byed/ gzhogs 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed de/ tshe dang ldan pa dag/ khyed da ltar ston pa nyid bzhugs pa bzhin du bstan
314b3('dul ba): pa nub par byed dam ci/ gal te khyed la 'gyod pa yod na/ rgan rim ji lta ba bzhin du gnas mal byin cig /de rnams 'on kyang ma bskos pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das
314b4('dul ba): la gsol pa dang / byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/ 'jigs pas ral pa'i dge slong rnams kyi phyir dbyar gnyis par gnas par dam
314b5('dul ba): bca' bar bya'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zla ba gsum pa'i dgag dbye bya zhing dbyar zla tha chung la dbyar phyi mar gnas par dam bca' bar
314b6('dul ba): bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jigs pas ral pa'i dge slong rnams kyi phyir dbyar gnyis par gnas par dam bca' bar bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa dang / ji tsam na 'jigs pas ral pa'i
314b7('dul ba): dge slong gzhan dag kyang mnyan yod du lhags pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ ngas
315a1('dul ba): 'jigs pas ral pa'i dge slong rnams la brten nas dbyar gnyis par gnas par dam bca' ba bcas kyi/ gsum pa ni/ ma yin no/ /'jigs pas ral pa'i dge
315a2('dul ba): slong rnams kyang / smos 'drin ji lta ba bzhin du ngal bsor gzhug par bya'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis de rnams las su sko bar byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de rnams
315a3('dul ba): las su bsko bar mi bya'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis de rnams la rnyed pa byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de rnams la rnyed pa mi sbyin no/ /dge slong rnams kyis kha
315a4('dul ba): zas kyi rnyed pa yang ma byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de rnams la kha zas kyi rnyed pa ni/ sbyin gyi/ gos kyi rnyed pa ni/ ma yin no/ /dad pa can rnams kyis gtsug
315a5('dul ba): lag khang mang du brtsigs pa las/ mnyan yod na dge slong nyung ngu zhig dbyar gnas par dam bcas te/ de rnams stong par 'dug pas sbyin bdag rnams kyi longs spyod las byung ba'i
315a6('dul ba): bsod nams med cing nal phrug rnams kyi gnas su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thams cad bgo bar bya ste/ re res kyang so sor gnyis sam/ gsum mam/
315a7('dul ba): bzhi ci ran par thams cad la longs spyad par bya ste/ la lar ni/ snga dro 'dug par bya'o/ /la lar ni/ nyi ma'i gung la'o/ /la lar ni/ phyi dro'o/ /la lar ni/ nub mo gnas par
315b1('dul ba): bya'o/ /dge slong rnams kyis lag gi las ma byas pas de rnams 'drums par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yon bdag la spro ba bskyed par bya'o/ /gal te grub na/ de lta na
315b2('dul ba): legs/ gal te ma grub par gyur na/ dge 'dun gyis phyir bcos par bya'o/ /gal te mi nus par gyur na/ ci tsam nus pa de tsam bcos par bya ste/ gzhan ni/ btang snyoms su gzhag par
315b3('dul ba): bya'o/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa rgyas par gyur pa de'i tshe dge slong mang po mnyan yod du lhags pa dang / de rnams gnas khang gis phongs par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das
315b4('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnyis dang gsum gyis bgo bar bya ste/ chu snod gzhag pa dang / 'dag chal dang / sman dang / so shing gzhag pa dang / phan tshun gyi them skas ma gtogs par
315b5('dul ba): chung ngu na 'dug pa'i tshad tsam yang thams cad kyis 'dra bar bgo bar bya ste/ nye 'khor ni/ spyi'i yin pa nyid pas bgo bar mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong dag/ dgon pa
315b6('dul ba): dang / shing drung dang / khang stong dang / ri sul dang / brag phug dang / rtswa'i stan dang / bla gab med pa dang / dur khrod dang / nags mtha' dang / bas mtha'i gnas mal 'di rnams su
315b7('dul ba): bsam gtan gyis shig/ /phyis yid la gcags par mi 'gyur bar bag yod par gyis shig/ ces dgon pa'i bsngags pa mang du gsungs pa de'i tshe/ dge slong kha cig dgon pa bar
316a1('dul ba): dam bcas nas dgon pa na gnas pa las/ de rnams de na chom rkun pa rnams kyis gtogs par gyur to/ /gtogs nas bram ze dang / khyim bdag gi khyim rnams
316a2('dul ba): su chos gos tshol ba'i phyir brtson par gyur pas/ lung nod pa dang / klog pa dang / gdon pa dang / rnal 'byor dang / yid la bya ba nyams par gyur pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis
316a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / byung ba 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dgon pa pa rnams kyi phyir gnas gzhag par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge
316a4('dul ba): slong dgon pa pa rnams kyi phyir gnas gzhag par bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis mi gsal ba zhig tu bzhag pa dang / dge slong dgon pa pa zhig gis lhung bzed dang
316a5('dul ba): chos gos bzhag nas sgo bcad de lde mig blangs nas song ba dang / dge slong dgon pa pa gzhan dag phongs par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas gsal bar
316a6('dul ba): dge slong dgon pa pa rnams kyi gnas gzhag par bya'o/ /nye dgas khyim bdag cig gtsug lag khang rtsig tu bcug nas/ de ni/ de na mi gnas par dge slong glo bur ba gang zhig 'ongs
316a7('dul ba): pa de la gnas byin nas rnyed pa ni/ bdag nyid kyis khyer ro/ /ji tsam na dge slong chos gos gsum pa zhig 'ongs pa dang / des gtsug lag khang de stong par mthong nas/ des dris
316b1('dul ba): pa/ 'di su'i gtsug lag khang yin/ dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ dge slong nye dga'i yin no/ /de de'i drung du song nas brnyas pa dang / des smras pa/ gtsug lag 'dir 'dug la/ rnyed pa
316b2('dul ba): gang yin pa de ni/ kho bo'i yin no/ /de der gnas te/ des gtsug lag khang de lan 'ga' yang phyag dar ma byas/ ba'i lci ba gsar ba'i byug bsam byugs so/ /de ji tsam zhig na gtsug lag
316b3('dul ba): khang de nas song ngo / /dge slong gzhan zhig 'ongs te/ des kyang nye dga' las brnyas nas gtsug lag khang der gnas pa dang / gtsug lag khang de phyag dar gyi phung pos gang bar mthong nas/ des de
316b4('dul ba): phyags nas phyag dar bor te/ phyags ma 'dzin bzhin du phyag dar gyi phung po'i drung na 'greng ba dang / ji tsam na dge slong gzhan zhig gis de mthong nas des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ khyod phyags
316b5('dul ba): ma lag pa na thogs bzhin du de nyid na 'greng ngam ci/ phyags ma de mi gzhag gam/ des smras pa/ 'di na lag pa srung ba 'ga' zhig gnas gnas pa lta ste/ des phyags ma'i rjes kyang med
316b6('dul ba): do/ /des smras pa/ 'di na dge slong chos gos gsum pa che ge mo zhig gnas gnas so/ /ji tsam na des de bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mthong nas ma nongs so/ /des smras pa/ rnyed pa ni/ nye
316b7('dul ba): dgas khyer la/ de'i gtsug lag khang kho bos phyag dar bya'am zhes pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
317a1('dul ba): pa/ rnyed pa su khyer ba des gtsug lag khang phyag dar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyin bdag shi ba rnams kyi ming gis yon bsngo bar bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa dang /
317a2('dul ba): dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis shi ba rnams kyi phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'don pa na/ khyim bdag cig gtsug lag khang du 'ongs na/ des de yon bsngo ba thos nas de de'i drung du song ste smras
317a3('dul ba): pa/ 'phags pa/ gal te bdag gis kyang gtsug lag khang brtsigs na/ bdag gi ming gis kyang yon bshad pa mdzad dam/ des smras pa/ rtsigs shig dang legs par bsngo'o/ /ji
317a4('dul ba): tsam na khyim bdag des gtsug lag khang zhig rtsig tu bcug nas/ des der ci yang ma bzhag go /des stong pa nyid du 'dug pa ji tsam na khyim bdag des mthong nas des gtsug lag khang
317a5('dul ba): du 'ongs nas smras pa/ 'phags pa/ bdag gi gtsug lag khang stong par mchis na/ de na su yang mi bzhugs sam/ dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis smras pa/ bzhin bzang mi
317a6('dul ba): snum pas so/ /khyim bdag des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ tshwa rgo can/ dgon dung la brtsigs pa la ga la snum par 'gyur/ khyim bdag de la bsam nas kho bo smra ba ma yin te/
317a7('dul ba): 'on kyang de na rnyed pa med do/ /des smras pa/ 'phags pa/ de ni/ bdag gi gtsug lag khang du su bzhugs pa la ras yug chen bskon no/ /nye dgas rnyed pa 'thob bo/ /snyam
317b1('dul ba): nas gral rim gyis bab pa na rang gi skal bar blangs nas de ni gzhan nyid na gnas te/ de ni stong par 'dug go/ ji tsam na bsod snyoms pa mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba zhig mnyan yod du
317b2('dul ba): 'ongs pa des/ gtsug lag khang stong pa de mthong nas/ des dge slong dag la dris pa/ gtsug lag khang 'di su'i yin/ de dag gis smras pa/ dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang yin mod kyi/
317b3('dul ba): dge slong nye dga'i skal par dbang ngo / /de nye dga'i drung du song nas/ khyod kyi skal pa'i gtsug lag khang 'dir 'dug go /des smras pa/ de bzhin byos shig /de de na gnas pa na bsod
317b4('dul ba): snyoms pa de/ mkhas pa snyoms las mi byed pa zhig yin pas/ des de nyi ma re rer byug pa dang phyag dar byas so/ /phyag dar byed pa la ni/ phan yon lnga yod de/ 'di lta ste/ bdag nyid
317b5('dul ba): sems dang bar 'gyur ba dang / gzhan sems dang par 'gyur ba dang / lha rnams yid dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / mdzes par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gsog pa dang / lus zhig nas bde
317b6('dul ba): 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /gang dag gis gtsug lag khang de byug pa dang / phyag dar byas pa mthong ba de dag gis khyim bdag de'i drung du song ste smras pa/
317b7('dul ba): des thos nas mchog tu dga' ba skyes so/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rang nyid der song na/ gtsug lag khang de de bzhin du byug pa dang phyag dar byas pa mthong nas/ de dad pa skyes
318a1('dul ba): te/ des bsod snyoms pa la ras yug chen bskon pa nye dgas thos nas de rings par rings par song ste smras pa/ bsod snyoms pa/ gtsug lag khang 'di
318a2('dul ba): kho bos skal ba yin gyi/ ras yug chen kho bo la byin cig /bsod snyoms pas bsam pa/ chags pa'i bdag nyid can 'di la gal te bdag gis ma byin yang 'on kyang mthus khyer nas
318a3('dul ba): bdag kyang gtsug lag khang nas bskrad par 'gyur ro/ /snyam nas des de la byin pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / byung ba 'di la bcom ldan
318a4('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang la dad pa skyes nas dad pa'i lhag par bya ba byas pa ni/ de kho na'i yin no/ /dbyar gyi rnyed pa ni/ nye dga'i yin no/ /'jig rten pa ni/ yon tan la
318a5('dul ba): dga' ba yin pas bdag nyid dang / bu dang / chung ma sdug bsngal bar gyur kyang / yon tan dang ldan pa la sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ bram ze dang / khyim bdag dad pa can rnams
318a6('dul ba): dge slong dgon pa pa rnams zas la mgron du 'bod par byed do/ /dge slong dgon pa pa rnams zas la khyim rnams su dong ba dang / ma byin par len pa rnams kyis gtsug lag khang
318a7('dul ba): nas brkus par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgo bcad la lde mig blangs la 'dong bar bya'o/ /ma byin par len pa rnams kyis kyang lde mig byas te
318b1('dul ba): brkus nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ srung ma'i dge slong bzhag la 'dong bar bya ste/ de la bsod snyoms kyis brel ba med par bya'o/ /ma byin pa len pa rnams kyis dge
318b2('dul ba): slong gzhan khrid de 'ongs nas/ des sgo phye zhes smras nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rims dang bcas sam rims med ces brda bya'o/ /gal te rims dang bcas so/ /
318b3('dul ba): zhes zer na/ mi dbye'o/ /'on te rims med ces smra na/ dbye bar bya'o/ /gzhan yang / dge slong dgon pa pas lo ma ltar mnyen pa gzhag par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dge
318b4('dul ba): slong dgon pa pas lo ma ltar mnyen pa gzhag par bya'o/ /zhes gsungs pa/ dge slong rnams kyis lo ma ltar mnyen pa ci 'dra ba ma shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
318b5('dul ba): dge slong dag/ lo ma ltar mnyen pa ni/ khyi yin te/ de la lhung bzed kyi lhag ma sbyin par bya'o/ /dge slong dgon pa rnams kyis khyi bcangs pa las mchod rten gyi 'khor sa dang /
318b6('dul ba): gtsug lag khang sder mos brud cing / bshad ba dang gci bas ma rung bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ ngas dge slong khyi bsrel ba'i kun
318b7('dul ba): tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong khyi bsrel bas nang par sngar langs la mchod rten gyi 'khor sa dang gtsug lag khang byul bar bya ste/ sder brud pa gang yin pa de
319a1('dul ba): bsnyam par bya'o/ /bshang ba dang gci ba yang phyag dar bya'o/ /dge slong khyi bsrel bas kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te 'jug
319a2('dul ba): par mi byed na/ 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' gtsug lag khang zhig gi dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan du gyur pa dang / ji tsam na der dge 'dun gyi gnas
319a3('dul ba): brtan gzhan zhig 'ongs nas nye dgas bsam pa/ bdag gtsug lag khang 'di'i dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan byed byed pa las/ gnas brtan gnyis par bya ba'am/ bdag gtsug lag
319a4('dul ba): khang gzhan du 'gro'o snyam du bsam pa las/ gtsug lag khang de nas byung ste/ de gtsug lag khang gzhan zhig tu song ba dang / de'i gnas brtan gnyis pa'i rnyed pa gang yin pa
319a5('dul ba): de/ de'i dge 'dun gyi gnas brgan gyi yin nas des bsam pa/ bdag gi rnyed pa 'di na yang der zad la/ bdag gi rnyed pa de na yang der zad na/ spogs med par dge 'dun
319a6('dul ba): gyi gnas brtan gyis ci zhig bya zhes/ de slar rings pa rings par gtsug lag khang de nyid du song ba dang / gnas mal phyed bskos tsam na gtsug lag khang du phyin nas des
319a7('dul ba): smras pa/ rgan rim ji lta ba bzhin du gtsug lag khang skos shig/ dge slong rnams kyis 'das zin to/ /zhes de ma bskos pa dang / nye dgas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan
319b1('dul ba): pa dag/ ston pa bzhugs bzhin du bstan pa nub par byed dam/ ci/ rgan rim ji lta ba bzhin du gtsug lag khang skos shig/ ces pa'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das
319b2('dul ba): la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig dge 'dun gyi'am mchod rten gyi bya ba la song song ba zhig yin na/ de'i gnas mal rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du bsko
319b3('dul ba): bar bya'o/ /gzhan gyi ni/ gar bab pa bzhin du'o/ /nye dga' lhag par chags pas gtsug lag khang gnyis kyi rnyed pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /snyam nas/ gtsug lag khang gnyis su
319b4('dul ba): dbyar gnas par dam bcas te/ des dbyar gnas nas rnyed pa mnos pa dang gcig nas kyang ma thob/ gcig shos nas kyang ma thob nas gnas mal 'gyed pa'i dge slong rnams la kha zer
319b5('dul ba): ba'i skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ des dbyar gnas par khas blangs pas de la rnyed pa byin cig/
319b6('dul ba): dge slong rnams kyis gtsug lag khang gnyis ka nas kyang byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gtsug lag khang gnyis ka nas sbyin par mi bya'o/ /gcig nas byin pa
319b7('dul ba): dang / dge slong gzhan rnams smod par byed/ gzhogs 'phyas byed/ kha zer bar byed de/ gtsug lag khang gnyis kar dbyar gnas na/ ci'i phyir gcig nas sbyin zhes pa'i
320a1('dul ba): skabs de/ dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gtsug lag khang gnyis ka nas phyed

320a3('dul ba): gis gtsug lag khang gnyis rtsig tu bcug ste/ gcig ni/ dgon pa pa rnams kyi yin no/ /gcig shos ni/ grong mtha' pa rnams kyi lan no/ /khyim bdag de'i kun tu
320a4('dul ba): spyod pa ni/ dbyar gnas pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi dge slong re re la ras yug chen re re bskon pa yin pas/ de ras yug chen rnams khyer te/ dgon pa ba rnams kyi gtsug
320a5('dul ba): lag khang du song ba dang / nye dgas dgon pa ba rnams kyi gtsug lag khang du rnyed pa 'bul lo/ /zhes thos nas des dga' bo la sling pa/ gal te 'dir rnyed pa 'bul na/ skal ba
320a6('dul ba): nos shig ces smras nas/ de rings pa rings par dgon pa ba rnams kyi gtsug lag khang du song ba dang / khyim bdag des mthong nas des bsam pa/ 'o ni/ gom stangs dang sbyar
320a7('dul ba): na/ dgon pa ba'i gtsug lag khang der song gi/ da ji ltar byas na rung snyam pa las/ re zhig grong mtha' ba'i gtsug lag khang du phul la/ phyis 'dir dbul lo/ /snyam
320b1('dul ba): nas/ de phyir log nas ras yug po che brim par brtsams pa na/ dga' bos lag pa bzed pa dang / khyim bdag des ras yug po che gcig byin no/ /yang bzed pa dang / khyim bdag
320b2('dul ba): gis smras pa/ 'phags pa/ khyod la ras yug po che phul lags na/ ci/ yang bzhed dam/ des smras pa/ khyim bdag/ khyod kyi gtsug lag khang du nye dgas dbyar gnas pas de'i
320b3('dul ba): skal pa nod do/ /khyim bdag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rang gi lag nas sbyin pa la bsngags pa mdzad pas/ rang gi lag kho na nas 'bul lo/ /de skyengs
320b4('dul ba): nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ nye dgas bsam pa/ khyim bdag de ring zhig thogs na grong gi mthar ma song grang snyam du bsam nas/ grong mtha' ba'i gtsug lag khang du song nas dga' bo
320b5('dul ba): la dris pa/ tshe dang ldan pa/ bdag gi ras yug po che mnos sam/ des ji ltar gyur pa smras so/ /khyim bdag gis lam gzhan nas dgon pa ba'i gtsug lag khang du song ste ras
320b6('dul ba): yug po che brims nas song ngo / /nye dgas yang slar dgon pa ba'i gtsug lag khang du brgyugs na/ ji tsam na ras yug po che rnams brims zin pa dang / de gtsug lag khang gnyis kyi rnyed pa
320b7('dul ba): la lhag par chags pa las rnyed pa las nyams nas/ mya ngan byed cing yi mug nas smre sngags 'don to/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs
321a1('dul ba): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ nye dga' lhag par chags pas ras yug po che las nyams pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
321a2('dul ba): stsal pa/ dge slong dag /da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi/ ji ltar 'dis 'das pa'i dus na yang lhag par chags pas zas chad par byas pa de nyon cig /dge slong dag /sngon byung
321a3('dul ba): ba| 'bab chu'i ngos gnyis na gtsug lag khang gnyis shig yod de/ gcig na ni/ dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa'o/ /gcig shos na ni/ bsod snyoms pa rnams kyi'o/ /ji tsam na khyi
321a4('dul ba): gaN+DI'i sgra shes pa zhig yod de/ de gaN+DI'i sgra thos nas dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa yod pa'i gtsug lag khang du song na/ de la dge slong kha cig gis lhung bzed kyi lhag ma byin pa dang / des
321a5('dul ba): de zos nas bsod snyoms pa rnams kyi gtsug lag khang du song ste/ der yang lhung bzed kyi lhag ma zos nas dga' mgur 'gro'o/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na bsod snyoms pa rnams
321a6('dul ba): la glo bur gyi rnyed pa zhig byung nas de rnams kyis sngar gaN+DI brdungs pa dang / khyi des gaN+DI'i sgra thos nas/ chu brgal bar brtsams te des dbus su phyin pa dang / dge 'dun gyi
321a7('dul ba): rnyed pa can gyi gtsug lag khang gi gaN+DI yang brdungs nas de spro ba med nas slar log par brtsams pa las/ de chu'i rgyun gyis ring du khyer nas gnyis ka las nyams par gyur to//
321b1('dul ba): dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyi gaN+DI'i sgra shes pa gang yin pa de ni/ nye dga' 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang 'di lhag par chags pas gnyis ka las nyams par gyur
321b2('dul ba): to| |da ltar yang lhag par chags pas gnyis ka las nyams par gyur to/ /dge slong dag /de lta bas na/ dge slong gis lhag par chags par mi bya'o/ /byed na/ 'gal tshabs can
321b3('dul ba): du 'gyur ro/ /sdom la/ 'thab dang nad pa rdzogs pa dang / /nub mo'i dus dang ka shi dang / /shing dang gsing ma 'dug gnas dang / /cha rnams dang ni bsgo ba'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom
321b4('dul ba): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ 'di ltar dge slong rnams kyis/ dge slong 'thab krol bgyid pa/ mtshang 'dru bar bgyid pa/ rtsod par bgyid pa/ 'gyed par
321b5('dul ba): bgyid pa/ rtsod pa'i gzhi bgyid pa rnams mchi zhing / de dag ngo tsha ma mchis pas mtho 'tsham pa'i slad du bdag cag la gleng bar bgyid/ dran par bgyid do/ /zhes thos na/ de rnams
321b6('dul ba): kyis de dag la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ nye bar 'khor/ dge slong gnyug mar gnas pa rnams kyis/ dge slong 'thab krol byed pa rnams 'ong ngo / /zhes thos na gnas mal bsko ba
321b7('dul ba): gsum dang gnas mal gzung ba drug bya'o/ /gnas mal bsko ba gsum gang zhe na/ dgun gyi dang / dpyid kyi dang / dbyar gyi'o/ /gnas mal gzung ba drug gang zhe na/ gtsug
322a1('dul ba): lag khang thams cad dang / gtsug lag khang gi nye 'khor thams cad dang / khang phran thams cad dang / khang phran gyi nye 'khor thams cad dang / kun
322a2('dul ba): dga'i ra ba thams cad dang / kun dga'i ra ba'i nye 'khor thams cad bsko bar bya'o/ /gal te gtsug lag skos shig /ces zer na/ 'di bskos zin to/ /zhes brjod par bya zhing /
