381a1('dul ba): gyur cing / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed par gyur pa ni/ kho bo cag gis rnyed pa rnyed pa ma yin te/ nyes pa rnyed kyi/ legs pa ma rnyed pas/ gzhi 'di la kho bo
381a2('dul ba): dang tshe dang ldan pa de dag gi ltung ba byung ba gang yin pa las/ kha na ma tho ba sbom po'am/ khyim na gnas pa la brten pa ma gtogs pa/ kho bos bdag dang tshe dang ldan pa de dag gi ched du khyed kyi
381a3('dul ba): drung du mi bcab par mthol zhing bshags par spro'o/ /zhes smra bar bya'o/ /phyogs gcig shos na dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan gang yang rung ba/ shes nyen can shes nyen can gang
381a4('dul ba): yang rung ba/ gtso bo gtso bo gang yang rung ba yod pa gang yin pa des kyang rang gi phyogs kyi drung du song ste tshig 'di skad ces/ tshe dang ldan pa dag/ bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos
381a5('dul ba): 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas 'thab par gyur cing / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed par gyur pa ni/ bdag cag gis rnyed pa rnyed pa ma yin te/ nyes pa rnyed kyi/ legs pa ma rnyed
381a6('dul ba): pas/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /gzhi 'di la kho bo dang khyed kyi ltung ba phyung ba gang yin pa las/ kha na ma tho ba sbom po'am/ khyim na gnas pa la brten pa ma gtogs pa/ kho bos bdag dang
381a7('dul ba): khyed kyi ched du tshe dang ldan pa de dag gi drung du mi bcab par mthol zhing bshags par spro'o/ /zhes smra bar bya'o/ /gal te dge slong de la rang gi phyogs nas dge slong gcig gis kyang smras pa
381b1('dul ba): ma bzlog cing mi gshe na/ de nas dge slong de/ phyogs gcig shos kyi drung du song nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te rgan rim ji lta ba bzhin du 'dud pa byas la tsog tsog por 'dug ste tshig 'di
381b2('dul ba): skad ces/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /kho bo cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas 'thab par gyur cing / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed par gyur pa ni/ kho bo cag
381b3('dul ba): gis rnyed pa rnyed pa ma yin te/ nyes pa rnyed kyi/ legs pa ma rnyed pas/ gzhi 'di la kho bo dang tshe dang ldan pa de dag gi ltung ba byung ba gang yin pa las/ kha na ma tho ba sbom po'am/ khyim na gnas
381b4('dul ba): pa la brten pa ma gtogs pa/ kho bos bdag dang tshe dang ldan pa de dag gi ched du khyed kyi drung du mi 'chab par mthol zhing bshags par spro'o/ /zhes smra par bya'o/ /gang gi tshe phyogs gcig
381b5('dul ba): gis gcig shos la'am/ gcig shos kyis gcig shos la spus la ltung ba lta bur byed/ 'byung bar bskyod/ mtshungs par nye bar ston par mdzad kyi/ phan tshun du ltung ba sgrog pas
381b6('dul ba): gleng bar mi byed na/ de ltar na/ rtsod pa de 'di lta ste/ rtswa bkram pa lta bur 'os pas zhi ba yin te/ dge slong dag/ de ltar na/ rtswa bkram pa lta bur 'os pa ni/ rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa yin
381b7('dul ba): zhing / de ltar na/ 'di na kha cig gi rtsod pa rnams 'di lta ste/ rtsa bkram pa lta bur 'os pa'i rtsod pa zhi bar byed pas dul ba dang / zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba yin no/ /dge slong dag /ltung ba'i rtsod
382a1('dul ba): pa ni/ rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa'i chos bzhi po 'dis dul bar bya/ zhi bar bya/ nye bar zhi bar bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ khas blang bar 'os pa dang / mngon sum du 'dul
382a2('dul ba): bar 'os pa dang / de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug par 'os pa dang / rtswa bkram pa lta bur 'os pas so/ /dge slong dag /bya ba'i rtsod pa ni/ dge 'dun mthun pas zhi bar bya'o/ /dge slong
382a3('dul ba): dag / gnas gang na dge slong gcig gnas pa de na 'thab pa med/ mtshang 'dru ba med/ 'thab mo med/ 'gyed pa med do/ /gang na gnyis yod pa de na yang 'thab pa med/ mtshang 'dru
382a4('dul ba): ba med/ 'thab mo med/ 'gyed pa med do/ /gang na gsum yod pa de na yang / 'thab pa med/ mtshang 'dru ba med/ 'thab mo med/ 'gyed pa med do/ /gang na dge slong bzhi'am/ lhag pa
382a5('dul ba): gnas pa de na ni/ 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa yod do/ /dge slong dag/ tshangs pa ji bzhin gcig de bzhin/ /brgya byin ji bzhin gnyis de bzhin/ /
382a6('dul ba): rgyal po ji bzhin gsum de bzhin/ /de las lhag pa 'khrug par 'gyur/ dge slong dag/ de lta bas na/ rjes su gnang ste/ tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig 'dzin pa gang yin pa de la yang /
382a7('dul ba): chos kyi rnyed pa sbyin par bya zhing / des kyang longs spyod par bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par ni/ mi bya'o/ /rtsod pa'i bzhi rdzogs so// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po brgyad cu pa/
382b1('dul ba): dge 'dun dbyen gyi bsdus pa'i sdom ni/ mang pos bkur dang lhag yos dang / /ba gam rnying dang bzang po dang / /'khor dang ko'u din rdzu 'phrul dang / /ko'u shi kas zos dang ba dang / /mnar med lhag
382b2('dul ba): gyur phyi ma'o/ /sdom ni/ mang pos bkur dang seng ge'i 'gram/ /legs par rab sad de bzhin du/ dga' ldan 'dod pa'i rigs dang ni/ /'dun pas 'dug dang gzhong pa dang / /srin bu go cha
382b3('dul ba): bzang len dang / /lhag bcas pa dang de bcu'o/ /yangs pa can du bstan pa dang / /rab sbyin dang ni grags 'dzin dang / /dang ba dang ni mkhas ma dang / /sa 'tsho ma ni bstan pa dang / /'dzam bu ri
382b4('dul ba): dwags nang skyes dang / rigs bdun ngan spong bu dang ni/ /rgyal po'i khab dang dka' thub dang / /ring 'phur dka' spyod dga' bo dang / /nag po bkra shis de bzhin du/ /bdud gzhom pa ni byas pa
382b5('dul ba): dang / /'khor ni mdo ru bsdus pa'o/ /gru 'dzin du dgra 'dul dang brgya tham pa'o/ /dmag gis mi tshugs su ma rgyal ba las rgyal dang lnga khri bzhi stong ngo / /wA ra NA sir bzod dka' dang drug khri
382b6('dul ba): sum stong ngo / /kim pi lar tshangs sbyin dang brgyad khri bzhi stong ngo / /glang po che'i grong du glang pos sbyin dang sum khri nyis stong ngo / /rdo 'jog tu bal bu can dang lnga stong ngo / /brang gis nyal du tshan
382b7('dul ba): po che 'dul dang sum khri nyis stong ngo / /ma rgyal ba las rgyal du byin dang sum khri nyis stong ngo / /kA na kub dzar rgyal sde dang khri nyis stong ngo / /tsam par klu'i lha dang khri brgyad stong ngo / /ta la'i
383a1('dul ba): phreng du mi'i lha dang nyis khri lnga stong ngo / /tam lir rgya mtsho'i lha dang khri nyis stong ngo / /ba so'i grong du blo gros bzang po dang khri brgyad stong ngo / /rgyal po'i khab tu mun sel
383a2('dul ba): dang nyi khri lnga stong ngo / /wA ra NA sir dbang phyug chen po'i sde dang brgya tham pa'o/ /rtswa can du rgya mtsho'i sde dang brgyad khri bzhi stong ngo / /gru 'dzin du dka' thub spyod dang stong ngo / /rtswa can du sa'i gdong
383a3('dul ba): dang brgyad khri bzhi stong ngo / /wA ra NA sir sa'i bdag po dang 'bum mo/ /dmag gis mi tshugs par sa 'dzin dang 'bum mo/ /mi thi lar lha chen po dang brgyad khri bzhi stong ngo / /yang mi thi lar lha
383a4('dul ba): chen po nas bzung ste mu khyud nas shing rta sra ba'i bar brgyad khri bzhi stong ngo / /kun tu snang bar nam mkha'i bdag po dang klu mnyam skyong dang bdun khri bdun stong ngo / /wA ra NA sir kri kri dang legs
383a5('dul ba): skyes dang brgya tham pa'o/ /gru 'dzin du rna ba can dang bu ram shing pa dang brgya tham pa'o/ /gru 'dzin du 'phags skyes po dang bu ram shing pa la sogs pas khyim gyi bar brgya tham pa'o/ /ser skya'i
383a6('dul ba): gzhir shing rta bcu pa nas bzung ste lnga khri lnga stong byung ba la seng ge'i 'gram las bzhi ste/ bzhi po de rnams las gnyis gnyis so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul ser skya'i gzhi
383a7('dul ba): n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de nas ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i shAkya rab tu mang po 'dun khang du tshogs shing 'dus nas bar skabs kyi gtam 'di lta bu dag gleng bar byed
383b1('dul ba): de| shes ldan dag / shAkya rnams ni/ gang las skyes/ thog ma ni/ gang yin/ rgyu ni/ ci zhig yin/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni/ gang yin/ gal te bdag cag gi drung du 'ga' zhig
383b2('dul ba): 'ongs nas 'di skad 'dri ste/ shes ldan dag /shAkya rnams ni/ gang las skyes/ thog ma ni/ gang yin/ rgyu ni/ ci zhig yin/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni/ gang yin zhes de
383b3('dul ba): skad du 'dri na/ bdag cag gis ni/ shAkya rnams ni/ gang las skyes pa dang / thog ma gang yin pa dang / rgyu ni/ ci zhig yin pa dang / shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs brgyud ni/ gang yin
383b4('dul ba): pa yang mi shes na/ ji skad du lung bstan/ tshur/ bdag cag bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong la lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la don 'di nyid zhus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
383b5('dul ba): bdag cag la ji skad du lung bstan pa de bzhin du gzung bar bya'o/ /de nas ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i shAkya rab tu mang po bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan
383b6('dul ba): 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rnams kyis 'di skad ces
383b7('dul ba): gsol to/ /btsun pa/ 'dir bdag cag ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rab tu mang po 'dun khang du tshogs shing 'dug nas bar skabs bka' mchid 'di lta bu dag gleng ste/ shAkya rnams ni/ gang
384a1('dul ba): las skyes/ thog ma ni/ gang yin/ rgyu ni/ ci zhig yin/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni/ gang yin/ gal te bdag cag gi drung du 'ga'
384a2('dul ba): zhig 'ongs nas 'di skad ces 'dri ste/ shes ldan dag /shAkya rnams ni/ gang las skyes/ thog ma ni/ gang yin/ rgyu ni/ ci zhig yin/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs
384a3('dul ba): rgyud ni/ gang yin zhes de skad 'dri na/ bdag cag gis ni/ shAkya rnams ni/ gang las skyes/ thog ma ni/ gang yin/ rgyu ni/ ci zhig yin/ shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi
384a4('dul ba): rigs rgyud ni/ gang yin pa yang mi shes na/ ji skad lung bstan/ tshur/ bdag cag bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong la lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la don 'di
384a5('dul ba): nyid zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la ji skad du lung bstan pa de bzhin du gzung bar bgyi'o/ /snyam nas/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das la bdag cag don 'di
384a6('dul ba): nyid zhu lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ shAkya rnams ni/ gang las skyes lags/ thog ma ni/ gang lags/ rgyu ni/ ci zhig lags/ shAkya rnams sngon gyi rigs
384a7('dul ba): rgyud ni/ gang lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ gal te ngas shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams te chos kyi gtam gleng na/ /
384b1('dul ba): mu stegs can dang / kun tu rgyu gzhan dag 'di skad ces/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni/ ci 'dod pa de lta bu ston pas bdag nyid la bstod par byed do/ /zhes smra ba gang yin pa'i gnas
384b2('dul ba): 'di yod pas/ nga'i nyan thos las shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams nas chos kyi gtam gleng bar nus pa su yod snyam mo/ /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po
384b3('dul ba): 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu/ nga rgyab bsnyung bas re
384b4('dul ba): zhig de bsal gyi/ khyod kyis shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams nas dge slong rnams la chos kyi gtam bya bar spobs par gyis shig /tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu
384b5('dul ba): chen pos bcom ldan 'das la cang mi smra bas khas blangs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos cang mi smra bas khas blangs par thugs su chud
384b6('dul ba): nas snam sbyar bltab ste sngas phangs su bcug nas glo g.yas pa phab ste zhabs kyi steng du zhabs bzhag nas snang ba'i 'du shes dang / dran pa dang / shes bzhin dang / ldang ba'i 'du
384b7('dul ba): shes kho na yid la mdzad pas mnal to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyis bu chen po 'di snyam du sems te/ ma la bdag gis sems ji ltar mnyam par bzhag na/ shAkya
385a1('dul ba): rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud/ shAkya rnams gang las skyes pa dang / thog ma gang yin pa dang / rgyu ci zhig yin pa dang / shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud
385a2('dul ba): gang yin pa mthong bar gyur pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o/ /snyam nas/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos sems ji ltar mnyam par bzhag na/
385a3('dul ba): shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs
385a4('dul ba): rgyud/ shAkya rnams gang las skyes pa dang / thog ma gang yin pa dang / rgyu ni/ ci zhig yin pa dang / shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud ni/ gang yin pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas
385a5('dul ba): ting nge 'dzin de las langs te dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go/ /'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rnams
385a6('dul ba): la smras pa/ go'u ta ma dag/ 'jig rten 'di 'jig cing / 'jig rten zhig na sems can phal cher 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris su skye bar 'gyur te/ de rnams de na yid las byung ba'i
385a7('dul ba): gzugs phun sum tshogs pa/ dbang po ma nyams shing ma tshang ba med pa/ yan lag dang nyid lag thams cad dang ldan pa/ kha dog bzang bos gnas pa/ rang gi 'od can/ nam
385b1('dul ba): mkha' la 'gro ba/ dga' ba za zhing dga' ba'i zas kyis tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so/ /de'i tshe sa chen po 'di chu 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur zhing / mtsho gcig tu 'gyur ro/ /sa chen po
385b2('dul ba): 'di chu 'ba' zhig gi mtsho gcig tu gyur pa'i steng du rlung gis spris ma chags pa dang / mkhregs pa dang / khebs par byed do/ /dper na/ 'o ma bskol ba grang bar gyur ba'i steng du rlung gis
385b3('dul ba): spris ma chags pa dang / mkhregs pa dang khebs pa de bzhin du/ sa chen po 'di chu 'ba' zhig gi mtsho gcig tu gyur pa'i steng du rlung gis spris ma chags pa dang / mkhregs pa dang khebs
385b4('dul ba): bar byed do/ /sa'i bcud de ni/ kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/ dri phun sum tshogs pa dang / ro phun sum tshogs pa yin zhing / kha dog phun sum tshogs pa ni/ 'di lta bu yin te/ dper
385b5('dul ba): na mar gsar lta bu'o/ /ro ni/ 'di lta bu yin te/ dper na/ sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi btsir ba lta bu'i dus gang yin pa de yod do/ /go'u ta ma dag /'jig rten gang yin pa 'di 'chags
385b6('dul ba): shing 'jig rten chags na/ de nas sems can kha cig tshe zad/ las zad/ bsod nams zad nas 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas 'di lta bur mi rnams dang skal ba
385b7('dul ba): mnyam par 'ong zhing / de rnams 'di na yid las byung ba'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa/ dbang po ma nyams shing ma tshang ba med pa/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan
386a1('dul ba): zhing kha dog bzang pos gnas pa/ rang gi 'od can/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba/ dga' ba za zhing dga' ba'i zas kyis tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas par 'gyur
386a2('dul ba): ro| |de'i tshe nyi ma dang zla ba yang 'jig rten du mi 'byung ste/ rgyu skar rnams kyang med/ skad cig dang / thang cig dang / yud tsam yang med/ mtshan mo dang / nyin mo yang med/ zla ba
386a3('dul ba): dang / zla ba phyed dang / dus tshigs dang / lo rnams kyang 'jig rten du 'byung ba med do/ /skyes pa dang / bud med du mngon pa yang med kyi/ gzhan du na/ sems can sems can zhes
386a4('dul ba): bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/ /de nas sems can brkam chags kyi rang bzhin can zhig gis/ mdzub mo'i rtse mos sa'i bcud myong bar byed do/ /ji lta ji ltar myangs pa de lta de ltar sred do/ /
386a5('dul ba): ji lta ji ltar sred pa de lta de ltar kham gyi zas rim gyis za'o/ /sems can gzhan dag gis kyang sems can de mdzub mo'i rtse mos sa'i bcud myong bar byed de/ ji lta ji ltar myangs pa de
386a6('dul ba): lta de ltar sred la/ ji lta ji ltar sred pa de lta de ltar kham gyi zas rim gyis za ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas de rnams kyis kyang mdzub mo'i rtse mos sa'i bcud myong bar rtsom ste/ ji lta ji ltar
386a7('dul ba): myangs pa de lta de ltar sred do/ /ji lta ji ltar sred pa de lta de ltar kham gyi zas rim gyis za'o/ /gang gi tshe sems can de rnams kyis sa'i bcud la kham gyi zas rim gyis zos pa de'i
386b1('dul ba): tshe de rnams kyi lus la mkhrang ba dang lci ba zhugs par gyur to/ /de rnams kyi kha dog bzang po/ /gsal ba gang yin pa de yang nub par gyur bas/ 'jig rten du mun pa byung bar gyur to/ /go'u ta
386b2('dul ba): ma dag / chos nyid kyis 'jig rten du mun pa byung na/ nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyu skar dang / skad cig dang / thang cig dang / yud cig dang / mtshan mo dang /
386b3('dul ba): nyin mo dang / zla ba dang / zla ba phyed dang / dus tshigs dang / lo 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de rnams de za zhing zas su za ba las tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so/ /de rnams las
386b4('dul ba): kha zas la ches nyung zad du za ba gang yin pa de ni/ kha dog dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /kha zas la ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni/ kha dog ngan par gyur te/ kha zas kyi tshad gnyis la brten
386b5('dul ba): nas kha dog rnam pa gnyis mngon te/ kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/ kye sems can/ kho bo ni/ kha dog dang ldan no/ /khyed ni/ kha dog ngan pa yin no/ /zhes sems can gyis
386b6('dul ba): sems can la khyad du gsod do/ /kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can de rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus sa'i bcud de nub par gyur to/ /go'u ta ma dag /sa'i
386b7('dul ba): bcud de nub pa na sems can de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces/ kyi hud bro ba/ kyi hud bro ba zhes smra zhing smre sngags 'don la/ mya ngan dang / sdug bsngal bar gyur
387a1('dul ba): to| |dper na/ da ltar mi rnams kyis zas zhim po cung zad cig zos nas sngon gyi yi ge dang / tshig dang tshig 'bru de nyid rjes su dran nas 'di skad ces/ kyi hud bro ba/ kyi
387a2('dul ba): hud bro ba zhes smra ba de bzhin du sems can de rnams sa'i bcud de nub pa na tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces/ kyi hud bro ba/ kyi hud bro ba zhes smra zhing smre sngags 'don la/ mya ngan dang /
387a3('dul ba): sdug bsngal bar gyur kyang smras pa 'di'i don ni/ 'di yin/ smras pa 'di'i don ni/ 'di yin no/ /zhes de'i don ni/ mi shes so/ /go'u ta ma dag /sems can de rnams kyi sa'i bcud
387a4('dul ba): de nub pa na/ sa zhag kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/ dri phun sum tshogs pa/ ro phun sum tshogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/ kha dog ni/ 'di lta bu yin te/ dper na/ dong ka'i me tog lta
387a5('dul ba): bu'o/ /ro ni/ 'di lta bu yin te/ dper na/ sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi btsir ba lta bu'o/ /de rnams de za zhing zas su za ba las tshe ring yun ring du gnas so/ /de rnams la kha zas las ches nyung
387a6('dul ba): du za ba gang yin pa de ni/ kha dog dag dang ldan par gyur to/ /kha zas la ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni/ kha dog ngan par gyur to/ /zas kyi tshad gnyis la brten nas kha dog rnam pa
387a7('dul ba): gnyis mngon te/ kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/ kye sems can/ kho bo ni/ kha dog dang ldan la/ khyod ni/ kha dog ngan pa yin no/ /zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad
387b1('dul ba): du gsod par byed do/ /kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can de rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus sa zhag nub par gyur to/ /go'u ta ma dag /sa zhag de nub par gyur pa na
387b2('dul ba): sems can de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces/ kyi hud bro ba/ kyi hud bro ba zhes smra zhing smre sngags 'don la/ mya ngan gyis sdug bsngal bar byed do/ /dper na/ da ltar mi rnams
387b3('dul ba): sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba 'ga' zhig gis reg pa na/ sngon gyi yi ge dang / tshig dang / tshig 'bru de nyid rjes su dran nas 'di skad ces/ e ma'o kyi hud/ e ma'o kyi hud ces smra
387b4('dul ba): ba de bzhin du sems can de rnams sa zhag de nub pa na/ tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces/ kyi hud bro ba/ kyi hud bro ba zhes smra zhing smre sngags 'don la/ mya ngan dang / sdug bsngal bar
387b5('dul ba): gyur kyang smras pa 'di'i don ni/ 'di yin/ smras pa 'di'i don ni/ 'di yin no/ /zhes bya bar de'i don ni/ mi shes so/ /go'u ta ma dag /sems can de rnams kyi sa zhag de nub pa na/
387b6('dul ba): myu gu'i tshal kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/ dri phun sum tshogs pa/ ro phun sum tshogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / kha dog ni/ 'di lta bu yin te/ dper na/ shing ka dam pa ka'i me tog
387b7('dul ba): lta bu'o/ /ro ni/ 'di lta bu yin te/ dper na/ sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi btsir ba lta bu'o/ /de rnams de za zhing zas su za ba las tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so/ /de rnams las kha zas la ches
388a1('dul ba): nyung bar za ba gang yin pa de ni/ kha dog dang ldan par gyur to/ /kha zas la ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni/ kha dog ngan par gyur to/ /zas kyi tshad gnyis la brten
388a2('dul ba): nas kha dog rnam pa gnyis mngon no/ /kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/ kye sems can/ kho bo ni/ kha dog dang ldan la/ khyod ni/ kha dog ngan pa yin no/ /zhes sems can gyis sems
388a3('dul ba): can la khyad du gsod par byed do/ /kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can de rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus/ myu gu'i tshal de nub par gyur to/ /go'u ta ma dag /
388a4('dul ba): myu gu'i tshal de nub par gyur pa na/ sems can de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces/ mdun nas phar song / mdun nas phar song zhes smra zhing smre sngags 'don la/ mya ngan
388a5('dul ba): dang / sdug bsngal bar gyur to/ /dper na/ da ltar mi rnams 'ga' zhig la tshig drag po'i tshar bcad pas tshar gcad par 'dod pa na/ sngon gyi yi ge dang / tshig dang / tshig 'bru de dag
388a6('dul ba): nyid rjes su zlos shing 'di skad ces/ mdun nas phar song / mdun nas phar song zhes smra ba de bzhin du sems can de rnams myu gu'i tshal nub pa dang / tshogs shing 'dus nas 'di skad ces/
388a7('dul ba): mdun nas phar song / mdun nas phar song zhes smra zhing / smre sngags 'don la/ mya ngan dang / sdug bsngal bar gyur kyang smras pa 'di'i don ni/ 'di yin/ smras pa/ 'di'i don ni/ 'di yin
388b1('dul ba): no/ /zhes bya bar de'i don ni/ mi shes so/ /go'u ta ma dag /sems can de rnams kyi myu gu'i tshal nub nas ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bras bu tshon bzhi pa phub ma dang / sbun pa med pa/ shun
388b2('dul ba): pa med pa/ dag pa/ gtsang ma skyes te/ de nub brngas na/ nang skye zhing smin par 'gyur/ nang brngas na/ nub skye zhing smin par 'gyur pas/ brngas shing brngas kyang slar skya pas brngas par yang mi mngon
388b3('dul ba): no/ /de rnams de za zhing de zas su za ba las tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so/ /gang nas sems can de rnams kyis ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bras bu la kham gyi zas su rim gyis zos pa de nas
388b4('dul ba): de rnams kyi dbang po tha dad pa byung bar gyur te/ kha cig la ni/ skyes pa'i dbang po'o/ /kha cig la ni/ bud med kyi dbang po'o/ /de na bud med kyi dbang po can gang yin pa rnams dang / skyes pa'i dbang
388b5('dul ba): po can gang yin pa rnams gcig la gcig mig gis mig tshugs su blta'o/ /ji lta ji ltar gcig la gcig mig gis mig tshugs su blta ba de lta de ltar kun tu chags so/ /ji lta ji ltar kun tu
388b6('dul ba): chags pa de lta de ltar zhen to/ /ji lta ji ltar zhen pa de lta de ltar log par zhugs so/ /sems can gzhan dag gis kyang sems can gyis sems can la log par zhugs pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas
388b7('dul ba): kyang sa dang / bong ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mos gtor nas 'di skad ces/ sems can ngan pa tha chad rnams ni/ bya ba ma yin pa byed do/ /sems can ngan pa tha chad rnams ni/ bya ba ma
389a1('dul ba): yin pa byed pa yin gyi/ kwa'i sems can/ khyod kyis da ji ltar sems can sun dbyung zhes smra'o/ /dper na/ da ltar mi rnams bag ma blangs pa na/ phye ma dang / dri dang /
389a2('dul ba): phreng ba dang / gos dang / 'bras yos kyis gtor nas 'di skad ces/ bag ma bde bar gyur cig /ces zer ba de bzhin du sems can rnams kyis/ sems can gyis sems can la log par
389a3('dul ba): zhugs pa mthong ba na/ sas gtor cing / bong ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo rnams kyis kyang gtor nas 'di skad ces/ sems can ngan pa tha chad rnams ni/ bya ba ma yin pa byed do/ /
389a4('dul ba): sems can ngan pa tha chad rnams ni/ bya ba ma yin pa byed pa yin gyi/ kwa'i sems can/ khyed kyis da ji ltar sems can sun dbyung zhes smra ba'i dus gang yin pa de yod do/ /go'u ta ma
389a5('dul ba): dag / de ltar na/ sngon chos ma yin par 'dod pa gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi 'dul ba ma yin par 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni/ da ltar chos su 'dod/ 'dul bar 'dod do/ /sngon smad par
389a6('dul ba): bya bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni/ da ltar bsngags par bya bar 'dod do/ /de rnams kyis de zhag gcig spangs pa nas zhag gnyis dang / gsum dang / bdun yang spangs so/ /gang nas
389a7('dul ba): sems can de rnams sdig pa can dam pa ma yin pa'i chos de la lhag par sdig pa can gyi brtul zhugs spyod pa de nas de rnams khang pa rtsig pa la brtson par byed de/ 'dir bdag cag
389b1('dul ba): bya ba ma yin pa spyad do/ /'dir bdag cag bya ba ma yin pa spyad do/ /zhes zer bas khyim khyim zhes bya bar grags te/ go'u ta ma dag /'di ni/ 'jig rten du khang pa'i las kyi mtha' rnams byung ba'i
389b2('dul ba): rtsom pa dang po yin no/ /de yang chos kyis yin gyi/ chos ma yin pas ma yin te/ de la rgyal ba'i dbang po'i chos la 'di ni/ gtso bo yin te/ de rnams nub bza' ba don du gnyer ba yang dgongs
389b3('dul ba): ka sA lu'i ched du 'dong bar byed do/ /nang bza' ba don du gnyer ba yang nang par sA lu'i ched du 'dong bar byed do/ /de nas sems can snyoms las kyi rang bzhin can zhig gis/ nang par gyi sA lu nub
389b4('dul ba): mo blangs so/ /de nas sems can zhig gis sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye sems can khyod tshur/ sA lu'i phyir 'dong ngo / /de nas sems can des sems can de la 'di skad ces
389b5('dul ba): smras so/ /kye sems can/ khyod rang gi sA lu la soms shig /kho bos ni/ nang par gyi sA lu do nub blangs so/ /de nas sems can de 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma/ de ni/ legs so/ /kye
389b6('dul ba): ma| de ni/ shin tu legs kyi/ ma la bdag gis zhag gnyis kyi dang / zhag gsum gyi dang / zhag bdun gyi bar gyi sA lu blang ngo / /snyam du sems nas/ des zhag gnyis kyi dang / zhag gsum
389b7('dul ba): gyi dang / zhag bdun gyi bar gyi sA lu blangs so/ /de nas sems can zhig gis sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye sems can/ khyod tshur/ sA lu'i phyir 'dong ngo / /de nas sems can
390a1('dul ba): des sems can de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye sems can/ khyod rang gi sA lu la soms shig /kho bos ni/ zhag gnyis kyi dang / zhag gsum gyi dang / zhag bdun
390a2('dul ba): gyi bar gyi sA lu blangs zin to/ /de nas sems can de 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma/ de ni/ legs so/ /kye ma/ de ni/ shin tu legs kyi/ ma la bdag gis zla ba phyed dang / zla ba gcig gi sA
390a3('dul ba): lu blang ngo / /snyam nas/ des zla ba phyed dang / zla ba gcig gi sA lu blangs so/ /gang nas sems can de rnams kyis ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bru gsog 'jog gis yongs su longs spyad
390a4('dul ba): pas zos pa de nas sA lu de'i 'bras bu phub ma dang / sbun pa dang / shun pas g.yogs par gyur to/ /brngas shing brngas na yang phyir mi skye bas brngas par yang mngon la/ sA lu yang sbubs sam/
390a5('dul ba): yal ga'i sbubs la yod par gyur to/ /de nas sems can de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas shes ldan dag /bdag cag sngon yid las byung ba'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa/ dbang po ma
390a6('dul ba): nyams shing ma tshang ba med pa/ yan lag dang nyid lag thams cad dang ldan pa/ kha dog bzang pos gnas pa/ rang gi 'od dang ldan pa/ nam mkha' la 'gro zhing / dga' ba za zhing dga' ba'i
390a7('dul ba): zas kyis tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas la/ bdag cag sa'i bcud kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/ dri phun sum tshogs pa/ ro phun sum tshogs pa byung bar gyur to/ /bdag cag sa'i bcud la
390b1('dul ba): kham gyi zas su rim gyis zos te/ gang gi tshe bdag gi sa'i bcud la kham gyi zas su rim gyis zos pa de'i tshe/ bdag cag gi lus la rtsub pa nyid dang / lji ba nyid dag zhugs par gyur to/ /kha dog
390b2('dul ba): bzang po'i gsal ba gang yin pa de nub par gyur pas/ 'jig rten du mun pa byung bar gyur to/ /bdag cag de za zhing de zas su za ba las tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas par gyur to/ /bdag cag las
390b3('dul ba): kha zas ches nyung du za ba gang yin pa de ni/ kha dog bzang por gyur/ kha zas ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni/ kha dog ngan par gyur te/ kha zas kyi tshad gnyis la brten nas kha dog rnam pa gnyis
390b4('dul ba): mngon te kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/ kwa'i sems can/ kho bo ni/ kha dog dang ldan la/ khyod ni/ kha dog ngan pa yin no/ /zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad du gsod par byed do/ /
390b5('dul ba): bdag cag kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus sa'i bcud de nub par gyur to/ /sa'i bcud de nub pa na/ sa zhag kha dog phun sum tshogs
390b6('dul ba): pa| dri phun sum tshogs pa/ ro phun sum tshogs pa byung bar gyur te/ bdag cag de za zhing de zas su za ba las tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so/ /bdag cag las kha zas ches nyung du za ba gang
390b7('dul ba): yin pa de ni/ kha dog dang ldan par gyur/ kha zas ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni/ kha dog ngan par gyur te/ zas kyi tshad gnyis la brten nas kha dog rnam pa gnyis mngon no/ /kha dog
391a1('dul ba): rnam pa gnyis yod pas/ kwa'i sems can/ kho bo ni/ kha dog dang ldan la/ khyod ni/ kha dog ngan pa yin no/ /zhes sems can gyis sems can la khyad du
391a2('dul ba): gsod par byed do/ /bdag cag kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus sa zhag de nub par gyur to/ /sa zhag de nub pa na/ myu gu'i
391a3('dul ba): tshal kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/ dri phun sum tshogs pa/ ro phun sum tshogs pa byung bar gyur te/ bdag cag de za zhing de zas su za ba las tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas so/ /bdag cag
391a4('dul ba): rnams las kha zas ches nyung ngu za ba gang yin pa de ni/ kha dog dang ldan par gyur/ kha zas ches mang du za ba gang yin pa de ni/ kha dog ngan par gyur te/ zas kyi tshad gnyis la brten
391a5('dul ba): nas kha dog gi rnam pa gnyis mngon no/ /kha dog rnam pa gnyis yod pas/ kwa'i sems can/ kho bo ni/ kha dog dang ldan la/ khyod ni/ kha dog ngan pa yin no/ /zhes sems can gyis
391a6('dul ba): sems can la khyad du gsod par byed do/ /bdag cag kha dog gi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos de dag nyid blangs pa'i rgyus myu gu'i tshal de nub par gyur to/ /myu gu'i
391a7('dul ba): tshal de nub pa na/ ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu'i 'bru tshon bzhi pa/ phub ma med pa/ sbun pa med pa/ shun pa med pa/ dag pa/ gtsang ma skyes te/ de nub pa brngas na/ nang skye

397b2('dul ba): bya ba byung ngo / /go'u ta ma dag /rgyal po nam mkha'i bdag po'i bu klu mnyam skyong ngo / /go'u ta ma dag /rgyal po klu mnyam skyong gi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgya

397b4('dul ba): rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung
397b5('dul ba): zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i spyan sngar bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' ma 'ongs pa na/ byang chub par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab nas tshangs par spyod pa spyad de/ dga'
397b6('dul ba): ldan gyi lha'i ris su skyes so/ go'u ta ma dag /rgyal po kri kri'i bu legs skyes so/ /go'u ta ma dag /rgyal po legs skyes bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po brgya
397b7('dul ba): tham pa yang / grong khyer gru 'dzin du byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni/ rgyal po rna ba can zhes bya ba byung ngo / /go'u ta ma dag /rgyal po rna ba can la bu gnyis te/ go'u ta ma dang / b+ha ra d+h+wa dza'o//
398a1('dul ba): de gnyis las/ go'u ta ma ni/ mngon par 'byung bar dga'o/ /b+ha ra d+h+wa dza ni/ rgyal srid la mngon par dga'o/ /des/ pha chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed pa
398a2('dul ba): mthong nas des bsam pa/ bdag yab 'das nas rgyal por 'gyur te/ bdag gis kyang chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byas na/ sems can dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur bas 'dir
398a3('dul ba): ci'i dus la bab ce na/ khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar bya'o/ /snyam du bsam nas rgyal po rna ba can gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te gsol ba btab
398a4('dul ba): pa/ yab/ mkhyen par mdzod cig /bdag ni/ dad pas khyim nas khyim ma mchis par rab tu 'byung ngo / /des smras pa/ bu/ gang gi phyir mchod sbyin mchod par byed pa dang / sbyin sreg
398a5('dul ba): sreg par byed pa dang / dka' thub spyod pa de dag ni/ 'di'i ched yin te/ nga 'das nas rgyal srid lag mthil du 'ongs te rgyal po byed par 'gyur na/ ci'i phyir rab tu 'byung / des
398a6('dul ba): smras pa/ yab/ bdag gis chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid bgyid rngo mi thogs so/ /de lta bas na mkhyen par mdzod cig /rab tu 'byung ngo / /de nas rgyal pos gal gyis bcu par
398a7('dul ba): shes nas gnang ngo / /de'i tshe bsti gnas shig na drang srong mdog nag ces bya ba gnas so/ /de nas gzhon nu go'u ta ma rgyal pos gnang nas dga' zhing mgu la/ dga' ba chen po dang /
398b1('dul ba): yid bde ba skyes nas drang srong mdog nag gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / spyod lam dul bas rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas nas smras pa/ drang srong chen po/ bdag rab tu 'byung bar 'dod kyi/ bdag rab
398b2('dul ba): tu phyung zhig / des de rab tu phyung ngo / /drang srong mdog nag ni/ 'bras bu dang / rtsa ba dang / chu 'thung bas/ de yang drang srong go'u ta ma/ drang srong go'u ta ma zhes bya bar gyur to/ /ji tsam na/ dus gzhan
398b3('dul ba): zhig na rgyal po rna ba can shi nas gzhon nu b+ha ra d+h+wa dza pha'i rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du bcug go/ ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na drang srong go'u ta mas mkhan po la smras pa/ mkhan po/ dgon
398b4('dul ba): pa'i zas kyis 'tsho bar rngo mi thogs kyi/ grong 'dabs su gnas par bgyi'o/ /des smras pa/ bu/ rung gi/ grong ngam/ dgon pa na gnas pa'i drang srong gis ni/ mdor na dbang po srung ba yin gyi/ khyod
398b5('dul ba): song la gru 'dzin gyi nye 'khor du lo ma'i spyil bu byos la 'dug cig / mkhan po/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes smras nas/ drang srong go'u ta ma gru 'dzin gyi nye 'khor du lo ma'i spyil bu byas te gnas
398b6('dul ba): so| |de'i tshe grong khyer gru 'dzin na smad tshong ma bzang mo zhes bya ba dang / skyes bu g.yon can pad+ma'i rtsa lag ces bya ba zhig gnas te/ des de la dga' mgur spyod pa'i phyir gos dang rgyan bskur
398b7('dul ba): ro| |des gos dang rgyan dag thogs nas chas pa las/ yang mi gzhan zhig kaR+sha pa Na lnga brgya thogs pa zhig 'ongs nas bzang mo/ dga' mgur spyad kyi tshur shog /des bsam pa/ gal te
399a1('dul ba): bdag song na kaR+sha pa Na lnga brgya yang mi 'thob la/ khyim du 'ongs pa spangs te gzhan du 'gro ba 'di ni/ legs pa ma yin no/ /snyam nas/ des bu mo mngag gzhug ma
399a2('dul ba): la smras pa/ song la pad+ma'i rtsa lag la jo mo'i mchid nas re zhig bdag la skabs ma mchis te/ slad kyis mchi'o/ /zhes smros shig /des de'i gan du song nas smras so/ /mi de yang bya ba mang po
399a3('dul ba): zhig yin pas de dang de dga' mgur spyad nas thun dang po nyid la song ngo / /des bsam pa/ nam tshod ring du yod pas de'i sems bdag gis bsrung bar nus so/ /snyam nas des/ yang bu mo de la
399a4('dul ba): bsgo ba/ pad+ma'i rtsa lag gi gan du song la jo mo'i mchid nas sta gon bgyis lags na/ skyed mos tshal gang du mchi zhes smros shig /des de'i gan du song nas smras pa dang / des smras pa/ khyod kyi
399a5('dul ba): jo mo skad cig la skabs med/ skad cig la skabs yod ce'am/ bu mo de/ de dang rigs mi 'phrod pa zhig pas des smras pa/ rje'i sras/ skabs ma mchis pa ni/ ma lags mod kyi des khyod kyi
399a6('dul ba): gos dang rgyan dag gis skyes pa gzhan dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad do/ /de'i 'dod chags kyi kun nas dkris pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur cing gnod sems kyi kun nas dkris
399a7('dul ba): pa skyes te/ de mi bzod pa skyes nas smras pa/ bu mo/ song la bzang mo la pad+ma'i rtsa lag na re/ skyed mos tshal ga ge mo zhig tu shog ces byos shig/ des song nas bzang mo la smras pa dang /
399b1('dul ba): de nas de skyed mos tshal du song ba dang / skyes bu g.yon can pad+ma'i rtsa lag gis smras pa/ khyod kho bo'i gos dang rgyan gyis skyes pa gzhan dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod pa rigs sam/ des smras pa/ rje'i
399b2('dul ba): sras/ de ni/ bdag gis nongs te/ 'on kyang bud med ni/ rtag tu skyon can lags pas bzod par mdzod cig/ de nas de mi bzod pa skyes nas ral gri shubs nas phyung nas bsad do/ /de nas bu mo mngag
399b3('dul ba): gzhug mas jo mo bsad do/ /jo mo bsad do/ /zhes ku co'i sgra chen po bton pa skye bo'i tshogs kun gyis thos nas brgyugs pa dang / de tsam na bsti gnas de nyid na drang srong go'u ta ma gnas so/ /de nas skyes
399b4('dul ba): bu g.yon can pad+ma'i rtsa lag de skrag nas/ ral gri khrag can drang srong go'u ta ma'i mdun du bor nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po de nyid kyi nang du zhugs so/ /skye bo'i tshogs chen pos der ral gri khrag can mthong
399b5('dul ba): nas smras pa/ rab tu byung ba 'dis bzang mo bsad do/ /zhes de nas drang srong go'u ta ma de bskor te/ mi bzod pa skyes nas smras pa/ kwa'i rab tu byung ba/ drang srong gi rgyal mtshan bzung nas 'di 'dra
399b6('dul ba): ba'i las byed dam/ des smras pa/ ci byas/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ bzang mo dang khyod lhan cig dga' mgur spyad nas de bsad do/ /des smras pa/ kho bo'i sdig pa zhi bas las de mi byed do/ /
399b7('dul ba): zhes des zhi ba smras kyang / skye bo'i tshogs chen po des lag pa phyin kha log tu dam du bcings nas rgyal po la phul te/ lha/ rab tu byung ba 'dis bzang mo dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad nas de
400a1('dul ba): bkum lags so/ /rgyal po rnams ni/ mi rtog pa yin pas/ des smras pa/ gal te de ltar gyur na/ rab tu byung ba 'di ngas spangs kyi gsal zhing la shon cig/ de nas
400a2('dul ba): rab tu byung ba me tog kA ra bI ra'i phreng ba mgul du btags shing / skyes pa gos sngon po gyon pa/ lag na mtshon thogs pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor nas lam po che dang / tshong 'dus dang / bzhi mdo
400a3('dul ba): dang / sum mdo rnams su bsgrags pa'i sgor bsgrags te/ grong khyer gyi lho phyogs kyi sgor phyung nas gson po nyid du gsal zhing la gshon no/ /de'i mkhan po mdog nag de/ dus dus su de'i bsti gnas su
400a4('dul ba): 'gro ba yin pas/ ji tsam du dus gzhan zhig na song ba las ma mthong nas/ des phan tshun du btsal bar brtsams pa dang / ji tsam na/ de gsal zhing la gshon par mthong nas/ de/ skad
400a5('dul ba): mi gsal zhing mig mchi mas gang la snying rje ba'i tshig gis dal bu dal bus smras pa/ kyi hud bu/ 'di ci zhig/ des kyang skad mi gsal zhing yid chad la gnad du bab pa'i gnod pa'i
400a6('dul ba): tshor ba skyes shing gdungs pas smras pa/ mkhan po/ gzhan ci lags/ las lags mod/ des smras pa/ bu/ rma byung ba'am/ gnod pa zhig ma byas grang / mkhan po/ bdag gi lus kyis
400a7('dul ba): rma phyung gi/ sems kyis ni/ ma yin no/ /bu/ ji ltar shes/ mkhan po/ bden pa gsol gyi/ gson cig /bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gang gis bdag gi lus kyis rma phyung gi/
400b1('dul ba): sems kyis ma yin na/ bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des mkhan po'i pags pa'i mdog nag po gang yin pa de gser gyi kha dog tu gyur cig /bdag nyid chen po de/ lhag pa'i bsam pa goms pa
400b2('dul ba): yin pas tshig smras ma thag tu drang srong mdog nag gi pags pa nag po mi snang zhing / gser gyi kha dog tu gyur to/ /kun tu drang srong mdog nag gser gyi kha dog tu gyur to/ /zhes sgra grags pas/ de'i ming
400b3('dul ba): gser mdog ces bya bar gyur to/ /de ngo mtshar mchog tu gyur to/ /de nas drang srong go'u ta mas smras pa/ mkhan po/ bdag ni/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas 'gro ba ni/ gang / skye ba ni/ gang / tshe phyi ma ni/ gang zhig
400b4('dul ba): lags/ des smras pa/ bram ze rnams na re/ bu med pa la 'gro ba med do/ /zhes zer na/ khyod kyis bu 'ga' bskyed pa lta yod dam/ mkhan po/ yab kyis rgyal srid kyi slad du spro ba bskyed pa na/ bdag
400b5('dul ba): gzhon nu nyid du rab tu byung bas bud med kyi rgyus kyang ma 'tshal na/ bdag gis bu bskyed pa lta ga la mchis/ bu/ gal te de lta na/ sngon yul la spyad pa rje su dran par gyis shig /mkhan po/ tshor ba
400b6('dul ba): drag pos nyen pas da ni/ bdag gi gnad rnams chad cing tshig rnams bye ste/ 'gum pa gcig pu dran par bas na/ ji ltar sngon gyi yul la spyad pa rjes su dran par 'gyur/ de'i mkhan po mngon par
400b7('dul ba): shes pa thob pa yin pas/ des rdzu 'phrul gyis rdzi char chen po sprul nas char pa'i thigs pas de'i lus la phog pa dang / de nas char pa dang / rlung grang mos reg pas/ sdug bsngal rnam par
401a1('dul ba): mnan nas/ des sngon gyi yul la spyad pa rjes su dran par bya bar brtsams so/ /gang gi tshe des 'khrigs pa'i 'dod chags rjes su dran par byas pa las/ khu ba'i thigs pa
401a2('dul ba): gnyis khrag dang lhan cig ltung ngo / /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas ni/ bzhi ste/ bdag sems pa dang / 'jig rten sems pa dang / sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa sems pa dang /
401a3('dul ba): sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul sems pa'o/ /khu ba'i thigs pa de gnyis sgo nga gnyis su gyur nas/ nyi ma shar ba'i dus kyi tshe/ nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis smin nas rdol ba dang / khye'u gnyis shig
401a4('dul ba): byung nas/ de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba'i bu ram shing gi tshal gseb der de gnyis bzhugs so// //'dul ba gzhi/ bam po gya gcig pa/ de nas nyi ma'i 'od zer shin tu tsha ba byung ste/ nyi
401a5('dul ba): ma'i 'od zer gyis drang srong go'u ta ma gdungs nas shi'o/ /de nas drang srong gser mdog 'ongs nas shi ba mthong nas/ des gsal shing gi nye 'khor du bltas na/ sgo nga rdol ba'i khog pa gnyis
401a6('dul ba): shig 'dug nas de phan tshun rjes gcod cing bu ram shing gi tshal gseb tu zhugs pa las/ ji tsam na khye'u gnyis shig mthong ngo / /nges 'di gnyis su'i bu yin zhes bsam pa la zhugs
401a7('dul ba): pa dang / drang srong go'u ta ma'i yin par gyur nas/ de nas de lhag par sdug pa skyes te/ des de gnyis bsti gnas su khrid nas bsnun bsnyod de/ de gnyis kyi ming btags pa/ nyi ma shar ba'i
401b1('dul ba): tshe nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis smin par byas pa las/ 'di gnyis skyes par gyur pas/ de bas na nyi ma'i rigs yin pas nyi ma'i rigs/ nyi ma'i rigs zhes bya bar gyur to/ /drang srong go'u ta ma'i bu yin pas
401b2('dul ba): ming gnyis pa go'u ta ma/ go'u ta ma zhes bya bar gyur to/ /rang gi yan lag las skyes pas ming gsum pa yan lag skyes/ yan lag skyes bya bar gyur to/ /bu ram shing gi tshal gseb nas rnyed pas
401b3('dul ba): ming bzhi pa bu ram shing pa/ bu ram shing pa zhes bya bar gyur to/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po b+ha ra d+h+wa dza bu med par shi nas blon po rnams 'dus nas gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag /da
401b4('dul ba): su zhig rgyal por dbang bskur bar bya/ gzhan dag gis smras pa/ 'di'i gcen go'u ta ma drang srong rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ste/ rgyal srid 'di ni/ de'i rigs rgyud du 'ongs pa yin pas de dbang
401b5('dul ba): bskur ro/ /de nas de rnams kyis gros byas nas drang srong gser mdog gi drung du song ste son pa dang / rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa/ drang srong chen po/ go'u ta ma gang khyed cag du mchis/
401b6('dul ba): des smras pa/ khyed cag kho nas bsad do/ /de rnams kyis smras pa/ drang srong chen po/ bdag cag gis de mthong bar yang mi dran na/ ji ltar bsad/ kho bos dran par bya'o/ /ma nongs so/ /des
401b7('dul ba): de rnams dran par byas pa dang / smras pa/ drang srong chen po/ gal te de lta na/ sdig pa spyod pa de ming tsam smos pa yang bsgrags pa ma yin gyi/ zhog cig /des sdig pa'i las ci byas/ 'di
402a1('dul ba): dang 'di'o/ /skyon med pa gnod pa mi byed pa des sdig pa'i las ma byas par khyed cag gis bsad do/ /de ltar ci mngon/ des ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa dang / de rnams
402a2('dul ba): yid mi bde ba skyes nas smras pa/ drang srong chen po/ gal te de lta na/ des ma lags kyi/ bdag cag gis sdig pa'i las bgyis so/ /zhes de rnams de skad du gtam smra bar byed pa na/ khye'u de
402a3('dul ba): gnyis kyang drang srong gi drung du 'ongs so/ /blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ drang srong chen po/ khye'u 'di gnyis su'i lags/ des smras pa/ de kho na'i bu'o/ /de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'di gnyis
402a4('dul ba): ji ltar skyes/ 'di gnyis kyi ming ci lags/ des byung ba dang bcas par rgyas par smras pa/ blon po rnams kyis thos te/ mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes nas de rnams kyis drang srong de la gsol ba
402a5('dul ba): btab nas de gnyis las gzhon nu phu bo shos rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba las/ de yang bu med par shi'o/ /de nas gcig shos nu bo dbang bskur nas de'i ming rgyal po bu
402a6('dul ba): ram shing pa zhes bya bar gyur to/ /go'u ta ma dag /rgyal po bu ram shing pa'i bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po bu ram shing pa brgya yang grong khyer gru 'dzin du byung
402a7('dul ba): ste/ de rnams kyis tha ma ni/ rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes po zhes bya ba byung ngo / /go'u ta ma dag /rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes po la bu bzhi ste/ skar mda' gdong
402b1('dul ba): dang / lag rna dang / glang po che 'dul dang / rkang gdub can no/ /dus gzhan zhig na/ de'i btsun mo dam pa shi nas de lag pa la 'gram pa gtad de sems khong du chud cing 'dug go /blon po rnams
402b2('dul ba): kyis smras pa/ lha/ ci'i slad du phyag la zhal gtad de thugs mi dgyes shing bzhugs/ des smras pa/ nga yi btsun mo dam pa shi na/ ci'i phyir sems khong du chud cing mi 'dug /lha/ gal te de ltar
402b3('dul ba): na| nyi 'og gi rgyal po rnams la bu mo mchis na/ lha/ ci'i slad du lha'i btsun mo dam pa mi btsal/ rgyal pos smras pa/ gzhon nu 'di dag ni/ rgyal srid mngon par 'dod pas phyir rgol ba 'di
402b4('dul ba): dag yod na/ nga la su zhig bu mo ster bar 'gyur ba lta/ dgongs shig dang / bdag cag gis btsal lo/ /ji tsam na/ rgyal po gzhan zhig gi bu mo gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/
402b5('dul ba): btsun mo dam par 'tshal ba yod pa de rnams kyis brtags te rgyal po de'i drung du dong nas/ de rnams kyis gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de rgyal po la rig par byas pa dang / rgyal pos bsgo ba/ khug
402b6('dul ba): cig / de nas de rnams rgyal po'i spyan sngar dong nas rkang pa gnyis su gtugs te thog mar gtam byas nas 'dug go /gtam gyi skabs rnyed cing rgyal po'i zhal mthong nas smras pa/ lha/ bkra
402b7('dul ba): shis par gyur cig / bkra shis par gyur cig /rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag /khyed ci gsol/ rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes po'i btsun mo dam pa gum nas de'i ched du
403a1('dul ba): sras mo slong ngo / /rgyal pos smras pa/ 'thab rir bab pa'i mchog yin pas rung na/ 'on kyang dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te nga'i bu mo la khye'u zhig yod par gyur
403a2('dul ba): na| de gal te rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la gzhag pa lta na/ sbyin no/ /lha/ bka' bzhin 'tshal/ mchis la lha la snyan du gdags par gsol lo/ /zhes de rnams dong nas rgyal po bu
403a3('dul ba): ram shing pa 'phags skyes po la ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag /gzhon nu ches phu bor gyur pa rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba rnams spangs te nu bo
403a4('dul ba): rgyal srid la 'jog pa de ni/ 'os pa ma yin no/ /lha/ don 'di la nges pa ma mchis te/ re zhig btsun mo blangs la/ lha de dang lhan cig rtsed mo dang / dgyes pa dang / dgyes mgur spyod
403a5('dul ba): par mdzod cig dang / de la khye'u btsa' bar 'gyur ram/ 'on te bu mor 'gyur ram/ ci ma mchis par 'gyur sus 'tshal/ rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag /gal te de lta na/
403a6('dul ba): dengs la longs shig /de rnams dong nas bsus te/ ji tsam na rgyal po'i dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos blangs nas/ de yang rgyal pos mngon par 'dod par gyur te/ de de dang
403a7('dul ba): lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las/ dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo sems can dang ldan par gyur to/ /de zla ba brgyad dam/ dgur
403b1('dul ba): 'das pa dang / khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa zhig btsas so/ /btsas nas de'i btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas te/ khye'u 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed/ blon
403b2('dul ba): po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ 'di ltar/ ma skyes pa nyid nas rgyal srid la mngon par dga' bas/ de'i slad du khye'u'i ming rgyal srid dga' zhes bgyi'o/ /khye'u rgyal srid dga' ma ma brgyad la rjes su gtad
403b3('dul ba): de zhes bya ba nas rdzing na gnas pa'i pad+ma bzhin du myur du skyed par byed do/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de rgyal tshab kyi rgyal srid la ma bzhag pa de'i zhang po rgyal pos thos nas/ des de la pho
403b4('dul ba): nya btang ste tshig rtsub po dang bcas pa'i spring yig spring pa/ khyod kyis sngon khas blangs shing dam bcas pa bzhin gal te byed na/ de lta na legs/ gal te de ltar ma byas na/ khyod kyi mthu dang
403b5('dul ba): brtson 'grus kyis pha rol gnon pa gang yin pa des sdod cig / kho bo der 'ongs nas yul 'khor bur mar rlog go /rgyal po de mthu chen po ldan pa des thos nas skrag ste/ blon po rnams bsags
403b6('dul ba): nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag /nga la rgyal po des 'di skad ces springs na/ de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ des rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ rgyal srid dga' rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur lags mod/
403b7('dul ba): des smras pa/ shes ldan dag /gzhon nu ches phu bor gyur pa rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba rnams spangs te nu bo rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba 'di ni/ 'os pa ma yin no/ /de rnams kyis smras
404a1('dul ba): pa| lha/ rgyal po de ni/ stobs dang gzhon pa rgya che bas gal te 'dir mchis na/ gdon mi 'tshal bar yul bur mar rlog pa gang lags pa'i gnas de mchis pas/
404a2('dul ba): rgyal srid dga' rgyal tshab kyi dbang phyug la dbang bgyid par dbang bskur la/ gzhon nu de rnams ni/ spyug tu gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ skyon med cing gnod pa ma byas
404a3('dul ba): pa'i gzhon nu rnams ji ltar spyug / lha/ bdag cag ni/ blon po lags te/ lha la sman par bgyi ba lhur len pa lags pas/ skyon ma mchis pa dang / nongs pa ma mchis pa yang spyug la/
404a4('dul ba): skyon mchis pa dang nongs pa bgyis pa ni/ gzhog go /rgyal po btang snyoms su bzhag nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go /blon po rnams tshogs nas phan tshun du gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes
404a5('dul ba): ldan dag / thabs shig bsham par bya ste/ des na rgyal bu gzhon nu rnams la thugs byung bar gyur pa zhig bya'o/ /zhes de nas de rnams kyis skyed mos tshal byi dor byas pa/ ri mo sna tshogs
404a6('dul ba): bris par shin tu dri zhim po'i pog phor nye bar bzhag / dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po btags/ me tog sna tshogs kyis dga' dga' ltar byas pa zhig byed du bcug go /de nas de rnams
404a7('dul ba): kyis blon po rnams kyis skyed mos tshal de byi dor byed pa rgyang ring po nas mthong nas gzhon nu rgod bag can de rnams skyed mos tshal gyi phyogs su dong ngo / /blon po rnams kyis skyed mos tshal
404b1('dul ba): byi dor byas nas sgor byung ba dang / gzhon nu rnams kyis dris pa/ 'di su'i skyed mos tshal/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha'i lags so/ /de nas slar log par brtsams pa dang / blon po rnams kyis smras pa/
404b2('dul ba): gzhon nu rnams nang du zhugs shig /ci'i phyir slar log /de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha'i skyed mos tshal yin na/ 'dir 'jug tu ga la rung / blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha'am gzhon nu rnams
404b3('dul ba): rol pa 'di la 'gal ba ci mchis/ de rnams nang du zhugs te rtse bar brtsams so/ /blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/ lha/ skyed mos tshal legs par byi dor bgyis lags kyi/ lha gzigs
404b4('dul ba): pa'i dus la bab lags so/ /rgyal po chas pa dang / skyed mos tshal na ku tse'i sgra thos so/ /thos nas kyang blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /skyed mos tshal na ku co'i sgra grags na/ 'di na
404b5('dul ba): su zhig 'dug / blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ gzhon nu rnams so/ /gal te de lta na/ ngas gzhon nu rnams spangs so/ /blon po rnams kyis rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ lha bzod
404b6('dul ba): bar mdzad cing gzhon nu rnams mi spang bar gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ de bzhin du bya'o/ /zhes gzhon nu de rnams spyug par chas pa dang / rgyal po'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa/
404b7('dul ba): lha| gal te de lta na/ bdag cag 'khor gyi skye bo mang po dang lhan cig mchi na/ de ci nas kyang mi dgag pa de ltar bka' stsal pa'i rigs so/ /rgyal pos bsgo nas de rnams chas pa na/ de
405a1('dul ba): rnams la dga' ba'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang de rnams lhan cig chas te/ zhag bdun du grong khyer gru 'dzin gyi sgo phye nas skye bo'i tshogs rgyus so/ /blon
405a2('dul ba): po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/ lha/ gal te grong khyer gyi sgo ma bkum na ring po mi thogs par gru 'dzin stongs par 'gyur ro/ /gal te de lta na sgo chod cig /de nas gzhon nu de rnams rang rang gi
405a3('dul ba): sring mo khrid nas mthar gyis ri bo gangs ri dang nye bar skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram/ drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu phyin nas/ de rnams kyis der lo ma'i spyil bu dag
405a4('dul ba): byas te gnas btab ste/ ri dwags bsad cing bsad nas 'tsho bar byed cing / dus gsum du drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas su 'dong bar byed do/ /lang tsho dang / dar la bab pa'i dregs pas zin pas 'dod
405a5('dul ba): chags kyis shin tu nyen te/ sha dri ngan pa/ skya bo seng seng por gyur to/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na drang srong ser skyas de lta bu mthong nas dris pa/ /khyed cag ci'i phyir skya bo seng seng por gyur/ de
405a6('dul ba): rnams kyis smras pa/ drang srong chen po/ bdag cag 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis shin tu nyen pas so/ /des smras pa/ rang rang gi sring mo spongs la mas dben gyi sring mo rnams dang lhan cig
405a7('dul ba): 'dug cig / drang srong chen po/ bdag cag gis de lta bu bgyir rung ngam/ shes ldan dag /'di ltar/ rgyal rigs rgyal srid stor pa rnams kyis rung ngo / /de na de rnams drang srong gi
405b1('dul ba): tshig ni/ tshad ma yin no/ /snyam nas 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis nyen pas dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes te mas dben gyi sring mo rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod
405b2('dul ba): par byed do/ /de rnams dang de dag lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa na bu pho dang bu mo dag btsas te/ de rnams chen por gyur pa dang / bsam gtan gyi tsher
405b3('dul ba): ma ni/ sgra yin pas/ drang srong ser skya sems rtse gcig pa nyid du ma btub nas des smras pa/ shes ldan dag /mthong zin gyi/ kho bo gzhan du 'gro'o/ /drang srong chen po/ ci'i phyir/ bsam
405b4('dul ba): gtan gyi tsher ma ni/ sgra yin pas sems rtse gcig pa nyid du mi btub pas so/ /drang srong chen po/ khyod 'di nyid na bzhugs shig /bdag cag gzhan du mchi na/ 'on kyang sa'i phyogs shig
405b5('dul ba): bdag cag la phob cig / shes ldan dag /rung ngo / /drang srong bdag nyid chen po rnams ni/ 'dod pa bzhin yid la re ba 'grub pa yin pas/ des gser gyi bya ma bum blangs te chu'i rgyun
405b6('dul ba): gyis grong khyer gyi rnam pa dag bris nas de rnams kyis grong khyer brtsigs so/ /drang srong ser skyas de rnams kyi gnas kyi phyir gzhi yongs su btang ngas ser skya'i gzhi/ ser skya'i gzhi zhes bya bar gyur
405b7('dul ba): to/ /de rnams der 'phel bar gyur pas/ skye bo'i tshogs chen por gyur te/ dog pas 'phel che bar ma gyur to/ /lha rnams kyi sems kyis de rnams kyi sems shes nas phyogs gzhan zhig bstan pa dang de
406a1('dul ba): rnams der dong ste/ grong khyer gcig shos brtsigs nas lhas bstan/ lhas bstan zhes bya bar gyur to/ /de nas de rnams tshogs shing 'dus nas phan tshun gros bya bar
406a2('dul ba): brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag /gang gi phyir bdag cag spyug pa ni/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs pa de las gyur gyi/ de lta bas na/ bdag cag las sus kyang rigs mnyam pa las
406a3('dul ba): chung ma blang par mi bya ste/ gcig kho nas chog shes par bya'o/ /de rnams rigs mnyam pa gcig kho na las chung ma gcig len gyi/ rigs mnyam pa las chung ma gnyis pa ni/ mi len to/ /de
406a4('dul ba): nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po 'phags skyes po bu sdug pa rnams rjes su dran nas blon po rnams la smras pa/ kye grong pa dag /gzhon nu de rnams da ltar ga na 'dug /de rnams kyis rgyas par smras
406a5('dul ba): pa/ lhas nongs pa 'ba' zhig las spyugs pa las/ de rnams rang rang gi sring mo khrid de 'di nas mchis pa na/ gangs ri dang nye ba chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram/ drang srong ser skya'i bsti
406a6('dul ba): gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu gnas btab ste/ rang rang gi sring mo spangs te mas dben gyi sring mo rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar bgyid/ dga' bar bgyid/ dga' mgur spyod
406a7('dul ba): par bgyid do/ /de rnams rtse bar bgyid/ dga' bar bgyid/ dga' mgur spyod par bgyid pa na/ bu pho dang bu mo dag btsas so/ /grong pa dag /gzhon nu rnams kyis de ltar byed phod
406b1('dul ba): dam/ lha/ rngo thogs lags so/ /de nas rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes pos ro stod bsrangs nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyangs te ched du brjod pas brjod pa/ kye ma/ gzhon nu rnams ni/ phod pa
406b2('dul ba): yin no/ /kye ma/ gzhon nu rnams ni/ shin tu phod pa yin no/ /zhes sems can dbang chen pos tshig tu phyung ste/ kye ma/ gzhon nu rnams ni/ phod pa yin no/ /kye ma/ gzhon nu rnams ni/
406b3('dul ba): shin tu phod pa yin no/ /zhes byas pas de rnams shAkya zhes bya bar gyur to/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po bu ram shing pa 'phags skyes po shi nas rgyal srid dga' rgyal srid la dbang bskur
406b4('dul ba): to/ /de yang bu med par shi nas skar mda' gdong rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du bcug go /de yang bu med par shi nas/ lag rna rgyal por gyur to/ /de yang bu med par shi nas glang
406b5('dul ba): po che 'dul rgyal por gyur to/ /de yang bu med par shi nas/ rkang gdub can rgyal por gyur to/ /de'i bu gnas 'jog go /go'u ta ma dag /gnas 'jog gi bu sa khyim mo/ /go'u ta ma dag /rgyal pos
406b6('dul ba): khyim gyi bu dang / tsha bo dang / yang tsha dang / sum tsha'i rgyud rgyal po lnga khri lnga stong / grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir byung ste/ de rnams kyi tha ma ni/ shing rta bcu pa dang / shing rta brgya pa dang / shing rta dgu
406b7('dul ba): bcu pa dang / shing rta khra bo dang / shing rta rgyal dang / brtan pa'i shing rta dang / gzhu bcu pa dang / gzhu brgya pa dang / gzhu dgu bcu pa dang / gzhu rgyal dang / gzhu bkra dang / gzhu brtan no/ /
407a1('dul ba): go'u ta ma dag /gzhu brtan la bu gnyis te/ seng ge 'gram dang / seng ge'i sgra'o/ /go'u ta ma dag /'dzam bu gling gi gzhu thogs ji snyed yod pa de rnams kyi nang na ni/ seng
407a2('dul ba): ge'i 'gram mchog tu grags so/ /go'u ta ma dag /seng ge'i 'gram la bu bzhi ste/ zas gtsang dang / zas dkar dang / bre bo zas dang / tshad med zas so/ /bu mo gtsang ma dang / dkar mo dang /
407a3('dul ba): bre bo ma dang / tshad med ma'o/ /zas gtsang la bu gnyis te/ bcom ldan 'das dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo'o/ /zas dkar la bu gnyis te/ tshe dang ldan pa rgyal dang / shAkya'i rgyal po bzang
407a4('dul ba): ldan no/ /bre bo zas la bu gnyis te/ ming chen dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gag pa'o/ /tshad med zas la bu gnyis te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lhas sbyin no/ /gtsang ma'i bu ni/ legs
407a5('dul ba): par rab sad do/ /dkar mo'i bu ni/ phreng ba can no/ /bre bo ma'i ni/ bzang len no/ /tshad med ma'i dge 'phel lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi sras ni/ sgra gcan zin yin te/ go'u ta ma dag /
407a6('dul ba): mang pos bkur gyi rgyud/ tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin du rdzogs/ srid pa'i phreng rgyun chad/ skye ba'i 'khor zad de/ da ni/ yang srid pa med do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa
407a7('dul ba): mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po'i gtam rdzogs par mkhyen nas bzhengs te bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u dgal gyi bu/ legs
407b1('dul ba): so/ /legs so/ /mo'u dgal gyi bu/ khyod kyis dge slong rnams kyi mdun du shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams nas chos kyi gtam smras pa yang khyod legs so/ /mo'u dgal gyi bu/ yang
407b2('dul ba): khyod kyis shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams te chos kyi gtam rtag tu smros shig dang / des na/ de rnams la yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
407b3('dul ba): kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /khyod kyis shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams pa'i chos kyi gtam chongs shig /zungs shig /lhogs shig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
407b4('dul ba): dge slong dag /shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams pa'i chos kyi gtam ni/ don dang ldan/ chos dang ldan pa nas tshangs par spyod pa'i bar dang ldan pa yin te/ dge slong dag /rigs kyi
407b5('dul ba): bu dad pas rab tu byung bas shAkya rnams kyi sngon gyi rigs rgyud las brtsams pa'i chos kyi gtam gzung zhing klog pa'i rigs so/ /de nas ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
407b6('dul ba): pa la mngon par dga' ste/ rjes su yi rang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo / /de'i tshe grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi na rgyal po
407b7('dul ba): seng ge'i 'gram zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba/ 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed
408a1('dul ba): pa dang / chom rkun med cing / nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa/ 'bras dang / bu ram shing gi phreng ba dang / ba lang dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa na bu gcig pa la sdug pa
408a2('dul ba): bzhin du rgyal srid skyong bar byed do/ /grong khyer lhas bstan du rgyal po legs par rab sad ces bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/
408a3('dul ba): skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba/ 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / chom rkun med cing / nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa/ 'bras dang / bu ram shing gi phreng ba dang /
408a4('dul ba): ba lang dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa na/ bu gcig pa la sdug pa bzhin du rgyal srid skyong bar byed do/ /rgyal po legs par rab sad kyi btsun mo dam pa gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug
408a5('dul ba): pa/ mdzes pa/ yul gyi bzang mo lum+bi ni zhes bya ba yod do/ /lhas bstan na/ khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba/ yongs su bzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos
408a6('dul ba): kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig gnas pa de'i kun dga' ra ba me tog phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dang / chu phun sum
408a7('dul ba): tshogs pa dang / bya sna tshogs skad 'byin pas de'i kun dga' ra ba dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa der rgyal po dus dus su btsun mo'i 'khor dang lhan cig lhags nas de na dga' ba'i rtse mo
408b1('dul ba): nyams su myong bar byed do/ /lum+bi nis de mthong nas 'dod pa skyes te/ des smras pa/ lha/ kun dga' ra ba 'di bdag la stsal du gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ kun dga' ra ba 'di khyim bdag gi
408b2('dul ba): yin na/ ji ltar sbyin/ gal te khyod la kun dga' ra ba dgos na/ khyod kyi phyir de bas lhag par bzang ba gzhan zhig bya'o/ /de nas rgyal po legs par rab sad kyis lum+bi ni'i ched du de bas khyad par
408b3('dul ba): du 'phags pa'i kun dga' ra ba zhig byed du bcug nas de'i ming lum+bi ni'i tshal zhes bya bar gyur to/ /rgyal po seng ge'i 'gram la yun ring po nas kye ma'o/ /bdag gi rgyud la 'khor los bsgyur ba skyes
408b4('dul ba): par gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa'i bsam pa 'di yod do/ /rgyal po legs par rab sad la yun ring po nas kye ma'o/ /bdag ni/ seng ge'i 'gram dang lhan cig gnyen du gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam pa'i
408b5('dul ba): bsam pa 'di yod do/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na de btsun mo dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las/ dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo sems can dang
408b6('dul ba): ldan par gyur nas/ de zla ba brgyad dam/ dgu 'das pa na bu mo gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so/ /btsas pa de'i
408b7('dul ba): gzugs bzang pos rgyal po legs par rab sad btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dang / lhas bstan na gnas pa'i skye ba'i tshogs rnams mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes te the tshom du gyur nas ci 'di
409a1('dul ba): bu mo yin nam/ 'on te las sna tshogs pas sprul pa'i sgyu 'phrul yin snyam mo/ /de'i btsas pa'i btsas ston nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig tu rgya cher byas nas/
409a2('dul ba): bu mo 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do/ /blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ lhas bstan na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs lam po che dang / tshong 'dus dang / bzhi mdo dang /
409a3('dul ba): sum mdo rnams su gleng ba kha cig gi mchid nas ni/ 'di bu mo kho na lags te/ sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas gzugs bzang zhing kha dog phun sum tshogs par gyur to/ /zhes mchi'o/ /
409a4('dul ba): gzhan dag gi mchid nas ni/ 'di bu mo ma lags kyi/ 'o na ci zhe na/ las sna tshogs pas sprul pa'i sgyu 'phrul lags so/ /zhes mchi lags pas/ des bas na/ bu mo'i ming sgyu 'phrul zhes
409a5('dul ba): gdags so/ /zhes de'i ming sgyu 'phrul zhes btags so/ /bu mo sgyu 'phrul ma ma brgyad la rjes su gtad de zhes bya ba nas chen mor gyur to/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de la mtshan
409a6('dul ba): mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan pa mtshan phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i bu zhig btsa' bar 'gyur zhing stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /zhes bstan to/ /yang de rtse
409a7('dul ba): bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las/ bu mo gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig btsas so/ /
409b1('dul ba): de btsas pa na/ grong khyer de dag thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos snang bar byas te/ sgyu 'phrul ma ji lta ba bzhin du de'i gzugs bzang ba rnam pa thams cad du dpyad par mi nus so/ /de'i btsas pa'i btsas ston
409b2('dul ba): yang rgya cher byas nas/ bu mo 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do/ /blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ sgyu 'phrul bas 'di lhag par gzugs bzang bas de bas na/ sgyu 'phrul chen mo
409b3('dul ba): zhes bgyi bar gdags so/ /zhes btags so/ /de yang bskyed bsrings nas chen mor gyur pa dang / de la mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan
409b4('dul ba): pa zhig btsas par gyur te/ de ni/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /zhes bstan to/ /rgyal po legs par rab sad kyis rgyal po seng ge'i 'gram la pho nya btang ste/ bdag la bu mo
409b5('dul ba): gnyis shig btsas pa ni/ sgyu 'phrul dang / sgyu 'phrul chen po lags te/ de la gcig la ni/ mtshan thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i bu zhig btsa' bar 'gyur zhing / de ni/ stobs kyi 'khor
409b6('dul ba): los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan to/ /gcig shos la ni/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i bu zhig btsa' bar 'gyur zhing / de ni/ 'khor los bsgyur
409b7('dul ba): ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan gyi/ 'di gnyis las gang bzhed pa gzhon nu zas gtsang gi chung mar snoms shig seng ge'i 'gram gyis slar spring pa/ gnyis ka yang gzhon nu la
410a1('dul ba): dgos mod kyi/ 'on kyang chung ma 'dra ba gnyis gcig la gzhag par mi bya bas/ gang la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i bu zhig btsa' bar 'gyur zhing /
410a2('dul ba): de yang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan pa de/ re zhig 'dod do/ /gcig shos kyang tshogs la brtag par bya'o/ /des de 'khor lnga brgya dang bkri'o/ /de'i tshe shAkya rnams kyi
410a3('dul ba): phyir rgol ba skya seng zhes bya ba ri khrod pa dag cig yod nas shAkya rnams 'dus te rgyal po seng ge 'gram gyi drung du song nas lha/ skya seng ri khrod pa bdag cag la gnod pa bgyid kyi/ grogs mdzad
410a4('dul ba): du gsol/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag /kho bo rgas pas de rnams dang lhan cig g.yul sprad par mi nus so/ /lha/ gzhon nu zas gtsang gtang du gsol/ dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te
410a5('dul ba): gzhon nu ji ltar 'dod pa'i dam pa zhig blangs pa de sbyin pa lta na/ gtong ngo / /de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ bka' bzhin 'tshal/ stsal bar bgyi'o/ /rgyal pos dpung gi tshogs yan lag
410a6('dul ba): bzhi pa/ gzhon nu zas gtsang la gtad nas/ des ri khrod pa de rnams bcom/ rab tu bcom ste/ rmeg bta'o/ /de nas shAkya rnams mgu nas rgyal po seng ge 'gram gyi drung du dong ste/ lha/ gzhon
410a7('dul ba): nus ri khrod pa rnams bcom/ rab tu bcom ste/ rmeg bta' lags pas/ bdag cag glo ba dga' ba/ gzhon nu mchog ci bzhed gsungs shig /dbul lo/ /shes ldan dag /shAkya
410b1('dul ba): rnams kyi khrims su bcas pa sus kyang mnyam pa las chun ma gzhag par mi bya'o/ /zhes bcas so/ /lha/ ci khrims dral lam/ des smras pa/ lhag par shin tu bsdam gyi/ dral bar mi bya na/ 'on
410b2('dul ba): kyang gzhon nu'i dam pa zhig slong ba ni/ mnyam pa las chun ma blangs pa yin no/ /lha/ rung gi de bzhin du mdzod cig /de nas seng ge'i 'gram gyis legs par rab sad la pho nya btang nas/ kho
410b3('dul ba): bos tshogs la brtags zin gyi/ bu mo gcig shos kyang bkri zhig /des de yang 'khor lnga brgya dang bkri ste/ gzhon nu zas gtsang gis gnyis ka blangs so/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/ rgyal po
410b4('dul ba): seng ge'i 'gram shi nas ser skya'i gzhi na rgyal po zas gtsang rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang ba/ 'thab pa
410b5('dul ba): dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / chom rkun med cing nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa dang / 'bras dang / bu ram shing gi phreng ba dang / ba lang dang ma he phun sum tshogs pa na bu gcig pa la sdug pa bzhin
410b6('dul ba): du rgyal srid skyong bar byed do/ /de dus gzhan zhig na/ btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo dang lhan cig steng gi khang bzang gi gzhi skyes ba med par dong nas rol mos rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga'
410b7('dul ba): mgur spyod par byed do/ /'di ni/ chos nyid yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa na 'jig rten la gzigs pa lngas gzigs par mdzad de/ rigs la gzigs pa
411a1('dul ba): dang / yul la gzigs pa dang / dus la gzigs pa dang / rgyud la gzigs pa dang / bud med la gzigs pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis rigs
411a2('dul ba): la gzigs par mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni/ 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rigs ji lta bu zhig tu nying mtshams
411a3('dul ba): sbyor ba len snyam na/ bram ze'i rigs sam/ rgyal rigs kyi rigs su yin la/ de la res 'ga' ni/ bram ze'i rigs btsun par bkur/ res 'ga' ni/ rgyal rigs te/ da lta ni
411a4('dul ba): rgyal rigs btsun par bkur bar gzigs nas/ ma la bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpa' rigs ngan par nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so/ /zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi
411a5('dul ba): 'gyur bar bdag gis rgyal rigs su nying mtshams sbyor ba blang bar bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /'di ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur pa'i las byas shing
411a6('dul ba): bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas rgyu 'dis na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rigs la gzigs par mdzad do/ /
411a7('dul ba): byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis yul la gzigs par mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni/ 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub
411b1('dul ba): sems dpa' rnams yul ji lta bu zhig tu nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ 'bras dang / bu ram shing dang / ba lang dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa/ slong mo pa brgya 'du ba/ mtha' 'khob kyi skye bo
411b2('dul ba): med pa/ dbus pa'i skye bo gnas pa'i yul gang yin par gzigs nas 'di snyam du dgongs te/ dbus kyi yul 'di ni/ bu ram shing gi phreng dang / 'bras dang / ba lang dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa/
411b3('dul ba): slong mo pa brgya 'du ba/ mtha' 'khob kyi skye bo med pa/ dbus pa'i skye bo gnas pa yin gyi/ ma la bdag la gzhan dag byang chub sems dpa' yul mtha' 'khob rnams su nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so//
411b4('dul ba): zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur bar bdag gis yul dbus su nying mtshams sbyor snyam mo/ /'di ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing
411b5('dul ba): bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas rgyu 'dis na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yul la gzigs par mdzad do/ /byang chub
411b6('dul ba): sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis dus la gzigs par mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni/ 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dus
411b7('dul ba): ci lta bu zhig tu 'dzam bu'i gling du nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ skye rgyu'i tshe lo yar skyes pa na brgyad khri thub pa yan chad nying mtshams sbyor ba mi len la/ mi rnams kyi tshe lo mar 'grib pa
412a1('dul ba): na brgya thub pa man chad nying mtshams sbyor ba mi len no/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgyu gang gis mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa yan chad nying mtshams sbyor ba len par mi
412a2('dul ba): mdzad ce na/ mi rnams tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na/ yid 'byung bar dka' zhing skyo bar bya bar dka' la/ blun zhing dbang po rtul ba dang / bag med cing bde ba mang bas/ bden pa rnams kyi snod
412a3('dul ba): du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /mar 'grib pa lo brgya man chad du yang snyigs ma lnga po 'di lta ste/ tshe'i snyigs ma dang / nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma dang / sems can gyi snyigs ma dang / lta ba'i snyigs
412a4('dul ba): ma dang / dus kyi snyigs ma shas che ba yin pas/ bdag la gzhan dag/ byang chub sems dpas snyigs ma lnga shas che ba'i dus su nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so/ /zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer
412a5('dul ba): bar mi 'gyur ro/ /snyam mo/ /'di ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/
412a6('dul ba): chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas/ rgyu 'dis na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dus la gzigs pa yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis rgyud la gzigs par
412a7('dul ba): mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni/ 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyud ci 'dra ba zhig tu nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/
412b1('dul ba): rigs gang zhig btsun par bkur zhing ma mes dang / pha mes zung bdun gyi bar spyod pa la skyon med pa yin par gzigs nas de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ shAkya'i rigs rgyud 'di ni/ btsun par bkur ba
412b2('dul ba): yin zhing / mang pos bkur ba nas bzung ste spyod pa skyon med pa yin gyi/ ma la bdag la gzhan dag/ byang chub sems dpas rgyud ngan pa las nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so/ /zhes gzhi 'dis kha
412b3('dul ba): zer bar mi 'gyur bar bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang gi rgyud du nying mtshams sbyor ba blang ngo / /snyam mo/ /'di ltar/ byang chub sems dpas thog ma med pa'i dus nas smad par mi 'gyur ba'i las byas
412b4('dul ba): shing bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas/ rgyu 'dis na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyud la gzigs par mdzad do/ /byang chub
412b5('dul ba): sems dpa' rnams rgyu gang gis bud med la gzigs par mdzad ce na/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa ni/ 'di snyam du dgongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bud
412b6('dul ba): med ci 'dra ba zhig gi rum du nying mtshams sbyor ba len snyam na/ bud med gang zhig gzugs bzang mo dang ldan pa/ tshul dang ldan pa/ rigs dang ldan pa/ rgod bag can ma yin la/ rigs 'phel bar
412b7('dul ba): 'gyur zhing / sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams la/ kye ma/ bdag sangs rgyas kyi yum du gyur cig ces smon lam btab ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bcur rum du 'dzin nus pa dang / rang gi don yang
413a1('dul ba): nyams par mi byed pa yin par gzigs nas 'di snyam du dgongs te/ sgyu 'phrul chen mo 'di ni/ ma mes dang / pha mes zung bdun gyi bar spyod pa la skyon med cing gzugs dang
413a2('dul ba): ldan pa dang / tshul dang ldan pa dang / rgod bag can ma yin pa dang / rigs 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rum du zla ba bcur 'dzin nus pa dang / rang gi don yang mi nyams pa
413a3('dul ba): 'di ltar sgyu 'phrul chen mos sngon sangs rgyas rnams la/ kye ma bdag sangs rgyas kyi yum du gyur cig/ ces smon lam btab pa yang yin pas/ bdag la gzhan dag/ byang chub sems dpa'
413a4('dul ba): mtshan ngan pa dang ldan pa'i bud med kyi rum du nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs so/ /zhes gzhi 'dis kha zer bar mi 'gyur ro/ /snyam mo/ /'di ltar/ byang chub sems dpas smad par mi 'gyur
413a5('dul ba): ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ chos bshad pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin pas rgyu 'dis na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bud med la gzigs
413a6('dul ba): par mdzad do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas gzigs nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris drug la lan gsum du bsgrags pa/ grogs po dag /dga' ldan gyi ris 'di nas nga shi 'phos
413a7('dul ba): te/ mi rnams kyi nang du rgyal po zas gtsang gi chung ma dam pa'i rum du nying mtshams sbyor ba blangs la/ de'i bur gyur te bdud rtsi rtogs par bya'i/ khyed cag las gang dag bdud rtsi don
413b1('dul ba): du gnyer ba de phal cher yul dbus su nying mtshams sbyor pa longs shig / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /byang
413b2('dul ba): chub sems dpa' mkhyen par mdzod cig/ da ltar 'jig rten ni sdig pas gos pa/ skye rgu ma rung ba'i bsam pa can/ 'dzam bu gling rtog ge pa drug dang / rjes su sgrog pa drug dang / snyoms par
413b3('dul ba): 'jug pa drug gis dkrugs pa lags so/ /de la rtog gi ba drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'od srung rdzogs byed dang / kun tu rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu dang / smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can
413b4('dul ba): dang / mi pham skra'i la ba can dang / ka ta'i bu nog can dang / gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu'o/ /rjes su sgrog pa drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bram ze rgyus brgal dang / bram ze gnas rdeg dang / bram ze
413b5('dul ba): bzang ldan dang / bram ze tshangs pa'i tshe dang / bram ze pad+ma'i snying po dang / bram ze dmar po'o/ /snyoms par 'jug pa drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod dang / sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring
413b6('dul ba): 'phur dang / kun tu rgyu legs bzang dang / bram ze'i khye'u rgyal dang / drang srong ma bcings pa dang / lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can no/ /'dir ni/ chos mnyan pa'i slad du byang chub sems dpa'i
413b7('dul ba): gdan dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa bsham par bgyi zhing / bdag cag 'di snyam du/ bdag cag la dga' ldan gyi gnas na byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs pas chos bshad de/ chos de bdag
414a1('dul ba): cag gis thos nas/ ci nas kyang bdag cag gi yun ring po'i don dang / sman pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar sgyur par bgyid par sems lags so/ /de skad ces smras
414a2('dul ba): pa dang / byang chub sems dpas dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/ /grogs po dag /de'i phyir rol mo'i cha byad thams cad rdungs shig /dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis
414a3('dul ba): rol mo'i cha byad thams cad brdungs pa dang / byang chub sems dpas kyang dung bus te smras pa/ grogs po dag /'di la sgra lhag par gang che/ bcom ldan 'das/ dung gi sgra lags so/ /grogs po
414a4('dul ba): dag / ji ltar dung gi sgras rol mo'i cha byad thams cad zil gyis mnan te gnas pa de bzhin du ngas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling du song la rtog ge pa drug dang / rjes su sgrog pa drug dang snyoms par 'jug pa
414a5('dul ba): drug zil gyis mnan nas bdud rtsi rtogs par bya ste/ bdud rtsis 'gro ba tshim par bya'o/ /mi rtag pa'i dung 'bud par bya'o/ /stong pa nyid kyi rnga brdung bar bya'o/ /bdag med pa'i seng ge'i sgra
414a6('dul ba): bsgrag par bya'o/ /zhes smras nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ seng ge gcig gis gcan gzan tshogs ni du ma 'joms/ /rdo rje gcig gis brag gi rtse mo du ma 'jig/ brgya byin gcig gis lha
414a7('dul ba): ma yin dbang du ma 'joms/ /nyi ma gcig gis mun pa du ma rnam par sel/ /grogs po dag /khyed cag las gang bdud rtsi don du gnyer ba de yul dbus kyi grong khyer chen po drug tu nying mtshams
414b1('dul ba): sbyor ba longs shig / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das 'di ni/ btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i lhums su nying mtshams sbyor pa len par
414b2('dul ba): bzhed kyi/ ma la bdag gis de la gzi brjid bsgrub par bya/ lhums kyang sbyang bar bya'o/ /snyam nas/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo la gzi brjid bsgrubs shing lhums
414b3('dul ba): kyang gtsang bar byas so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa gzigs pa lngas gzigs te/ 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha drug la lan gsum du bsgrags nas nam gyi gung thun la
414b4('dul ba): glang po cher bstan te/ btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i lhums su zhugs so/ /smras pa/ 'gro ba yongs su bskyab phyir dam bzhes na/ /lha rnams la bsgo de nas shi 'phos te/ /nang par sprin rum nyi ma gsar
414b5('dul ba): 'char ltar/ /de ni bu ram shing pa'i lhums zhugs so/ /'di ltar/ sgyu 'phrul chen mos rmi lam bzhi rmis pa/ glang po che dam pa dkar po mche ba drug pa zhig bdag gi rum dral nas zhugs ba dang /
414b6('dul ba): steng gi nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / ri brag chen po la 'dzeg pa dang / bdag la skye bo'i tshogs chen po phyag byed pa'o/ /des rgyal po zas gtsang la smras pa dang / rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/
414b7('dul ba): shes ldan dag /rmi lam ston mkhan dang / mtshan mkhan gyi bram ze rnams khug cig/ de dag gis rmi lam ston mkhan dang / mtshan mkhan gyi bram ze rnams bkug pa dang / de nas rgyal pos
415a1('dul ba): de rnams la rmi lam bsnyad pa las/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ bstan bcos las ji ltar g.yar sngar bab pa dang sbyar na/ sras skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis
415a2('dul ba): kyis brgyan pa zhig bltams par 'gyur te/ gal te khyim pa khyim na gnas par gyur na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /gal te skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad
415a3('dul ba): pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar gyur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya bar 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par
