415a4('dul ba): 'gyur ro/ /bar sdom la/ 'chi 'pho lha dang rin po che/ /zur brgyad dub dang brtul zhugs brtan/ /chos nyid kyis/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos te
415a5('dul ba): yum gyi lhums su zhugs pa de'i tshe sa chen po 'di shin tu g.yos par gyur/ 'jig rten 'di thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur cing / 'jig rten na 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun pa/
415a6('dul ba): mun nag/ smag tu rgyu pa gang du nyi ma dang zla ba 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu che ba dag gis kyang 'od kyis snang bar mi nus pa de dag kyang de'i tshe snang brgya chen pos gsal bar gyur
415a7('dul ba): to/ /der sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag rang gi lag pa brkyang pa yang mi mthong ba las/ de rnams snang ba des sems can gcig gis gcig mthong nas shes ldan dag /sems can
415b1('dul ba): gzhan yang 'dir skyes so/ /shes ldan dag /sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so/ /zhes bya bar shes so/ /chos nyid kyis/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhums su
415b2('dul ba): zhugs pa de'i tshe lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis/ de la mi'am mi ma yin pa sus kyang 'tshe bar mi 'gyur bar lha'i bu bzhi yum gyi srung mar 'jog pa ni/ lag na ral gri dang / lag na mdung
415b3('dul ba): dang / lag na mdung thung dang / lag na mda' bo che'o/ /chos nyid kyis/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa ni/ mdzod kyi nang du rdzas bzhag pa bzhin du mngal gyi dri ma
415b4('dul ba): dang / sha ma'i dri ma dang / khrag gi dri ma dang / mi gtsang ba gang yang rung ba sna tshogs kyis ma sbags so/ /dper na/ nor bu rin po che ka shi'i ras kyis mi gos pa dang / ka shi'i ras kyang nor bu rin po
415b5('dul ba): ches mi gos pa de bzhin du gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa na/ mdzod kyi nang du rdzas bzhag pa bzhin du mngal gyi dri ma dang / sha'i dri ma dang / khrag gi dri ma dang /
415b6('dul ba): mi gtsang ba gang yang rung ba sna tshogs kyis ma sbags so/ /chos nyis kyis/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de'i tshe yum gyi lhums na de dag thams
415b7('dul ba): cad yongs su rdzogs pas bzhugs pa mthong ngo / /dper na/ bai DUR+Ya zur brgyad pa/ bzang po'i rigs dang ldan pa/ dang ba/ gsal ba/ dri ma med pa/ tshon skud sna lnga/ sngon po dang / ser po
416a1('dul ba): dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan la brgyus pa de/ skyes bu mig dang ldan pas mthong na/ 'di ni/ skud pa'o/ /'di ni/ nor bu'o/ /skud pa 'di la nor
416a2('dul ba): bu brgyus pa yin no/ /zhes shes pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de'i tshe/ yum gyi lhums na de thams cad yongs su rdzogs pas
416a3('dul ba): bzhugs pa mthong ngo / /chos nyid kyis/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de'i tshe/ de'i yum 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dzin pas
416a4('dul ba): lus ngal ba'am lus dub par 'gyur ba med do/ /chos nyid kyis/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de'i tshe/ yum deng phan chad ji srid
416a5('dul ba): 'tsho'i bar du brtul zhugs lnga'i gzhi blangs par gyur te/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spangs te srog gcod pa las slar ldog go /ma byin par len pa dang / mi tshangs par spyod pa dang /
416a6('dul ba): brdzun du smra ba dang / sbyar ba'i chang dang / 'bru'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas spangs te/ sbyar ba'i chang dang / 'bru'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas las slar
416a7('dul ba): ldog par byed do/ /srog mi gcod dang ma byin mi len dang / /brdzun du mi smra chang la mi brkam dang / /'khrig pa'i mi tshangs spyod pa spong ba 'di/ /'di ni don grub yum gyi chos nyid yin/ chos
416b1('dul ba): nyid kyis/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhums na bzhugs pa de'i tshe de'i yum 'di lta ste/ skyes pa rnams la 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i yid gtod pa med do/ /nyon mongs
416b2('dul ba): rnams la chags par mi 'gyur zhing / /de ni 'dod rgyus sems gdungs mi 'gyur la/ /de yul 'dod pa'i yon tan ldan pa yi/ /skyes pa rnams la sems ni gtod pa med/ /sgyu 'phrul chen mo 'dod pa
416b3('dul ba): skyes pa/ kye ma/ bdag gis rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i chu btung ngo / /snyam nas/ des rgyal po zas gtsang la smras pa dang / rgyal po zas gtsang gis mtshan mkhan rnams la smras pa/ ci'i phyir btsun mo 'di
416b4('dul ba): lta bu'i 'dod pa skye/ mtshan mkhan rnams kyis/ lha/ btsun mo la sras skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku brgyan pa zhig bltams par 'gyur te/ de rab tu byung nas shes bya'i mtsho
416b5('dul ba): mtha' dag 'thung bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan to/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te 'di la mtsho chen po'i chu ma blud na cir 'gyur/ sras yan lag ma tshang ba zhig btsas par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal pos
416b6('dul ba): smras pa/ nga ming zas gtsang ma zhes bya ba'i bu yan lag ma tshang bar bya'am/ de'i tshe grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi na kun tu rgyu mig dmar zhes bya ba mig 'phrul la byang ba zhig 'dug pa de/ rgyal pos
416b7('dul ba): bkug nas bsgo ba dang / des de steng gi khang bzang gi gzhi na 'dug pa la rgya mtsho chen po bzhi bstan te chu blud pa dang de'i 'dod pa skyes pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to/ /gzhan yang de'i 'dod
417a1('dul ba): pa skyes pa/ kye ma/ btson thams cad thar par bya'o/ /snyam pa dang / rgyal pos btson thams cad thar par byas nas de'i 'dod pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to/ /gzhan
417a2('dul ba): yang de'i 'dod pa skyes pa/ kye ma/ sbyin pa dag sbyin/ bsod nams dag bya'o/ /snyam pa dang / rgyal pos sbyin pa dag byin/ bsod nams dag byas nas/ de'i 'dod pa skyes pa gang yin pa de dang bral
417a3('dul ba): bar gyur to/ /gzhan yang de'i 'dod pa skyes pa/ kye ma/ bdag skyed mos tshal blta'o/ /snyam pa dang / rgyal pos skyed mos tshal bstan nas de'i 'dod pa skyes pa gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur
417a4('dul ba): to/ /gzhan yang de'i 'dod pa skyes pa/ kye ma/ bdag skyed mos tshal du 'dug par bya'o/ /snyam pa dang / rgyal po legs par rab sad la lum+bi ni'i tshal zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal yod nas/ de la
417a5('dul ba): rgyal po zas gtsang gis spring ba/ khyod kyi bu mo skyed mos tshal du 'gro bar 'dod kyi/ skyed mos tshal gyi byi dor byos shig /de'i zho shas 'tsho ba dag la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag /skyed mos tshal gyi
417a6('dul ba): byi dor byos shig / de rnams kyi skyed mos tshal gyi byi dor byas so/ /de nas 'khor rnams dang lhan cig dong ngo / /de nas des lum+bi ni'i tshal du 'chag pa na/ shing mya ngan 'tshang me tog shin tu
417a7('dul ba): rgyas pa zhig mthong ste/ de bltams par 'dod nas de la bzung ste 'dug pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bsam pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i yum ni/ ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan pas
417b1('dul ba): skye bo'i tshogs chen pos bskor na/ bltams mi phod kyi/ thabs shig bsham par bya'o/ /snyam nas/ des rlung dang char drag cig sprul nas des skye bo'i tshogs de kun tu bros so/ /de nas lha rnams kyi
417b2('dul ba): dbang po brgya byin gyis bdag nyid ma ma rgan mo'i cha byad du mngon par sprul nas btsun mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i mdun du bsdad pa dang / des bltams par brtsams so/ /byang chub sems dpa' bltams
417b3('dul ba): pa dang / brgya byin gyis pags pa'i sleb mos bzung ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ brgya byin 'di/ bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' blangs so/ /zhes dregs par
417b4('dul ba): 'gyur bar mkhyen nas/ bdag nyid rdo rje'i skur byin gyis brlabs pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'dar bar gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpas bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka/ thong zhig /
417b5('dul ba): thong zhig /phar song zhig /chos nyid kyis/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das bltams pa de'i tshe yang sa chen po 'di g.yos par gyur ces bya ba nas shes ldan dag /
417b6('dul ba): sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so/ /shes ldan dag /sems can gzhan yang 'dir skyes so/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// //'dul ba bzhi/ bam po gya gnyis pa/ chos
417b7('dul ba): nyid kyis/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhums nas bltams pa na ral gri shubs nas phyung ba bzhin du mngal gyi dri ma dang / sha ma'i dri ma dang / khrag gi dri ma
418a1('dul ba): dang / mi gtsang ba gzhan dang gzhan sna tshogs kyis ma gos so/ /chos nyid kyis/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das yum gyi lhums nas bltams pa de'i
418a2('dul ba): tshe/ de'i yum mi 'dug /mi nyal te/ 'greng bzhin du rgyal rigs ma des rgyal rigs bltams par byed do/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa'i mod la sus
418a3('dul ba): kyang ma bzung bar phyogs bzhir gzigs nas gom pa bdun bdun 'dor zhing tshig tu yang gsung la/ 'di ni/ shar phyogs yin te/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i thog mar 'gro bar bya'o/ /'di ni/ lho
418a4('dul ba): phyogs yin te/ 'gro ba mtha' dag gi yon gnas su 'gyur bar bya'o/ /'di ni/ nub phyogs yin te/ nga'i skye ba tha ma ni/ 'di yin par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni/ byang phyogs yin te/ srid pa'i
418a5('dul ba): mtsho las brgal bar bya'o/ /de'i dbu'i steng nas lha rnams gdugs dkar po dang / rnga yab nor bu'i yu ba can dag 'dzin to/ /chos nyid kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa'i mod
418a6('dul ba): la bar snang las chu bsil ba zhig dang / chu dron mo zhig ste/ chu gnyis kyi rgyun spyi gtsug gi steng du 'bab cing / des byang chub sems dpa' khrus mdzad do/ /chos nyid kyis/ byang chub sems
418a7('dul ba): dpa' bltams pa'i mod la skrun pa'i yum gyi mdun du chu mig chen po byung nas 'bab par 'gyur te/ de la de'i yum chus chu'i bya ba byed do/ /chos nyid kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'
418b1('dul ba): bltams pa'i mod la lhas bar snang las lha'i ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / a ka ru'i phye ma dang / rgya spos kyi phye ma dang / tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang / ta ma la'i 'dab mas 'thor
418b2('dul ba): ro/ /lha'i me tog man dA ra bas kyang 'thor ro/ /lha'i sil snyan rnams kyang sgra 'byin no/ /gos dag kyang 'thor bar byed do/ /bar sdom la/ bltams dang bzhengs dang gom pa bdun/ /chu rgyun gnyis
418b3('dul ba): dang chu mig lha/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa bltams pa de nyid kyi tshe/ rgyal po bzhir yang bu btsas te/ mnyan yod du rtsibs kyis 'phur tshangs sbyin gyi bu
418b4('dul ba): btsas pa na/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bu btsas pa na/ yul gsal ba gsal ba bzhin du snang bas/ de bas na/ 'di'i ming gsal rgyal zhes bya bar gdags so/ /zhes btags
418b5('dul ba): so/ /rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na rgyal po pad+ma chen po'i bu btsas pa na/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bu btsas pa na/ 'jig rten nyi ma'i gzugs shar ba ltar snang zhing gzugs can ma'i
418b6('dul ba): bu yin pas/ ming gzugs can snying po zhes bya bar gdags so/ /zhes btags so/ /ko'u sham+b+hi na rgyal po dmag brgya pa'i bu btsas pa na/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi bu btsas pa na/ 'jig rten nyi
418b7('dul ba): ma shar ba ltar snang bar gyur pas/ 'di'i ming shar pa zhes bya bar gdags so/ /zhes btags so/ /grong khyer 'phags rgyal du rgyal po mu khyud mtha' yas kyi bu btsas pa na/ de 'di snyam du
419a1('dul ba): sems te/ bdag gi bu btsas pa na/ 'jig rten sgron mas snang ba lta bur gyur pas/ 'di'i ming rab snang zhes bya bar gdags so/ /zhes btags te/ de ni/ de lta ma yin
419a2('dul ba): no/ /'on kyang de thams cad ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i mthu yin no/ /ri bo kun 'dzin la drang srong nyon mongs med ces bya ba/ 'jig pa la mkhas pa/ 'chags pa la mkhas pa zhig gnas te/ de'i
419a3('dul ba): tsha bo ni/ mis byin zhes bya'o/ /des de la dus dus su 'jig pa'i gtam dang / 'chags pa'i gtam smras pas/ de de las rab tu byung ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das bltams pa
419a4('dul ba): na/ 'jig rten thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe mis byin phug tu zhugs te bsam gtan byed pa na/ des snang ba de mthong nas nyon mongs med la smras pa/ mkhan po/
419a5('dul ba): 'dir ni nyi ma thams cad dag /gcig car byung bar gyur tam ci/ /'di ltar ri ni phug bcas pa/ /'di ni 'od kyis gsal bar gyur/ /nyon mongs med kyis de la smras pa/ nyi ma'i 'od ni rgyun du
419a6('dul ba): rno/ /bu gcig snang ba 'di dag ni/ /yan lag reg na 'di bsil bas/ /nges par thub pa de yi 'od/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od chen ni/ /nges par lhums nas bltams gyur la/ /bltams
419a7('dul ba): nas sems dpa' chen po de'i/ /'od zer gser dang 'dra ba ni/ /dri ma med pa 'di dag gis/ /'jig rten gsum ni snang bar byas/ /mis byin gyis smras pa/ mkhan po/ bdag byang chub
419b1('dul ba): sems dpa' ltar mchi'o/ /des smras pa/ bu/ da lta byang chub sems dpa' dbang che ba dbang che ba'i lha rnams kyis bskor cing bzhugs pas/ gang yang bdag cag gis skabs mi rnyed pa'i gnas 'di yod
419b2('dul ba): do/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir byon nas de'i ming 'dogs pa de'i tshe/ bdag cag blta ba'i phyir 'dong ngo / /gang gi nyi ma kho na la byang chub sems dpa' bcom
419b3('dul ba): ldan 'das bltams pa de nyid kyi nyi ma kho na la rgyal po zas gtsang gi rim gro ba rnams las 'dun pa la sogs te lnga brgya dang / rim gro ma rnams las 'dun ma la sogs te lnga brgya btsas so/ /bal
419b4('dul ba): glang mo lnga brgya dang / rta rgod ma lnga brgya la yang rte'u 'brangs so/ /gter lnga brgya'i kha yang nye bar snang ngo / /khams kyi rgyal phran rnams kyis kyang dpya phul te blon po rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang la
419b5('dul ba): ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang / rgyal pos bsam pa/ bdag gi bu btsas pa na/ bdag don thams cad dang / las kyi mtha' thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur pas/ gzhon nu'i ming don thams
419b6('dul ba): cad grub pa zhes gdags so/ /zhes de na byang chub sems dpa' la ming 'di thog mar btags te/ 'di lta ste/ don thams cad grub pa zhes bya'o/ /grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi na gnod sbyin shAkya
419b7('dul ba): 'phel zhes bya ba zhig gnyug mar gnas so/ /shAkya rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni/ shAkya su yang rung ba la khye'u'am bu mo btsas pa gang yin pa de/ gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel gyi rkang pa la phyag
420a1('dul ba): 'tshal du gzhug pa'i phyir 'khrid pa yin pas/ rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag /dengs la gzhon nu gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel gyi rkang pa la phyag
420a2('dul ba): 'tshal du chug cig / lha/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes blon po rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang la mnyan nas rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i khyogs kyi steng du byang chub sems dpa' bzhag nas
420a3('dul ba): grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir 'jug par brtsams pa na/ ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya gtum po/ gzu lums can/ rtsub pa/ btsam pa med pa de rnams byang chub sems dpa' nang du zhugs pa na/ thub
420a4('dul ba): pa bzhin du gnas pa blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa dang / rgyal po zas gtsang gis bsam pa/ ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya 'di rnams ni/ gtum po/ gzu lums can/ btsam pa med pa
420a5('dul ba): yin na/ gzhon nu nang du zhugs pa na/ thub pa bzhin du gnas pas/ gzhon nu'i ming shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar gdags so/ /zhes de na byang chub sems dpa'i ming gnyis pa btags pa
420a6('dul ba): 'di lta ste/ shAkya thub pa zhes bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel gyi gnas dang nye ba zhig tu byon pa dang / gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel gyis byang chub sems dpa' gnas
420a7('dul ba): dang nye bar phyin pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang phyir byung nas lus thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs pa skye bo'i tshogs kyis rgyal po zas gtsang la smras pa/ lha/
420b1('dul ba): gnod sbyin shAkya 'phel nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs lags so/ /rgyal pos thos nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag /lhas kyang gzhon nu'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs pas/
420b2('dul ba): 'di ni/ lha'i yang lha yin pas/ de bas na/ gzhon nu'i ming lha'i yang lha zhes gdags so/ /zhes de na byang chub sems dpa'i ming gsum pa btags pa/ 'di lta ste/ lha'i yang lha zhes bya'o/ /byang
420b3('dul ba): chub sems dpa' bltams pa'i mod la yab dang yum gyis ma ma rnams la gtad nas/ ma ma khyod kyis gzhon nu dus dus su sku mnye byos shig /dus dus su khrus byos shig /dus dus su zan
420b4('dul ba): byin cig / dus dus su yang dag pa'i bde bas bsnyen bkur byos shig /ma ma dga' ba'i lag pa gnyis kyis de blangs nas dus dus su bsku mnye byed/ dus dus su khrus byed/ dus dus su zan sbyin/
420b5('dul ba): dus dus su yang dag pa'i bde bas bsnyen bkur byed do/ /yang de'i tshe dri shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i ngo bo gang yin pa de rnams kyis byugs shing / rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas yab zas gtsang la
420b6('dul ba): phul ba dang / rgyal po zas gtsang gis de blangs te pang du bzhag nas yang dang yang du rtog cing dga' ba bskyed do/ /chos nyid kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa'i mod la yab dang yum
420b7('dul ba): gyis mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan gyi bram ze rnams la nye bar ston pa yin pas/ shes ldan dag /jig gzhon nu gang dag dang ldan pa'i skyes bu chen po'i 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur ro/ /gzhan du
421a1('dul ba): ni/ ma yin te/ gal te khyim pa khyim na gnas par gyur na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po/ /mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba/ chos kyi rgyal po/ chos dang ldan
421a2('dul ba): pa/ rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de'i rin po che sna bdun ni/ 'di lta bu dag 'byung ste/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu
421a3('dul ba): rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / bdun pa ni/ blon po rin po che'o/ /bu dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol
421a4('dul ba): gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa de rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus par gnod par bsdo ba med cing 'tshe ba med pa/ de nyid chad pa med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med la/ chos dang mthun pas legs
421a5('dul ba): par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro/ /gal te skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu phyung na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
421a6('dul ba): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya bar 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ba/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan nam/ shes ldan dag /gang dag
421a7('dul ba): dang ldan pa'i skyes bu chen po'i 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur gyi/ gzhan ni ma yin zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar skyes bu chen
421b1('dul ba): po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po ni/ gang dag yin/ lha/ gzhon nu'i zhabs shin tu gnas pa lags so/ /zhabs gnyis shin tu gnas pa nyid kyis sa la mnyam par 'bab ste/ lha/ 'di ni/ gzhon
421b2('dul ba): nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /de'i zhabs kyi mthil gyi ngos gnyis las 'khor lo rtsibs stong pa/ lte ba dang mu khyud du bcas pa/ rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa mchis te/ lha/ 'di
421b3('dul ba): ni/ gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha/ gzhon nu ni/ sor mo ring ba dang / zhabs kyi rting pa yangs pa dang / de'i phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa lags te/ phyag
421b4('dul ba): dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa ni/ dper na/ shing bal gyi 'dab ma'am ras bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin no/ /lha/ 'di ni/ gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha/ gzhon nu
421b5('dul ba): ni/ phyag dang zhabs dra bas 'brel ba lags te/ de'i phyag dang zhabs dra bas 'brel ba ni/ dper na/ ngang pa'i rgyal po gzhon nu'i bzhin no/ /lha/ 'di ni/ gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
421b6('dul ba): lags so/ /lha/ gzhon nu ni/ zhabs long mo'i tshigs mi mngon pa dang / byin pa ri dwags e na ya'i lta bu dang / sku mdud pa dang / sku bzhengs bzhin du ma btud par phyag pus mo'i lha nga gnyis
421b7('dul ba): sleb cing reg pa ste/ lha/ 'di ni/ gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha/ gzhon nu ni/ 'doms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa lags te/ de'i 'doms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa ni/
422a1('dul ba): dper na/ glang po cang shes kyi'am/ rta cang shes byung ba dag gi bzhin no/ /lha/ 'di ni/ gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha/ gzhon nu ni/ sku ji srid
422a2('dul ba): par 'dom yang de srid la/ 'dom ji srid par sku yang de srid pas/ shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar mchu zheng gab pa lags te/ lha/ 'di ni/ gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha/ gzhon nu ni/
422a3('dul ba): sku ro stod spu re re nas skye zhing / de'i sku la spu re re nas skye ba yang mthing ga la g.yas phyogs su 'khyil bar skye lags te/ lha/ 'di ni/ gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha/
422a4('dul ba): gzhon nu ni/ mdog gser dang 'dra ba dang / 'od 'dom gang ba dang / pags pa srab cing mdog gser 'dra ba lags te/ pags pa srab pa nyid kyis rdul dang dri mas sku la mi gos pa ste/
422a5('dul ba): lha/ 'di ni/ gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha/ gzhon nu'i sku ni/ bdun mtho ba ste/ sku bdun mtho bar 'khrungs pa ni/ phyag gnyis dang / zhabs gnyis dang / dpung
422a6('dul ba): mgo gnyis dang / ltag pa lags te/ lha/ 'di ni/ gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha/ gzhon nu ni/ thal gong rgyas pa dang / sku ro stod seng ge'i 'dra ba dang / sku
422a7('dul ba): drang zhing kho lag che ba dang / dpung mgo shin tu zlum pa dang / tshems bzhi bcu mnga' ba dang / tshems mnyam pa dang / tshems thags bzang ba dang / mche ba shin tu dkar pa dang / 'gram
422b1('dul ba): ba seng ge'i 'dra ba dang / ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa lags te/ lha/ 'di ni/ gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha/ gzhon nu ni/ ljags shin tu ring zhing srab pa lags te/ ljags
422b2('dul ba): shin tu ring ba nyid dang / srab pa nyid kyi phyir ljags zhal nas byung bas skra mtshams nas bzung ste zhal gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi bar du g.yogs par mdzad pa ste/ lha/ 'di ni/ gzhon nu'i skyes bu
422b3('dul ba): chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha/ gzhon nu'i gsung ni/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ka la ping+ka'i skad ltar yid du 'ong ba dang / rnga'i dbyangs can lags te/ lha/ 'di ni/ gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i
422b4('dul ba): mtshan lags so/ /lha/ gzhon nu ni/ spyan mthon mthing la/ ba'i rdzi ma lta bu dang / dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa dang / smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu dung ltar dkar zhing g.yas su 'khyil ba lags te/ lha/
422b5('dul ba): 'di ni/ gzhon nu'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan lags so/ /lha/ 'di dag ni/ gang dag dang ldan pa'i 'gro ba gnyis su 'gyur gyi/ gzhan du ni/ ma lags pa zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du 'jig
422b6('dul ba): rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gyi skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis lags so/ /gal te gzhon nu rab tu ma byung bar gyur na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por
422b7('dul ba): 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /chos nyid kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa bltams nas zhag bdun lon pa dang / de skrun pa'i yum nongs par 'gyur te/ nongs ma
423a1('dul ba): thag tu sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris gya nom par skye bar 'gyur ro/ /chos nyid kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa ni/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug
423a2('dul ba): pa/ mi'i kha dog las 'das pa/ lha'i kha dog ma thob pa/ skyes pa dang bud med rnams kyis bltas pa na ngoms mi shes shing dga' ba 'thob ste/ dper na/ 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser la mgar
423a3('dul ba): ba mkhas pas rgyan brdungs pa/ la ba dkar po gsar pa'i steng du bzhag na/ shin tu gsal zhing 'bar la rnam par 'tsher ba de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa gzugs
423a4('dul ba): bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ mi'i kha dog las 'das shing / lha'i kha dog ni/ ma thob pa yin no/ /chos nyid kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i
423a5('dul ba): snying du sdug pa dang / yid du 'ong bar 'gyur te/ skye bo'i tshogs chen pos de phrag par sbed pa ni/ dper na/ ston ka'i pad+ma skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong bas/
423a6('dul ba): skye bo'i tshogs chen pos de lag pa nas lag par brgyud par byed pa bzhin te/ snga ma bzhin no/ /bar sdom la/ mig mi 'dzum dang rnam smin dang / /gsung snyan 'jebs pa mkhas pa bsdus/
423a7('dul ba): chos nyid kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa'i mod nas spyan mi 'dzum par gzugs rnam par lta ste/ de spyan mi 'dzum pa ni/ dper na/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams bzhin
423b1('dul ba): no/ /chos nyid kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa'i mod nas sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i lha'i spyan dang ldan pas/ des na/ de nyin mtshan du dpag tshad gcig kho ra khor yug tu
423b2('dul ba): gzigs so/ /chos nyid kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa'i mod nas gsung snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / gsung snyan pa dang / gsung yid du 'ong ba yin te/ dper na/ gangs can gyi bya skad
423b3('dul ba): snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad snyan pa dang / yid du 'ong ba de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa'i mod nas gsung snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / gsung snyan pa dang / gsung yid du 'ong ba
423b4('dul ba): yin no/ /chos nyid kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa'i mod nas mkhas pa/ gsal ba/ yid gzhungs pa/ rgyud las 'byung ba'i shes rab dpyod pa dang ldan pa yin te/ de'i tshe rgyal
423b5('dul ba): po zas gtsang gi dgos pa'i ched la 'dug nas don zab mo'i tshig dang / yi ge dag shes rab kyis so sor 'byed par byed do/ /de nas mis byin gyis smras pa/ mkhan po/ byang chub sems
423b6('dul ba): dpa' ser skya'i gzhir byon nas de'i mtshan yang gsum btags kyi/ da ni/ byang chub sems dpa' la blta ba'i phyir bzhud do/ /de bzhin du bya'o/ /zhes de gnyis chas pa dang / byang chub
423b7('dul ba): sems dpa'i mthus rdzu 'phrul nyams nas rkang pa kho nas grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir zhugs nas rgyal po zas gtsang gi khyim gyi sgor song ba dang / drang srong nyon mongs med kyis sgo srung gi mi la
424a1('dul ba): smras pa/ kye nang rje/ song la rgyal po zas gtsang la drang srong nyon mongs med lha zhal mthong bar 'tshal nas sgo na sdod cing mchis so/ /zhes gsol cig /de song nas
424a2('dul ba): rgyal po la rig par byas pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan nyon mongs med la su zhig 'gog /nang du zhugs shig /de zhugs pa dang rgyal po zas gtsang gis bkur sti sngon du 'gro ba'i mchod
424a3('dul ba): yon sbreng bas mchod nas stan bstabs te 'dug pa dang / rgyal po zas gtsang gis bshes pa'i gtam gyis kun tu dga' bar byas nas smras pa/ drang srong chen po dgos pa ci zhig la 'ongs/ des
424a4('dul ba): smras pa/ rgyal chen bdag cag 'dir mchis pa/ khyod kyi sras ni mthong bar 'tshal/ /'jig rten gtso bo rnam 'dren pa/ /thub pa de ni mthong bar 'tshal/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ gal te de lta na gzhon
424a5('dul ba): nu nyal gyi/ ma sad kyi bar du re zhig skad cig sdod cig /des smras pa/ lha/ mnal log pa nyid blta'o/ /de bzhin gyis shig /de ji tsam na/ byang chub sems dpa' mig ma btsums shing
424a6('dul ba): mi 'dzum par gzugs rnams la blta ba mthong nas des tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ rigs dang ldan pa'i rta rnams ni/ /mtshan mo'i bzhi cha nyal ba ltar/ /dgos pa don gnyer rnams
424a7('dul ba): kyi gnyid/ /mig la yun ring mi gnas so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' bltams pa'i mod kyi ma mas pang du blangs nas drang srong la byin pa dang / drang srong nyon mongs med kyis lag pa gnyis
424b1('dul ba): kyis blangs nas yud tsam zhig brtags te smras pa/ lha/ gzhon nu mtshan mkhan dang / ltas mkhan gyi bram ze rnams la bstan lags sam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bstan to/ /de rnams kyis ji skad du
424b2('dul ba): lung bstan/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba nas 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de nas drang srong nyon mongs med kyis byang
424b3('dul ba): chub sems dpa' mthong nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ sa bdag rtog pa po rnams blo 'khrul te/ /rtsod pa'i dus na 'khor los bsgyur mi 'byung / /bsod nams mchog gi chos kyi mdzod 'di ni/ /nyes
424b4('dul ba): las rnam par rgyal nas sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /mtshan mi gsal dang ldan na mi dbang po/ /gling bzhi rnams kyi bdag po dbang phyug 'gyur/ /thub dbang mtshan ni shin tu gsal bas na/ /mi mchog
424b5('dul ba): sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor los bsgyur/ /zhes smras nas bdag nyid kyi tshe'i mtha' dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par byang chub pa la brtag pa la zhugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lo
424b6('dul ba): nyi shu rtsa dgu bzhes nas khab nas byung nas lo drug tu dka' ba spyod par 'gyur te/ de nas bdud rtsi rtogs par 'gyur bar mthong ngo / /bdag ni/ bar skabs der shi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur par
424b7('dul ba): mthong nas de mig mchi mas gang ste 'dug pa rgyal po zas gtsang gis mthong nas sdangs nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ skye ba bud med rnams kyis gar mthong na/ ngoms par mi 'gyur dga' ba
425a1('dul ba): thob 'gyur ba/ /lus bzang dge byed de ni 'dir mthong nas/ /drang srong chen po ci slad ngu bzhin gyur/ /ga las bdag gi gzhon nu 'jigs pa 'am/ /tshe zad 'gyur ba nye bar mi gnas
425a2('dul ba): grang / /de ni myur du legs par bdag la smros/ /khyod kyi mchi mas bdag ni 'dar bar gyur/ /drang srong nyon mongs med kyis kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gal te 'di yi steng du nam mkha' las/ /rdo
425a3('dul ba): rje'i ser drag 'phangs pa bab gyur kyang / /thub pa chen po'i sku las ba spu ni/ /nyag ma gcig kyang g.yo bar mi nus so/ /me chen rlung gi shugs kyis bdas pa dang / mtshon cha rnon po shin tu mi bzad
425a4('dul ba): dang / /drag po'i dug dang sbrul gyi dug rnon yang / /gzhon nu la bab skad cig 'jig mi 'gyur/ /thugs rje nyid la gnas gyur gang lags pa/ /'jigs par nyen pa rnams la mi 'jigs stsol/ /de ni
425a5('dul ba): 'jig rten kun gyi 'jigs 'joms na/ /mi dbang 'di la 'jigs pa ga la 'byung / /'jig rten na ni bdag nyid che rnams kyi/ /gtsor gyur bdag nyid chen po gang zhig la/ /tshangs bcas lha yang
425a6('dul ba): rtag tu srung byed pa/ /mi dbang de la 'jigs pa ga la 'byung / /mi dbang bdag gi rgyud pa mthong nas ni/ /gang phyir zhi ba mi 'thob bdag sdug mod/ /chos kyi mchog mdzod 'di dang 'phrad nas ni/ /
425a7('dul ba): don mi thob par bdag ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ /gang dag smra ba'i dam pa mtshungs med pa/ /'di yi chos thos 'gyur zhing thos nas kyang / /rab tu zhi ba'i pha rol 'gro de dag /skyed cing bsod nams
425b1('dul ba): ldan la rims nad bral/ /drang srong nyon mongs med rgyud nyon mongs pa can gyis bsam pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i mthus bdag gi rdzu 'phrul nyams te bdag rkang gis song nas/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang rgyal po
425b2('dul ba): 'phya bar 'gyur ro/ /snyam du rig nas smras pa/ lha/ khyod yun ring po nas kye ma'o/ /drang srong nyon mongs med rkang kho nas ser skya'i gzhir zhugs par gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam du dgongs pa skyes pa/ bdag gi rkang
425b3('dul ba): gis ser skya'i gzhir zhugs te da ni/ rkang kho nas phyir 'byung gi /khyod kyis lam bstar ba dang / grong khyer byi dor byed du stsol cig /rgyal po zas gtsang gis blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag /
425b4('dul ba): dengs la grong khyer gyi byi dor dang lam stor du chug la/ lam po che dang / tshong 'dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su drang srong nyon mongs med rkang gis grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi nas phyir 'byung gi
425b5('dul ba): khyed cag gis bya ba dang byed pa gang yin pa de dag byos shig / ces dril sgrogs shig /lha/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes blon po rnams kyis rgyal po las mnyan nas grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi rdo ba dang /
425b6('dul ba): gseg ma dang / gyo mo rnams bsal nas tsan+dan gyi chus chag chag btab/ shin tu dri zhim po'i pog phor nye bar bzhag /dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po bcangs/ rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng nas
425b7('dul ba): lam po che dang / tshong 'dus dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo rnams su dril sgrog tu bcug pa/ ser skya'i gzhi'i shAkya shes ldan dag nyon cig /drang srong nyon mongs med grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi nas
426a1('dul ba): phyir 'byung gi/ khyed cag gis bya ba dang byed pa gang yin pa de byos shig/ de nas de nyon mongs pa'i blo dang ngan g.yo'i spyod pas rgyal po zas gtsang blon po'i tshogs kyis
426a2('dul ba): yongs su bskor ba dang / ser skya na gnas pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag du ma rjes bzhin du 'brang zhing 'byor pa mchog gis grong khyer gyi dbus nas dbus su byung ste grong khyer ser skya'i sgor byung nas
426a3('dul ba): rgyal po slar bzlog ste ji ltar dga' ba'i spyod lam gyis song ste/ rim gyis ri bo kun 'dzin gyi drung du phyin pa dang / de de la 'dzeg nas phan tshun nyul zhing ji ltar 'dod pa'i gnas shig btsal nas phyogs
426a4('dul ba): shig tu 'dug go/ de nas de lam gyis dub pa ngal sos te bsam gtan bskyed nas rdzu 'phrul yang bskyed do/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na drang srong nyon mongs med nad kyis thebs nas/ de rtsa ba dang /
426a5('dul ba): sdong bu dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu'i sman gyis bsnyen bkur byas na/ 'on kyang phyir thu bar gyur to/ /de nas mis byin gyis de'i lus kyi gnas rnams brtags nas smras pa/ mkhan
426a6('dul ba): po| bdag cag cung zad rab tu byung ba de thams cad ni/ bdud rtsi'i ched dang / bdud rtsi btsal ba'i phyir lags na/ gal te mkhan pos bdud rtsi rtogs par gyur na/ bdud rtsi de las bdag
426a7('dul ba): cag la yang bgos shig / des smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u/ kho bo yang cung zad rab tu byung ba de thams cad bdud rtsi'i ched dang / bdud rtsi btsal ba'i phyir yin na/ kho bos kyang bdud rtsi ma
426b1('dul ba): rtogs so/ /de lta mod kyi/ shAkya rnams kyi nang du byung ba'i gzhon nu gang yin pa des/ bdud rtsi 'di rtogs par 'gyur zhing / bdud rtsis kyang 'gro ba tshim par byed par 'gyur gyi/ de'i drung du rab tu phyung
426b2('dul ba): zhig / khyod rab tu byung nas kyang rigs brjod par mi bya/ rus brjod par mi bya/ bram ze'i khye'ur brjod par mi bya ste/ rab tu byung nas kyang tshangs par spyod pa 'ba' zhig spyad par bya zhing / bdud rtsi rtogs
426b3('dul ba): par bya ba'i phyir brtson par bya'o/ /de nas khyod kyis bdud rtsi rtogs par 'gyur ro/ /zhes smras nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshol 'dod na/ /shar gyi phyogs su khyod 'dug
426b4('dul ba): dang / /yang dag sangs rgyas grags ldan pa/ /rnyed par dka' ba mthong bar 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba smras nas/ bsags pa kun gyi mtha' 'dzad cing / /mthon po rnams kyi mtha' ltung 'gyur/ /'phrad pa'i
426b5('dul ba): mtha' ni 'bral ba ste/ /gson pa'i mtha' ni 'chi ba yin/ /zhes smras te/ dus kyi chos dang ldan par gyur to/ /de nas mis byin gyis de'i lus la lus kyi mchod pa byas nas wA ra NA sir song ste gnas so/ /
426b6('dul ba): de de na bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya la bram ze'i gsang tshig klog tu 'jug go/ mis byin gyi rus ka t+ya na yin pas/ de'i ming ka t+ya'i bu/ ka t+ya'i bu zhes bya bar gyur to/ /de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon
426b7('dul ba): par byang chub pa na spyan sngar 'gro bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ka t+ya'i bu de la gdams ngag phog nas 'khor ba'i dgon pa las bsgral te/ shin tu mthar phyin pa'i grub pa dang bde ba mya ngan las
427a1('dul ba): 'das pa la 'jog par 'gyur te/ de'i ming ni/ ka t+ya'i bu chen po/ ka t+ya'i bu chen po/ zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig na byang chub sems dpa' 'khrungs nas ring
427a2('dul ba): po ma lon par ma ma'i bang du bzhugs nas gser gyi gzhong par 'bras dang shar bsres pa'i chan gsol ba na/ de ma mas bkag kyang ma thub par mang por gsol nas dbrog par brtsams pa dang /
427a3('dul ba): dbrog ma nus nas des rgyal po zas gtsang la sbran pa dang / rgyal pos btsun mo dang lhan cig gis dbrog par brtsams pa dang / des kyang ma nus so/ /de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams dang ser skya na gnas
427a4('dul ba): pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams la bsgo na/ de rnams kyis kyang dbrog par ma nus so/ /de nas glang po che lnga brgya la btags pa dang / byang chub sems dpas bsam pa/ 'di rnams kyis bdag gi stobs nyams
427a5('dul ba): na/ mi rung gi/ ma la bdag gis mdzub mo bkug pas gser gyi gzhong pa nas gzung ngo / /snyam nas des mdzub mo bkug pas gser gyi gzhong pa bzung nas drangs pa dang / glang po che lnga brgya po de
427a6('dul ba): dag kha phyir bsgyur te drangs nas de dag gis kyang gser gyi gzhong pa dbrog par ma nus so/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis bsam pa/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i lag pa g.yon pas glang po che lnga
427a7('dul ba): brgya drangs pa dang sbyar na/ gdon mi za bar lag pa gnyis kyis ni/ glang po che stong thub kyi/ de bas na/ gzhon nu'i ming glang po che stong gi stobs can zhes gdags so/ /zhes btags so/ /
427b1('dul ba): bar sdom la/ khye'u dang rtsa mo dag dang ni/ /rig pa khang bzang dag dang ni/ /ngang pa mtshon cha dge ba'i snying / /dmag dang btsun mo rnams yin no/ /chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpas shAkya thub pa 'khor lnga
427b2('dul ba): brgya dang yi ge'i slob dpon srin bu go cha la yi ge slob par gtad nas/ yi ge'i slob dpon srin bu go chas/ byang chub sems dpa' la yi ger bris nas phog pa dang / byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'di
427b3('dul ba): ni/ ngas shes so/ /de nas des yi ge gnyis dang gsum nas de bzhin du lnga brgya'i bar bris nas phog pa dang / byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'di dag kyang ngas shes kyi gzhan dag smros shig/ srin bu go
427b4('dul ba): chas smras pa/ 'jig rten na ni/ yi ge 'di tsam spyod kyi/ gzhan ni/ bdag gis ma 'tshal to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyis yi ge bris te srin bu go cha la byin nas gsungs pa/ yi ge 'di'i ming
427b5('dul ba): ci yin smros shig/ des smras pa/ ma 'tshal to/ /byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/ 'jig rten du gnyis shig byung na/ yi ge 'di mngon par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'am/ 'khor los
427b6('dul ba): bsgyur ba'o/ /nam mkha'i ngos la gnas pa'i tshangs pas smras pa/ srin bu go cha/ byang chub sems dpa' ji skad gsungs pa de de bzhin te/ yi ge 'di shes pa ni/ 'jig rten du gnyis shig byung na mngon
427b7('dul ba): par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'am/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'o/ /byang chub sems dpas yi ge de tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis bklags pa la/ nam mkha'i ngos la gnas pa'i tshangs pas
428a1('dul ba): dbang byas pas/ tshangs pa'i yi ge/ tshangs pa'i yi ge zhes bya bar gyur to/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' yi ge'i mthar phyin pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i zhang po bzang
428a2('dul ba): len zhes bya ba des/ glang po che'i gnya' bar zhon pa bslab nas 'phong gi slob dpon lhar bcas zhes bya ba des 'khor lnga brgya dang gcod pa slob pa la zhugs pa na/ bzang len gyis lhar bcas la
428a3('dul ba): smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin du gzhon nu gzhan dag ni/ snying rje can yin pas bslab par bya ba thams cad slobs shig/ lha sbyin 'di ni/ gdug pa'i las byed pa yin gyis/
428a4('dul ba): 'jig rten thams cad la gnod par gyur na mi rung gi/ 'di la gnang du bsnun pa ma ston cig/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bslab pa thams cad la legs par bslab pas gnas lnga po
428a5('dul ba): 'di lta ste/ rgyang nas phog pa dang / sgra grags par phog pa dang / gnad du phog pa dang / mi 'tshor bar phog pa dang / tshabs che ba dag la yang byang bar gyur pa de'i phyogs kun tu sgra grags
428a6('dul ba): pa/ shAkya rnams kyi nang du byung ba'i gzhon nu zhes bya ba nas 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ /de'i tshe yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyis
428a7('dul ba): glang po che mtshan dang ldan pa zhig rnyed nas de rnams kyis bsam pa/ rgyal po zas gtsang gi sras mtshan mkhan rnams kyis 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan pa de'i
428b1('dul ba): mthus glang po rin po che 'di byung gi/ dong la de kho na la dbul lo/ /snyam nas de rnams kyis glang po rin po che de rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas khrid de dong ba las/ rim gyis ser skya'i gzhir phyin nas rgyal
428b2('dul ba): po'i pho brang gi sgor glang po che dam pa bzhag nas sdod pa dang / ma stes te gdug pa'i las can lhas sbyin phyir byung ba des glang po che dam pa de de ltar rgyan gyis brgyan pa mthong nas/ de des phrag dog chen po
428b3('dul ba): skyes te/ de phrag dog dang mi bzod pa skyes pas dris pa/ glang po che dam pa 'di su'i yin/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ gzhon nu shAkya thub pa mtshan mkhan rnams kyis 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por lung
428b4('dul ba): bstan pa de la yangs pa can gyi tshogs rnams kyis glang po rin po che 'di skyes su phul lo/ /lhas sbyin lhag par mi bzod pa skyes nas smras pa/ re zhig 'khor los bsgyur bar ma gyur par je khyed cag de
428b5('dul ba): la glang po rin po che 'bul lam zhes smras nas thal lcag gis glang po che bsad do/ /ji tsam na phyogs der dga' bo 'ongs pa des de mthong nas dris pa/ shes ldan dag/ glang po che bzang po 'di sus
428b6('dul ba): bsad/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lhas sbyin gyis so/ /des bsam pa/ gdon mi za bar 'di la lhas sbyin gyis mthu sad kyi/ ma la bdag gis kyang 'di la mthu sad par bya'o/ /snyam nas mjug ma
428b7('dul ba): nas bzung ste dri mi zhim par mi 'gyur bar bya bar mtha' gcig tu bor ro/ /ji tsam na byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa phyir byung ba des de gzigs nas dris pa/ glang po che 'di gang nas 'ongs/ de
429a1('dul ba): rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa smras so/ /sus bsad/ lhas sbyin gyis so/ /mgron rnams la mgron gyi mchod pa bya ba yin na/ ma legs pa zhig byas so/ /phyogs gang du bsad/
429a2('dul ba): 'o nir ro/ /'di sus 'dir khyer te 'ongs/ dga' bos so/ /des dgongs pa/ gdon mi za bar de gnyis kyis 'di la mthu sad kyi/ ma la ngas kyang 'di la mthu sad par bya'o/ /snyam du dgongs nas
429a3('dul ba): mjug ma nas bzung ste ra ba'i khar 'phangs pa las/ ra ba rim pa bdun dang / 'obs bdun las bzlas te bor ro/ /de ltung bas gshong btod pa glang po che'i gshong / glang po che'i gshong zhes
429a4('dul ba): bya bar gyur to/ /der bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis mchod rten brtsigs pas/ deng sang du yang dge slong mchod rten la phyag byed pa dag phyag byed do/ /'dir smras pa/ lhas
429a5('dul ba): byin gyis ni glang chen dbang po bsad/ /dga' bos de ni gom pa bdun du khyer/ /byang chub sems dpa'i phyag gis bar snang la/ /rdo ba bzhin du phyi rol rgyang ring 'phangs/ /gzhon nu rnams kyis
429a6('dul ba): smras pa/ gcod pa byed du 'dong ngo / /zhes de rnams kyis phyir byung ba/ byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pas kyang gsan nas 'khor lnga brgya dang gcod pa byed du phyir byung ngo / /gzhon nu rnams
429a7('dul ba): 'bras rnga bzhin du gcod par byed de/ de rnams kyis shing bcad cing / bcad pa rnams kyis 'gyel to/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni/ bre'i kha gcod pa bzhin du gcod par mdzad do/ /des
429b1('dul ba): shing bcad cing / bcad pa rnams ma 'gyel te/ de bzhin du 'dug pa dang / gzhon nu rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa stobs dang ldan zhing gnas lnga la
429b2('dul ba): byang che zhes thos na/ 'di gcod par byed pa yang mi shes pa las na/ 'di bdag cag pas stobs dang ldan pa ni/ ma yin te/ 'di ltar/ bdag cag gis shing gang dag bcad pa de thams cad
429b3('dul ba): ni/ 'gyel la/ 'dis gang dag bcad pa de dag ni/ de bzhin du 'dug go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa la mngon par dad pa'i lha gang yin pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ shAkya
429b4('dul ba): 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang / bzo la byang ba ma shes pas/ byang chub sems dpa' la brnyas shing mthu la yang smod par 'gyur gyi/ de la thabs shig bsham par bya'o/ /snyam
429b5('dul ba): nas/ des de dang mthun pa'i rlung zhig btang bas/ des shing de dag thams cad chems chems zer nas 'gyel te/ shAkya rnams kyis mthong nas mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes so/ /de rnams tsha bas byed pa
429b6('dul ba): la zhugs te/ de rnams kyis de na 'ben du lcags kyi ta la bdun dang / rnga dang / phag btsugs so/ /lhas byin gyis rkang thabs byas te lcags mda' 'phangs pa dang / lcags kyi shing ta la gcig
429b7('dul ba): phigs so/ /dga' bos ni/ gnyis pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpas lcags mda' 'phangs pa dang / shing ta la bdun dang / rnga dang / phag las thal nas lcags kyi mda' de sa la zug pa klus
430a1('dul ba): phyung ba dang / chu ro phun sum tshogs pa zhig byung nas de la skye bo'i tshogs chen pos 'thung bar brtsams so/ /bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis der mchod
430a2('dul ba): rten brtsigs te/ deng sang du yang dge slong mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba dag phyag byed do/ /gzhon nu rnams shing rtar zhugs nas ser skya'i gzhir zhugs pa dang / mtshan mkhan grong khyer
430a3('dul ba): nas phyir byung ba de rnams kyis gzhon nu shAkya thub pa shing rtar zhugs nas nang du zhugs pa la lung bstan pa/ gal te 'di lo bcu gnyis su rab tu ma byung bar gyur na/ gdon
430a4('dul ba): mi za bar 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis gzhon nu mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan to/ /zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes
430a5('dul ba): te shAkya rnams bsags nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag /mtshan mkhan rnams kyis gal te gzhon nu lo bcu gnyis su rab tu ma byung bar gyur na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur
430a6('dul ba): ro/ /zhes lung bstan pa kho bos thos so/ /gzhon nu 'di gal te lo bcu gnyis su rab tu ma byung ste/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur na/ bdag cag nam mkha'i ngos la rgyu zhing gling
430a7('dul ba): bzhir mchi zhing 'dong gi/ 'di'i khyim phubs shig/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ gzhon nu 'dod pa rnams don du mi gnyer ro/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ gzhon nu la
430b1('dul ba): bud med thams cad bstan nas 'di gang la dga' bar gyur pa de chung mar blang bar bya'o/ /de nas kha cig gis smras pa/ lha/ gzhon nu ni/ sbyin pa la dga' bas rgyan rnams bud med la stsol du stsal la
430b2('dul ba): de gang la dga' skyes bar 'gyur ba de chung mar blang bar bgyi'o/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ de bzhin du gyis shig/ blon po rnams kyis rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs rin po ches spras pa'i phung po
430b3('dul ba): spungs so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis khyim dang / grong khyer phyag dar dang byi dor byed du bcug nas rgyu skar dang / tshes grangs dang / yud tsam dag bstun te gdan seng ge'i khri bshams pa la
430b4('dul ba): gzhon nu shAkya thub pa bzhag nas seng ge'i khri dang nye bar rgyan sna tshogs kyi phung po spungs te/ blon po rnams dang / gzhan yang / ser skya'i gzhi'i skye bo'i tshogs gtso bor bkur ba rnams nang du
430b5('dul ba): zhugs so/ /de nas bud med thams cad rang gi khyim gyi 'byor pa dang mthun pa'i cha byad dang / rgyan dang / gos gyon nas zhugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa la dga' bas rgyan de dag
430b6('dul ba): de rnams la byin no/ /shAkya lag na dbyug pa can gyi bu mo grags 'dzin ma zhes bya ba/ gzugs dang la tsho la bab pa de/ ma song nas shAkya lag na dbyug pa can gyis smras pa/ bu mo/ byang
430b7('dul ba): chub sems dpa' rgyan sbyin gyi song zhig/ des smras pa/ yab/ ci/ 'o skol cag la rgyan ma mchis sam/ bu mo/ /med pa ni/ ma yin mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' bud med gang bzhed pa
431a1('dul ba): de gdam par mdzad do/ /yab/ 'dam yang rung / mi 'dam yang rung / de kho na bdag gi sdum thab lags so/ /bu mo/ gal te de lta na shin tu 'gro dgos pas song
431a2('dul ba): zhig / de nas grags 'dzin ma na tshod gzhon zhing cha lugs bzang ba/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i yid dang mig 'phrog pa/ bud med thams cad kyi nang na lha'i bu mo bzhin du gzi brjid dang ldan
431a3('dul ba): pas nang du zhugs nas spyod lam dul bas byang chub sems dpa'i spyan sngar 'dug go/ byang chub sems dpas rgyan thams cad byin nas sor gdub rgya kho na lus pa byang chub sems dpas de la
431a4('dul ba): bstan pa dang / de nas thog ma med pa'i dus nas mchog tu mnyes pa byas pa des/ seng ge'i khri'i skas la 'dzeg nas byang chub sems dpa'i phyag nas rang gis phyung ngo / /blon po rnams
431a5('dul ba): dang / ser skya'i gzhi'i skye bo'i tshogs gtso bor bkur ba rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag /'di ni/ bud med thams cad las khyad par 'phags pa yin te/ 'dis gzhon nu'i thugs
431a6('dul ba): dang bstun par nus pas 'di blang bar bya'o/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis grags 'dzin ma bud med kyi 'khor nyi khri dang gzhon nu shAkya thub pa'i btsun mor blangs so/ /chos nyid kyis/ gang
431a7('dul ba): gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du byung ba de'i tshe shing dge ba'i snying po zhes bya ba skye bar 'gyur te/ de nyi ma gcig cing khru brgyar skye bar 'gyur la/ ji tsam nyi ma ma
431b1('dul ba): shar ba de srid du ni/ sen mos kyang gcad du rung la/ nyi ma shar nas ni/ mtshon gyis kyang mi chod cing / mes kyang mi tshig pa zhig ser skya'i gzhi dang lhas bstan gyi bar na 'bab chu ro hi ka zhes bya ba'i
431b2('dul ba): 'gram na skyes te/ dus dus su chu brug pas de'i rtsa ba brus nas rlung gi shugs kyis 'gyel te gags bzhin du chu bcad de 'dug go/ de nas chus rgyal po legs par rab sad kyi yul ni/ chu med
431b3('dul ba): bas ma rung la/ zas gtsang gi yang chus ma rung ste/ rgyal po legs par rab sad kyis rgyal po zas gtsang la spring pa/ shing dge ba'i snying po 'gyel nas 'bab chu ro hi ka'i gags su gyur te mchis
431b4('dul ba): na/ gzhon nu mthu dang ldan zhes thos kyi/ da gtang ba'i rigs so/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/ kho bo gzhon nu la bka' mi stsol lo/ /'dun pas smras pa/ lha/ bdag la gnang ba 'ba'
431b5('dul ba): zhig stsol cig dang / ci nas kyang gzhon nu la yang bka' ma stsal bzhin du rang nyid gshegs par 'gyur ba de ltar bgyi'o/ /rgyal po zas gtsang gis khas blangs so/ /'dun pas 'bab chu ro hi
431b6('dul ba): ka'i 'gram du gzhon nu rnams kyi skyed mos tshal re re btsugs nas smras pa/ gzhon nu dag /skyed mos tshal du 'dong / de rnams so so'i shing rtar zhugs nas skyed mos tshal du dong ba las/
431b7('dul ba): lhas byin gyi skyed mos tshal gyi steng nas ngang pa zhig 'phur ba de/ lhas byin gyis mdas bsnun nas byang chub sems dpa'i skyed mos tshal du ltung ba dang / byang chub sems dpas bzung nas
432a1('dul ba): mda' phyung ste sman gyis glan nas sos so/ /lhas byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' la spring pa/ ngang pa'o ni/ sngar ngas bzung ba yin gyi/ skur cig /byang chub sems
432a2('dul ba): dpas slar spring pa/ ngas gang gi tshe kho na sems can thams cad la phan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de kho na'i tshe ngas sems can thams cad bzung ba yin no/ /der byang
432a3('dul ba): chub sems dpa' dang lhas byin lhan cig srid pa tha ma la thog mar sha 'khon de byung ste/ srid pa gzhan rnams su ni/ phal mo che zhig kyang byung ngo / /legs par rab sad kyis gzhon nu rnams
432a4('dul ba): shing dge ba'i snying po dbyung ba'i phyir lhags so/ /zhes thos nas/ des skye bo'i tshogs chen po mngags te/ de na skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i sgra chen po dang / sgra mthon po grags nas byang chub
432a5('dul ba): sems dpas smras pa/ shes ldan dag /skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i sgra chen po sgra mthon po grags pa 'di ci zhig /'dun pas ji ltar gyur pa gsol pa dang / byang chub sems dpas gsungs
432a6('dul ba): pa/ gal te de lta na/ 'byin du 'dong ngo / /zhes byang chub sems dpa' gzhon nu rnams dang lhan cig dong ba dang / ji tsam na khung nas sprul gdug pa zhig byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du
432a7('dul ba): byung ba dang / 'char kas byang chub sems dpa' thal bar brlags su 'gyur du 'ong zhes mtshon rnon pos rked du bcad pa las/ de'i dbugs kyis 'char ka la phog pas 'char ka nag
432b1('dul ba): bor gyur nas/ de'i ming 'char ka nag po/ 'char ka nag po/ zhes bya bar gyur to/ /de nas gzhon nu rnams kyis shing dge ba'i snying po 'byin pa la zhugs pa na/ lhas byin gyis 'bad pa dang cung
432b2('dul ba): zad cig g.yos so/ /dga' bos ni/ cung zad cig bteg go/ byang chub sems dpas ni/ thams cad kyi thams cad du steng gi nam mkha' la 'phangs te dum bu gnyis su chag nas 'bab chu ro hi
432b3('dul ba): ka'i tshu rol gyi 'gram du dum bu gcig / pha rol gyi 'gram du dum bu gcig ltung bar gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpas skye bo'i tshogs la gsungs pa/ shes ldan dag /shing dge ba'i snying po
432b4('dul ba): 'di ni/ bsil ba'i rang bzhin yin pas mkhris pa'i nad dang / shu ba dang / phol mig byung ba la byugs na/ zhi bar 'gyur gyi/ dum bu dum bur byos la khyer cig /gzhon nu rnams rang rang
432b5('dul ba): gi shing rtar zhugs te skyed mos tshal gyi sa nas ser skya'i gzhir dong nas grong khyer du zhugs pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' shing rtar zhugs pa la mtshan mkhan rnams kyis/ gal te 'di
432b6('dul ba): lo bdun du rab tu ma byung bar gyur na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan to/ /shAkya dril bu sgra'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma zhes bya ba/ steng gi khang bzang gi gzhi la 'dug
432b7('dul ba): pa byang chub sems dpas gzigs so/ /gzigs ma thag tu zhabs kyi mthe bos shing rta mnan nas mi g.yo bar gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpas sa 'tsho ma la brtag par brtsams so//
433a1('dul ba): sa 'tsho mas kyang byang chub sems dpa' la'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sa 'tsho ma la rtog pa na phyag na lcags kyi mda' bsnams pa de phyir brlags so/ /sa 'tsho ma yang byang
433a2('dul ba): chub sems dpa' la rtog pa na/ rkang pa'i mthe bos khang bzang gi gzhi brtol to/ /skye bo'i tshogs chen pos byang chub sems dpa' dang sa 'tsho ma phan tshun du rtog par byed cing lhag pa'i
433a3('dul ba): bsam pa skyes par gyur pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang smras pa/ bud med 'di 'dra ba 'dis ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i thugs dang bstun par nus so/ /gtam de rgyal po zas gtsang gis
433a4('dul ba): thos nas de 'khor nyi khri dang byang chub sems dpa'i btsun mor blangs so/ /chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir gshegs par bzhed par gyur pa de'i tshe kha
433a5('dul ba): lo sgyur ba la/ kye kha lo sgyur ba/ re zhig bzhon pa bzang po myur du shoms shig dang / der nga zhugs nas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir 'gro'o/ /zhes gsung bar 'gyur bas/ de nas byang
433a6('dul ba): chub sems dpas kha lo sgyur ba la bsgo ba/ kye kha lo sgyur ba/ re zhig bzhon pa bzang po myur du shoms shig dang / der nga zhugs nas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir 'gro'o/ /lha/ bka'
433a7('dul ba): bzhin 'tshal zhes kha lo sgyur bas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa'i ltar mnyan nas/ bzhon pa bzang po myur du bshams te byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song
433b1('dul ba): nas phyin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha /bcibs pa bzang po bshams lags kyi/ lha/ de de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/ de nas byang chub sems
433b2('dul ba): dpa' shAkya thub pa bzhon pa bzang por zhugs nas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pas mi rgas/ 'khogs/ gtugs pa/ sgur po/ /phyam sgur po ltar kyar
433b3('dul ba): kyor can/ mdun nas 'khar ba la brten cing lus 'dar zhing 'gro ba/ de'i skra se ba/ ji ltar yang mi gzhan dag dang mi 'dra ba zhig gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang kha lo sgyur ba la gsungs pa/ kha lo
433b4('dul ba): sgyur ba/ mi rgas/ 'khogs/ gtugs pa/ sgur po/ phyam sgur po ltar kyar kyor can/ mdun nas 'khar ba la brten cing lus 'dar zhing 'gro la/ de'i skra se ba/ ji ltar yang mi gzhan dang mi 'dra ba 'di
433b5('dul ba): ci yin/ lha/ mi 'di ni/ rgas pa zhes bgyi'o/ /kha lo sgyur ba/ rgas pa zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/ lha/ mi 'di ring po mi thogs pa kho nar 'gum par 'gyur bas de ni rgas pa zhes bgyi'o/ /kha lo sgyur ba/
433b6('dul ba): nga yang rga ba'i chos dang / rga ba'i chos nyid las ma 'das sam/ lha yang rga ba'i chos dang / rga ba'i chos nyid las ma 'das so/ /kha lo sgyur ba/ de'i phyir shing rta phyir sgyur cig /pho brang nyid du 'dong ngo /
433b7('dul ba): 'di ltar/ nga pho brang du phyin nas nga rga ba las ma 'das zhes grags pa'i don de nyid bsam par bya'o/ /kha lo sgyur bas shing rta phyir bsgyur nas pho brang nyid du chas te/ der byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub
434a1('dul ba): pa pho brang gi nang du byon nas nga yang rga ba las ma 'das pa lta zhig ces mi dgyes shing thugs ngan dgongs so/ /'dir smras pa/ dar yal rgas shing sgur la mgo
434a2('dul ba): skya ba/ /lag na 'khar ba thogs pa'i mi gzigs nas/ /'di bdag rgas las ma 'das zhes grag ces/ /de nas mi dgyes thugs ngan dgongs par mdzad/ /de nas rgyal po zas gcang gis kha lo
434a3('dul ba): sgyur ba la smras pa/ kha lo sgyur ba/ ci/ gzhon nu yid dga' ba dang mgu bas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir byung ngam/ skyed mos tshal la mngon par dga'am/ lha/ ma lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe
434a4('dul ba): na/ lha/ gzhon nu skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir gshegs pa na/ mi rgas/ 'khogs/ gtugs pa/ sgur po/ phyam sgur po ltar kyar kyor can/ mdun nas 'khar ba la brten cing lus 'dar zhing
434a5('dul ba): mchi la/ de'i skra se ba ji ltar yang mi gzhan dag dang mi 'dra ba zhig gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang bdag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kha lo sgyur ba/ mi rgas/ 'khogs/ gtugs pa/
434a6('dul ba): sgur po/ phyam sgur po ltar kyar kyor can/ mdun nas 'khar ba la brten cing lus 'dar zhing 'gro la/ de'i skra se ba/ ji ltar yang mi gzhan dag dang mi 'dra ba 'di ci yin/ de la bdag gis
434a7('dul ba): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /lha/ 'di ni/ rgas pa zhes bgyi'o/ /de 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /kha lo sgyur ba/ rgas pa zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/ de la bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /lha/ mi
434b1('dul ba): 'di ring po mi thogs pa kho nar 'gum par 'gyur bas/ lha/ de ni/ rgas pa zhes bgyi'o/ /de 'di skad ces gsungs te/ kha lo sgyur ba/ nga yang rga ba'i chos nyid las ma 'das sam/ de la bdag gis 'di skad
434b2('dul ba): ces gsol to/ /lha yang rga ba'i chos dang / rga ba'i chos nyid las ma 'das so/ /de skad ces gsungs te/ kha lo sgyur ba/ de'i phyir shing rta phyir sgyur cig /pho brang nyid du 'dong ngo / /'di lta pho brang du phyin nas
434b3('dul ba): nga rga ba las ma 'das zhes grags pa'i don de nyid bsam par bya'o/ /lha/ gzhon nu de pho brang gi nang du gshegs te/ de nas nga yang rga ba las ma 'das pa lha zhig ces mi dgyes shing thugs ngan dgongs
434b4('dul ba): so/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/ mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan gyi bram ze de rnams kyi tshig yang dag par bden par mi 'gyur grang / gzhon nu skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig
434b5('dul ba): bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar 'gyur du 'ong gi/ ma la bdag gis gzhon nu la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga las phal mo che zhig byin la ci nas kyang 'di la
434b6('dul ba): dga' zhing rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga las phal mo che zhig byin te/ ci nas kyang
434b7('dul ba): 'di la dga' zhing rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar byas so/ /'dir smras pa/ shAkya thub pa'i yab ste zas gtsang des/ /kha lo sgyur las tshig de thos nas ni/ /de tshe dga' nas bdag 'dor mi gzhug
435a1('dul ba): phyir/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga las yang byin no/ /chos nyid kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir gshegs par bzhed par gyur pa de'i tshe kha lo sgyur ba la/
435a2('dul ba): kye kha lo sgyur ba/ re zhig bzhon pa bzang po myur du shoms shig dang / de la nga zhon nas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir 'gro'o/ /zhes gsung bar 'gyur bas/ de nas byang chub sems dpas kha lo
435a3('dul ba): sgyur pa la gsungs pa/ kye kha lo sgyur ba/ re zhig bzhon pa bzang po myur du shoms shig /de la nga zhon nas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir gshegs so/ /lha/ bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes kha lo sgyur bas/
435a4('dul ba): byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa'i ltar mnyan nas bzhon pa bzang po bshams ta byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa la
435a5('dul ba): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /lha/ bcibs pa bzang po bshams lags na/ lha da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa bzhon pa bzang por
435a6('dul ba): zhugs nas skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pas mi skya bo/ rbab rbab po/ rid pa/ nyam chung ba/ dbang po nyams pa/ skye bo mang po'i mig gis
435a7('dul ba): blta mi phod pa zhig gzigs so/ / sarba mang+ga laM// //
435b1('dul ba): empty page
